“Parisi amɨn, awa! Ji amɨn kɨmakbi yopyop tamo mɨktɨmgwan taŋakwa amɨn da dɨma pɨndagek kwenikon bamaŋ akwaŋ ji uŋun yombem.”
Asa uŋun Jeosapat dakon datni. Jeosapat uŋun Jeoram dakon datni. Jeoram uŋun Usia dakon datni.
Aŋakwa Yesu da yagɨt, “Dat, dɨwarɨni wɨrɨrɨk yobi. Yo aŋ uŋun dɨma nandaŋ pɨsaŋek aŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋakwan emat amɨn da ɨmalni namɨn da tɨmɨtjak yaŋ do wasok kɨnda awit.
Ae mɨŋat monjɨyo, ji meŋ datji dakon gen nandaŋek yo morapmon geni guramɨtni. Amɨn Tagɨ da uŋuden aŋpak yolni do galak tosok.
Nak uŋudon egɨp do but dasi madepsi galak tosot. Galak tok morapno kɨsi gak dakon yut do tosok. Gɨptɨm ae nandak nandakno kɨsi da Piŋkop egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ gak do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap yosot.
Uŋun bɨsapmon nak bupmɨsi nandagɨm, aŋek butnokon da yokwisi nandagɨm.
Amɨn kɨŋ ap awit uŋun da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨŋek wunda kwalkwal aŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Ae! Gak Telagɨ Yut Madep tuwɨlek gɨldat kapbɨ da butgwan kaluk ak do yagɨl,
“Yaŋ nayɨŋban yagɨm, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ gak namɨn?’ “Yaŋ yoko Amɨn Tagɨ da yagɨt, ‘Nak Yesu. Nak naŋ aŋupbal ak do pi asal.
Uŋun da aŋ pulugaŋakwan tagɨsi egɨpgum. Tagɨsi nandaŋ namgut do aŋek nak yokwikon naŋ abɨdagɨt.
Mani amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ yosak, “Amɨn dɨwarɨ nandaŋ gadat aŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ aŋpak tagɨ aŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋban kobogɨ yaŋ yokdɨsat, “Gak nandaŋ gadat aŋek aŋpak tagɨyo kɨsi dɨma abi kaŋ, nak niaŋon da gak dakon nandaŋ gadat kokeŋ? Mani, nak dakon aŋpak tagɨ da nandaŋ gadatno golɨkdɨsak.”
Nin amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom dakon aŋpak bamɨsi uŋun nandamaŋ, nido Yesu uŋun nin paŋpulugok do egɨp egɨpni paregek kɨmakgɨt. Ae ninyo kɨsi paŋmuwukbi notnin paŋpulugok do egɨp egɨpnin paregek kɨmotneŋsi.
Moneŋ tabɨlɨ kɨnda aŋobɨŋ ɨba abɨdaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On wup gat ae man mandabi gat uŋun namɨn dakon?” Yaŋban yaŋ yawit, “Sisa dakon.”
Mani Amɨn Tagɨ gen yosok uŋun dɨmasi yapmaŋdak. Uŋun da ji paŋteban aŋek kɨlasi tagɨsi aŋakwan Yokwi Ami da jikon yo kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma asak.
Nak naga dakon man awɨgɨkeŋ kaŋ, nak nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn da yaŋ dɨma yokeŋ, nido nak gen bamɨsi yokeŋ. Mani nak naga dakon man awɨgɨk do dɨma nandɨsat, nido amɨn da mano awɨgɨni do dɨma galak tosot. Uŋun da aŋpakno gat ae gen yogokno gat pɨndagek uŋun da tɨlagonjok mano awɨgɨni kaŋ uŋun tagɨ.
Nin kaloŋ kaloŋ Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨwarɨ do nandaŋek paŋtagap ano amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomni, aŋek aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ yomni. Nin uŋun do nandak nandak aneŋ.
Jap naŋ yɨgakwa Yesu da bret kɨnda abɨdaŋ, Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek, pudaŋ paŋdetni do yomgut. Yomɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Tɨmɨgek noni, on nak dakon gɨptɨm tɨmno.”
Jap gat ae yo morap gat arɨpnikon yomaŋaki tagɨsi ekwaŋ.
Gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek amɨn iyɨ kaloŋ kaloŋ kɨŋ kɨŋ awit. Bɨlakni morapmɨ amɨn da mibɨl taŋek kɨŋakwa bɨlakni kaloŋɨsok amɨn da buŋon kɨwit. Kɨŋ mudaŋakwa Yesu iyɨ gɨn egakwan mɨŋat uŋun ɨŋamnikon akgɨt.
uŋun da aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak. Aŋakwa gɨldat kapbɨ aŋakwan Piŋkop da kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdokdɨsak.” Gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek bupmɨsi nandawit.
Piŋkop dakon gwakni kabɨ ae Sunduk dakon gwakni kabɨ yaŋon da kokwinɨgek nandamaŋ. Amɨn kɨnda aŋpak kɨlegɨ dɨma asak, uŋun Piŋkop dakon monji dɨma. Ae amɨn kɨnda paŋmuwukbi notni do but dasi dɨma galak taŋ yomɨsak, uŋun Piŋkop dakon monji dɨma.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yo amɨn but nandak nandagon da wɨŋ waŋga kwaŋ uŋun da amɨn dakon but paŋupbal aŋ.
Yaŋ aba pi ami da aeni oman monjɨ kɨnda yabekdak. Uŋun pi monjɨ busuŋɨkon aŋagek yo yokwisi aŋɨmgwit.
Dabɨlgo amɨn tet da yokwikon gepban kaŋ, pɨlɨk mabɨ kɨsak. Gɨptɨm dɨwatgo kɨnda pasɨljak kaŋ, uŋun da yo madep dɨma asak. Mani gɨptɨmgo kɨsi kaloŋ maba Tɨpdomon pɨgɨsak kaŋ, uŋun da jɨgɨsi.
Butjɨk morapno uŋun si pap tosok, do wɨrɨrɨk namɨŋaki yaworɨ egɨpbeŋ. Aŋpulugaŋaki jɨgɨ da dɨma abɨŋ nepni.
Yaŋban datni da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Monjɨno, bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ gak nak gat ekwamak. Ae yo morapno uŋun gak dakon gɨn.
Ji nin da telagɨ paŋmuwukbi Jerusalem ekwaŋ uŋun do paret paŋmuwukgamaŋ uŋun dakon geni kɨlɨ nandawit, do gen dubagɨ dɨma mandakeŋ.
Uŋun do iyɨŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Niaŋ nandaŋ? Galili amɨn kɨmakgwit uŋun dakon yokwini da Galili amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon yokwini yapgut, uŋun do aŋek jɨgɨ uŋun pawit yaŋ nandaŋ?
Uwalno da madepsi teban taŋakwa nak da arɨpmɨ dɨmasi pabɨŋ yopmɨ, mani Yawe da nak uŋun da kɨsiron baŋ abɨdagɨt.
Amɨn da wit mibɨltok paŋ uŋun baŋ dɨwarɨ tɨmɨgek bret wasaŋek Piŋkop do paret aŋ. Yaŋ aba bret dɨwarɨ kɨsi telagɨ gɨn aŋ mudoŋ. Ae kɨndap dakon gelɨ uŋun telagɨ kaŋ, kɨlɨŋɨ yo kɨsi telagɨ gɨn.
Yesu uŋun Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon burɨ kɨnda paret yopgwit uŋudon egek amɨn yoyɨŋ degek gen uŋun yagɨt. Mani bɨsapni dɨma agɨt, do amɨn kɨnda da dɨma abɨdagɨt.
Amɨn tɨmtɨm yaŋek piŋkop ŋwakŋwarɨkon kwaŋ uŋun jɨgɨ morapmɨ pakdaŋ. Nak paret ak do bɨt kɨlapyo dakon yawi tagal do uŋun gat dɨma muwutneŋ, ae piŋkopni dakon man dɨma yokeŋ.
Mani yopmaŋ kɨk do aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da ji do aeno opbeŋ do nandɨsagon don opbeŋ.” Yaŋ yoyɨŋek tap wakgakon wɨgek Epesas yɨpmaŋek kɨgɨt.
Ji but tobɨl bamɨsi aŋek aŋpakjikon but tobɨl dakon bamɨ aŋalon ani. Ji dɨsi do ‘Nin Abraham dakon babɨkni’ yaŋ dɨma yoni. Nak yaŋsi dayɨsat, Piŋkop da yaŋban on tɨp kabɨ da Abraham dakon babɨkni tagɨ dagoni. Ji uŋun Abrahamon da altawit uŋun da yo madep dɨma asak.
Not kabɨ, mɨktɨm amɨn da nandaba yokwi tok aŋdamni kaŋ, dɨma wurɨpdatni.
Nin ɨdon muwuk but kaloŋ aŋek amɨn bamot ji do kɨni do manjɨgɨmaŋ. Manjɨŋ yopno notnin bamot galagɨsi nandaŋ yomamaŋ Pol ae Banabas uŋun gat kɨni do yaŋ yomgumaŋ.
Ji Piŋkop dakon gen guramɨk kɨmokgoŋ dakon geni amɨn kɨsi da kɨlɨ nandawit, do nak ji do but galaksi nandɨsat. Mani nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi aŋek aŋpak tagɨsi baŋgɨn tɨmɨgek aŋpak yokwi dakon nandak nandak jikon kɨnda dɨma tosak do nandɨsat.
“Nak yutnon dɨma kɨkeŋ, ae dɨpmɨn potpot tamokon dɨma pokgeŋ.
Piŋkop da Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ don tɨmɨtdɨsak dakon geni uŋun kombɨ amɨn da kalɨpsigwan kɨlɨ yawit. Gen uŋun yaŋ tosok:
Gɨldarɨ ae kalbiyo amɨn da yaŋ yoŋ, “Piŋkopgo dukon egɨsak?” Yaŋ nayaŋ, do bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ kunam tagegɨsat. Gɨldarɨ ae kalbiyo kunam baŋ japmɨ do naŋegɨsat.
Joŋ bɨt da abɨŋ paŋupbal aŋ, ae joŋ kɨlap da noŋ.
Wɨgɨ jap noknok tamokon yɨgek bret abɨdaŋ Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek bret pudaŋek yomgut.
Wɨli ji dɨsi dakon gɨptɨm do galak toŋ, yaŋ gɨn mɨŋatji but dasi galak taŋ yomni. Amɨn kɨnda mɨŋatni do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsak, uŋun amɨn da iyɨ do yaŋ gɨn nandɨsak.
Amɨn da butni pɨdaŋban but morap aŋek yaŋ nandawit, “Jon uŋun Kristo bo?”
Mɨrɨm uŋun galaktokni yolek dukwan dukwan tagɨni kɨsak. Wuwɨgɨ nandamaŋ mani dukwan da abɨsak ae dukwan kɨsak uŋun dɨma kaŋ pɨsomaŋ. Amɨn morap Wupmon da altoŋ uŋun yaŋ gɨn.”
Mani Yawe da toktok teban mɨŋat amɨnyo pasal ɨmɨŋek ekwaŋ uŋun do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak. Ae babɨk don altoni uŋun do aŋpak kɨlegɨsi aŋ yomdɨsak.
Nak but yokwi dakon ɨmal pasat bɨsapmon, amɨn da manji gen yaŋ namaŋ.
Mani mɨŋat pagɨt amɨn on mɨktɨm dakon yo do nandaba kɨk asak, ae mɨŋatni dakon galaktok yol do nandɨsak,
Uŋun nandaŋek kokup kɨnda mani Nasaret, Galili mɨktɨmon tosok, uŋudon paŋkɨ egɨpgwit. Yaŋ aba kombɨ amɨn dakon gen bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Nasaret amɨn yaŋ iyɨni.”
Nin Telagɨ Wup kɨlɨ abɨdagɨmaŋ, do nandamaŋ, Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni do yo tagɨsi morap dɨwarɨ yom do yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun gat kɨsi yomdɨsak. Nin Piŋkop da tɨmɨkban iyɨ gat kɨsi egɨpneŋ bɨsapmon yo uŋun tɨmɨtdamaŋ. Aŋek nin Piŋkop dakon tɨlɨm madepni do nandaŋek mani aŋkɨsɨkdamaŋ.
Uŋun iyɨ dakon tomno dabɨlni kosok, mani kɨŋek tomno dabɨlni uŋun niaŋen uŋun tepmɨsi ɨŋtosok.
Pol da uŋun kaŋek Piŋkop da iyɨ Gen Bin Tagɨsi kɨŋ yoyɨneŋ do yaŋ nimɨsak yaŋ nandaŋek uŋudon gɨn Masadonia kɨk do tagap tagɨmaŋ.
Uŋun dɨmasi! Nin kɨmakbi yombem do yokwi dakon yaŋ ɨlɨt arɨpmɨ dɨma nandaŋek yolyolɨ. Do niaŋon da yokwi sigɨn aneŋ?
Yo uŋun kosirɨ kapbɨ altaŋ namɨŋek uŋudon gɨn aeni Kwen Kokup wɨgɨgɨt.
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gak Piŋkop da but galak yo amɨn do ɨsal yomɨsak uŋun nandɨsal tam, ae namɨn da pakbi nabɨ noko yaŋ gayɨk uŋun nandɨsal tam, iyɨŋbɨ uŋun amɨn da pakbi egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ tagɨ gaban.”
Gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn madep da Pol da gen yosak do kɨsit tɨlak aŋ ɨban Pol da yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak nandɨsat, bɨlak morapmɨ gak on amɨn kabɨ dakon gen kokwin kɨla agak amɨni egɨpgul. Do gen yaŋ nameŋ dakon kobogɨ gayɨk do tagɨsi nandɨsat.
Nandaŋ yawotni uŋun wagɨl tugok tugogɨsi. Kristo nin ae yumaŋ nip do kɨlɨ kɨmakgɨt, ae yawini baŋ Piŋkop da yokwinin kɨsisi wɨrɨrɨk nimgut.
Yolɨŋban pɨndagek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madep awit, mani but morap nandaŋek nandaba bamɨ dɨma agɨt. Yaŋ nandaŋakwa yoyɨgɨt, “Jikon jap dɨ toŋ?”
Asi, gak gen teban guramɨkgi kaŋ, gɨptɨm mandak aŋpak uŋun da aŋpak tagɨsi asak. Mani gen teban kɨrɨŋɨtdal kaŋ, gak gɨptɨmgo dɨma mandabi Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ yombem dagosol.
Asi, gen yogokno tagɨsi dɨma, mani nandak nandakno uŋun tagɨsi. Uŋun nandak nandakno aŋpak morap agɨmaŋon kɨlɨ dolɨgɨmaŋ.
“Amɨn kɨnda uŋun jap yetni pigaga paŋkɨ tɨŋtɨŋagɨt. Tɨŋtɨŋaŋakwan jap yet dɨwarɨ kosiron maŋba amɨn da bamaŋakwa mɨnam da abɨŋ si nawit.
Mani Kristo dakon yawi da uŋun yapmaŋdak. Kristo uŋun gulusuŋ kɨnda agɨt dakon dɨwarɨni kɨnda dɨmasi taŋ ɨmgut. Ae Wup egɨp egɨp teban egɨsak uŋun da tapmɨmon iyɨ dakon egɨp egɨpni naŋ paret agɨt, do yawini gɨptɨmnin baŋgɨn paŋmɨlɨp aban gwaljɨgɨ mɨni dɨma amaŋ. Mani uŋun aŋpaknin yokwi morap nin kɨmoron paŋkwaŋ uŋun dakon dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨkban pasɨlakwa nin Piŋkop da dabɨlon gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi ekwamaŋ yaŋsi nandamaŋ. Do nin Piŋkop egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ dakon pi tagɨ aneŋ.
Nido Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun amɨn pasɨlbi yokwikon baŋ wɨsɨŋek tɨmɨt do pɨgɨt.”
Mani Piŋkop da iyɨ dakon gobɨŋ baŋ yamaŋ yomdɨsak. Aŋakwan uŋudon gɨn wuda madepsi noman tokdaŋ.
Yo uŋun dɨma altaŋakwa gen uŋun kɨlɨ dayɨt. Do don yo uŋun bamɨ noman taŋakwa yaŋsi nandaŋ gadani, Nak Naga Uŋun Amɨn.
Bɨsit yaŋ agɨm, “Yawe, top amɨn da nak aŋkewalni yaŋ do nak pulugaŋ nepbi.”
Yawe, gak tapmɨmgo madepsi. Tapmɨmgo pɨdaŋbisi.
Uŋun kokup papmon amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut uŋun mani Saimon. Uŋun koŋ da tapmɨm ɨmɨŋakwa wasok amɨn da dɨma agagɨ morapmɨ kɨlɨsok aban Samaria mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi da kaŋek but morap nandaŋ ɨmgwit. Uŋun amɨn da iyɨ do nak kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda yaŋ yagɨt.
Pita da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, tɨlak gen yal uŋun nin dogɨn yal, bo ae amɨn kɨsi do yal?”
Amɨn kɨnda da ji but dasi dɨma tɨmɨtjak bo ae genji nandak do kurak tosak kaŋ, yut kokupyoni yɨpmaŋ degek kandap jikon kɨmbabaŋ tegoni uŋun tɨdaŋba kɨni.
Nin nandamaŋ, Piŋkop da yo morap kɨsikon pi aban uŋun yo morap da amɨn morap iyɨ do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun da paŋpulugok madepsi tɨmɨkgaŋ. Uŋun amɨn Piŋkop da galaktokni yolni do aŋek yaŋ yomgut.
Iyɨ do nandaba wɨkwaŋ amɨn da yaŋsul yokwisi aŋ namaŋ. Mani nawa gengo do manji dɨma yomɨsat.
“Nak Daron kɨŋek ji gen pikon depdɨsat yaŋ dɨma nandani. Moses da ji paŋpulugosak yaŋ nandaŋ teban toŋ, mani dɨma. Moses da iyɨ gen pikon depdɨsak.
Uŋun nin mani. Uŋun da nin Juda amɨn ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da kabɨkon baŋ manjɨŋ nipgut.
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Piŋkop dakon gen teban yɨpmaŋek babɨkji dakon gen paŋteban aŋek uŋun baŋ paŋ ekwaŋ. Uŋun tagɨ dɨma.
Yawe, nak gen kɨnda yok do asat uŋun gak da kɨlɨ nandagɨl.
Yesu nandaban jɨgɨ madepsi aŋakwan bɨsit tebai sigɨn agɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan kɨŋkɨŋni yawi da yaŋ mɨktɨmon mawit.
Gen teban dakon pi uŋun nin gen pikon nipmaŋek pasɨlneŋ do yosok. Mani uŋun teŋteŋɨ madepni gat apgut, do nin nandamaŋ, Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlek tok dakon pi uŋun dakon tɨlɨmni uŋun wagɨl madepsi daman.
Nido ji amɨn kɨlɨ kɨmakgwit yombem. Ji Piŋkopmon gadaŋek egɨp egɨpji bamɨsi uŋun Kristokon pasɨlɨ tosok.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ da si kɨmot do aŋ, nak uŋun yombem. Tapmɨmno kɨsisi mudaŋ.
Tap da tagaŋ wɨŋek ɨleŋon mɨktɨm wɨtjisak ae pakbi tek maŋakwa wɨwɨk madep asak, uŋudeŋ gɨn jɨgɨ morapmɨ da wɨtjɨŋ namɨŋakwa yokwisi nandɨsat.
“Mani amɨn kɨsisi dɨma op do yawit. Kɨnda da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak pi kɨnda kaluk yumɨt uŋun kɨŋ kokeŋ. Do nandaŋ namɨŋaki dɨma opbeŋ.’
Yesu uŋudon da muwut muwut yutni kɨndakon wɨgek
Mɨŋat uŋun ɨŋamnikon mani mandawit. Mani uŋun tɨlak gen yombem kɨnda. Mani uŋun yaŋ: “Kokup Pap Madep Babilon, uŋun Yumabi Mɨŋat Morap gat, ae Aŋpak Yokwisi Mɨktɨmon Tosok uŋun dakon Meŋi.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Korasin ae Betsaida kokupmon amɨn, awa! Nak wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ abo pɨndagek ji but tobɨl dɨma awit. Tair ae Saidon kokupmon amɨn da pɨndakgwit tam, but tobɨl bamɨsi abam. Aŋek bupmɨ dakon yɨk ɨmalyo paŋek abɨlagon yɨkbam.
Yo morap gwɨlɨgwan toŋ uŋun altaŋ teŋteŋaŋ mudokdaŋ. Ae yo morap pasɨlɨ toŋ uŋun amɨn da nandaba pɨsokdaŋ.
Piŋkop da nin do yaŋsi agɨt, do Piŋkop gen papia da yosok uŋun da arɨpmon aneŋ. Yaŋ yosok: “Amɨn kɨnda yo kɨnda do yo madepsi yaŋ nandak do kaŋ, Amɨn Tagɨ dogɨn yo madepsi yaŋ nandaŋ ɨmdo.”
Yaŋban iyɨ gɨn notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Kobogɨ ni gen kɨnda naŋ iyɨneŋ? ‘Piŋkop da yabekgɨt’ yaŋ iyɨneŋ kaŋ, gen tebai yaŋ niyɨsak, ‘Ji nido dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit?’
Aŋakwa Yesu abɨŋ Ɨleŋ Olip dakon kosit obandom naŋ pukwaŋ uŋun aŋkapmat aŋakwan paŋdet kabɨni madepsi da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ morap aban pɨndakgwit uŋun do nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi awit. Yaŋ aŋek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiwit.
Gen on ji paŋmayak ak do dayɨsat. Paŋmuwukbi jikon amɨn bamorɨkon geni toŋ bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi aŋek paŋmɨlɨp asak dakon amɨn kɨnda dɨma egɨsak, ma?
Jɨgɨ bɨsapmon nak Amɨn Tagɨ do bɨsit asat. Kalbi bɨsit aŋ ɨmɨsat, mani but yawot dɨma abɨdosot.
Amɨn kɨnda Yesukon kaluk saŋbesak uŋun da kɨla amɨn pi dɨma asak. Uŋun iyɨ do nak amɨn madep kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋek kwen wɨgɨk aban Piŋkop da Sunduk gen pikon yɨpgut, yaŋ gɨn gen pikon dɨ yɨpban.
Gak bɨt kɨlapyo bo wain noki, bo ae yo dɨwarɨ gat aŋapbo notno mosak yaŋ nandɨsal kaŋ, uŋun aŋpak dɨma abi.
Amɨn kɨnda Yesu Kristokon egɨsak kaŋ, gɨptɨmni mandɨsak bo dɨma mandɨsak uŋun kɨsi yo ɨsalɨ. Mani amɨn kɨnda nandaŋ gadat aŋek uŋun da aŋtagap aban amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak uŋun da yo bamɨsi.
Amɨn kɨlegɨ uŋun silbat da yaŋ madepsi tagaŋek bamɨ tokdaŋ. Sida kɨndap Lebanon mɨktɨmon toŋ uŋun da tɨlak tagokdaŋ.
Yaŋ tɨdaŋbal amɨn kabɨ madepsi da dɨma yaŋ tɨdonjil do yaŋsop aŋyomgwit. Mani madepsi sigɨn yaŋ tɨdaŋek yagɨmal, “Amɨn Tagɨ, Dewit Dakon Monji, bupmɨ nandaŋ nim!”
Kɨla amɨn madep tapmɨmɨ toŋ gak aŋpak kɨlegɨsi uŋun do galagɨsi nandɨsal. Gak da Israel amɨn nin do aŋpak tagɨsi gat ae aŋpak kɨlegɨ gat nibɨ yolgamaŋ. Gak da Israel mɨktɨmon gen kokwin kɨlegɨ gat ae aŋpak kɨlegɨ gat asal.
Amɨn morapmɨ da pi amaŋ uŋun do toktogɨsi uwal aŋ nimɨŋek nindapba kɨmotneŋ do aŋ. Do amɨn kɨmoron da dɨma pɨdoni tam, nin mibɨlɨ nido uŋun pi amaŋ?
Mɨktɨmon egɨpbeŋ bɨsap morapmon kɨlano tagɨsi aŋek but dasi galak taŋ namɨŋ wɨgɨkdɨsal. Ae bɨsap mudok mudogɨ mɨni yutgokon egɨ wɨgɨkeŋ.
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda but dasi galak taŋ namjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da nak dakon gen guramɨtjak. Datno da uŋun amɨn but dasi galak taŋ ɨmjak. Aŋakwan nit op do uŋun amɨn gat egɨpneŋ.
Mani bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ but dasi galak taŋ namɨsal yaŋsi nandako dagosok. Ae jɨgɨkon baŋ aŋpulugosol, do gak do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk abeŋ. Yawe da nak do yo tagɨsi agɨt, do mani awɨgek kap yokeŋ.
Mani amɨn kabisok kɨnda Sadis ekwaŋ uŋun ɨmalni dakon kɨla aŋek garak dɨma awit. Uŋun amɨn kabɨ dakon aŋpakni kɨlegɨsi, do ɨmal kwakwagɨ paba nak gat tagɨ agɨpneŋ.
Timoti yabetdo jikon opgut. Timoti notnin uŋun Piŋkop dakon oman amɨn, uŋun Kristo dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋosok. Ji paŋteban aŋek nandaŋ gadatji paŋpulugosak do yabekgɨmak.
Pilip uŋun kɨŋ Nataniel kaŋ kwaŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Moses da gen teban papiakon amɨn kɨnda do gen mandagɨt, ae kombɨ amɨn da gen mandawit, uŋun amɨn kɨlɨ kaŋ kwamaŋ. Uŋun Yesu, Nasaret kokupmon amɨn, Josep dakon monji.”
pɨdaŋ Yesu yolba kokup da waŋga pɨgɨgɨt. Kokup uŋun ɨleŋon tagɨt, do tɨpdomon maba pɨgɨsak do aŋkɨwit.
Gɨldatno tagɨ Erodion do ɨmni. Uŋun nak dakon dɨwatno kɨnda. Gɨldatno tagɨ Nasisus dakon dɨwatni Amɨn Tagɨ da kabɨkon ekwaŋ uŋun do yomni.
Uŋun da yumabi aŋpak awit uŋudeŋ dɨma aneŋ. Uŋun da yaŋ aba gɨldat kaloŋ dogɨn amɨn 23 tausen da kɨmakgwit.
Nak mayagɨ nandaŋek yaŋ dayɨsat, nin jikon aŋpak uŋuden aneŋ dakon tapmɨmnin mɨni. Mani amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon man awɨgɨsak kaŋ, nagayo kɨsi mano awɨgɨkeŋ gɨn. (Nak nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn da yaŋ yosot.)
Amɨn bamot uŋun kɨŋ Yesu altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn da yaŋ gayɨk do aŋek nit yabekban abamak, ‘Gak Piŋkop da amɨn yabet do yagɨt uŋun, bo nin amɨn kɨnda don apdɨsak do jomjom aneŋ?’ ”
Uŋun bɨsapmon Maria tepmɨ kɨŋek mɨktɨm ɨleŋɨ toŋ tɨmon Judia mɨktɨm dakon kokup pap kɨndakon kɨgɨt.
Ae amɨn kɨnda da yo kɨnda ɨbi do gayɨsak kaŋ, ɨbi. Ae amɨn kɨnda da gagon goman ak do gayɨŋban kaŋ, manji dɨma ɨbi.”
Uŋun gɨptɨm dakon yo do wadaŋ amɨn uŋun dakon bɨsitni nandaŋ yomdɨsak. Bɨsit aba saŋbeŋek manji dɨma yomdɨsak.
Yawe, wɨsa dagokdo morap gak do bɨsit asat. Wɨsa dagokdo gak do bɨsit tebaisi asat. Bɨsitno dakon kobogɨ nabi do jomjom asat.
Nandaŋ gadat dɨma aŋ amɨn gat gadat gadaron da pi dɨma ani. Aŋpak tagɨ gat aŋpak yokwi gat tagɨ paŋmuwutneŋ? Bo teŋteŋɨ gat pɨlɨn tuk gat tagɨ paŋmuwutneŋ?
Yaŋ do aŋek Piŋkop da Abraham dakon nandaŋ gadatni kaŋek “amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt.”
Nak tagaŋ amɨn madep egapbo Yawe da tapmɨmno aŋupbal aŋek bɨsapno aŋpɨsɨp agɨt.
Yesu yaŋsi nandagɨt, Dat da yo morap kɨla abeŋ do tapmɨm namgut yaŋ nandagɨt. Ae Piŋkopmon da apgum, do ae Piŋkopmon tobɨl kɨkdɨsat yaŋ kɨsi nandagɨt.
Amɨn morap gulusuŋ aŋ, uŋun gulusuŋni dakon tomni tɨmɨtdaŋ. Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨn morap dakon aŋpak kokwin ak do arɨp gɨn asak.
Yaŋban Yesu da nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “O mɨŋat, nandaŋ gadatgo uŋun wukwisi. Yo nido yal uŋun yaŋ gɨn altaŋ gamdɨsak.” Yaŋ iyɨŋakwan uŋudon gɨn gwi kɨlek tagɨt.
Mɨŋat monjɨyono, abɨsok mibɨ bɨsapmon ekwamaŋ. Kristo dakon uwal uŋun apdɨsak dakon geni kɨlɨ nandawit. Abɨsok uwalni morapmɨ kɨlɨ noman taŋ, do nin mibɨ bɨsapmon ekwamaŋ yaŋ nandamaŋ.
Yesu uŋun mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi yoyɨŋban kɨŋakwa iyɨ boron wɨgek Magadan tet do kɨgɨt.
Aba donki bɨlagɨ uŋun wɨtdalakwal donki uŋun dakon ami da yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Donki bɨlagɨ uŋun nido wɨtdalgamal?”
Kundu da aŋpakni kɨlegɨ do yaŋ teŋteŋok aŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn morapyo da tɨlɨmni koŋ.
Mani jap niaŋen dɨ baŋ nomaŋ uŋun da nin Piŋkop da kapmatjok arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋkɨsak. Jap uŋun dɨma noneŋ kaŋ, Piŋkop da dabɨlon uŋun gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma asak. Ae jap uŋun noneŋ kaŋ, Piŋkop da dabɨlon dɨma kɨlek toneŋ.
Yesu da gen yagɨt uŋun da yaŋ nolɨsak. Bɨsap morap on bret gat ae wain on kapmon noni bɨsapmon Amɨn Tagɨ dakon kɨmot do yaŋ teŋteŋaŋakwa wɨgɨ ae apjak bɨsapmon wɨgɨsak.
don uwalgo kandap mibɨlgogwan yopbo gengo guramɨtdaŋ.” ’
Yaŋ aban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Not, yo ak do nandaŋek abɨl uŋun abi.” Yaŋ iyɨŋban emat amɨn da Yesu tebai abɨdawit.
Yaŋdo, ji abɨsok aŋ, yaŋ gɨn notji paŋpulugaŋek butni paŋteban aŋ aŋ ani.
Not, gak Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo morap but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ kɨmagek butni paŋteban asal. Yaŋ aŋaki uŋun da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi namɨŋakwan butno yaworɨsi tosok.
Aŋek Telagɨ Wup da amɨn kɨsi morap burɨkon pɨgɨ tugagɨt. Aŋek Wup da paŋpulugaŋban wasaŋek gen mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yawit.
Piŋkop dakon monjɨ gwayoni uŋun gɨptɨm ae yawiniyo toŋ, uŋun amɨnsi gɨn, do Yesu uŋun kɨsi amɨn dagagɨt. Aŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨmot yomɨsak dakon tapmɨm taŋ ɨmɨsak amɨn Sunduk, uŋun aŋupbal ak do aŋek kɨmakgɨt.
Kɨla Amɨn Madepno ae Piŋkopno, aŋpulugoki do bɨsit asat, do yaŋ ɨlɨtno nandaŋ nabi.
Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn monɨŋ kɨnda yokwi asak do yabetjak kaŋ, uŋun dakon kobogɨ yokwisi. Yabet dɨma aŋakwan amɨn da wit mɨsɨŋɨt tɨp madep tegɨkon wamaŋ maba tap ɨlarɨgwan pɨgek kɨmotjak kaŋ uŋun da tagapmɨ.
“Yaŋba Amɨn Madep da yaŋ yoyɨsak, ‘Asisi dayɨsat, yo morap notno kɨnda mani mɨni do awit uŋun yo morap nak do awit.’
Nak Telagɨ Yut Madepmon kɨk do aŋek mibɨltok kɨlektok dakon sɨlɨp yolek don kɨgɨm. Telagɨ Yut Madepmon kɨlɨ kɨlek tagɨm da egapbo nandawit. Nin amɨn kaloŋɨsok da upbalapmɨ mɨni egɨpgumaŋ.
Ji bɨt kɨlapyo kokup kɨdat do dapmaŋ paret aŋ uŋun dɨma noni. Ae yawi dɨma noni. Ae si tɨpba kwoŋ uŋunyo kɨsi dɨma noni. Aŋek mɨŋat wɨliyo yumabi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ dɨma ani. Ji kaŋ kɨmagek uŋun aŋpak morap yapni kaŋ uŋun tagɨsi. Nin dakon gen yaŋ gɨn. Do ji tagɨsi egɨpni.”
Yaŋdo, amɨn kɨnda gapman dakon pi amɨn dakon gen pabɨŋ yopmaŋdak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop da amɨn manjɨŋek pikon yopgut uŋun baŋ kwen wɨgɨk aŋ yomɨsak. Yaŋ ani amɨn kwen wɨgɨk awit dakon kobogɨ do yo yokwisi tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Jɨgɨ amɨn dɨwarɨ da paŋ uŋudeŋ dɨma paŋ. Amɨn dɨwarɨ jɨgɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ paŋ, mani yo uŋuden dɨ dɨma noman taŋ yomaŋ.
Agripa da Pol yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Bɨkbɨk gabo gaga do gen ya.” Iyɨŋban mɨrak yopni do Pol kɨsirɨ aŋenagek iyɨ kutnok do gen yaŋ yagɨt,
Juda mɨktɨmon amɨn da Piŋkop pakyaŋsi nandaŋ ɨmaŋ. Israel mɨktɨmon mani wukwisi tosok.
Dabɨlnikon gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi egɨpgum, do Yawe da aŋpakno kɨlegɨ uŋun do nandaŋek kobogɨ do aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ namgut.
Pakyaŋsi nandaki. Abraham dakon nandaŋ gadat gat ae aŋpakni tagɨ uŋun kaloŋɨ gadagɨmal, aŋakwan uŋun aŋpak tagɨ da nandaŋ gadatni arɨpmɨsi agɨt.
Nido Piŋkop gen uŋun egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ, ae tapmɨmni madep. Geni uŋun tepmɨsi, ae emat agak sɨba geni terɨ terɨ toŋ uŋun yapmaŋdak. Gen uŋun da amɨn yaban mɨkgwansi pɨgɨsak. Pɨgek amɨn gat ae wup gat yamaŋ pɨdosok, ae kɨdat dakon saŋbek gat ae wuk gat kɨsi yamaŋ pɨdosok, do nin dakon nandak nandak gat ae butnin dakon galaktok morap gat uŋun pakyaŋsi nandaŋ mudosok.
Yesu uŋun nandaŋek Jairus yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Dɨma pasolgi. Ɨsal nandaŋ gadat gɨn aŋaki gwago kɨlek tosak.”
Ae Piŋkop da namɨn do bɨlak 40 da arɨp butjap nandaŋ yomgut? Mɨŋat amɨnyo yokwi aŋek kɨmakgwit aŋakwa gɨptɨmni mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ mɨktɨmon tawit amɨn uŋun do butjap nandagɨt.
Nak dakon gen guramɨgek jɨgɨ altaŋ gamgwit bɨsapmon butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan tebaisi akgɨl. Yaŋ agɨl do jɨgɨ madep mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn paŋkewal do noman tokdɨsak bɨsapmon kɨlago aŋapbo jɨgɨ uŋun dɨma altaŋ gamjak.
Kɨŋakwan Yesu da paŋdetni pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yoni morapmɨ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan pɨgɨk do aŋtɨdok aŋ.”
Yo morap altokdaŋ dakon bɨsap ji dɨma nandaŋ, do kaŋ kɨmagek egɨpni.”
Pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nandaŋ gadat awit bɨsapmon Telagɨ Wup abɨdawit bo dɨma?” Yaŋ yoyɨŋban yawit, “Dɨma, nin Telagɨ Wup kɨnda egɨsak yaŋ dɨma nandagɨmaŋ.”
Amɨn kɨlegɨ ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk nandaŋek Yawe aŋkɨsini. Uŋun aŋpak uŋun ji da agagɨsi.
Gen kɨnda saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Namɨn da lam koleŋek kwoba naŋ gap asak, bo pɨgat kagagwan yɨpjak? Dɨmasi, tamonikon yɨpno teŋteŋosok.
Sonda pɨlɨn kaga paŋdetni Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn do pasalek yut kɨndakon muwugek yoma beŋgan aŋek yɨkgwit. Yɨgakwa Yesu da abɨŋ bɨkbɨk nikon agek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Butji yaworɨ tosak.”
Mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨkon egek burɨkon da jap dogɨn madepsi nandaŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨlɨkgwit.
Aŋakwan Parisi amɨn morapmɨ gat Sadyusi amɨn morapmɨ gat telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomjak do Jonon apgwit. Apba pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ dakon gwakni kabɨ, Piŋkop da butjap nandaŋek yokwi pakpak do yo yokwisi aŋ yomdɨsak. Piŋkop dakon butjap apdɨsak namɨn da uŋun dakon but pɨso dayɨk da uŋun yap do pasal kwaŋ?
Nido kɨla amɨn madep da mɨŋat tagɨsi yaŋ gandaŋek but dasi galak taŋ gamɨsak. Uŋun amɨn tagɨgo, do man madep ɨmɨŋ kɨmokgi.
Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨŋat amɨnyo da pasol pasol madepsi aŋakwa on mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn madep gat mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyoni gat obɨsi tasɨk toŋ. Piŋkop da gen pap yaŋakwan mɨktɨm pakbi dagoŋ.
Piŋkop da yaŋ yosok, “Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨno nak gat saŋbek saŋbek aŋek uŋun aŋteban ak do mukwa sowit ji nagon apba muwutneŋ.”
Amɨn kɨsisi mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ tɨlɨmni gat ae yo masɨ masɨmɨsi asak uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ yomni.
“Kabɨt. Uŋun amɨn Piŋkop da aŋpulugaŋek aŋteban asak do dɨma nandagɨt. Uŋun moneŋ yo morapni do nandaŋ gadagɨt, aŋek aŋpak yokwi da aŋpulugaŋakwa tagɨsi egɨpbeŋ yaŋ nandagɨt.”
Ae uŋun da kwenon amɨn morapmɨsi pɨndakgɨm, uŋun manjɨrɨ mɨni. Amɨn uŋun amɨn kabi kabi egɨ egɨ aŋ uŋun morap kɨsi dakon. Ae mɨktɨm morap kɨsi, ae gɨptɨm mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, ae gen mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ uŋun kɨsi kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamo, ae Sipsip Monjɨ da ɨŋamon akgwit. Uŋun ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk kwakwagɨsi ae dubagɨ baŋ pawit. Ae kɨsirɨkon jopbaŋ tam baŋ tɨmɨkgwit.
Nak dat kɨnda da monjɨ yoyɨsak uŋun da tɨlak yaŋ dayɨsat, ji nin do but dasi galaktaŋ nimni.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt ae iyɨk do si pasalgwit.
Yo morap yaŋ agɨt, nido kalɨp Abraham oman amɨni do yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun do sigɨn nandagɨt.
Yawe, gak Saŋbek Saŋbek Kɨnamgo gat kɨsi abɨŋek yɨk yawot yutgokon yɨkgi. Saŋbek Saŋbek Kɨnam uŋun gak dakon tapmɨm madepgo dakon tɨlak asak.
Nak da mɨktɨmni abo tap ɨdap Mediterenian uŋudon da wasaŋek kɨŋ pakbi madep Yupretis da arɨpmon kɨkdɨsak.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, bɨsap kɨnda apdɨsak, ae kɨlɨ abɨk, uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn kɨmakbi Piŋkop Monji dakon gen nandaŋek egɨp egɨp abɨdokdaŋ.
Mibɨltok abeŋ amɨn uŋun moneŋ 1 danari tɨmɨgek pi uŋun dakon ami do nandaba yokwi taŋban
Yesu da saŋbeŋek tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da wain pini aŋek amɨn da moneŋ pini dɨ aŋek pi ami do bamɨ dɨ paŋ ɨmni yaŋ nandaŋek pi uŋun da kɨsiron yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨm tɨmɨ dɨgwan bɨsap dubagɨ egɨp do kɨgɨt.
Kɨsisi waŋga kɨŋ mudaŋakwa sipsip kɨla amɨn da mibɨltaŋ yoban tegɨ nandaŋ ɨmaŋ, do buŋon yol aŋaŋ kwaŋ.
Nak naga kalɨp Piŋkop da ɨŋamon amɨn kɨlegɨsi egɨpbeŋ do amɨn dɨwarɨ yapmaŋek pi madepsi agɨm. Do man madep pak do nandɨsat kaŋ tagɨ pakeŋ.
Not kabɨ, nak ji dakon but paŋteban ak do gen on mandaŋ damɨsat uŋun do mɨrak pakyaŋsi yopni, nido gen on mandɨsat uŋun dubagɨsi dɨma.
Ji Kristo do nandaba wukwan ɨmɨŋek notji gawak yomɨŋ yomɨŋ aŋek egɨpni.
Yesukon altaŋek ɨmalni ɨlɨk donki bɨlagɨ da kwenon yopmaŋakwal Yesu pawɨgɨ uŋudon yɨkgɨt.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban mɨŋat bamot uŋun pasalgɨmal, mani kɨsɨk kɨsɨk nandaŋek tɨmtɨm yaŋek paŋdet kabɨni gen uŋun yoyɨk do kɨgɨmal.
Yawe, aŋpulugoki do bɨsit gayɨsat.
Nandani. Gɨptɨm mandak do teban teban aŋ amɨn uŋun amɨn dɨwarɨkon man madep pak do aŋek aŋ. Uŋun pasalek yaŋ nandaŋ, “Amɨn dɨwarɨ da nin Kristo dakon tɨlak kɨndap do nandaŋ gadamaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ nimni kaŋ, yo yokwi aŋ nimdaŋ.”
Iyɨŋban Pailat da emat amɨn 100 dakon kɨla amɨn yaŋ ɨban opban iyɨgɨt, “Asi Yesu kuŋwak, bo dɨma?”
Mani Juda amɨn dɨwarɨ dɨma nandaŋ gadawit uŋun da Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ dakon but sugawit. Sugaŋba nandaŋ gadat awit mɨŋat amɨn do nandaba yokwi tok aŋyomgwit.
Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu Genesaret Pakbi Ɨdap ɨleŋɨkon agek Piŋkop dakon gen yaŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da abɨŋ uŋun da kapmatsisok aŋgwasɨŋek nandawit.
Mani uŋun sipsip kɨla amɨn yombem da iyɨ mibɨltok kɨŋek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni kɨla agɨt. Mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon kosit yolɨgɨt.
Nak jap do abeŋ kaŋ, but pɨso dɨma dayɨkdɨsat. Mɨktɨm madep gat ae yo morap uŋungwan toŋ uŋun kɨsi nak dakon gɨn.
Dɨwarɨ yopyop ae amɨn kɨsit kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi paŋmɨlɨp agak uŋun kɨsi amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma agagɨ.
Gak ‘Moneŋno morapmɨ ae yo kabɨno morapmɨ toŋ. Yo kɨnda do wadak wadak dɨma asat’ yaŋ yosol. Mani dɨma. Amɨn da bupmɨsi nandaŋ gamni da tɨlagon yokwisi egɨsal. Gak yogo mɨnisi da egɨsal, ae dabɨlgo mɨni, ae molaŋ molaŋ agɨsal. Aŋek gaga dɨma nandabɨ pɨsosok.
“Ji da amɨn yabekba Jonon kwa Jon da nak do yaŋkwok bamɨsi agɨt. Mɨktɨm amɨn kɨnda da nak dakon gen aŋteban asak uŋun da yo madep dɨma asak. Mani ji yokwikon baŋ pulugaŋ kɨni yaŋ do Jon da yaŋkwok agɨt uŋun do dayɨsat.
Yesu Kristo Piŋkop dakon galaktok yolek gɨptɨmni naŋ paregek bɨsap kaloŋ kɨmakgɨt. Yaŋ aŋek paŋpulugagɨt da nin iyɨ dakon telagɨ mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ ekwamaŋ.
Yesu da oman amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji pakbi koleŋ tɨbɨrɨkon tagalba pɨkwan.” Yoyɨŋban yaŋ aba genikon wɨŋ tugawit.
Yawe, gak abɨŋ uwalno gat emat wamaŋek pabɨŋ yopbi. Emat agak sɨbago abɨdaŋek uŋun gat emat wamaŋek yokwi pakpak da kɨsiron baŋ abɨdoki.
Jap pi gat ae yo morap uŋungwan toŋ, ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani. Uŋun bɨsapmon kɨndap morap koron toŋ uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap yokdaŋ. Yawe da buron kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdaŋ, nido Yawe abɨŋ gen kokwin aŋek mɨktɨm daman kɨsi dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo dakon aŋpak kokwin aŋ yomdɨsak. Aŋpak kɨlegɨkon da, ae gen bamɨkon da, mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨn morapyo gen kokwin aŋyomdɨsak.
Mani, amɨn iyɨ do pasal ɨmaŋ ae Yawe da nin do but dasi bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ galak taŋ nimɨsak yaŋsi nandaŋ gadaŋ amɨn uŋun do galak taŋ yomɨsak.
Mɨŋat amɨn morap dakon kɨla amɨni uŋun muwukba nin gat kɨsi Abraham dakon Piŋkop yaŋ aŋkɨsamaŋ. Uŋun on mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn madep morap dakon Piŋkop egɨsak. Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ mani wukwisi taŋ aŋaŋ kɨsak.
Amɨn yokwi da nawa gengo manji yomɨŋakwa japmɨsi nandaŋ yomɨsat.
Don Yesu da Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalon pɨgek amɨn uŋun kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nandaki, gak kɨlek tal. Yo yokwi saŋbeŋek dɨma aki. Aki kaŋ sot agɨl uŋun yapmaŋek yo jɨgɨsi da altaŋ gamdɨsak.”
Kristo da nin do nandaŋ yawok nimɨŋek paŋpulugaŋban Piŋkop da dabɨlon amɨn kɨlegɨsi agɨmaŋ. Aŋpak uŋun aŋek egɨp egɨp teban abɨdoneŋ do nin manjɨgɨt. Nin egɨp egɨp teban do nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom aŋek ekwamaŋ.
Agakwan Yesu pɨdaŋ agek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat, amɨn morap uŋun dukwan keŋ? Amɨn kɨnda gen pikon gep do dɨma akdak on?”
Nin nandaŋ gadat aŋek yaŋsi nandamaŋ, gak Piŋkop dakon Telagɨ Amɨni.”
Juda amɨn dɨ Antiok ae Ikoniam da apgwit uŋun da amɨn dakon but sugaŋba Pol uwal aŋ ɨmgwit. Uwal aŋ ɨmɨŋek Pol tɨp baŋ aŋagek kɨlɨ kuŋwak yaŋ nandaŋek ɨlɨk aŋaŋ abɨgɨ kokup pap da waŋga yɨpgwit.
Asisi, yokwi gat kɨsi altagɨm. Meŋ da butgwan wasaŋek yɨkgɨm bɨsapmon yokwi gat kɨsi yɨkgɨm.
Mani mɨŋat amɨn morap nandaŋ ɨmgwit gat, ae mɨŋat Galili da Yesu yolek apgwit uŋun gat dubagɨkon da agek yo noman tawit uŋun pɨndakgwit.
Nin Sisaria kokupmon gɨldat kabi dɨ egapno kombɨ amɨn kɨnda mani Agabus uŋun Judia mɨktɨmon da pɨgɨt.
Agek Yesu obɨŋakwan kaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kabɨt, on Piŋkop dakon Sipsip Monɨŋni!”
Mani nak amɨn kɨlegɨ, do don gandakdɨsat. Pokdot da pɨdosot bɨsapmon gak nak gat egɨsal yaŋ nandaŋek but galaksi nandakeŋ.
Kalɨpsi Isip amɨn pabɨŋ yopgut bɨsapmon, Piŋkop da gen teban uŋun Israel amɨn nin do nimgut.
Piŋkop gen papia da uŋun do yaŋ yosok: “Padɨge Jekop do but dasi galaktaŋ ɨmgum, mani peni Iso do dɨma galak taŋ ɨmgum.”
Israel amɨn kalɨp Isip yɨpmaŋ degek kɨwit. Jekop dakon dɨwatni da amɨn gen ŋwakŋwarɨ yoŋ kabɨ dakon kokup yɨpmaŋek kɨwit.
Emat amɨn gat ae mibɨltok amɨn madepni gat, ae Juda amɨn dakon obip amɨn gat da Yesu abɨdaŋek nap teban naŋ abɨsɨwit.
Ae Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo nin amɨn dɨwarɨ da aŋ uŋudeŋ muwut muwutnin dɨma yɨpmaŋ detneŋ. Ji nandaŋ, Kristo dakon abap bɨsapni kɨlɨ abɨŋek kapmat tosok, do nin kaloŋ kaloŋ amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon but paŋteban ak do pi madepsi aneŋ.
Uŋun yokwi morap amɨn buron da wɨŋ waŋga kwaŋ uŋun da amɨn paŋupbal aŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋakwa pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Jerusalem yɨpmaŋek kɨwit.
Nido, toktogɨsi amɨn da yaŋ nayaŋ, gak Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋ kɨmokdol, ae Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ kɨmokdol.
Nandak nandak amɨn uŋun kɨŋ mudaŋakwa, Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo da Josep dɨpmɨnon altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Erot da Monjɨ aŋakban kɨmotjak do wɨsɨkdɨsak, do gak pɨdaŋ monjɨ ŋakŋak gat meŋi gat tɨmɨkbɨ Isip mɨktɨmon pasal kɨni. Isip sigɨn egakwa nak da aesi apni do don gayɨkeŋ.”
Piŋkop da Telagɨ Yutnon telagɨ pi aŋ amɨn uŋun Telagɨ Yut dakon jap baŋ tɨmɨkgaŋ. Ae alta dakon pi aŋ amɨn da altakon paret do bɨt kɨlapyo mukwa sosoŋ uŋun dakon dɨwarɨ noŋ. Ji uŋun dɨma nandaŋ, ma?
Aŋakwa jap yet dɨwarɨ tɨpmɨ toŋ tɨmon mawit. Maŋ kwawit, mani mɨktɨm pakbini mɨni, do kɨbɨdaŋ pasɨlgwit.
Notnonisi, ji on mɨktɨmon kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon amɨn da yaŋ ekwaŋ, ae binap amɨn yombem. Do yaŋsi dayɨsat, ji but kalɨp dakon galaktok yokwi manji yomni. Uŋun da wupji abɨŋ yɨp do emat asak.
Kɨŋek Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak dakon bɨsap uŋun kwaŋ tosok uŋun dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋoni.
Nak kunam tagek gak do nandaŋek jap kelkel aŋek gawak gamɨsat bɨsapmon, amɨn da nak do gen yokwi yaŋ namaŋ.
Mani jikon da kɨnda da yaŋ nayɨkdɨsak, “Piŋkop da yaŋ asak kaŋ, nido nin gulusuŋnin toŋ yaŋ niyɨsak? Namɨn da Piŋkop da yo ak do nandɨsak uŋun yapmaŋek iyɨ da galaktogon yo kɨnda asak?”
Sonda kalbi nin paŋmuwukbi gat jap aŋwa nok do aŋek muwukgɨmaŋ. Aŋapno Pol wɨsa dagokdo kɨkeŋ yaŋ nandaŋek Piŋkop gen dubagɨsi yaŋakwan kalbi binapmɨ agɨt.
Jon da jikon obɨŋek kosit kɨlegɨ dayɨŋ dolɨŋban geni nandaba bamɨ dɨma agɨt. Mani takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn yokwi gat ae kosit oba mɨŋat gat da geni nandaba bamɨ agɨt. Ji uŋun kawit mani nandak nandakji kulabɨk aŋek geni nandaba bamɨ dɨma agɨt.”
Dɨsi nandaŋ, don Amɨn Tagɨ da tomni damdɨsak. Tomni uŋun yo tagɨsi mɨŋat amɨni do manjɨgɨt uŋun. Ji Kristo dakon pi monjɨ ekwaŋ, ae uŋun kɨla amɨnji egɨsak.
“Nak mɨŋat amɨno da geno guramɨk kɨmotni dosi nandɨsat. Ae Israel amɨn nak dakon galaktok yol kɨmotni do nandɨsat.
Yawe aŋkɨlɨk koni, uŋun tagɨsi. Paŋkutnosak do kwaŋ amɨn uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ ani.
Yaŋdo, kɨlɨ dayɨt, ji yokwisi taŋ damɨŋakwa kɨmotdaŋ. Ji nak Uŋun Amɨn yaŋ dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namni kaŋ, yokwisi taŋ damɨŋakwa kɨmotdaŋ.”
Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Yesu Nasaret amɨn da obɨgɨsak.”
Uwalnin da mandaŋ kɨndapmon kɨlɨ sowit, do gak da butjap nandaŋ yomɨŋek paŋupbal aki.
Nak papiakon da ji paŋpasol ak do dɨma nandɨsat.
Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da niaŋon da nak abɨŋ nep do nandaŋ kokwin aŋ uŋun pɨndak mudaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jamba but amɨn ji nak nido aŋkewalgaŋ?
Yesu uŋun Jerusalem kokup papmon kɨk do aŋek kokup pap ae kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ tawit uŋudon agek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
Mani aŋpak yokwi kalɨp awit uŋun dakon bamɨ tagɨ kɨnda dɨma abɨdawit. Abɨsok uŋun aŋpak do mayagɨ nandaŋ. Uŋun aŋpak da amɨn kɨmot yomɨsak.
Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu gen uŋun yoyɨŋ mudaŋakwan Piŋkop da aŋenakban Kwen Kokup wɨgɨgɨt da Piŋkop da amɨnsi tet do yɨkdak.
Dabɨlgo uŋun gɨptɨmgo dakon teŋteŋɨ. Dabɨlgo tagɨsi kaŋ, gɨptɨmgo kaloŋ teŋteŋɨni toŋ. Mani dabɨlgo yokwi kaŋ, gɨptɨmgo pɨlɨn tuksi tosok.
Gak nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn dakon gen gulusuŋni do mɨrak dɨma yopbi. Gaga nandɨsal, gen uŋuden da butjap ukwayɨtyo paŋalon asak.
Bɨsit aŋ mudaŋek kɨsitni kwenikon wɨtjɨŋakwal Telagɨ Wup abɨdawit.
Yesu Telagɨ Yut Madepmon wɨgek paret yopyop tamo da kapmatjok yɨkgɨt. Yɨgek pɨndagakwan amɨn morapmɨ da paret yopgwit. Moneŋ morapmɨ taŋ yomgwit amɨn uŋun da moneŋ madep yopgwit.
Yo morap uŋun do yaŋ nandat aŋek kɨŋakwal Yesu iyɨ opban kɨsi kɨwit.
Do Babilon gagon gita dakon gen, bo kɨnam kɨrɨŋ dakon gen, bo kweŋ, ae saŋbeŋek gak da nagalgwan dɨmasi yokdaŋ. Ae kɨsit kɨlda amɨn pi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ aŋ uŋun saŋbeŋek gagon dɨma egɨpdaŋ. Ae tɨp madep da wit mɨsɨŋɨkgaŋ dakon wuwɨgɨ gagon saŋbeŋek dɨma tosak.
Iyɨŋba paŋdetni bamorɨ yaŋ yoban opbal Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ iyɨnjil do yabekgɨt, “Gak Piŋkop da amɨn yabet do yagɨt uŋun, bo nin amɨn kɨnda don apdɨsak do jomjom aneŋ?”
Kɨdatno kɨsi noman taŋakwa tagɨ manjɨkeŋ. Uŋun da nak da yokwi tat uŋun kaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋ.
Aŋakwan Jon dakon paŋdetni gen bini nandaŋek kɨŋ bumjotni abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ tɨp kɨnamon yɨpgwit.
Pol da wasok uŋun aban kaŋek mɨŋat amɨn morapyo da Likonia genon da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Mao, piŋkop ekwaŋ dɨ da amɨn gɨptɨm paŋek ninon peŋ!”
Yesu Kristo yokwi pakpak amɨn tɨmɨt do mɨktɨmon pɨgɨt. Gen uŋun bamɨsi amɨn kɨsi da nandaŋek nandaŋ gadat tagɨ ani. Nak naga yokwi pakpak dakon mibɨltok amɨn egɨpgum.
Piŋkop, mɨŋat amɨnyo da gak dakon man kundu yapmaŋek kwensi awɨgɨni do nandɨsat. Tapmɨmgo yɨpbi mɨktɨm morap kɨsikon nomansi teŋteŋosak. Yaŋ aŋaki mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi da man madepgo do nandani.
Yesu Jerusalem kɨŋ altaŋek Telagɨ Yut Madep uŋun da nagalgwan pɨgɨgɨt. Pɨgɨ yo morap pɨndak aŋ aŋ kɨgɨt, mani gɨldat pɨgɨk do aŋakwan paŋdetni 12 kabɨ gat tobɨlek Betani kokupmon kɨwit.
Iyɨ dakon kɨsit dasi pi tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨt. Amɨn iyɨ do nandaba wɨgɨwit amɨn uŋun yolban waseŋ kɨwit.
Gɨldat kɨnda do Agripa gat Benaisi gat kɨla amɨn madep ɨmalni tagɨsi paŋek opgumal. Opbal emat amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn madep gat, ae kokup pap uŋun dakon mibɨltok amɨn gat kɨsi muwut muwut yutnon wɨgɨwit. Aŋakwa Pestus da Pol yaŋ ɨban wɨgɨt.
Ae yomaŋ nok dakon yoni dɨwarɨ kɨsi taŋ yomgwit, uŋun sinamon, ae jap paŋgalak ak yo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, ae mukwa kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi sogok dakon yo, ae bɨt nelak kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, ae wain, ae olip dakon nelagɨ, ae plaua tagɨsi gat, ae wit. Ae bulmakau, ae sipsip, ae os, ae oskon da amɨn pawɨl tamo, ae oman monjɨ kɨsi. Uŋun yo morap amɨn dɨ da saŋbeŋek yumyumɨ mɨni.
Mɨktɨmninon dukwan dukwan morap kɨsi emat aŋ, ae pɨlɨn tuk madepsi tosok, do gak da nin gat saŋbek saŋbek agɨl uŋun do aego nandaki.
Aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨm, ‘Israel dakon kɨla amɨn madep noman taŋ noman taŋ ani uŋun gak da kabɨkon dagɨn noman tokdaŋ. Babɨkon da babɨkon gak da kabɨkon nani kɨnda da kɨla amɨn madep yɨyɨt tamokon yɨtdɨsak.’ ”
Obɨsi baljoŋ, ae dam tebanon nipmaŋgaŋ, ae uwal da paŋdagat aŋek japmɨ nandaŋek gen tebai niyaŋ. Ae pi tebaisi aŋek dɨpmɨn tagɨ dɨma pokgomaŋ, ae jap do amaŋ.
Kɨla amɨn madep Erot uŋun Yesu dakon gen bin nandaŋek
Mani amɨn kɨnda da Telagɨ Wup abɨŋ yɨp do manji gen kɨnda yosak kaŋ, Piŋkop da dɨwarɨni dɨma wɨrɨrɨtjak. Uŋun dɨmasisi, uŋun dɨwarɨni mudok mudogɨ mɨni taŋ wɨgɨkdɨsak.”
Yawe, nak gak dakon oman monjɨgo. Meŋno da kalɨp gak dakon pi agɨt, abɨsok monji nakyo kɨsi pigo asat. Nak nap tebanon egapbo pulugaŋ nepgul.
Gak mibɨltok kɨŋaki mɨŋat amɨnyo da buŋon golgwit. Gak da Moses gat Aron gat do pi yobɨ uŋun da kɨlani agɨmal.
Ji on mɨktɨm dakon yo do nandaba kɨk ani do dɨma nandɨsat. Mɨŋat dɨma pagɨt amɨn uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ dakon pi dogɨn nandɨsak, ae Piŋkop dakon galaktok yol do nandɨsak.
Asi, Piŋkop da mɨktɨmon egɨpbeŋ do nandɨsak uŋun nandaŋ gadaŋ kɨmokdot. Mɨktɨmon ji gat egek paŋpulugaŋapbo nandaŋ gadatji teban taŋakwa but galaksi nandani yaŋsi nandɨsat.
Jɨgɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ altaŋ naba kɨlano aŋaki dɨma kɨmokdot. Uwalno da nak do japmɨ nandaŋ, mani gak tapmɨmgo madep, do si pabɨŋ yopmaŋek nak aŋpulugosol.
Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat monjɨyo dakon jap pɨŋan do yomyomɨ mɨni.”
“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem amɨn, ji kombɨ amɨn dapba kɨmokgoŋ. Amɨn Piŋkop da yabekban jikon abaŋ uŋun ji da tɨpbaŋ dapba kɨmokgoŋ. Pup meŋi da monjini paŋmuwuk pɨrɨgwan yopmaŋdak, uŋun da tɨlak nak da bɨsap morapmɨ ji paŋmuwut do nandagɨm, mani ji da kurak taŋ namgwit.
Ae Kristo meme bo ae bulmakau monɨŋ dakon yawi baŋ tɨmɨgek uŋun Yut Burɨ Telagɨsigwan dɨma wɨgɨgɨt. Uŋun iyɨ dakon yawi naŋ tɨmɨgek telagɨ yutgwan bɨsap kaloŋ kɨnda gɨn wɨgɨgɨt. Aŋek nin yokwikon baŋ yumaŋ naŋban egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do amɨn agɨmaŋ.
Pilip uŋun Betsaida kokupmon nani, Andru gat Pita gat dakon kokup ɨsalni.
Dɨsi nandaŋ, don yo kabɨni uŋun tɨmɨt do nandagɨt, mani dɨma tɨmɨkgɨt. Gɨsamni ae tɨmɨt do kunam takgɨt, mani but tobɨl aŋek gɨsamni tɨmɨtjak dakon kositni dɨma taŋ ɨmgut.
Yawe, gak dakon gengo toktogɨsi taŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsak. Uŋun Kwen Kokup tebaisi tosok.
Gapman dakon amɨn madep da abɨsok yo amaŋ dakon geni nandɨsak kaŋ, gen pikon nipjak do nak si pasoldot. Upbalap madep nido ayɨŋ yaŋ niyɨsak kaŋ, nin da gen kobogɨ tagɨ kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma iyɨneŋ.” Kɨlda mandak da gen yaŋ yoyɨŋek amɨn muwukgwit uŋun yoyɨŋban kɨŋ mudawit.
Asisi, mɨŋat amɨnyo manji gamaŋ uŋun tasɨk tokdaŋ. Amɨn gak golgwit da ae kɨlɨ gepmaŋ dekgwit, uŋun paŋupbal abɨ mɨni ani.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gen kɨnda babɨk da abɨdawit uŋun ji kɨlɨ nandawit. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn dɨma dapba kɨmotni. Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda aŋakban kɨmotjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn gen pikon kɨsak.’
Ɨleŋon wɨgɨ altaŋek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Paŋkewalon dɨma moni yaŋ do bɨsit ani.”
Gen pɨlɨn kaga dayɨsat, uŋun gɨldat kalba yaŋ teŋteŋoni. Gen pɨsɨk mɨrakjikon dayɨsat uŋun yut kwenon da agek yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ yomni.
Yaŋdo, mɨŋat amɨnyo Yesu Kristokon gadawit uŋun yokwi dakon kobogɨ dɨmasi tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Nandani. Nak ji da tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ gat ae skopion gat bamoni, ae uwal dakon tapmɨm kɨsisi pabɨŋ yopni do yaŋ mudaŋ damɨsat. Yo kɨnda da ji arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋupbal asak.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Aeno tɨlak gen kɨnda dayɨko nandani. Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨk yombem. Amɨn da uŋun yɨk pakbi ɨdapgwan yɨpba pɨkwan tap kɨlap mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yɨkgwan pɨkwaŋ.
Mani Yesu da nandak nandakni pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨktɨm kɨnda dakon amɨn da pudaŋ kɨ kabi bamorɨ aŋek emat wamjil kaŋ, mɨktɨm uŋun yokwi tokdɨsak. Ae amɨn yurɨ kɨnda da pudaŋ kɨŋek emat wamni kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yut tagɨ dɨma egɨpdaŋ.
“Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da yaŋ akdaŋ: peni kɨnda da padɨge uwal da kɨsiron yɨpban aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak, ae amɨn kɨnda da mɨŋat monjɨyoni uwal da kɨsiron yopban dapba kɨmotdaŋ, ae mɨŋat monjɨyo da meŋi datniyo do yaŋ gɨn akdaŋ.
Piŋkop, gak nido toktogɨsi manji nimɨsal? Nido sipsip kabɨgo tagɨsi pawɨldal nin do butjap tebaisi nandaŋ nimɨsal?
Mani mɨktɨm da mɨŋat aŋpulugaŋek gen kagani aŋtaŋ kɨŋakwan nugɨm yokwisi madep da pakbi uŋun wandɨkgɨt uŋun mɨktɨm da si naŋ mudagɨt.
Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Uŋun da niaŋsi aŋgamɨk? Niaŋon da dabɨlgo sɨŋtak?”
Ae Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨwarɨ gat not aŋek egɨpni. Aŋpak uŋun aba Piŋkop dakon aŋpagon egɨp egɨp da teban tosak. Ae amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak abɨdoni. Uŋun aŋpak abɨdaŋba notsi aŋek egɨp egɨp aŋpak da jikon teban tosak.
Iyɨŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ji wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ dɨma pɨndatni kaŋ, nandaŋ gadat dɨma akdaŋ.”
Asi, yo morap ak do nandagɨm bo ae yolapbo Piŋkop da kaŋban kɨlek tosak yaŋ nandagɨm, uŋun wagɨl yo ɨsalɨsi. Nido, Amɨn Tagɨno Yesu Kristo nandaŋ ɨmɨsat uŋun do nandako yo bamɨsi asak. Do nak aŋpulugok do yo agɨt, nak uŋun do nandaŋek Kristo dakon aŋpak abɨdagɨm. Ae nandak nandaknokon da kalɨp yo dɨwarɨ yolek agɨm uŋun yo ɨsalɨsi yaŋ nandɨsat. Yesu Kristo naŋgɨn tebai abɨdaŋek
Koŋni toŋ amɨn kɨnda Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon yɨkgɨt. Uŋun da madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt,
Butno wagɨlsi jɨk tosok. Yawe, bɨsap niaŋ da jɨgɨ paŋegɨpbeŋ?
Mɨŋat amɨnyo da uwal aŋ namgwit bɨsapmon, aŋpulugaŋaki dɨma aŋupbal awit. Aŋek Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ dakon mibɨltok amɨni egɨpbeŋ do nak manjɨgɨl. Mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨma nandaŋ yomgum, abɨsok nak da yoŋgamgwan ekwaŋ.
Ji bɨsap dubagɨsi egek babɨkji pɨndatni do nandɨsat. Israel amɨn yaworɨ tagɨ egɨpni.
Ae Yesu da yo agɨt uŋun dakon gen bin da madepsi ɨreŋ taŋek Judia mɨktɨm kɨsi arɨpmɨ agɨt, ae mɨktɨm dɨwarɨkon kɨsi kɨgɨt.
Yaŋban Pailat da iyɨgɨt, “Asi gak kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda, ma?” Yaŋban Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda yaŋ nayɨsal uŋun asi bamɨ yosol. Nak gen bamɨ mɨŋat amɨn morap yoyɨkeŋ do on mɨktɨmon pɨgɨm. Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do meŋ da aŋalagɨt. Gen bamɨ yolgaŋ amɨn morap uŋun nak dakon gen do mɨrak yopmaŋgaŋ.”
Uŋun pasɨl egek amɨn kɨlegɨ do obip yamaŋgaŋ. Uŋun dɨma pasolgoŋ, do tepmɨsi yamaŋgaŋ.
Niaŋon da kandap yokwi aŋmɨlɨp agɨmak uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do yoŋ kaŋ
Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Sisa dakon yo uŋun Sisa iyɨ do ɨmni, ae Piŋkop dakon yo uŋun Piŋkop iyɨ do ɨmni.” Gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek Yesu do nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
Yaŋ tɨdaŋakwa uŋudon gɨn Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji si teban taŋek egɨpni. Nak naga abɨsat. Dɨma pasolni.”
“Ji kaŋ kɨmagek gen pakyaŋsi nandani. Taŋ yomaŋ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da dɨ gat saŋbeŋ daban tɨmɨtdaŋ. Mani mɨnini amɨn uŋun taŋ namaŋ yaŋ nandɨsak uŋun Piŋkop da gwayekdɨsak.”
Amɨn kɨnda uŋun gwak kwenon yut agɨt, uŋun dɨma sosak kaŋ, pi amɨn uŋun tomni tagɨsi tɨmɨtdɨsak.
Uŋun amɨn kabɨ da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨgo Jekop dapba kɨmakgwit, aŋek mɨktɨmni obɨsi aŋupbal awit.
Amɨn morapmɨ nandaŋakwa yo noman taŋ namɨŋakwa yaŋ nandaŋ, gak kaloŋ dagɨn tagɨsi aŋkutnosol.
Toktogɨsi uŋun da kabɨkon kɨnda da kɨla amɨn madep egɨ egɨ akdɨsak. Kundu da toktogɨsi tosok uŋun da tɨlak, uŋun da kabɨkon kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda da toktogɨsi Israel amɨn kɨla akdɨsak.
Piŋkop da Wup damgut uŋun da ji oman amɨn egek pasol pasol aesi ani do dɨmasi nandɨsak. Wupni da ji paŋpulugaŋban Piŋkop dakon gwakni dagaŋek Piŋkop do “Aba, Dat” yaŋ iyamaŋ.
Aŋek amɨn dakon galaktok yolek amɨn uŋun kalɨp gapman gat emat wamgut, ae amɨn kɨnda aŋakban kɨmakban dam tebanon yɨpgwit, uŋun yɨpban kɨgɨt. Ae galaktokni yolek Yesu aŋakba kɨmotjak do emat amɨn da kɨsiron yɨpgut.
Mani gen bamɨ paŋek egɨsak amɨn uŋun teŋteŋɨkon abɨsak. Abɨŋek teŋteŋɨkon egakwan amɨn da kaŋba Piŋkop da aŋpulugaŋban aŋpak tagɨsi asak.”
Piŋkop, aŋpakgo kɨlegɨ uŋun kɨla amɨn madep do iyɨŋ dekbɨ gen kokwin kɨlegɨ asak.
Amɨn kɨlegɨ uŋun Yawe da yutnon kɨlɨ kwaokbi. Piŋkopnin da yutnon egek madepsi tagoŋ.
Yaŋakwan mal da dukwan dukwan kɨsi yamgwit. Aŋakwa wuwɨk madepsi noman taŋakwan kɨrɨrɨŋ aŋakwa wudɨp madepsi agɨt. Wudɨp uŋun madepsi daman agɨt. Mɨktɨmon amɨn egɨ aŋaŋ obaŋ bɨsapmon wudɨp madep uŋuden kɨnda kalɨp dɨma noman tagɨt.
Iyɨŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mibɨltok Juda amɨn paŋpulugaŋek ae don mɨktɨm dɨwarɨkon amɨn paŋpulugokeŋ. Yosol uŋudeŋ abeŋ kaŋ, mɨŋat monjɨyo dakon jap pɨŋan do yomdɨsat. Uŋun tagɨ dɨma.”
Mɨktɨmon egɨpgwit bɨsap morapmon ji yo tagɨ tagɨ morapmɨ tɨmɨgek dɨsi dogɨn nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek egɨpgwit. Jap morapmɨ naŋek madepsi tagawit, do dɨkba kɨmotni dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ noman tak.
Yaŋ pɨndagek aeni tobɨl kɨŋ bɨsit mibɨltok agɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn agɨt.
Amɨn bamot do papia yomgwit uŋungwan gen yaŋ mandawit, “Nin yabekbi kabɨ ae paŋmuwukbi dakon kɨla amɨn, nin ji dakon notji da papia on mandamaŋ. Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn Antiok ae Siria ae Silisia Provinskon ekwaŋ ji gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ dayamaŋ.
Asisi, amɨn kunam tagek jap yet kwaot do jap yet pigaga paŋgwaŋ, uŋun don jap bamɨ pektaŋba paŋ paŋobɨŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap yokdaŋ.
Do gak moneŋgo abɨdaŋek kɨ. Naga da galaktogon amɨn buŋon abeŋ uŋun gat moneŋ tɨlak kaloŋɨkon damɨsat.
Piŋkop kaloŋ dagɨn gen teban paŋalon agɨt, uŋun kaloŋ dagɨn Gen Kokwin Amɨn egɨsak. Ae uŋun kaloŋ dagɨn mɨŋat amɨnyo yokwikon baŋ tagɨ tɨmɨtjak, ae tagɨ paŋupbal asak. Do gak namɨn da amɨn dakon aŋpakni kokwin asal?
Mani yaŋ dɨma aŋ. Ji dɨsi paŋmuwukbi notji baŋ paŋkewalek yokwi aŋyomaŋ.
Yesu gen yaŋ iyɨŋakwan, muwut muwut yutni dakon kɨla amɨn Jairus da yutnon da amɨn dɨwarɨ da abɨŋ Jairus yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gwago kɨlɨ kuŋwak, uŋun do nido yoyɨŋdet ɨsal dogɨn jɨgɨ ɨmɨsal?”
Yo morap mɨrɨm paŋ uŋun Yawe aŋkɨsini! Yawe aŋkɨsini!
Iyɨŋba yagɨt, “Piŋkop da ji baŋgɨn iyɨ dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ pasɨlɨ toŋ uŋun damɨsak. Mani amɨn dɨwarɨ tɨlak gen gɨn nandaŋ. ‘Do dabɨl sɨŋtaŋek kokdaŋ, mani dɨma kaŋ nandaŋyo akdaŋ. Ae gen nandakdaŋ, mani mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaba pɨsokdaŋ.’ ”
Yaŋ ani, nido Piŋkop da aŋpak ninon asak uŋun kɨlɨ aŋkɨlɨk kawit, aŋek Amɨn Tagɨ uŋun tagɨsi yaŋ kɨlɨ nandawit.
Nak Piŋkop da yawi dɨwat kabɨno Israel amɨn yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjaksi do nandɨsat. Do nak dakon galaktok uŋun yaŋ: Kosit dɨ yaŋ toŋ tam nak da naga jobɨt tɨmɨgek Kristo yɨpmaŋ degapbo Israel amɨn da nak dakon tamo abɨdaŋbam.
Ji wagɨlsi nandaŋ kokwinji tagɨ dɨma, ma? Ji Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨmon da egɨp egɨp kalugɨ wasawit da abɨsok dɨsi da tapmɨmon da wasɨp akdaŋ, ma?
Gak da jɨgɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yopbɨ nagon apgwit, mani nak nandɨsat, gak da nak aego aŋteban akdɨsal. Mɨktɨm kagagwan naŋ abɨ pɨdokeŋ.
Egakwan mɨrɨm madep aŋakwan paŋdetni pakbi wayɨt do aŋtɨdok aŋakwa pɨndakgɨt. Yaŋ pɨndagek wɨsa wɨsa do pakbi ɨdapmon bamaŋ bamaŋ kɨŋek kɨŋ paŋdetni yap do agɨt.
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ morap egɨ aŋaŋ kwaŋ, ji Yawe aŋkɨsini. Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨŋat amɨn morap ji mani yaŋ aŋkɨsini.
Yaŋ iyɨŋba Yesu da pɨdaŋ agek mɨrɨm gat ae pakbi gat tebai yoyɨŋek yagɨt, “Yawokgɨl!” Yaŋban mɨrɨm yawogakwan pakbi wayɨŋ dɨmasi agɨt.
Yaŋ iyɨŋek kɨsirɨ kwenikon wutjɨŋban uŋudon gɨn manji kɨlek taŋakwa Piŋkop aŋkɨsigɨt.
Yaŋ aŋakwa Juda amɨn Tesalonaika egɨpgwit uŋun da Pol uŋun Beria kokupmon egek Piŋkop dakon gen yosok yaŋ nandawit. Yaŋ nandaŋek obɨŋ amɨn dakon but sugaŋ paŋupbal awit.
Aŋpakji kokwinɨgek gen pikon dep do dɨma yosot. Nak yaŋ kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm, nin toktogɨsi ji do but dasi galaktaŋ damamaŋ. Kɨmotneŋ bo egɨpneŋ nin sigɨn but dasi galaktaŋ damdamaŋ.
Aŋakwa mɨŋat uŋun pakbi tɨbɨtni yɨpmaŋek tobɨl kokup papmon kɨŋek amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Nin yokwi da napmon dɨma egɨpneŋ do aŋek, Kristo da nin pulugaŋ nipgut. Do ji tebai atni. Amɨn da gen teban dakon oman monjɨ ae dagoni do dayɨŋba kaŋ, geni dɨma nandani.
Betani kokup uŋun Jerusalem da kapmatjok 3 kilomita da tɨlak tosok.
Gen tebango tepmɨsi guramɨtdɨsat. Nido, gak da nandak nandak dɨ gat saŋbeŋek namdɨsal.
Yaŋ yaŋban Parisi amɨn da iyɨwit, “Yaŋ kaŋ ae mibɨlɨ nido Moses da gen teban kɨnda yaŋ mandagɨt? Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn kɨnda mɨŋatni kwɨnɨt do kaŋ, mɨŋat paŋkwɨnɨt papia kɨnda mandaŋ ɨmɨŋek kwɨnɨtjak.’ ”
Ji yaŋ gɨn yoni kaŋ tagɨ, “Amɨn Tagɨ da galak tosagon nin sigɨn egek yo uŋun ak do nandamaŋ uŋun aneŋ.”
Yaŋ aŋek yo wagɨl tagɨsisi ae yo madepsi nim do yaŋ teban tok agɨt. But sulugɨk aŋpak da mɨktɨm amɨn ninon taŋek nin madepsi paŋupbal asak, mani Kristo da nin paŋpulugaŋban aŋpak uŋun tasɨk togɨ uŋun yapmaŋek Piŋkop iyɨ dakon egɨp egɨp ae aŋpak abɨdoneŋ do aŋek yo tagɨsi morap uŋun nimgut.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋek kokup pap uŋun yɨpmaŋ waŋga pɨgek uŋun pɨlɨn kaga Betani kokupmon paŋkɨ pakgɨt.
Yaŋakwan amɨn uŋun gɨkwemon yɨkgɨt uŋun sɨbani abɨdaŋek mɨktɨmon jap pik tawit uŋun baljagɨt.
Nin gen teban da yoŋgamgwan egapno yokwikon baŋ yumaŋ nipgut. Aŋek yaŋ aban Piŋkop dakon gwakni agɨmaŋ.
Mɨŋat da eni yɨpmaŋek kɨŋ yumabi aŋpak asak uŋun da tɨlak ji Piŋkop kɨlɨ yɨpmaŋ dek mudaŋ. Nandani, mɨktɨm dakon yo do galagɨ nandɨsak amɨn uŋun Piŋkop do kuragɨsi nandaŋ ɨmɨsak. Uŋun dɨma nandaŋ, ma? Nandani, on mɨktɨm not aŋɨmɨsak amɨn, uŋun Piŋkop dakon uwalni dagosok.
Nin Yawe ya yaŋ iyɨneŋ. Uŋun da piŋkop toptopmɨ morap yapmaŋ mudosok. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Israel mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ, egɨp egɨpji Yawekon tosok yaŋsi nandani. Uŋun da ji paŋpulugaŋek paŋkutnosok.
Piŋkop aŋkɨsineŋ. Man madepni do nandaŋek aŋkɨsiŋek kap yoneŋsi. Uŋun gɨkwemon yɨgek kɨsak. Mani uŋun Yawe. Nin iyɨ da dabɨlon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aneŋ.
Do nin kɨsi kaloŋ kaloŋ aŋpak morap agɨmaŋ dakon mibɨlɨ Piŋkop iyɨkdamaŋ.
(Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni amɨn da don Telagɨ Wup abɨdoni do gen uŋun yagɨt. Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu man madep dɨma pagɨt, do Telagɨ Wup dɨma yobi.)
Aŋek nin amɨn monɨŋ da arɨpmon saŋbeŋek dɨma egɨpneŋ. Aŋek amɨn paŋgalak aŋ amɨn, ae amɨn paŋkewal, ae top dakon mibɨlɨ pakyaŋ nandaŋ amɨn uŋun dakon geni da ji dakon nandak nandak paŋkɨ paŋabɨŋ paŋabɨŋ dɨma ani.
Yaŋ yaŋek kɨsit bamotni ae gekgekniyo yolɨŋban paŋdetni Amɨn Tagɨni kaŋek but galak madepsi nandawit.
Gak da yopbɨ notnoni da manji namgwit. Gak da nepbɨ nak amɨn yokwisi dagaŋapbo madepsi pasal namaŋ. Uŋun da tebai abɨdaŋakwa arɨpmɨ dɨma pulugaŋ kɨkeŋ.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ iyɨ do amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ nandaŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ do nandaba pɨwit. Yesu da uŋun amɨn do tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt.
Pakbi ɨgakwa Yawe dagok dagogɨ mɨni kɨla amɨn madep egɨsak.
Ae gɨldaron aŋelo kɨnda akban kagɨm. Uŋun da mɨnam kwen binap akwaŋ do yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Piŋkop dakon jap noknok madep do abɨŋ muwutni.
“Ae 10 tausen danari tɨmɨkgɨt amɨn uŋun da abɨŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, gak da 10 tausen danari kɨla akeŋ do namgul uŋun pini ako 10 tausen danari kɨnda gat oni noman tak.’
Ji kalɨp nak da manon da yo kɨnda abɨdok do bɨsit kɨnda dɨma awit. Ji bɨsit ani. Yaŋ aŋek yo tɨmɨgakwa kɨsɨk kɨsɨk da butjikon tugosak.”
Yaŋ yaŋban mibɨltok amɨn da monjɨsok uŋun yabegek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak tayaŋgok kɨŋ gen nayɨl uŋun do amɨn kɨnda dɨmasi iyɨki.”
Ae Piŋkop dakon kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamokon da amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop dakon pi monjɨ, Piŋkop do pasalek ekwaŋ amɨn, ji amɨn mani mɨni ae mani toŋ, ji Piŋkop aŋkɨsini!”
Kalɨp Josua da yɨk yawot kokup yomgut tam, Piŋkop da bɨsap kɨndakon don yom do dɨma yaŋban.
but dabɨlni pabɨ pɨsoni. Pabɨ pɨsaŋek pɨlɨn tuk manji ɨmɨŋek but tobɨl aŋek teŋteŋɨkon apni. Abɨŋek Sunduk dakon tapmɨmon da pulugaŋ kɨŋek Piŋkopmon apni. Aŋek nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨŋakwa dɨwarɨni wɨrɨrɨk yobo telagɨ mɨŋat amɨn kabɨnokon saŋbeni.’ ”
Kɨnda, uŋun mani Kliopas, uŋun da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Dubagɨkon amɨn Jerusalem apgwit da ekwaŋ uŋun da bɨkbɨgon gak kaloŋ dagɨn yo on bɨsapmon noman taŋ uŋun dɨma nandal?”
Yo tagɨsi do galak tosot uŋun arɨpnokonsi namɨsak. Yaŋ aŋakwan nak aeno amɨn kalugɨ dagaŋek sɨŋgɨŋ da yaŋ tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨsat.
Piŋkop da Yesu Kristo obakon da nandaŋ yawok damɨŋek yo tagɨsi aŋ damgut, do bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ ji do nandaŋek Piŋkopno ya yaŋsi iyɨsat.
Gen yosot uŋun pakyaŋsi nandani.”
Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu dakon nandaŋ yawotni jikon tosak do bɨsit asat.
Uŋun amɨn yo morap noman taŋ yomaŋ uŋun do nandaba yokwi tok aŋek gen morapmɨ yoŋ. Uŋun iyɨ dakon butni dakon galaktok yokwi uŋun yol do galak toŋ. Uŋun gen pap yaŋek gɨptɨm pawɨgɨk aŋek iyɨ dakon man pawɨkwaŋ. Aŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋun paŋpulugoni do paŋgalak aŋ.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda da nak dakon gen guramɨtjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn dɨmasi kɨmotjak.”
Eliut uŋun Eleasa dakon datni. Eleasa uŋun Matan dakon datni. Matan uŋun Jekop dakon datni.
Yawe, mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨkon sɨkak maŋakwa joŋ yo morap ae kwoŋ uŋun da tɨlak paŋpulugaŋaki kalɨp tagɨsi egɨpgumaŋ yaŋ gɨn aenin tagɨsi egɨpneŋ.
Elaija mɨktɨm amɨn nin yombem. Mani sɨkak dɨma mosak do bɨsit tebai aŋakwan, sɨkak dɨma maŋakwan bɨlak 3 ae kanek 6 agɨt.
“Nak gen teban kalugɨ kɨnda damɨsat uŋun yaŋ: ji dɨsikon notji do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ yomɨŋ ani. Nak ji do but dasi galak taŋ damɨsat, yaŋ gɨn ji dɨsikon notji do yaŋ gɨn nandani.
Amɨn yokwi joŋ yombem tagɨ kwoŋ, ae yo morapmɨ tɨmɨgek tagɨsi ekwaŋ. Mani gak da wagɨlsi paŋupbal akdɨsal. Amɨn nandak nandakni mɨni ae nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn on yo morap do arɨpmɨ dɨma nandaŋ pɨsoni.
Aŋkewalek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak asi Piŋkop dakon Monji egɨsalon yaŋbɨ tɨp on da bret dagaŋban.”
Nin Gen egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋok amaŋ. Uŋun Gen abɨkisigwan wasok wasogɨkon kɨlɨ egɨpgut da egɨsak. Nin mɨrak yopmaŋapno gen yagɨt, ae dabɨl da kagɨmaŋ, ae kɨsit da kwenikon ɨgayɨgɨmaŋ.
Kɨŋ altaŋakwan Kenan mɨŋat kɨnda uŋudon egɨpgut uŋun da abɨŋ yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, Dewit Dakon Monjɨ, bupmɨ nandaŋ nam! Gwano koŋ da madepsi aŋupbal asak.”
Yaŋsi nandamaŋ, amɨn gak do uwal aŋ gamaŋ, uŋun kɨmotdaŋ. Yo yokwi aŋ amɨn pabɨŋ yopbɨ bɨrapmɨgɨ dukwan dukwan kɨkdaŋ.
Amɨn 1 tausen gak da kapmatjok kɨmagakwa ae amɨn 10 tausen amɨn tetgo do kɨmotni kaŋ, uŋun yo yokwi gak da kapmatjok arɨpmɨ dɨma apni.
Uŋun da pɨlɨn tuk yɨpban kubɨkgɨt. Gɨkwem pɨlisi sɨkak mok do aŋakwan wamaŋdak uŋun da wɨtjɨgɨt.
Yokwi dakon tomni uŋun kɨmot, mani Piŋkop da but galak do egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni yumsi nimɨsak. Uŋun egɨp egɨp Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristokon tosok.
Not kabɨ, nak jikon obɨŋek Piŋkop dakon geni pasɨlɨ dayɨŋ teŋteŋagɨm bɨsapmon, nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi amɨn da gen madep mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yoŋ uŋudeŋ dɨma yagɨm.
Telagɨ Wup da yaŋsi yosok, bɨsap kɨnda don apdɨsak, uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn dɨwarɨ nandaŋ gadatni wɨtdal kɨkdaŋ, nido uŋun wup yokwi amɨn paŋkewalgaŋ uŋun dakon geni guramɨtdaŋ, ae koŋ dakon geni yoldaŋ.
Ae mibɨltok amɨn jiyo kɨsi oman monjɨsi do aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ yomni. Pasol pasol yomyom aŋpak uŋun yɨpni. Amɨn Tagɨ Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun ji ae uŋunyo kɨsi dakon Amɨn Tagɨ. Uŋun da mɨŋat amɨn morapyo kɨsi dakon aŋpak tɨlak kaloŋɨkon gɨn kokwinɨkdak.
Asi, ji yokwi uŋun pabɨk do emat madepsi awit, mani emat aŋakwa yawisi kɨnda dɨma mawit, don mokdaŋ.
Yaŋsi nolayɨŋban kat, do ji dakon gen nagon kwan nandaŋek but bamot dɨma aŋek abɨsat. Ji mibɨlɨ nido nak do gen yɨpba kɨgɨt?”
Yawe Piŋkopnin egɨsak, uŋun yombem kɨnda mɨni. Uŋun kwensi kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamonikon yɨkdak.
Yut wɨgɨni uŋudon gɨn yɨk egɨyo aŋakwa jap daba noni. Pi agak amɨn uŋun tomni tagɨ tɨmɨkgaŋ. Ji yurɨ yurɨ dɨma agɨpni.
Amɨn monjɨ gwayo morapmɨ amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ ani. Uŋun da gen pi tamokon uwal gat gen pi aŋakwa aŋpulugokdaŋ. Aŋakwa mayagɨ dɨma pakdɨsak.
Yawe, suŋ kɨnda dɨma agɨm, mani tepmɨsi nak gat emat wam do tagap taŋ. Jɨgɨno do kaŋek abɨŋ aŋpuluga!
Uwal yo yokwi aŋ namaŋ da kɨsiron baŋ abɨdoki. Aŋek Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da kɨsiron baŋ abɨdoki. Uŋun gen bamɨ dɨma yoŋ. Top baŋgɨn yaŋek gen uŋun bamɨ yaŋ yoŋ.
(Uŋun bɨsapmon Jon dam tebanon dɨma yɨpbi.)
Nin yaworɨsi agek bɨsap madepsi nagɨmaŋ. Aŋek Juda amɨn da Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek ekwaŋ bɨsap madepni uŋun kɨlɨ yapmak, do mɨrɨm sɨkakyo da tap pakbi aŋupbal akdɨsak yaŋ nandaŋek Pol da yaŋ yagɨt,
Yaŋ kaŋek tap wakga kɨŋ tɨpmon tɨdaŋban wagɨl tuwɨl kɨsak yaŋdo si pasalgwit, do tap wakga da buŋɨkon kɨrat madep tap wakga abɨdaŋban akgaŋ 4 kabɨ yopba pɨgɨwit. Yaŋ aŋek wɨsa tepmɨ dagosak do bɨsit pi awit.
Sakwabat dakon man sɨlɨpmon, mɨŋat oden dakon man baŋgɨn mandaki: Mɨŋat bɨlak 60 yapmaŋdak, ae eni kaloŋɨ dakon mɨŋatni egɨpgut uŋun dakon man baŋgɨn mandaki.
Pakbi da pak kɨŋek mɨktɨmgwan pasɨlgaŋ uŋudeŋ si pasɨlni. Amɨn da joŋ bamaŋba kɨbɨdoŋ uŋudeŋ gak da si bamaŋaki yokwi toni.
Paret Yawe da galak tosok uŋun baŋ aŋek egɨp egɨpji Yawekon tosok yaŋsi nandani.
Ae Amɨn Dakon Monji da abɨŋ jap pakbiyo agɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan kaŋek yaŋ yawit, ‘Kabɨt, jap morapmɨ noknok amɨn ae wain morapmɨsi noknok amɨn. Takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt ae yokwi pakpak amɨn dakon notni.’ Yaŋ yaŋ ɨmgwit, mani Piŋkop da pi morap agɨt uŋun pɨndagek nandano nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi gɨn asak.”
Uŋun yo dabɨlnin da pɨndakgɨmaŋ, do nin kombɨ amɨn kalɨp egɨpgwit dakon gen do tebaisi nandaŋ gadamaŋ. Ae jiyo kɨsi geni tebaisi abɨdoni kaŋ tagɨsi. Kombɨ amɨn dakon gen uŋun kalɨŋ da yaŋ pɨlɨn tukgwan soŋegakwan wɨgɨ Piŋkop da abɨŋek wɨsawɨsa dakon gɨk pap da yaŋ Kristo dakon teŋteŋɨ da butjikon teŋteŋokdɨsak.
Ji Kristo gat gadawit aŋek Kristo da pi agɨt do aŋek but kalɨp kɨlɨ yopmaŋ mudawit. But kalɨp yopyop dakon aŋpak uŋun gɨptɨm mandak dakon aŋpak yombem, mani uŋun gɨptɨm dakon dɨma. Kristo da yo uŋun butjikon agɨt.
Yaŋban Pol da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨ bo dubagɨ egek but tobɨl ani uŋun da yo madep dɨma asak. Gak ae on amɨn kabɨ abɨsok nak dakon gen nandaŋ, ji kɨsi nak yombem gɨn ani do Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨsat. Mani on nap teban kɨsit jikon paŋteban ani do dɨma galak tosot.”
Ji uŋun amɨn da aŋ uŋudeŋ dɨma ani, nido Datji dɨma iyɨŋakwa yo morap do wadak wadak aŋ uŋun nandaŋ mudosok.
Do Pol Timoti abɨdoko kɨsi agɨpdeŋ yaŋ nandagɨt. Mani Juda amɨn uŋun mɨktɨmon egɨpgwit da Timoti dakon datni uŋun Grik amɨn kɨnda yaŋ kɨlɨ nandawit. Do Juda amɨn dakon but moni do Pol da Timoti dakon gɨp mandagɨt.
Yum nandaŋaki uwalno da nak dɨma abɨdoni. Uŋun topmon da gen yaŋ namɨŋek nak aŋupbal akdo aŋ.
Yo morap nolɨgɨt uŋun bamɨsi pɨndakgɨm. Piŋkop dakon gen ae Yesu Kristo dakon gen uŋun bamɨsi.
Amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ aŋpakni tagɨ bo yokwi yaŋ do kokwinɨk kɨmotni. Yaŋ asak amɨn, aŋpak iyɨ agɨt uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ asak. Aŋek iyɨ dakon aŋpak do nandaŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon aŋpak dɨma kokwinɨtjak.
Mani donki kɨnda da amɨn da yaŋ gen yaŋek Balam dakon aŋpak yokwini do tebai iyɨgɨt. Donki gen dɨma yoŋ, mani uŋun donki da uŋun aban kombɨ amɨn uŋun ŋugɨgɨ aŋpak ak do nandagɨt uŋun yɨpgut.
Ae amɨn kɨnda da wain kalugɨ tɨbɨrɨ meme gɨp baŋ wasaŋbi tɨbɨrɨ kalɨpmɨkon kolesak kaŋ uŋun tagɨ dɨma. Yaŋ asak kaŋ, wain da pukwa paptaŋ meme gɨp kɨrɨŋɨgakwa wain maŋ mudokdaŋ. Amɨn da wain kalugɨ meme gɨp kalugɨkon koleŋba wain gat meme gɨp gat kɨsi tagɨ tomal.”
Jiyo kɨsi kalɨp but kalɨpmɨ dakon aŋpak baŋ awit. But kɨndap toptopmɨ da but kalɨpmɨ joŋɨkban wagɨl yokwisi asak. Do ji aŋpak kalɨpmɨ uŋun wɨrɨrɨk mudaŋek but nandak nandakji kulabɨk aba kalugɨsak.
Kɨŋek kokup kɨndakon wɨgɨk do aŋakwan amɨn wuda tebani toŋ 10 kabɨ da dubagɨkon agek
Kaŋakwa Pilip da koŋ morapmɨ yol yomɨŋakwan koŋ da madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek wɨŋ abɨgɨwit. Ae amɨn kɨdarɨ kɨmakbi ae kandapmɨ yokwi uŋun paŋmɨlɨp aŋyo agɨt.
Yabekba Ponisia ae Samaria mɨktɨm uŋun baŋ kɨwit. Kɨŋek uŋun mɨktɨm bamotgwan nandaŋ gadat amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨmal, “Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da but tobɨl aŋek Piŋkopmon kwaŋ.” Gen uŋun yoyɨŋbal but galak madepsi nandawit.
Ji yokwi yɨpba uŋun da gɨptɨmji si kɨmorɨ uŋun kɨlani dɨma asak. Yokwi da ɨlɨk paŋgwan gɨptɨm dakon galaktok yokwi dɨ abam.
Yesu da yosok, “Nandani! Nak kɨlɨ uŋunjok apdɨsat. Mɨŋat amɨnyo kombɨ gen on papiakon toŋ uŋun guramɨkgaŋ, uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani.”
Amɨn kɨsi da Demitius dakon aŋpak tagɨsi uŋun do yoŋ. Ae Piŋkop dakon gen bamɨ uŋunyo kɨsi aŋpakni tagɨsi uŋun da aŋteŋteŋ asak. Ninyo kɨsi aŋpakni tagɨsi uŋun do yomaŋ. Dɨsi nandaŋ, gen uŋun bamɨsi yomaŋ.
Kokup pap dakon nagal dakon teban tokni uŋun Piŋkop da tɨp yumaŋ nogɨ wukwisi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ uŋun baŋ paŋtɨlɨm agɨt. Tɨp 1 tagɨsi nagal mibɨlon tagɨt uŋun tɨp jaspa. Ae tɨp 2 uŋun tɨp pɨli uŋun tɨp sapaia. Ae tɨp 3 uŋun tɨp aget. Ae tɨp 4 uŋun kalɨkalɨgɨ, uŋun tɨp emeral.
Pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo yabekbini 12 kabɨ da obɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Kokup amɨni mɨnikon ekwamaŋ, do yoyɨŋbɨ mɨŋat amɨn morapyo kɨŋek kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ ae tɨmɨ dɨgwan kɨŋ jap pakbiyo gat ae dɨpmɨn potpot tamoyo gat wɨsini.”
Uŋun da kokup kɨdatni dakon wupni do gawak yomgwit nin yaŋ dɨma aneŋ. Piŋkop gen da yaŋ yosok: “Jap pakbiyo madepsi aŋek uŋun da kwenon kap ae kɨsɨk kɨsɨkyo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ awit.”
Do ji da paret ani uŋun da Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo paŋpulugaŋban wadak wadak saŋbeŋek dɨma ani, ae uŋun do aŋek Piŋkop do ya yaŋ madepsi iyɨkdaŋ.
Piŋkop da kokup papni telagɨ kabapmon agɨt.
Mani nin Piŋkop ya yaŋsi iyamaŋ, nido Kristo da uwalni pabɨŋ yopgut. Ae Piŋkop da mibɨl taŋ nimɨŋakwan nin iyɨ dakon amɨn kabɨni buŋon da yolgamaŋ. Uŋun da nin paŋtagap aban Kristo dakon mibɨlɨ yono uŋun da yo kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi da yaŋ dukwan dukwan kɨsak.
Ae yoyɨŋ dekba mɨŋat gɨmoŋɨ nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi aŋek aŋpak tagɨsi baŋgɨn aŋek Piŋkop da dabɨlon gwaljɨgɨ mɨni egɨpni. Aŋek yutni kɨla tagɨsi ani, ae amɨn do aŋpak tagɨsi aŋyomni, ae eni dakon pɨŋbini egɨpni. Aŋpak uŋun ani kaŋ, amɨn da Piŋkop gen do yaŋba yokwi tok dɨma akdaŋ.
Paŋmuwukbi dɨwarɨ do aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ yomɨŋek but dasi galak taŋ yomni. Piŋkop da Kristo da manon dɨwarɨsi yopmaŋ damɨsak, yaŋ gɨn ji dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ yomni.
Amɨn kɨlegɨ ji butji tagɨsi taŋakwan Yawesi aŋkɨsini. Butji gwaljɨgɨ mɨni amɨn, ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk nandaŋek yaŋ tɨdoni.
Nak da on papiakon kombɨ gen toŋ uŋun nandani amɨn morap do gen tebai yɨpmaŋdat. On gen tosogon amɨn kɨnda gen kɨnda gat saŋbesak kaŋ, amɨn paŋupbal ak yo yokwisi on papiakon toŋ, uŋun Piŋkop da saŋbeŋban uŋun amɨnon noman taŋ ɨmdaŋ.
Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae gen kokwin amɨn kɨsi morap gat da yaŋ nandawit, amɨn dɨ yaŋ yomno abɨŋ Yesu top gen yaŋ ɨmɨŋek gulusuŋ agɨt yaŋ yaŋakwa aŋatno kɨmotjak yaŋ nandawit, mani Yesu suŋ kɨnda dɨma agɨt yaŋ kawit.
Gak yaŋ yoki, “Monɨŋɨsogon da wɨŋ abɨsok ekwamaŋ bɨsapmon uwal da nak yo yokwisi aŋ namaŋ. Mani nak arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨŋ nepni.
Nak gɨldat kaloŋ kɨndagɨn gak dakon yut da yomakon egɨpbeŋ kaŋ, uŋun da tagɨsisi asak. Uŋun da gɨldat 1 tausen tɨmɨ dukon egɨ egɨ asat uŋun yapmaŋ mudosok. Nak oman amɨn pɨŋbisi egek Piŋkopno dakon yoma kagakon yoma kɨla agak amɨni egɨp do but dasi galak taŋ kɨmokdot. Mani amɨn yokwi da yutnon egɨp do dɨma galak tosot.
Yo morap akdɨsat uŋun uwal da paŋupbal ak do pi aŋ. Toktogɨsi nak aŋupbal ak do kosit wusɨk aŋ.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ da aŋpakno kokwinɨgek abɨŋ nepmaŋba kobogɨ do gen uŋuden baŋ yoyɨsat.
Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: “Namɨn da Amɨn Tagɨ dakon nandak nandak pɨndak nandaŋyo asak do Amɨn Tagɨ tagɨ iyɨŋdetjak?” Mani Kristo dakon nandak nandak ninon tosok.
Kɨŋ uŋudon agek paŋmuwukbi gen morapmɨ yoyɨŋek burɨ paŋteban aŋek don Grik mɨktɨmon kɨŋ altagɨt.
Mani Parisi amɨn gat ae gen teban mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn gat uŋun Jonon telagɨ pakbi dɨma sowit. Yaŋ aŋek Piŋkop da kosit kɨlegɨ yolɨk do agɨt uŋun manji ɨmgwit.)
Nin yaŋon da egɨpneŋ kaŋ, pasol pasol madepsi aŋek gen pi madep dakon gɨldat gat ae kɨndap tedepmɨ madepsi Piŋkop dakon uwalni wagɨl soŋ yomdɨsak uŋun do jomjom akdamaŋ.
Kalbi dɨpmɨn pokdok ae gɨldat kalba waŋga waŋga agakwan jap yet kwoŋ. Mani niaŋsi aŋek kwoŋ uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandɨsak.
“Amɨn Tagɨ, oman monjɨno yutnon pokdok. Kɨdarɨ alek taŋ, ae tepmɨ madepsi nandɨsak.”
Gak uwal dakon emat amɨni tapmɨmɨ toŋ dakon yoni tagɨsi gwayeŋ paŋapgul. Uŋun emat amɨn uŋun kɨlɨ kɨmak mudawit, ae emat dakon yo kabɨni tɨmɨtni dakon tapmɨm mɨni.
Yaŋban Juda amɨn da yawit, “Nin bɨlak 46 kabɨ da butgwan telagɨ yut on agɨmaŋ. Gak da gɨldat kapbɨ dogɨn wɨtjɨk do yosol, ma?”
Ae kundukon tɨlak kɨnda gat noman tagɨt. Tɨlak uŋun yaŋ: nugɨm yokwisi gɨptɨmɨ gami madepsi kɨnda noman tagɨt. Uŋun nugɨm yokwisi uŋun busuŋni 7 kabɨ. Aŋakwan jomɨ 10 yaŋ busuŋɨkon kwawit. Aŋakwan kɨla amɨn madep pelɨt 7 kabɨ da busuŋɨkon tawit.
Yabekban kɨŋ kosiron pakgwit da wɨsa dagokdo aeni kɨŋ Jopa kokup pap aŋkapmat aŋakwa gɨldat binap agɨt. Uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn Pita bɨsit pi ak do yut kwenon wɨgɨgɨt.
Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: “Amɨn kɨlegɨ amɨn da jap yet tɨŋtɨŋoŋ uŋun da tɨlak bupmɨ amɨn do yo morapmɨ yomɨsak. Aŋpakni kɨlegɨ uŋun toktogɨsi taŋ aŋaŋ kɨsak.”
Piŋkop uŋun gen kokwin kɨla amɨn kɨlegɨsi. Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ yokwi pakpak do japmɨ nandaŋek pabɨŋ yopmaŋdak.
Do jap yet kwaokgɨt amɨn mani mɨni, ae pakbi yomgut amɨn kɨsi mani mɨni. Piŋkop da iyɨ jap bamɨ paŋalon asak, do uŋun kaloŋgɨn mani toŋ.
Mɨŋat monjɨ kabɨno, amɨn da kosit kɨlegɨ yɨpmaŋ detni do top dayɨkdaŋ do kaŋ kɨmotni. Amɨn kɨnda aŋpak kɨlegɨ asak uŋun amɨn kɨlegɨ, Kristo yombem egɨsak.
Yaŋba Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kɨŋ yo morap kaŋ nandaŋyo aŋ uŋun Jon iyɨni.
Uŋun da kwenon Josep da datni Jekop ae yawi dɨwatni 75 kabɨ yaŋ kɨsisi morap apni do gen yɨpban kɨgɨt.
Yawe, nak ya yaŋ gayɨsat uŋun da paretno asak, uŋun tɨmɨkgi. Gen tebango do nayɨŋ dekgi.
Ae aŋelo 3 kweŋni pɨsogɨt. Aŋakwan gɨk madepsi kɨnda kalɨŋ da yaŋ soŋek kundu yɨpmaŋ abɨŋ magɨt. Uŋun pakbi madep madep pokgoŋ uŋun kabi kapbɨ yaŋ kokwin awiron kabi kɨndakon magɨt. Ae pakbi dabɨlon magɨt.
Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn amɨn uŋun pɨdaŋek yalɨŋ potni tɨmɨgek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yutnikon kɨgɨt.
ae provins dakon gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨni kɨsi dakon geni guramɨtni. Kɨla amɨn madep da uŋun amɨn yabegek aŋpak yokwi aŋ amɨn do kobogɨ yokwi aŋyomni, ae aŋpak kɨlegɨ aŋ amɨn dakon man pawɨgɨni do yopgut da ekwaŋ.
Bo Dat nagon egakwan nak Daron egɨsat uŋun nandabɨ bamɨ dɨma ak? Nak gen dayɨt uŋun naga da nandak nandagon da dɨma dayɨt. Dat nagon egɨsak uŋun da pini asak.
Kɨla amɨn madep tapmɨmɨ toŋ dapban kɨmakgwit. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Do yaŋ gayɨsat, on mɨŋat dakon dɨwarɨni morapmɨ Piŋkop da yopmaŋ ɨban nak do but dasi galagɨ madepsi nandaŋ namɨsak. Mani dɨwarɨni tagapmɨsok taŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn Piŋkop da dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ ɨmjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da nak do galagɨ madep dɨma nandaŋ namjak.”
Gak da tap ɨdap yɨpbɨ ɨmal da yaŋ mɨktɨm wutjɨgɨt. Aŋaki pakbi da kabap morap kɨsi wutjɨgɨt.
Amɨn da ɨmal baŋ gɨptɨmni wamaŋgaŋ uŋudeŋ, gak gaga naŋ teŋteŋɨ naŋ wamaŋdal. Amɨn da ɨmal yut ɨlɨkba pɨkwaŋ uŋudeŋ, gak da kundu gat ae gɨk morap gat yopmaŋdal.
Nak paŋmuwukbi dakon kɨla amɨn da mɨŋat gak gat ae gwakgo gat do papia on mandaŋ damɨsat. Piŋkop da gak iyɨ do manjɨgɨt. Nak asisi ji do but dasi galak taŋ damɨsat, ae nak gɨn dɨma, mɨŋat amɨn morap gen bamɨ nandaŋ uŋun kɨsi da ji do but dasi galak taŋ damaŋ.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak naga da nandak nandagon yo kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma abeŋ. Datno dakon gen nandaŋek gen kokwin asat. Naga dakon galaktok yolek dɨma asat, Dat nak yabekgɨt uŋun dakon galaktok yoldat, do gen kokwin kɨlegɨ asat.
Paŋdetni da tɨlak gen uŋun yagɨt dakon mibɨlɨ do iyɨwit.
Yesu bɨsap morapmɨ agɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn kokup pap yɨpmaŋek Ɨleŋ Olipmon wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨgakwan paŋdetni kɨsi yolba wɨgɨwit.
Yesu pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda Gadara mɨktɨmon kɨŋ altaŋban amɨn bamorɨ koŋni toŋ uŋun da amɨn kɨmakba paŋkɨ tɨp kɨnamgwan yopmaŋgaŋ mɨktɨmon da abɨŋ Yesu altaŋ ɨmgumal. Uŋun amɨn bamot amɨn dapdapni yokwisi. Do amɨn uŋun do pasalek uŋun kosit naŋ dɨma agɨpgwit.
Ji yaŋ aŋakwa nak gen kɨnda dɨma yagɨm. Do nak dɨsi yombem yaŋ nandaŋ namaŋ, mani dɨmasi. Abɨsok nak tebai dayɨŋek nomansi gen pikon depdɨsat.
Gengo uŋun aŋteban aŋaki dagok dagogɨ mɨni toktogɨsi tosok uŋun kalɨpsigwan kɨlɨ nandagɨm.
Mani Galio da Akaia mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn madep yɨkgɨt bɨsapmon Juda amɨn da muwugek Pol uwal aŋ ɨmɨŋek abɨdaŋ ɨlɨk aŋaŋ gen pi yutnon aŋkɨ yɨpmaŋek yaŋ yawit,
Piŋkop, amɨn da pakbi do tep toŋ uŋudeŋ, nak Piŋkop egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ gak do nandɨsat. Ni bɨsapmon kɨko Piŋkop gat egɨpdeŋ?
Nak gak gat egɨsat. Nak dakon amɨn morapmɨsi on kokup papmon ekwaŋ, do amɨn kɨnda da dɨma gɨtjak.”
Ji kɨŋ monjɨ ŋakŋak ɨmalnaŋ wabi bulmakau ɨdapmon potdɨsak do wɨsɨŋ koni. Uŋun kaŋek bamɨ dayɨsat yaŋ nandani.”
Gɨkwem kagagwan da gen kɨnda yaŋ altagɨt, “On Monjɨno, pino asak do manjɨgɨm, do ji geni nandani.”
Yaŋ yaŋek uŋun moneŋ baŋ mɨktɨm kwoba wasawit mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda yumaŋ nawit. Yumaŋ naŋek amɨn dubagɨkon da abɨŋ kɨmokgoŋ uŋun dakon amɨn kɨmakba yopyop tamo kɨnda wasawit.
Kwa Erot da bɨsap kɨnda aŋ yomɨŋek uŋun bɨsapmon kɨla amɨn madep yɨk ɨmalni paŋek kɨla amɨn madep tamonikon yɨkgɨt. Yɨgek gen madepsi yoyɨgɨt.
Not kabɨ, nin ji gat egek Piŋkop dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yagɨmaŋ bɨsapmon nin yo nibaŋ naŋ paŋyo aneŋ yaŋ do pi tebaisi agɨmaŋ uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ. Nin dakon yɨyɨt do jɨgɨ dɨma pani yaŋ do gɨldarɨ ae kalbi pi madepsi agɨmaŋ.
Ji Piŋkop da papiakon gen tosok uŋun dɨma manjɨŋ nandawit? Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Yut agak amɨn da gwak yokwi yaŋ yaŋek maba kɨgɨt, uŋun gwak amɨn da yut kodɨgɨkon tɨp kɨnda naŋ tɨdawit da akdak.
Ae mɨŋat kɨnda da eni yɨpmaŋek kɨŋ wɨli kalugɨ pasak kaŋ, uŋun mɨŋat yumabi asak.”
Kosit ɨleŋon pakbi kɨnda pokdok uŋudon pakbi naŋ teban taŋek emaron teban tokdɨsak.
(Asi, nak amɨn kabɨ dɨ gat kɨsi telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomgum. Uŋun Stepanas da yutnon egɨpgwit amɨn baŋ soŋ yomgum. Ae amɨn dɨwarɨ gat soŋ yomgum bo dɨma, uŋun nak dɨma nandɨsat.)
Dɨsi nandaŋ, sot kɨnda da abɨdaŋban nak wasok wasoksi abɨŋ jikon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋagɨm.
Aŋakwa aŋelo da kɨndap altakon tagɨt uŋun abɨdaŋ mukwa soksok ɨdapgwan yopban tugaŋba kɨndap maban mɨktɨmon mawit. Mɨktɨmon maŋakwa mal dakon teŋteŋɨ da yamgwit. Aŋakwa nandaŋapbo wuwɨk madepsi noman taŋakwa kɨrɨrɨŋ agɨt, ae mɨktɨm wudɨp agɨt.
Ji monjɨ dakon pɨŋbini egek gawak ɨmni. Butjap tepmɨ nandɨsak, do japmɨ nandaŋ daban dɨ kɨmakbam. Amɨn morap paŋkutnosak do Piŋkopmon kwaŋ uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ ani.
Moses yo uŋun altaŋban kaŋek but morap agɨt. Yaŋ nandaŋek kapmatjok da pakyaŋsi kok do aŋek kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan Amɨn Tagɨ da yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
Meŋ da butgwan pasɨlɨ tamogwan tagok tagok agɨm bɨsapmon gak da pɨndagaki kɨdat morapno tagaŋek notnikon saŋbewit.
Uŋun da binapmon “amɨn dakon monji yombem kɨnda” akban kagɨm. Uŋun ɨmal dubakni paban pɨgɨ kandapni kɨsi wɨtjɨgɨt. Aŋek nap kɨnda gol baŋ wasaŋbi naŋ pɨbɨrɨkon aŋgwasɨŋek wamgut.
“Kokup kɨndakon kɨŋakwa not aŋ damɨŋek jap daba kaŋ uŋun si noni.
Ae nin notnin kɨnda gat yabetno amɨn bamot gat kɨsi kwaŋ. Bɨsap morapmɨ pi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨkon aŋkɨlɨk kono pi but dasi aban kagɨmaŋ. Uŋun ji da pi tagɨsi akdaŋ yaŋsi nandɨsak, do pi uŋun ak do galagɨsi nandɨsak.
Yawe, gak dakon nawa gen kalɨpmɨsi uŋun do nandaŋ egɨsat. Uŋun da butno aŋteban asak.
Uŋun gɨldat da pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo Yesu boron yɨgek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda do kɨno.”
Nin Piŋkop but dasi galak taŋ ɨmamaŋ ae gen tebani guramɨkgamaŋ kaŋ nin yaŋsi nandaneŋ, nin Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat monjɨyoni but dasi galak taŋ yomamaŋ.
Mani gak bɨsap dubagɨ abɨdono egɨpneŋ uŋun tagɨ dɨma. Do nandaŋ yawok nimɨŋek genin pɨsɨpmɨsok on nandaŋ nibi do gayamaŋ.
Aŋakwan Jon dam tebanon yɨgek Kristo da pi agɨt dakon gen bin nandaŋek paŋdet kabɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Yaŋ yoyɨŋba obip amɨn moneŋ tɨmɨgek geni guramɨkgwit. Gen uŋun Juda amɨn da yaŋ aŋ ɨreŋ aba abɨsokyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn yoŋ.
Yaŋ aŋakwa Yesu da nandaŋ gadatni kaŋek amɨn kɨsirɨ kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Monjɨ, dɨwarɨgo yopmaŋ gamɨsat.”
Nak uŋun da binapmon pi tapmɨmɨ toŋ amɨn kɨnda da dɨma agɨt uŋun baŋ agɨm. Yaŋ dɨma agɨm tam, yokwini dakon gen kɨnda dɨma tosok. Mani nak da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨm uŋun pɨndakgwit, mani nak gat Datno gat kɨsi do nandaba yokwi tok aŋnimaŋ.
Yaŋ aŋapbo mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn gat ae kɨla amɨn dakon gen kokwin amɨn kabɨ da nandaŋ namgwit, do nak da pi agɨm uŋun da ji tagɨ dayɨŋ teŋteŋoni. Uŋun da Juda amɨn notnin Damaskus egɨpgwit do papia kɨnda mandawit. Uŋun naba nak Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn kabɨ Damaskus egɨpgwit uŋun tɨmɨk paŋobɨŋ Jerusalem dam teban yutnon yopmaŋek kobogɨ do yo yokwi aŋyomni do aŋek kɨgɨm.”
Kwen Kokup da iyɨ yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek yaŋ yosok, “Piŋkop uŋun aŋpakni kɨlegɨsi. Uŋun iyɨ gen kokwin agak ami.”
Juda amɨn, bo Grik amɨn, bo Piŋkop dakon paŋmuwukbi da yokwikon moni dakon aŋpak kɨnda dɨma ani.
Ae yoni morapmɨ amɨn Piŋkop da mani abɨŋ yɨpmaŋdak, do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ asak, nido jareŋ da bɨrɨpmɨkwaŋ uŋun da tɨlak kɨmotdaŋ.
Not kabɨ, babɨknin Dewit uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ do asisi dayɨŋ teŋteŋoko. Dewit uŋun kɨmakban kɨlɨsi wayɨkgwit. Bumjotni dakon tamo abɨsok on kokupmon komaŋ.
Mani Juda amɨn da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Uŋun amɨn da iyɨ do ‘Nak Piŋkop dakon Monji’ yaŋ yagɨt. Nin dakon gen teban da uŋuden amɨn si kɨmotni do yosok.”
Uŋudon da wɨsa dagokdo Mitilini yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨm kɨnda mani Kios kapmatjok taŋban kaŋek yapgumaŋ. Ae gɨldat kɨnda do tap uŋun pudaŋ yapmaŋek Samos kokup papmon kɨŋ altagɨmaŋ. Ae uŋudon da wɨsa dagokdo Miletus kokup papmon kɨŋ altagɨmaŋ.
Abɨsok Amɨn Tagɨ Kristo uŋun Dewit da kokupmon ji do altak. Uŋun ji yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do altak.
Parisi amɨn gat gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat Jerusalem kokup papmon da obɨŋ Yesu aŋgwasɨŋek muwukgwit.
Yaŋba Pailat da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep naŋ yɨpbo kɨsak do nandaŋ?”
Ji abɨsok Piŋkop ae Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu tagɨsi nandaŋ yomaŋ. Uŋun aŋpagon nandaŋ yawot ae but yawot da ji da egɨp egɨpmon sigɨn madep tosak do bɨsit asat.
Yaŋdo, nak Yesu Kristokon gadako Piŋkop dakon pi agɨmak uŋun do butgalaksi nandɨsat.
Yawe, gengo nayɨŋ dekbɨ guramɨk egapbo bɨsapno mudosak.
Emat amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da obɨŋ Pol abɨdaŋek nap teban bamorɨ baŋ Pol abɨsɨni do yoyɨgɨt. Aŋek amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On namɨn amɨn kɨnda? Ae ninaŋ agɨt?”
Uŋun gen dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ. Amɨn da monjɨ paŋalaŋ uŋudeŋ altoŋ amɨn morap kɨsi da Piŋkop dakon gwakni dɨma. Monjɨ morap yaŋ teban tok kosiron da altaŋbi uŋun dagɨn Abraham dakon babɨkni.
“Amɨn kɨnda da gen pikon gep do gen yaŋ gaban kaŋ, jil gen pi tamokon kɨk do aŋek kosiron kɨŋek gen uŋun tepmɨsi aŋmɨlɨp ak do pi anjil. Yaŋ dɨma anjil kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da gen kokwin kɨla agak amɨn da kɨsiron gepban uŋun da obip amɨn da kɨsiron gepban dam teban yutnon gepdɨsak.
Yawe da yokwikon baŋ pulugaŋban dɨma kɨmokdot. Ae but dasi galak taŋ namɨŋek bupmɨ nandaŋ namɨsak.
Jekop uŋun Josep dakon datni. Josep uŋun Maria dakon eni. Aŋakwan Maria da Yesu aŋalagɨt. Yesu uŋun Kristo yaŋ iyaŋ.
Not kabɨ, nak asi dayɨsat, Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo da jikon pi tagɨsi asak uŋun do butnokon da nandako yo madepsi asak. Dɨsi nandaŋ, uŋun bamɨsi. Ae yaŋyo kɨsi nandani, nak gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ kɨmoronsi kɨŋ kɨŋ asat. Gen on bamɨsi yosot.
Kristo da nin do but dasi galaktaŋ nimɨsak, do yo kɨnda da nin uŋun kagagwan naŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋwasisak. Jɨgɨ tepmɨyo paneŋ, bo amɨn da yo yokwi aŋ nimni, bo jap do aneŋ, bo ɨmal do wadak wadak aneŋ, bo yo yokwisi kɨnda da nin paŋupbal ak do asak, bo emat ninon noman tosak kaŋ, uŋun yo morap da tagɨ paŋwasini? Uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨmasi!
Piŋkop, yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨnin, kalɨpsi nin tagɨsi egɨpgumaŋ abɨsok paŋkaluk abɨ yaŋgɨn egɨpneŋ. Butjap saŋbeŋek dɨma nandaŋ nibi.
Ae mɨktɨmon datnin do nandani. Uŋun da nin paŋkɨlek ak do jɨgɨ nimɨŋakwa nandano wukwan yomgumaŋ. Yaŋ agɨmaŋ do wupnin dakon Datni da nin paŋkɨlek asak bɨsapmon uŋun do madepsi gawak ɨmɨŋek egɨp egɨp abɨdoneŋsi.
Amɨn Tagɨ, piŋkop gak yombem dɨ mɨni. Gak da kɨsi morap yapmaŋdal. Ae amɨn kɨnda da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ asal uŋudeŋ kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma asak.
Aŋpulugoki do jomjom aŋegɨsat, do aŋpakno tagɨsi ae kɨlegɨsi uŋun da nak aŋkutnoni dosi nandɨsat.
Uŋun kap yaŋ yoŋ, “Nin Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo, nin muwugek Piŋkop dakon man awɨgɨno. Israel amɨn, nin Yawe dakon man awɨgɨno.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji pɨndakba emat amɨn da abɨŋ Jerusalem aŋgwasɨŋek akba kaŋ, yaŋ nandani, kokup pap wagɨl tasɨk tosak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun abɨsak.
Yo morap yaŋ da arɨpmon wasaŋek mukwa sogok amɨn gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ telagɨ yut dakon yut burɨ mibɨltogɨ do wɨgek pini awit.
Uŋun amɨn da Piŋkop dakon gen bamɨ yɨpmaŋek top gen baŋ yolgwit. Aŋek Piŋkop yo morap wasagɨt uŋun manji ɨmɨŋek yo morap wasagɨt uŋun baŋ gawak yomɨŋek omani aŋyomgwit. Mani Piŋkop yo morap wasagɨt uŋun naŋgɨn toktogɨsi aŋkɨsiŋ kɨmorɨ. Uŋun asi.
Pɨdaŋ agakwan kombɨ amɨn Aisaia dakon papia ɨba abɨdaŋ wɨtdalek gen yaŋ naŋ manjɨgɨt:
Bupmɨ amɨn jap arɨpmɨsi naŋ tugokdaŋ. Ae Yawe wɨsɨŋ kokdo pi aŋ amɨn uŋun da mani aŋkɨsikdaŋ. Piŋkop da paŋpulugaŋban dagok dagogɨ mɨni butni tagɨsi taŋ aŋaŋ wɨgɨkdɨsak.
Yaŋ yaŋek Pita, Jems, ae Jon kɨsi tɨmɨkban kɨwit. Kɨŋ burɨkon jɨgɨ madepsi nandaŋek
Ananias uŋun kapmatjok da abɨŋ agek nak yaŋ nayɨgɨt, ‘Sol not, dabɨlgo aeni sɨŋtosak.’ Yaŋ nayɨŋban uŋudon gɨn sɨŋtaŋek Ananias kagɨm.
“Jil ason kokup tosok uŋudon kɨnjil. Uŋudon kɨŋ kaŋbal donki bɨlagɨ kɨnda amɨn da kwenikon dɨma yɨkbi uŋun napmon aŋteban abi da akban konjil. Napmɨ wɨtdalek aŋopjil.
Ae ji Kristo dakon, ae Kristo uŋun Piŋkop dakon.
Yawe, gak kaloŋ gɨn nak dakon yo morapno. Yo morapno gak da kɨsiron gɨn toŋ. Yo morapno paŋkutnaŋ namɨsal.
Pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo paŋdetni pakbi ɨdapmon pɨgɨwit.
Mani naga yaŋ nandɨsat, amɨn dɨma pasak kaŋ, kɨsɨk kɨsɨk egɨpdɨsak. Piŋkop dakon Wup da nakyo kɨsi aŋtagap aban gen on yosot yaŋsi nandɨsat.
Kɨlɨ don Josep Arimatea kokupmon nani da kɨŋ Yesu dakon bumjotni Pailat da nandaŋ ɨban aŋkɨsak do iyɨgɨt. (Josep uŋun Yesu dakon paŋdetni kɨnda. Mani Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn do pasalek Yesu do nandaŋ gadatni si aŋkɨsɨbɨgɨt.) Pailat da nandaŋ ɨban Josep da kɨŋ Yesu dakon bumjotni aŋkɨgɨt.
Pailat gen uŋun nandaŋek mibɨltok pasalgɨt uŋun si yapmaŋek madepsi pasalgɨt.
Yawe, gak dakon yut do but dasi galak tosot. Gak dakon tɨlɨmgo uŋudon tosok.
Paŋdetni da gen uŋun nandaŋek iyɨwit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, uŋun yo morap dukon noman toni?” Iyɨŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨmakbi dakon bumjotni dukwan toŋ, sɨŋgɨŋ uŋudon gɨn muwukgaŋ.”
Kalɨp kɨlɨ dayɨgɨmaŋ gen uŋun baŋgɨn ae dayɨsat: amɨn kɨnda da Gen Bin Tagɨsi kɨnda nin da dayɨno abɨdawit uŋudensi dɨma yaŋ teŋteŋosak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Tɨpdom do amɨn asak.
Piŋkop da gak aŋpulugaŋban yɨpmaŋ derɨ mɨni mɨŋat amɨnyokon Yesu do nandaŋ gadat asal uŋun yaŋ teŋteŋok abi do Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨsat. Yaŋ aŋaki Kristo da yo morap tagɨsi nimɨsak uŋun do pakyaŋsi nandaki.
Israel dakon Sipsip Kɨla Amɨn, gak Josep dakon amɨn kabɨ sipsip baŋ yaŋ kosit yolɨsal. Bɨsitnin nandaŋ nibi. Aŋelo madep serabim bamot da binapmon kɨla amɨn madep yɨgek tɨlɨmgo mɨŋat amɨn kabɨgo do yolɨŋbɨ pɨndatni.
Maikel uŋun aŋelo morap dakon mibɨltok amɨni, mani uŋun yaŋ dɨma agɨt. Maikel gat Sunduk gat namɨn da Moses dakon gɨptɨm abɨdosak yaŋ do gen emat agɨmal bɨsapmon, Maikel Sunduk do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨŋek gen yaŋ ɨmdo si pasalgɨt. Yaŋ gɨn yagɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ da iyɨ gen tebaisi gayɨsak dosi nandɨsat.”
Nak Belsebul da aŋpulugaŋban koŋ yoldat kaŋ, dɨsi dakon notji koŋ yolgaŋ uŋun amɨn kabɨ ni tapmɨmon da koŋ yolgaŋ? Uŋun amɨn kabɨ da genji kokwinɨgek gulusuŋ yoŋ yaŋ tagɨ dayɨni.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji nak do but dasi galak taŋ namaŋ kaŋ, yo morap ani do yagɨm uŋun guramɨtni.
Asisi dayɨsat, mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn da Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋek mɨŋat on da yo ak uŋun dakon gen bin kɨsi yoyɨŋakwa nandakdaŋ. Aŋakwa uŋun mɨŋat dakon man bini dɨma pasɨldɨsak.”
Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopji uŋun naŋ gɨn gawak ɨmɨŋek oman aŋɨmni.’ ”
Aŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek egɨpgwit ae amɨn kɨsi morap da uŋun amɨn do nandaba tagɨsi agɨt. Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ amɨn dɨwarɨ but tobɨl aba Amɨn Tagɨ da yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkban paŋmuwukbi kabɨkon saŋbeŋba kabi madepsi agɨt.
Telagɨ oman amɨngo dapmaŋek bumjotni yo ɨsalɨ yaŋ nandaŋek yum pɨndagakwa sɨŋgɨŋ gat ae joŋ pɨŋan gat da gɨptɨmni noŋ.
Ji nandaŋ gadaron tebaisi agek paŋkɨlɨkban kaŋ geni dɨmasi nandani. Ji nandaŋ, Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨwarɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ, uŋun ji da tepmɨ paŋ yaŋ gɨn paŋ.
Pi ɨsalno Timoti da gɨldatni tagɨ damɨsak. Ae nak dakon dɨwatno Lusias, ae Jeson, ae Sosipata uŋunyo kɨsi da gɨldatni tagɨ damaŋ.
Kɨmot da nak nap da yaŋ wamgut. Nak kɨmakbi kokup do nandaŋek pasol pasol madepsi agɨm. Yaŋ aŋek nandaba kɨk madepsi agɨm.
Mani Stiwen Telagɨ Wup da aŋpulugaŋek nandak nandak tagɨsi ɨmɨŋakwan geni abɨk do aŋtɨdok awit.
Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do nin yo dabɨl da si pɨndagek dɨma ekwamaŋ, nin nandaŋ gadaron dagɨn ekwamaŋ.
Piŋkop dakon gen abɨdaŋakwa jɨgɨ morapmɨsi noman taŋ damgwit, mani nin gat ae Amɨn Tagɨ gat da jɨgɨ paŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk pagɨmaŋ jiyo kɨsi uŋun aŋpak yolakwa Telagɨ Wup da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk damgut.
Yum kaŋakwa Kristo da but yawot damɨsak uŋun da nandak nandakji kɨla asak. Nido, Piŋkop da ji iyɨ do manjɨŋek butji yaworɨ taŋakwan gɨptɨm kaloŋɨ egɨpni do nandɨsak. Ae ji yo morap do Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨni.
Ji kɨŋ Saion kokup pap dakon dam madep aŋgwasɨŋek uwal pɨndat do dam uŋun da kwenon yut dubak dubak abi uŋun manjɨni.
Yaŋ yaŋban gɨkwem da pɨŋ ɨlɨmɨk yomaŋakwan gen kɨnda uŋungwan da yaŋ altagɨt, “Uŋun Monjɨno, nak uŋun do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsat. Ji geni nandani.”
Yoyɨŋba Gerasa mɨktɨm dakon mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi pasol pasol madepsi nandaŋek Yesu uŋun yopmaŋ dek kɨsak do iyɨwit. Iyɨŋba boron wɨgek yopmaŋ kɨgɨt.
Bɨsap kɨnda apdɨsak uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da yaŋ yokdaŋ, ‘Mɨŋat monjɨ suŋ ekwaŋ ae mɨŋat monjɨ mɨni ae mɨŋat monjɨ da mumɨ dɨma naŋbi, uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.’
