Nido Piŋkop Kristokon pi aŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn morap mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun tɨmɨk iyɨkon paŋapban but kaloŋ awit. Uŋun yokwi morapni awit uŋun do saŋbeŋek dɨma nandaŋ yomgut. Ae Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨnyo tɨmɨk iyɨkon paŋapban but kaloŋ ani dakon gen bin mɨŋat amɨnyokon yoyɨneŋ uŋun dakon pi nimgut.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda da ɨleŋ kɨnda yaŋ iyɨsak, ‘Gak pɨdaŋ tap kaga pɨgɨ’ yaŋ iyɨŋek but bamot dɨma asak kaŋ, uŋun iyɨsak uŋudeŋ gɨn altokdɨsak.
Amɨn da aŋpak yokwi uŋun ani do nandaŋek top gen uŋun dayɨkdaŋ. Mani geni dɨma nandani. Aŋpak uŋuden dogɨn Piŋkop da amɨn geni dɨma guramɨkgaŋ uŋun do butjap madepsi nandaŋ yomɨsak.
Aŋpakgo kɨlegɨ uŋun madepsi kabap daman yombem. Gen kokwin pi agakgo uŋun tap ɨdap ɨlarɨsi yombem. Yawe, gak da amɨn gat bɨt kɨlapyo gat kɨlani aŋaki tagɨsi ekwaŋ.
Aŋpakgo kɨlegɨ uŋun toktogɨsi taŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdaŋ. Ae nawa gengo uŋun bamɨsi.
Yaŋ aŋaki Juda amɨn dakon babɨkni dakon binap gen do mɨrak saŋbeŋek dɨma yopni, ae gen bamɨ manji ɨmaŋ amɨn dakon gen tebani do mɨrak dɨma yopni.
Yaŋ iyɨŋek ae amɨn kɨnda yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋ nak nol.” Mani amɨn uŋun da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nandaŋ namɨŋaki kɨŋ datno wayɨk yɨpmaŋek don abɨŋ golbeŋ.”
Amɨn kɨlegɨ dakon yoni kaloŋɨsok uŋun da amɨn yokwi dakon yoni morapmɨ yapmaŋ mudosok.
“Do yaŋ dayɨsat, nak da kombɨ amɨn ae nandak nandak amɨn ae yoyɨŋdet amɨn yabekgo jikon apdaŋ. Apba ji da uŋun amɨn dɨwarɨ yolba pasal kokupmɨ kokupmɨ kɨkdaŋ. Aŋakwa dɨwarɨ tɨmɨgek dapba kɨmotdaŋ, ae dɨwarɨ tɨlak kɨndapmon dapdaŋ, ae dɨwarɨ muwut muwut yutjikon nap kɨrɨŋbaŋ baljokdaŋ.
Nak ji gat egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon uŋun do kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm. Ji uŋun kɨlɨ ɨŋtawit, ma?
Yawe apban kaŋek kabap da pakbi dagoŋ. Uŋun mɨktɨm morap kɨsi dakon Amɨn Tagɨ egɨsak.
Mani ji da yoni mɨni amɨn uŋun nandaba pɨŋban yomaŋ. Namɨn da pabɨŋ depmaŋek jɨgɨ damɨŋek ji tɨmɨk gen pikon depmaŋgaŋ? Uŋun yoni morapmɨ amɨn dagɨn aŋpak uŋun aŋ.
Mani kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil nido nak wusɨk do pi amal? Nak Datno da yutnon egɨpmɨsi egɨsat jil uŋun dɨma nandamal?”
“Mani kokup ɨsalni da nandaba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmgwit. Yaŋ nandawit do amɨn tagɨ uŋun kɨŋakwan kokup amɨn dɨ yabekba kɨŋ yawit, ‘Nin uŋun amɨn da kɨla amɨn madepnin egɨpjak do dɨma galak tomaŋ.’
Piŋkop gen da yaŋ yosok: “Amɨn kɨnda yo kɨnda do yo madepsi yaŋ nandak do kaŋ, Amɨn Tagɨ dogɨn yo madepsi yaŋ nandaŋ ɨmdo.”
Yaŋba Pailat da yoyɨgɨt, “Dɨsi abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ dɨsi dakon gen tebanji yolek gen pikon yɨpni.” Yaŋban Juda amɨn da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin da amɨn kɨnda aŋatno kɨmotjak dakon yaŋ dagok ninon dɨmasi tosok.”
Muwut muwut yutnikon baŋ ji dolek uŋun gat dɨma muwutni do yaŋsop aŋ damdaŋ. Bɨsap kɨnda apjak, uŋudon amɨn da dɨkba kɨmagakwa uŋun amɨn da nin da Piŋkop do yo tagɨsi aŋ ɨmamaŋ yaŋ nandakdaŋ.
Mɨŋat monjɨyoni tagɨ kɨmotni, aŋakwa amɨn don altoni da uŋun amɨn dakon man dɨma nandani dosi nandɨsat.
Aba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ dakon kɨla amɨn madepni uŋun man madepni toŋ, do iyɨ do nandaba wukwanek gen tebai yaŋek amɨn kabɨni kɨla aŋ. Aŋek ‘Nin amɨn dakon paŋpulugokni ekwamaŋ’ yaŋ topmon da yoŋ.
Abɨsok nak Dat yabekban pɨgɨmon tobɨl wɨgɨkdɨsat. Mani jikon da kɨnda da ‘Gak dukon kɨsal?’ yaŋ dɨma nayaŋ.
“Amɨn Tagɨ Tapmɨm Ami, kalɨp yagɨl uŋun da tɨlagon oman amɨngo nak but yaworon da tagɨ kɨmokgeŋ.
Nak naga uŋun amɨn dɨma nandaŋ ɨmgum. Mani Piŋkop da nak telagɨ pakbi soŋ yobeŋ do yabegek yaŋ nayɨgɨt, ‘Gak kaŋbɨ Telagɨ Wup amɨn kɨnda da kwenon pɨŋ yɨkban kaŋ yaŋ nandaki, uŋun amɨn da amɨn Telagɨ Wup naŋ telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomdɨsak.’
Yawe uŋun kɨla amɨn madep egɨsak. Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn ji pasal nɨmnɨmɨkyo ani. Kɨla amɨn madep tamonikon yɨgakwan aŋelo madep serabim da terɨ terɨ akgaŋ. Aŋakwa mɨktɨm wudɨp asak.
Josep uŋun Galili provinskon, Nasaret kokupmon egɨpgut. Mani Dewit da yawi dɨwaron da altagɨt, do Judia provinskon, Dewit dakon kokup Betlehem uŋudon kɨgɨt.
Gengo kɨlegɨsi uŋun guramɨkdat, do nandaŋ kokwino tagɨsi da amɨn pelaŋ dakon nandak nandak yapmaŋdak.
Mani ji yaŋ dɨma egɨpni. Amɨn kɨnda jikon man madepni toŋ, uŋun amɨn monjɨ kɨnda buŋonsi altagɨt uŋun da tɨlagon egɨpjak. Ae kɨla amɨnji da oman monjɨ da tɨlak egɨpjak.
Kɨlɨ nak aŋelo dakon kandap da kapmatjok ŋwakbeŋ aŋek gawak ɨm do agɨm. Mani yaŋ nayɨgɨt, “Yaŋ dɨma abi! Gak gat ae not kabɨgo gat da Yesu da gen yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt uŋun nandaŋ gadaŋ amɨn kabɨ, ji da Piŋkop oman aŋɨmaŋ, uŋudeŋ gɨn nak kɨsi oman amɨni gɨn, do Piŋkop naŋ gawak ɨbi. Nin nandamaŋ, Yesu Kristo da gen yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt, uŋun dagɨn amɨn paŋtagap aban kombɨ gen yoŋ.”
Mani Amɨn Tagɨ da aŋpaknin dakon kobogɨ nimɨŋek nin paŋmɨlɨp asak. Uŋun mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨnyo gat dɨma pasɨlneŋ do yaŋ asak.
Jerusalem amɨn ji Yawe aŋkɨsini. Saion amɨn ji Piŋkopji aŋkɨsini.
Amɨn kɨnda da aŋpak yaworɨ dɨma aŋ ɨmjak dosi nandɨsat. Ae amɨn kɨnda da monjɨ datni mɨni egɨpni uŋun do bupmɨ dɨma nandaŋ yomjak.
Nak Yawe da aŋpulugosak do nandaŋek jomjom asat. Aŋek geni do tebaisi nandaŋ gadasat.
Ji nin do bɨsit ani. Piŋkop da dabɨlon butningwan gwaljɨgɨ mɨni yaŋsi nandamaŋ, ae yo morapmon aŋpak kɨlegɨsi baŋgɨn ak do nandamaŋ.
Piŋkop da yaŋ yosok, “Yokwi aŋ amɨn nandak nandak tagɨ dɨ dɨmasi tɨmɨtdaŋ. Bret naŋba mudoŋ, uŋun da tɨlak mɨŋat amɨno naŋ mudoŋ. Ae nak da paŋpulugokeŋ do bɨsit dɨma aŋ namaŋ.”
Yaŋ aŋakwa Yesu paŋdetni 12 kabɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ae jiyo kɨsi nepmaŋ dek kɨkdaŋ?”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji niaŋ nandaŋ? Amɨn kɨnda sipsipni 100 kabɨkon da kɨnda pasɨljak kaŋ, niaŋ asak? Kaŋ 99 kabɨ ɨleŋ obakon yopban jap naŋek egakwa kaloŋɨ pasɨljak uŋun wusɨk do kɨsak.
Juda amɨn dakon mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ da Pailat yaŋ iyɨwit, “ ‘Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madepni’ yaŋ dɨma mandaki. Gen yaŋ mandaki: ‘On amɨn da yagɨt, Nak Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madepni.’ ”
Piŋkop da amɨn yokwi yo yokwisi aŋ yomjak bɨsapmon, amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdaŋ. Amɨn kɨlegɨ da amɨn yokwi dakon yawi baŋ kandapni sugokdaŋ.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ni tɨlak gen kɨnda naŋ dayɨko amɨn abɨsok ekwaŋ uŋun dakon aŋpak do nandaba pɨsosak? Uŋun niaŋen amɨn dɨ da ekwaŋ?
Aŋek babɨkni yolban paŋkɨ Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da binapmon egek mɨktɨm ŋwakŋwarɨkon egɨpni do yagɨt.
Uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ Telagɨ Wup kɨsi da nin do yaŋ teŋteŋok asak. Mibɨltok yaŋ yosok:
Gɨptɨm morap uŋun arɨp gɨn dɨma. Amɨn uŋun gɨptɨmni ŋwakŋwat, ae bɨt kɨlapyo gɨptɨmni ŋwakŋwat, ae mɨnam gat ae tap kɨlapyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn.
Ae uŋun amɨn goman tagɨ sopjak yaŋ nandaŋ teban taŋek amɨn kɨnda do yo ɨmni kaŋ, ji amɨn tagɨ dɨma. Yokwi pakpak amɨn notni da goman uŋun kɨsisi sopdaŋ yaŋ nandaŋek notni do yo yomaŋ.
Wɨsɨŋek aŋelo bamorɨ ɨmalni kwakwagɨ pɨndakgɨt. Uŋun aŋelo bamot Yesu dakon bumjotni da tagɨt uŋudon yɨkgɨmal. Kɨnda busuŋɨ da tagɨron yɨkgɨt, aŋakwan kɨnda kandapni da tagɨron yɨkgɨt.
Bɨsitno pakyaŋsi tagɨsi nandaŋek gen kobogɨ nayɨki. Jɨgɨ uŋun da nak aŋupbal akdɨsak.
Piŋkop but yawot nimɨsak uŋun da ji paŋtagap aban egɨp egɨpji kɨsi parek ɨmɨŋek telagɨsi egɨpni dosi nandamaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek wupji ae butji ae gɨptɨmji dakon kɨla aŋakwan dɨwarɨsi mɨni egakwa Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo tobɨl apjak.
Yaŋban Yesu agek amɨn uŋun abɨdaŋ aŋopni do yoyɨgɨt. Yoyɨŋban kapmat aŋapba Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
Mani emaron teban toni dakon tapmɨm dɨma taŋ yomgut, do Kwen Kokup ae saŋbeŋek dɨma egɨpgwit.
Mɨŋat amɨn morap nak gat ekwamaŋ uŋun da gak do gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ yɨpba obɨsak. Ae nin dakon gɨldatnin tagɨ mɨŋat amɨnyo Yesu Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimaŋ uŋun yoyɨki. Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni ji morap kɨsikon tosak do bɨsit asat.
Yaŋ yaŋek monjɨ uŋun abɨdaŋ ɨlɨk pigaga da waŋga aŋaŋ abɨgɨ aŋakba kɨmakgɨt.
Ji dɨsi do nin nandaŋ kokwinin tagɨsi yaŋ nandaŋ, do nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn dakon geni nandak do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋ.
Bɨsit aŋek abɨŋ pɨndakban paŋdetni dɨpmɨn do yokwisi aŋek aeni dɨpmɨn sigɨn pakgwit. Paŋyolban pɨdaŋ ni gen naŋ iyɨneŋ yaŋ do ɨŋtaŋek ɨsal yɨkgwit.
Mɨŋat amɨnyo do aŋpak tagɨsi aŋyomni, ae notji paŋpulugok do yo kabɨsi baŋ notji do yomɨŋ yomɨŋ ani. Uŋun aŋpak do dɨma ɨŋtoni, nido uŋun paret kɨnda, Piŋkop da uŋun do galak tosok.
Yaŋban Pita da yagɨt, “Nin yo morapnin yopmaŋek gak naŋ gol awɨlgamaŋ.”
Ae Piŋkop dakon gen kɨnda gat yaŋ tosok: “Amɨn da gɨptɨmɨ sugawit uŋun kokdaŋ.”
Uŋun yutnon Saimon yopmi gɨptɨmɨ kɨndapmɨ soŋakwan sot aŋek pakgɨt. Uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ
Nak Pol da naga gɨldat tagɨ on mandɨsat. Dam tebanon sigɨn egɨsat, do dɨma ɨŋtaŋ namni. Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni jikon tosak.
Amɨn yokwi uŋuden kaluk altoŋon da wasaŋek kosit tagɨsi yɨpmaŋ degek aŋpak yokwi gɨn aŋ, ae top baŋgɨn yaŋekwaŋ.
Ji datji dakon aŋpak uŋun baŋgɨn aŋ.” Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Nin gwamda dɨma. Datnin uŋun Piŋkop kaloŋ gɨn.”
Asi, amɨn da ji paŋkewalek oman amɨni dep do aŋ, bo yosi kabokon da tɨmɨk mudoŋ, bo galaktokni yolni do paŋkewalgaŋ, bo iyɨ dakon man pawɨkwaŋ, bo ae mogɨm kulbak dɨkgaŋ bɨsapmon ji da yum pɨndagakwa galak toknikon ji pabɨŋ depmaŋgaŋ.
“Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da Amɨn Dakon Monji kaŋba tapmɨmni ae tɨlɨmni gat gɨkwemon da apban kokdaŋ.
Yo madepsi uŋun yaŋ: Piŋkop da ni aŋpak yolneŋ do kɨlɨ niyɨgɨt uŋun tebaisi tɨmɨgek yolneŋ.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋek kɨsit kandapyoni yolɨgɨt.
Egɨp egɨpno Piŋkopmon tosok yaŋsi nandaŋek geni bamɨsi do nandak nandak aŋek mani awɨgɨsat. Nak Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek yo kɨnda do dɨma pasolgeŋ. Amɨn da nak do yo kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma ani.
Piŋkop da gen kokwin kɨlegɨsi asak, do jɨgɨ damaŋ amɨn uŋun kobogɨ do jɨgɨ iyɨ yomdɨsak.
Mani amɨn kɨnda mɨŋatjok kɨnda pasak do manjɨŋ ɨmgwit uŋun butnikon da dɨma pakeŋ yaŋsi nandɨsak, ae amɨn da pasak dosi dɨma iyaŋ, ae iyɨ dakon gɨptɨm dakon galaktok kɨla tagɨ abeŋ yaŋ nandɨsak kaŋ, mɨŋat uŋun dɨma pasak. Uŋun da tagɨ asak.
Piŋkop da ji dakon nandaŋ gadat aŋkɨlɨk kok do aŋek paŋkɨlɨt yum pɨndagakwan abaŋ. Nin nandamaŋ, gol uŋun yo tagɨsi, mani gol uŋun yo tasɨk togɨ, do ji dakon nandaŋ gadat da gol yapmaŋdak ae wagɨl tagɨsisi. Amɨn da gol uŋun asi gol bo yaŋ do kɨndapmon soŋek aŋkɨlɨk koŋ. Do nandani, paŋkɨlɨt mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ altaŋ daba nandaŋ gadatji tebaisi sigɨn tosak kaŋ, mibɨ gɨldaron Yesu Kristo noman altosak bɨsapmon ji do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk nandaŋ damɨŋek man madep damdɨsak.
Yaŋ nandɨsak, “Nak arɨpmɨ dɨma mokeŋ. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ yo dɨ da nak arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨŋ nepni.”
Mani don tap ɨdap tebai iyɨŋbɨ duwalɨk kɨgɨt. Tap ɨdap gak da tebai yaŋbɨ nandaŋek tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨgɨt.
Nak naga aŋpak dɨma galak tosot uŋun baŋ asat kaŋ, Moses dakon gen teban uŋun yo tagɨsi kɨnda yaŋ yosot.
Kokup kɨdat dakon alta wasaŋakwa uŋun do aŋek Piŋkop da butjap madep nandagɨt. Piŋkop yɨpmaŋek kokup kɨdat gawak yomɨŋakwa nandaba yokwi tok aŋ yomgut.
Yawe dakon gen uŋun gen bamɨsi. Yo morap asak uŋun da nin toktogɨsi dɨma nipmaŋ dekdak yaŋ nolɨsak.
‘Nak Abraham, Aisak, ae Jekop dakon Piŋkopni.’ Piŋkop uŋun amɨn kɨmakbi dakon Piŋkop dɨma, amɨn egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋun dakon Piŋkop.”
Uŋun da monjɨ gwayoni dapmaŋ kokup kɨdat do paret awit.
Kɨŋ Betlehem kokupmon altaŋ egakwal Maria monjɨ altosak dakon bɨsapni apgut.
Ji morap yum pɨndagakwa amɨn da gɨptɨmji mandaŋ amɨn aeno yaŋsi dayɨŋ teŋteŋokdɨsat. Aŋpak uŋun ani kaŋ, gen teban morap kɨsi yol kɨmotdo.
Nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn burɨkon da yaŋ yoŋ, “Piŋkop kɨnda dɨma egɨsak.” Uŋun amɨn yokwisi. Yo wagɨl yokwisi baŋ gɨn aŋ. Kɨnda da aŋpak tagɨ kɨnda dɨma asak.
Yawe da gen yaŋ aŋteban aŋek nandak nandakni uŋun kulabɨk dɨma asak. Gen uŋun yaŋ yagɨt, “Melkisedek da mukwa sogok amɨn egɨpgut, uŋudeŋ gak mukwa sogok amɨn kɨnda dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨ wɨgɨkdɨsal.”
Piŋkop da yo agɨt dakon geni kalɨp pasɨlɨ tagɨt, mani nagon paŋalon agɨt. Uŋun dakon geni dɨsok kɨlɨ mandat.
Yawe, gak da nak yokwikon naŋ abɨdoki do madepsi nandaŋ egɨsat. Nawa gengo da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk namɨsak.
Dat gat nit kaloŋɨ ekwamak.”
Nak gat ji gat kɨsi Kristo dakon man do aŋek jɨgɨ pamaŋ. Kalɨp nandaŋakwa jɨgɨ pagɨm da ae sigɨn pasat dakon geni dɨsi nandaŋ.
Nak oman amɨngo mama gengo guramɨgek kobogɨ tagɨsi tɨmɨkdat.
Aŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn da gen kɨnda yaŋ yoŋ ‘Elaija mibɨltok abɨŋakwan Kristo buŋon apjak.’ Gen uŋun nido yoŋ?”
Gɨkwem tɨmɨ kɨnda dubagɨsi wɨgɨsak uŋudon egek gen tebani yomgut. Yoban gen teban morap Piŋkop da yomgut uŋun guramɨkgwit.
Mani, Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨnyo dakon gulusuŋni pɨndagek yaŋ yagɨt: “Amɨn Tagɨ da yaŋ yosok, ‘Nandani, bɨsap kɨnda apdɨsak, nak uŋun bɨsapmon Israel amɨn kabɨ gat ae Juda amɨn kabɨ gat saŋbek saŋbek kalugɨ abeŋ.
“Nak sipsipno dɨwarɨ uŋun on damon nani dɨma. Uŋun waŋga ekwaŋ. Uŋun sipsip kabɨ nak da ɨlɨk paŋabɨŋ yopbo naga dakon tek nandakdaŋ. Aŋek sipsip kabi kaloŋɨ gɨn egakwa kɨla amɨn kaloŋɨ da kɨlani akdɨsak.
Amɨn Tagɨno dakon meŋi nagon nido obɨsak? Nak mɨŋat tagɨ dɨma.
Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda Jerusalem egɨpgut uŋun mani Simeon. Uŋun amɨn aŋpakni kɨlegɨsi ae Piŋkop gawak ɨmɨŋ aŋkɨsiŋyo aŋek egɨpgut. Piŋkop da Israel amɨn kabɨ but yokwikon egɨpgwit uŋun butni paŋteban asak do manjɨkbi amɨn uŋun do jomjom aŋek egɨpgut. Simeon uŋun Telagɨ Wup da burɨkon tugaŋbi amɨn kɨnda.
Yaŋ aŋakwa Sadyusi amɨn dɨwarɨ da Yesukon apgwit. (Uŋun amɨn kabɨ amɨn kɨmakbi arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨdoni yaŋ nandaŋ.) Abɨŋek yaŋ iyɨwit,
Uŋun bɨsapmon Parisi amɨn da abɨŋ Yesu aŋkewal do aŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda abɨ kaŋek nin da gandano Piŋkop da gak yabekban pɨl da pini asal yaŋ gandaneŋ.”
Nandani, tagɨsi ekwaŋ amɨn do nandaba yokwi tok aŋek bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ iyɨ dakon man pawɨgɨk do kosit wusɨk aŋ amɨn da binapmon pɨdok pɨdok madepsi noman tosok, ae aŋpak yokwi morap uŋudon da noman toŋ.
“Iyɨŋban yagɨt, ‘Olip pakbi tɨbɨrɨ madep 100 da arɨp.’ “Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak tepmɨsi yɨgek on papia tam gomango mandabikon olip pakbi tɨbɨrɨ 50 yaŋ manda.’
Yaŋ aŋek iyɨgɨt, “Gak kɨŋ Silom Pakbi Ɨdapmon pakbi soki.” (Silom dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun “Yabekbi.”) Dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn uŋun kɨŋ pakbi soŋ dabɨlɨ sɨŋtaŋakwan yomanikon apgut.
Tobɨl jikon opjak do iyɨno tagɨ yaŋ yagɨt. Mani iyɨ jikon op do madepsi galak tagɨt do jikon obɨsak.
Yaŋ aŋek mibɨltok Anaskon aŋkɨwit. Anas uŋun Kaiapas dakon yopmi. Uŋun bɨlagon Kaiapas da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn egɨpgut.
Mani gak gaga bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ nandak nandakgo si pɨsaŋakwan egɨpbi. Jɨgɨ ae tepmɨyo guramɨkgi. Ae Gen Bin Tagɨsi mɨŋat amɨnyokon yaŋ teŋteŋok dakon pi abi. Mɨŋat amɨnyo paŋpulugoki dakon pi Piŋkop da gamgut, pi uŋun aŋ kɨmokgi.
Yaŋba Amɨn Tagɨ da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dakon nandaŋ gadatji uŋun mastat yet yombem monɨŋɨsisok taŋ damjak kaŋ, on kɨndap pɨlɨgɨ tap kagagwan pɨgɨsak do iyɨŋba genji tagɨ guramɨtjak.”
Bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok egek mɨktɨm amɨn da nak dɨma nandakdaŋ. Mani ji da nak nandakdaŋ. Nak egɨsat, do jiyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn egɨpdaŋ.
Amɨn yokwi da amɨn kɨlegɨ dakon mɨktɨm toktogɨ kɨlani dɨma ani. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, amɨn kɨlegɨ yokwi akdaŋ.
Mani gɨptɨm dakon galaktok kɨlani arɨpmɨ dɨma ani kaŋ, mɨŋat eyo agagɨsi. Mɨŋat eyo dɨma aŋek yumabi dɨ abam.
Pita uŋun kokup morap kɨsi agek Lida kokupmon kwan Piŋkop dakon amɨn kabɨ gat egɨpgwit.
Nak yo kɨnda da dam aŋakwan dɨma egɨsat. Nak yabekbi kɨnda, ae Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu kɨlɨ kagɨm. Amɨn Tagɨ dakon pi agɨm dakon bamɨ kabɨ ji mani.
Not gɨmano Gaius, aŋpak yokwi dɨma yolek abi, aŋpak tagɨsi baŋ yolek abi. Amɨn kɨnda aŋpak tagɨ asak uŋun Piŋkop dakon amɨn. Mani amɨn kɨnda aŋpak yokwi asak uŋun Piŋkop dɨma kaŋbi.
Ji Yawe Piŋkopnin aŋkɨsini. Uŋun telagɨ egɨsak, do burɨkon kɨŋek gawak ɨmni.
Piŋkop gak bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋek dɨma nipmaŋ dekdal. Yaŋ asal do nin dakon man dɨma pawɨgɨneŋ. Gak dakon man madepgo naŋgɨn aŋkɨsineŋ.
Not kabɨ, notji do yaŋba yokwi tok dɨma aŋ aŋ ani. Piŋkop da gen pikon dɨ depban. Nandani, Gen Kokwin Amɨn Madep yoma kagakon akdak.
Joŋ bɨt kɨlapyo pakbi uŋun baŋ noŋ, ae joŋ donki kɨsi uŋun pakbi noŋ, aŋek tekni paŋyawot aŋ.
“But yawot jikon yɨpmaŋdat. But yawotno ji do damɨsat. But yawot on mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨn da damaŋ uŋuden dɨma. Do butji jɨk taŋakwa pasol pasol dɨma ani.
Babɨknin emat agak sɨbakon da mɨktɨm uŋun dɨma abɨdawit. Iyɨ dakon tapmɨmon da emaron dɨma teban tawit. Gak da but dasi galak taŋ yomgul do uŋun gat egek teŋteŋɨ yomgul. Gak da tapmɨmon gɨn emaron teban tawit.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ Piŋkop da teŋteŋɨni yoban gen bamɨ kɨlɨ abɨdawit, ae Kwen Kokup dakon but galak yo uŋun kɨlɨ aŋkɨlɨgek nandawit, ae Telagɨ Wup uŋun kɨlɨ abɨdawit. Uŋun Piŋkop gen aŋkɨlɨgek uŋun yo tagɨsi yaŋ kɨlɨ nandawit, ae Piŋkop da wasaŋek Amɨn Kɨla Asak dakon tapmɨm kaŋek uŋun yo tagɨsi yaŋ kɨlɨ nandawit. Uŋuden amɨn yokwikon maŋek Piŋkop manji ɨmni kaŋ, tobɨl abɨŋek but tobɨl asak dakon kosit mɨni. Aŋpak uŋun asak da, iyɨ Piŋkop dakon Monji tɨlak kɨndapmon aeni aŋakdak. Uŋun amɨn da jɨgɨlak yaŋ ɨmni yaŋ do tɨlak kɨndapmon aeni awɨgɨ aŋakdak.
Ae don gen yɨpban mɨrɨm aŋakwan ais pakbi dagaŋek pokgoŋ.
Tapmɨm kalugɨ namɨŋek man bini tagɨsi tosak do kosit kɨlegɨkon nayɨŋ awɨldak.
Ae amɨn morap da yo kabɨgo yobi do gayɨŋba kaŋ yobi. Ae amɨn kɨnda da yogo kɨnda abɨdaŋ aŋkɨsak kaŋ, aŋtobɨl gamjak do tebai dɨma iyɨki.
Asi, nak madepsi pasoldot, aŋek gɨptɨmno madepsi nɨmnɨmɨkdak. Pasol pasol da obɨsi abɨŋ nepmaŋdak.
Yaŋban amɨn uŋun da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Emat amɨn 100 dakon kɨla amɨn kɨnda mani Konilias uŋun da yabekban abamaŋ. Uŋun amɨn kɨlegɨsi ae Piŋkop do pasalek gawak ɨmɨŋek egɨsak. Juda amɨn morap da uŋun amɨn do nandaba wukwan ɨmaŋ. Telagɨ aŋelo kɨnda da gak yaŋ gaban yutnikon kɨki do iyɨgɨt. Kɨŋek gak da gen dɨ yaŋbɨ nandɨsak do iyɨgɨt.”
Aŋakwa nin Bret Yisni Mɨni Bɨsap Madep mudaŋakwan Pilipai yɨpmaŋek tap wakgakon wɨgek kɨgɨmaŋ. Kɨŋ tap binap agapno gɨldat 5 kabɨ mudaŋakwan amɨn nin do jomjom aŋek Troas kokup pap egɨpgwit uŋudon kɨno notni pɨndak pɨndak agɨmaŋ. Aŋek uŋudon gɨldat 7 kabɨ egɨpgumaŋ.
Aŋopbal Simeon da Yesu bedaŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yaŋ yagɨt:
Sipsip da kɨŋ pasɨlgaŋ uŋun da tɨlak kosit tagɨsi kɨlɨ yɨpmaŋ dekgɨm. Do abɨŋ oman amɨngo nak do wusɨki. Nak gen tebango do dɨma ɨŋtosot.
Nak Sonda kɨnda da butgwan bɨsap bamot gak do nandaŋek jap kelek egɨ egɨ asat. Ae yo morap tɨmɨkdat uŋun kokwinɨkgo 10 kabɨ aŋakwa kabi kɨnda paret do yɨpmaŋ yɨpmaŋ asat.’
Do amɨn uŋun mɨŋatjok uŋun pasak kaŋ, uŋun aŋpak tagɨ asak. Mani dɨma pasak kaŋ, uŋun da wagɨl tagɨsi asak.
Pi madepsi aŋ uŋun do nandaŋek nandaba wukwan yomɨŋek but dasi galak taŋ yomni. Ae not kabɨsi gat but kaloŋ aŋek yaworɨ egɨpni.
Not kabɨ, gen teban pakyaŋsi nandaŋ amɨn ji do gen on dayɨsat. Ji dɨsi nandaŋ, amɨn kɨnda si egɨsak bɨsapmon gen teban da yoŋgamgwan egɨsak. Mani kɨmokdok bɨsapmon gen teban da yoŋgamgwan saŋbeŋek dɨma egɨsak.
Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ gen kokwin aŋyomɨŋek madepsi dapban kɨmotdaŋ. Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ kɨla amɨn madep madep obɨsi pabɨŋ yopdɨsak.
Piŋkop dakon gen da uŋun do yaŋ yosok: “Amɨn morap Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun mayaktok dɨma pakdaŋ.”
Amɨn da napbɨ gwapbokon teban taŋek tomni tɨmɨkgaŋ uŋun kɨlɨ tagap tak da nak do jomaŋek tosok. Tomni uŋun yaŋ: Amɨn Tagɨ da amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ nayɨkdɨsak. Amɨn Tagɨ da aŋpak kɨlegɨ yolek amɨn dakon aŋpakni kokwin aŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo gen pikon yopjak bɨsap madepmon tomni uŋun namdɨsak. Ae nak kaloŋ dogɨn dɨma namdɨsak, amɨn morap Yesu noman altaŋban kok do but kɨndap aŋ uŋun do kɨsi yomdɨsak.
Obip amɨn da yabekbi kabɨ paŋobɨŋ gen kokwin amɨn da ɨŋamon yopba akgwit. Agakwa mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn uŋun da mibɨlɨ yoyɨŋ nandak do yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Piŋkop da yo morap agɨt uŋun nin da pɨndakgɨmaŋ. Nin uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋok amaŋ. Ae Telagɨ Wup uŋun kɨsi uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋok asak. Piŋkop da amɨn morap iyɨ dakon gen guramɨkgaŋ amɨn uŋun Telagɨ Wup yomɨsak.”
Yawe aŋkɨsiŋek kulele tɨdoni. Gita napmɨ 10 kabɨ toŋ uŋun tɨdaŋakwa geni galagɨsi nandɨsak.
Piŋkop uŋun Juda amɨn dakon Piŋkop gɨn? Uŋun dɨmasi. Uŋun Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ kɨsi dakon Piŋkopni.
Uŋun kɨsi muwugek si pasɨlek ekwaŋ. Nak da kosit agɨsat uŋudon yubɨŋek nɨkba kɨmokgeŋ do pi aŋ.
Babɨkno Piŋkop da dabɨlon gulusuŋnin mɨni yaŋsi nandaŋek Piŋkop dakon pi awit, nakyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn pini asat. Kalbi ae gɨldarɨ yɨpmaŋ derɨ mɨni bɨsit aŋek gak do nandaŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨsat.
Gak da sɨkak morapmɨ yopbɨ maŋek mɨktɨm aŋyawot aŋakwan pakbini toŋ aŋakwa jap gɨsamɨgaki bamɨ tagɨ toŋ.
“Nak abɨsok gagon opbeŋ, mani kɨsɨk kɨsɨkno da uŋun amɨn kabɨkon tugosak yaŋ do mɨktɨmon sigɨn egek gen on yosot.
Aŋek samɨni kabɨ bɨkbɨk ninon ekwaŋ. Yo morap uŋun dukon tɨmɨkgɨt?”
Amɨn da pi masɨ masɨmɨ asal uŋun dakon geni yokdaŋ. Aŋakwa nak da man madepgo do yokeŋ.
Iyɨŋban kɨla amɨn da yagɨt, “Nak monɨŋɨsogon da gen teban morap uŋun kɨsi guramɨk aŋaŋ opgum.”
Amɨn morapmɨsi da Yesukon sigɨn obɨŋ muwugakwa Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn on bɨsapmon ekwaŋ uŋun amɨn yokwisi gɨn. Piŋkop dakon pi naŋ asat yaŋ nandak do wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda kok do yoŋ. Mani kɨnda dɨma kokdaŋ. Jona dakon tɨlak naŋgɨn kokdaŋ.
Aŋakwan amɨn wukwi ae amɨn pɨŋbi uŋun kɨsi uŋun dakon geni nandak do mɨrak pakyaŋsi yopgwit. Piŋkop dakon teban tokni mani Tapmɨmɨ Madepsi yaŋ yoŋ uŋun amɨnon tosok yaŋ yawit.
Do amɨn kɨnda da “Nak Pol da manon telagɨ pakbi sogɨm” yaŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma yogogɨ.
Gen yaŋ yaŋban Erot burɨkon jɨgɨ nandagɨt, mani amɨn jap nawit uŋun da ɨŋamon yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun do pasalek gen yagɨt dɨma kɨrɨŋɨkgɨt. Obip amɨni yoyɨŋban mɨŋatjok da gen iyɨgɨt uŋudeŋ aŋek
Yesu uŋun gen manjɨŋ mudaŋek papia gɨroŋɨgek kɨla amɨn do ɨmɨŋek yɨkgɨt. Yɨgakwan uŋun muwut muwut yutnon amɨn kɨsi dabɨlni Yesukon gɨn taŋakwan yɨkgwit.
Koŋ da bɨsap morapmɨ yaŋ asak. Monjɨno tebai abɨdaŋek maban mɨktɨmon maŋ pagek tarak kwakwagɨ da gen kaganikon pawɨŋ tɨmɨkdak, aŋakwan geni wamtɨmsisak, ae gɨptɨmɨ kɨsisi kɨtɨraŋ kɨsak. Nak paŋdetgoni koŋ yolni do yoyɨko aŋtɨdok aŋ, uŋun da arɨpmɨ dɨmasi yolyolɨ.”
Amɨn uŋun dapban kɨmotni do dɨkdɨkni kɨlɨ paŋnoman agɨt. Dɨkdɨk mɨleŋ asɨpmɨ toŋ paŋnoman asak.
Emat amɨn da pini aŋek tomni tɨmɨkgaŋ, do yɨyɨtni do iyɨ dakon moneŋ dɨma noŋ. Ae wain kwaokdak amɨn wain dakon sopmɨ iyɨ paŋ noŋ. Ae sipsip kɨla aŋ amɨn iyɨ sipsip dakon mumni noŋ.
Yesu da uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋek Tair kokupmon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋ yut kɨndakon wɨgek pasɨlɨ egek yɨk yawot akeŋ yaŋ nandagɨt, mani pasɨlɨ egɨp do aŋtɨdok agɨt.
Kɨŋ Jodan Pakbi pudaŋek aeni Jon da kalɨp amɨn telagɨ pakbi soŋ ɨmgut uŋun kokupmon paŋkɨ egɨpgut.
Pɨgakwa amɨn morap da kaŋba pɨlɨk bamok aŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋban
Amɨn dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm tɨpmɨ toŋ tɨm yombem, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop gen nandaŋek but galagon da abɨdoŋ.
Yawe Saion kokup papmon uŋudon kɨla amɨn madep egɨsak. Kap yaŋek mani aŋkɨsini. Amɨn morap kɨsikon pi morap agɨt uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋok ani.
Abɨsok jikon opbo bɨsap kapbɨ asak. Piŋkop gen papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: “Amɨn bamorɨ bo kapbɨ da amɨn kɨnda da suŋ aban kaŋek asi suŋ agɨt yaŋ yoni kaŋ, uŋun bamɨ yaŋ nandani.”
Mani Amɨn Tagɨ Yawe, nak gak do nandaŋ gadasat. Gak da nak tagɨsi aŋkutnosol. Yum nandaŋaki dɨma kɨmokgeŋ.
Amɨn yokwi iyɨ do nandaban wɨgakwan Piŋkop wɨsɨŋ kok do pi dɨma asak. Piŋkop do nandaban yo ɨsalɨ asak.
Mani pɨdok pɨdok ak do nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨmakon da yoŋ, ae gen emat aŋ amɨn, ae babɨkni dakon man dogɨn yaŋekwaŋ, ae Moses dakon gen tebanon gen toŋ uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ do gen emat aŋ amɨn dakon geni gulusuŋ do mɨrak dɨma yopbi. Gen uŋuden da nin arɨpmɨ dɨmasi paŋpulugoni.
Yawe aŋkɨsini! Piŋkop telagɨ yutnikon egɨsak, uŋun aŋkɨsini. Kwen Kokup tapmɨmɨ toŋsi uŋudon egɨsak, uŋun aŋkɨsini.
Do ji kɨŋ babɨkji da wasaŋek aŋpak yokwi awit uŋun aŋ mudoni.
Piŋkop, nak nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn kɨnda gak da nandaŋ namɨsal. Dɨwarɨno arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋkɨsɨbɨkeŋ.
Uŋun bɨsapmon paŋdetni 12 kabɨkon da kɨnda mani Judas Iskariot uŋun da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨkon kɨgɨt.
Do gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil kɨŋ abɨsok yo pɨndak nandaŋyo amal uŋun do Jon iyɨnjil. Dabɨlni mɨni amɨn sɨŋtoŋ, ae kandapmɨ alek taŋbi amɨn kosit akwaŋ, ae wuda tebani toŋ amɨn uŋun kɨlek toŋ, ae mɨragɨ mɨni amɨn da gen nandaŋ, ae amɨn kɨmakbi pɨdoŋ, ae yoni mɨni amɨn da Gen Bin Tagɨsi nandaŋ.
Piŋkopno da but dasi galak taŋ namɨsak, ae uŋun da abɨŋ aŋpulugokdɨsak. Piŋkop da nak yum nandaŋek nepban pɨndagapbo uwalno pabɨŋ yopdɨsak.
Mani, moneŋ morapmɨ tɨmɨt do nandaŋ amɨn, kɨlap da paron yokwalgaŋ da arɨp, paŋkewal da altaŋ yomɨŋek tɨmɨtdɨsak. Uŋun nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn da but sulugɨk morapmɨ aŋek uŋun da obɨsi paŋɨŋtok akdɨsak. Yaŋ aŋek wagɨlsi tasɨk taŋ mudokdaŋ.
‘Nin kasɨsɨŋ kɨlɨ pɨsomaŋ, mani ji kap ak do dɨma nandayɨŋ. Nin bupmɨ kap yamaŋ, mani ji bupmɨ nandaŋek kunam tat do dɨma nandayɨŋ.’ ”
Nikodemus, uŋun kalɨp Yesukon kɨgɨt, uŋun kɨla amɨn gat Parisi gat da kabɨkon nani kɨnda. Uŋun da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Yesu da tɨlak gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨsi altaŋ damjak uŋun dakon bɨsap ji dɨma nandaŋ, do tagap taŋek egɨpni.”
Aŋakwan amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ egɨ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋun da mani do nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek paŋpulugosak do nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom akdaŋ.”
Nin kɨŋapno mɨŋatjok uŋun Pol gat nin gat da buŋon nolek yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “On amɨn uŋun Piŋkop Wɨkwisi Madep dakon oman monjɨni. Piŋkop da ji yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak dakon gen dayaŋ.”
Mani Pita da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nak gak gat dam tebanon kɨŋek ae gak gat kɨsi kɨmotdeŋ do tagap tosot.”
Mani Israel amɨn kɨsi da Gen Bin Tagɨsi dɨma abɨdawit. Aisaia da yaŋ yagɨt: “Amɨn Tagɨ, gen yaŋ teŋteŋomaŋ namɨn da nandaŋ gadasak?”
“Ji kɨŋek yaŋ nandani: Ji sipsip monɨŋ baŋ yaŋ joŋ pɨŋan da bɨkbɨgon yabekdat.
Nak Masadonia mɨktɨmon kɨŋek gen gayɨgɨm uŋudeŋ aeno sigɨn gayɨsat. Gak Epesas kokupmon sigɨn egek mɨŋat amɨnyo Piŋkop gen yoyɨŋ dekgaŋ amɨn dɨ yoyɨŋdet ani bɨsapmon top gen dɨma yoni do gen tebaisi yoyɨki.
Mani mɨktɨmon kwaotno madepsi kwosok. Jap dɨwarɨ dakon tagok tagokni uŋun yapmaŋ mudosok. Kɨlɨŋɨ madep yopban kɨŋakwa mɨnam morapmɨ da paŋabɨŋ uŋun da yoŋgamgwan yɨkgaŋ.”
Nak bɨsap kapbɨ Amɨn Tagɨ da uŋun yo abɨdaŋ maban kɨsak do bɨsit tebai agɨm.
Uŋun amɨn da yaŋ yoŋ, “Top gen yaŋek teban toneŋ. Nin da galak togon gen yokdamaŋ. Amɨn kɨnda da kosit dɨma sopmaŋ nimjak.”
Yaŋ iyɨŋek amɨn kabɨ madep gat paŋdetni gat yoyɨŋban iyɨ akgɨron apgwit. Apba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon yɨyɨtni tagɨsi tosak do nandaŋek pi madep asak kaŋ, egɨp egɨpni pasɨl ɨmjak. Mani amɨn kɨnda nak do nandaŋek, ae Piŋkop dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi do nandaŋek, egɨp egɨpni do nandaban yo madep dɨma asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do amɨn asak. Amɨn kɨnda nak nol do nandɨsak kaŋ, iyɨ dakon galaktok manji yomɨŋek tɨlak kɨndapni guramɨgek noljak.
Nin jɨgɨ pamaŋ bɨsapmon ji da but yawot pani ae Piŋkop da ji yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak uŋun do aŋek pamaŋ. Ae Piŋkop da butnin paŋteban aban butnin yaworɨ tosok bɨsapmon, jiyo kɨsi but yawot pani do aŋek Piŋkop da yaŋ asak. Ji tebai agek nin da tepmɨ pamaŋ uŋudeŋ gɨn tepmɨ pani kaŋ, Piŋkop da butji paŋteban akdɨsak.
Kɨŋakwa amɨn morapmɨsi yolba kɨwit. Aŋakwa mɨŋat dɨwarɨ da yolek Yesu do bupmɨ kap kɨnda yaŋek kunam tagek yolgwit.
Mani gen uŋun amɨnon dɨma kɨŋ ɨreŋtosak do yaŋsop aŋ yomno Yesu dakon mibɨlɨ do aeni dɨma yonjil.”
Yaŋban nandaŋek mɨŋat da abɨŋ gawak ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, aŋpulugoki dosi nandɨsat!”
“Nin da nandaŋapno Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak da Piŋkop dakon Telagɨ Yut Madep uŋun tuwɨlek gɨldat kapbɨ da butgwan ae wɨtjɨkeŋ.’ ”
Yaŋ aba Yesu da nawa gen yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Parisi amɨn gat ae Erot gat uŋun dakon yis do pasalek kaŋ kɨmotni.”
“Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae Parisi amɨn ji jamba but amɨnsi. Awa! Ji kombɨ amɨn ae amɨn kɨlegɨ kalɨpsi egɨ kɨmakba yopgwit tamo paŋtɨlɨm aŋ.
Wɨgapbo ji nak wɨsɨkdaŋ, mani dɨma nandakdaŋ. Ae nak da kokup egɨpbeŋ uŋudon ji arɨpmɨ dɨma wɨgɨkdaŋ.”
Maria gen uŋun nandaŋek burɨgwan da jɨgɨsi nandaŋek yaŋ nandagɨt, “Ni gen kɨnda naŋ nayɨsak?”
Nak naga naŋ joŋɨgek naga do yaŋkwok asat, ae Dat nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋunyo kɨsi nak naŋ joŋɨgek yaŋkwok asak.”
Gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek dam tebanon yɨp do awit, mani bɨsapni dɨma agɨt do amɨn kɨnda da dɨma abɨdagɨt.
Wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨt uŋun dakon gen bini kɨlɨ yaŋba nandawit, do amɨn morapmɨ da kosiron kok do kɨwit.
Uŋudeŋ gɨn Sunduk da pudaŋ kɨ kabi bamot aŋek iyɨ emat wamjil kaŋ, amɨn kabɨni tebai dɨma egɨpdaŋ. Yaŋ ani kaŋ pasɨl mudokdaŋ.
Yawe, man bingo tagɨsi tosak do yokwikon naŋ pulugaŋ nepbi. Gak amɨn kɨlegɨsi, do jɨgɨ morap pasat uŋun wɨrɨrɨk nabi.
Amɨn morap gak do nandaŋ gadaŋ uŋun mayaktok dɨma pani, mani amɨn paŋkewalgaŋ amɨn uŋun mayaktok pakdaŋ.
Ji yaŋsi nandaŋ teban toŋ, “Gen tebanon nandak nandak tagɨsi morap gat ae gen bamɨ gat tɨmɨkgamaŋ, do nin amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni dakon kosit yolɨk amɨn, ae pɨlɨn tukgwan ekwaŋ amɨn dakon teŋteŋɨni. Nin nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn gat ae mɨŋat monjɨyo kɨsi dakon yoyɨŋdetni” yaŋ nandaŋ teban toŋ.
“On mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo nin gat gɨldat kapbɨ ekwamaŋ. Kɨlɨ japni kɨsi naŋ mudaŋ, do bupmɨ nandaŋ yomɨsat.
Yawe da yaŋban mɨrɨm madep aŋakwan tap pakbi da madepsi tamalɨkgwit.
Yawe da mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi dakon nandak nandak kɨlɨ nandaŋ mudagɨt. Uŋun nandɨsak, yo morap ak do nandaŋ, uŋun bamɨ tagɨsi dɨma noman tokdaŋ.
Nak aeno kaŋapbo, Sipsip Monɨŋ Saion Kabap uŋudon akban kagɨm. Agakwan amɨn 144 tausen uŋun gat kɨsi akgwit. Sipsip Monɨŋ dakon man gat ae Datni dakon man gat ɨŋamnikon mandabi.
Mɨktɨm dɨwarɨ taŋ aŋ aŋ kwaŋ dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo do yaŋ dɨma agɨt. Nawa geni dɨma nandaŋ. Yawe dakon man aŋkɨsini!
Wamno gami pi tebaisi aŋakwan tapmɨmno mɨnisi asak. Dabɨlno pɨlɨn taŋakwan tagɨ dɨma sɨŋtosot.
Nak gen tebango kɨsi morap guramɨkgeŋ. Wagɨl dɨma nepmaŋ dekgi.
Nido Piŋkop da mɨŋat dakon gɨptɨm naŋ wɨli dɨma wasagɨt, wɨli dakon gɨptɨm naŋ mɨŋat wasagɨt.
Mani jikon da amɨn dɨwarɨ nandaŋ gadat dɨma aŋ.” (Nandaŋ gadat dɨma awit amɨn uŋun Yesu da pini wasaŋek agɨron da kɨlɨ nandaŋ yomɨŋ mudagɨt. Ae namɨn da uwal da kɨsiron yɨpjak uŋun kɨlɨ nandaŋ ɨmgut.)
Paŋpulugok damdɨsak uŋun gen bamɨ dakon Wup. Mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨdogɨ, nido dɨma koŋ, ae dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ. Mani ji da nandaŋ ɨmaŋ. Ji gat egɨsak, ae don ji da butgwan egɨpdɨsak.
Yawe da pɨlɨn tuk yɨpban pɨlɨn tuk da mɨktɨm wutjɨgɨt, mani Isip da geni abɨŋ yɨpgwit.
Aŋakwan kokup ɨsalni da kaŋ pasalek uŋun dakon geni yaŋba Judia mɨktɨm ɨleŋɨ toŋ tɨmon kokup morap tawit amɨn kɨsisi da nandawit.
Ji da dɨma yokdaŋ. Datji dakon Wup da ji da dulumon da yokdɨsak, do pasol pasol dɨma ani.
Yokwi uŋun asal uŋun yopmaŋek but tobɨl a. Aŋek butgokon nandak nandak yokwi toŋ uŋun wɨrɨrɨk gamjak do Amɨn Tagɨ bɨsit iyɨki.
Yawe aŋkɨsikeŋ. Nak do yo morap tagɨsi asak uŋun do dɨma ɨŋtokeŋ.
Ji Yawe dakon pi amɨn Kwen Kokup egek galaktokni yolek omani aŋ, ji Yawe aŋkɨsini.
Juda amɨn da uŋun amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni egɨpgut da sɨŋtagɨt uŋun do nandaba bamɨ dɨma agɨt. Yaŋ nandawit do uŋun amɨn dakon meŋi datniyo apjil do gen yɨpgwit.
Uŋun Abiata da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn egɨpgut bɨsapmon yaŋ awit. Piŋkop da yutnon wɨgek bret Piŋkop do parekbi uŋun tɨmɨk naŋek amɨn kabɨni kɨsi do yoban nawit. Bret uŋun amɨn ɨsalɨ da dɨma nok nogɨ, mukwa sogok amɨn dagɨn tagɨ nawit.”
Mani nak yaŋ dayɨsat, gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon Tair gat Saidon kokupmon amɨn gat da kobogɨ do jɨgɨ tagapmɨ paŋakwa ji da kobogɨ do jɨgɨ madepsi pakdaŋ.
Uŋun da tap ɨdap pudaŋban tap ɨdap terɨ terɨ agakwan Israel amɨn binapmon da paŋkɨgɨt.
Kɨlɨ amɨn madep gat ae kɨla amɨn morap dɨwarɨ kɨsi paŋpulugosak do bɨsit ani. Yaŋ aŋek kaŋdo tayaŋgok egek butnin yaworɨ taŋakwa Piŋkop dakon galaktok morap yolek telagɨsi egɨpneŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek kɨmakgɨt.
mani nandak nandakni mɨktɨm dakon yo morap do nandaŋ, ae moneŋ paŋmuwut dakon galaktok da Piŋkop gen wɨtjɨŋba bamɨ dɨma tosok.
Uŋun bɨsapmon Bret Yisni Mɨni dakon bɨlak bɨsap madep noman tagɨt. Uŋun bɨsapmon Yapyap Bɨlak do sipsip bulagɨ baŋ dapmaŋgaŋ.
Nin telagɨ egɨpneŋdo, kalɨpsigwan mɨktɨm Piŋkop da dɨma wasaŋban noman taŋakwan Yesu gat gadat gadat aneŋ do kɨlɨsi manjɨgɨt. Telagɨsi egek Piŋkop da dabɨlon mɨŋat amɨnyo gulusuŋni mɨni da egɨpneŋ do agɨt.
Telagɨ Wupni toŋ amɨn da yo morap kɨsi kokwinɨk pɨndakgaŋ. Mani amɨn dɨwarɨ da Telagɨ Wupni toŋ amɨn dakon aŋpak kokwin arɨpmɨ dɨma ani.
Kristo da but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋek nin paŋpulugok do aŋek iyɨ dakon egɨp egɨpni parekgɨt, yaŋ gɨn jiyo kɨsi amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak baŋ yolek ani. Egɨp egɨpni uŋun paret kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi naŋ yaŋ Piŋkop do parekgɨt.
Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn amɨn morapmɨ da dabɨlon yalɨŋ potni tɨmɨgek abɨgɨgɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan amɨn kawit uŋun da tamtam yaŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yawit, “Yo kalugɨsi altaŋban komaŋ!”
Yo kabɨni gat mɨktɨmni gat yopba amɨn da yumaŋ naŋba moneŋ uŋun baŋ bupmɨ amɨn paŋpulugawit.
Bɨsap morapmɨ Yesu gat paŋdet kabɨni gat uŋun pigaga muwuk muwuk awit, do uwal da kɨsiron yɨpjak amɨn Judas kɨsi uŋun pigaga kaŋ nandaŋyo agɨt.
Nido, amɨn dakon butjap da Piŋkop dakon aŋpak kɨlegɨ dɨma aŋalon asak.
Amɨn kɨmakbi kɨmoron da dɨma pɨdoni tam, mibɨlɨ nido amɨn dɨwarɨ da amɨn kɨmakbi paŋpulugok do telagɨ pakbi sosoŋ? Arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨdoni tam, nido uŋun aŋpak aŋ?
Nagon obɨŋek geno nandaŋek guramɨkgaŋ amɨn uŋun dakon tɨlak kɨnda dolɨkeŋ.
Amɨn da bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ kɨsit kandapyoni wamgwit, mani uŋun amɨn tebai do nap teban si paŋdagagɨt. Amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨdogɨ.
Dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn dabɨlni paban pɨsaŋban sɨŋtoŋ. Ae jɨgɨ da tebai pabɨŋ yopmaŋgaŋ amɨn uŋun jɨgɨni kukwaŋ yomɨsak. Yawe uŋun amɨn kɨlegɨ do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak.
Aŋakwan Pailat da iyɨgɨt, “Kobogɨ nayɨk do dɨma nandɨsal, ma? Gepbo kɨki bo ae tɨlak kɨndapmon gɨtni dakon yaŋ dagok nagon gɨn tosok. Gak uŋun dɨma nandɨsal, ma?”
Aŋkɨ joŋ kalɨkalɨgɨ tɨmon nepban pak yawokdot. Aŋek pakbi monɨŋ monɨŋ yaworɨ pokgoŋ uŋudon gɨn nayɨŋ awɨldak.
Ɨmɨŋba abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ ɨmal garagɨ mɨni kɨnda naŋ wamaŋek
Yaŋban paŋdetni da Yesu dakon gen guramɨgek kɨŋ Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap paŋkosit awit.
Piŋkop, uwal da gen yaŋ gamaŋ, do gak abɨŋek gen pikon gaga da tet kɨla tebai abi. Gɨldat kɨnda kaloŋ nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn da yaŋsul yokwisi aŋ gamaŋ uŋun do nandaki.
Mani nak gen kɨnda dayɨkdɨsat uŋun yaŋ. Israel amɨn Gen Bin Tagɨsi uŋun nandawit bo dɨma? Uŋun nandawit. Piŋkop gen papia da yaŋ yosok: “Mɨŋat amɨn morapyo mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ da tekni kɨlɨ nandawit. Geni mɨktɨm dɨwarɨkon da dɨwarɨkon kɨlɨ kɨgɨt.”
Ji kɨla amɨn madep gat ae amɨn gat ae gapman gat ae kɨla amɨn morap gat,
Amɨn kɨnda “Nak Piŋkop but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsat” yaŋ yosak, mani paŋmuwukbi notni kɨnda do nandaban yokwi tok aŋɨmɨsak kaŋ, uŋun top amɨn kɨnda. Amɨn kɨnda notni noman pɨndakdak uŋun but dasi dɨma galak taŋ yomɨsak, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop dɨma kokogɨ uŋun but dasi arɨpmɨ dɨma galak taŋ ɨmɨsak.
“Amɨn tebaisi kɨnda emat agak yo kabɨni tɨmɨgek iyɨ dakon yut kɨlani tebai aŋakwan, yo kabɨni tagɨsi toŋ.
Aŋakwan Yesu bot buŋɨkon busuŋ kɨdɨŋ kɨndakon wɨtjɨŋek dɨpmɨn pagakwan paŋdetni da aŋyolek iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, nin pakbi naŋ kɨmotneŋ do nandabɨ yo ɨsalɨ asak?”
Yesu amɨn morapmɨ da bɨkbɨgon da kɨlɨ kɨgɨt, do kɨlek tagɨt amɨn uŋun namɨn da iyɨgɨt uŋun dɨma nandagɨt.
Mani amɨn kɨnda but bamot aŋek jap kɨnda nosak kaŋ, uŋun gulusuŋ asak, nido nandaŋ gadaron da dɨma nosok. Nandaŋ gadatninon da aŋpak morap amɨn da dɨma agagɨ yaŋ nandaŋek amaŋ, uŋun yokwi amaŋ.
Yaŋ aŋek Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu dakon man awɨgɨni, ae uŋun da ji dakon man kɨsi awɨgɨsak. Piŋkopnin gat ae Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo gat da nandaŋ yawok damɨŋakwan yo morap uŋun jikon tagɨ noman toni.
Amɨn morap telagɨ pakbi soŋakwa Yesu yo kɨsi sogɨt. Soŋek bɨsit aŋakwan kundu wɨtdal kɨgɨt.
Wɨsa dagok morap gak da nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsal uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋok aneŋ kaŋ uŋun tagɨsi. Ae kalbi morap bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ paŋpulugaŋek dɨma nipmaŋ dekdal uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋok aneŋ kaŋ uŋun tagɨsi.
“Do yaŋ dayɨsat, Piŋkop da yokwi morap gat ae Piŋkop do yaŋba yokwi tok agak morap tagɨ wɨrɨrɨtjak. Mani amɨn kɨnda Telagɨ Wup do yaŋba yokwi tok asak kaŋ, Piŋkop da uŋun amɨn dakon dɨwarɨni dɨma wɨrɨrɨk ɨmdɨsak.
Mani don, Yawe da oman amɨni Moses gat Aron gat manjɨŋek yabekban Isip kɨgɨmal.
Yawe, gak nido nak da dubagɨkon egɨsal? Bɨsap yokwikon gak nido pasɨl namɨsal?
Aŋakwa yo 4 kabɨ egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋun da yaŋ yawit, “Uŋun asi.” Yaŋ yaŋakwa kɨla amɨn kabɨ da maŋ pagek gawak yomgwit.
Nido yo yokwi da nagon noman toni bɨsapmon uŋun da iyɨ da yutnon aŋkɨsɨbɨŋ nepban egɨpbeŋ. Yoma sopmaŋek tagɨsi aŋkɨsɨbɨŋ nepjak. Tɨp madep kɨnda da kwenon nepban tagɨsi egɨpbeŋ.
Uŋun amɨn maŋ mudokdaŋ. Mani nin pɨdaŋek tebai atdamaŋ.
“Moses da kɨndap wal monɨŋgok sogɨt uŋun do gen mandagɨt uŋun manjɨŋek asisi nandamaŋ, amɨn kɨmoron da pɨdokdaŋ. Moses da Amɨn Tagɨ do yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Uŋun Abraham, Aisak, ae Jekop dakon Piŋkop.’
Yopmaŋ kɨŋakwan amɨn monjɨ uŋun abɨdaŋ yutnikon aŋkɨwit. Wagɨl dɨma kɨmakgɨt yaŋ nandaŋek butni yaworɨ tawit.
Kaŋakwan Kwen Kokup wɨtdal kɨŋakwan yo kɨnda ɨmal madep yombem kɨnda da pɨgɨt. Uŋun kodɨgɨ 4 kabɨkon da yɨpba mɨktɨmon pɨgɨt.
Uŋun meŋ datyo da yawikon da dɨma altawit. Ae amɨn da galak togon da dɨma. Piŋkopmon da altawit.
Pakyaŋsi kaŋ kɨmotni. Jikon da kɨnda maŋek Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni dɨ yɨpmaŋ dekban. Ae jikon da kɨnda kɨndap ɨsɨpmɨ da yaŋ kwaŋek yokwi paŋalon aŋdaban amɨn morapmɨ dɨ paŋupbal aban Piŋkop manji dɨ ɨbam.
Lot dakon mɨŋatnikon yo noman taŋ ɨmgwit uŋun do nandani!
Ji Taitus kɨlɨ nandaŋ ɨmgwit. Taitus uŋun nak gat gadat gadaron da ji paŋpulugok do pi kaloŋɨ amak. Ae amɨn bamot do yaŋsi nandani, uŋun paŋmuwukbi dakon ɨŋam tɨmɨgek akwamal, ae Kristo man madep ɨmamal.
Elisabet monjɨ kwap awɨlgɨt uŋun dakon kanek 6 mudaŋakwan Piŋkop da aŋeloni Gebriel yabekban mɨŋatjok kɨnda mani Maria uŋun do kɨgɨt. Galili mɨktɨmon, kokup kɨnda mani Nasaret uŋudon egɨpgut. Maria uŋun amɨn kɨnda mani Josep, Dewit da kabɨkon nani uŋun pasak do manjɨkbi.
Nak dɨma kɨmokgeŋ. Nak egek Yawe da yo agɨt uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋok abeŋ.
Kɨlɨ uŋunjok Piŋkop but yawot nimɨsak uŋun da Sunduk kandap gɨbaŋninon yɨpban bamono sulɨgɨkdɨsak. Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu dakon nandaŋ yawotni jikon tosak do bɨsit asat.
Aŋapbo Yawe da aŋpak uŋun abeŋ do but dasi galak taŋ kɨmotjak. Bulmakau baŋ paret abeŋ uŋun do madepsi dɨma galak tosok.
Iyɨ paŋteban ak do aŋpak yokwi uŋun aŋ. Amɨn dɨwarɨ yokwalni do pat yopmaŋek gen yaŋ yoŋ, “Amɨn kɨnda da nin arɨpmɨ dɨma nindakdɨsak.”
Yaŋban Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Bɨsit ani bɨsapmon yaŋ yoni: ‘Dat, gak dakon man telagɨ tosak. Amɨn Kɨla Agakgo yɨpbɨ ninon apjak.
Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn nin da gen aŋteban agɨmaŋ uŋun kɨlɨ mandaŋ yomgumaŋ. Gen uŋun yaŋ: Ji kokup kɨdat do paret abi uŋun dakon jap dɨma noni. Ae yawi gat ae bɨt kɨlapyo si tɨpba kwoŋ dɨma noni. Ae mɨŋat wɨliyo yumabi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ dɨma ani.”
Judas tepmɨ Yesukon kɨŋ altaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, kalbi tagɨsi!” Yaŋ iyɨŋek mandaŋ nagɨt.
Mani mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni kaŋ, niaŋon da bɨsit iyɨŋba paŋpulugosak? Ae gen bini do dɨma nandani kaŋ, niaŋon da nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni? Ae amɨn kɨnda da Piŋkop gen dɨma yoyɨsak kaŋ, niaŋon da gen bini nandani? Uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma nandani.
Yo kɨnda da tebaisi bamaŋ namɨsak uŋun da tɨlak nak obɨsi tasɨk taŋek yokwisi egɨsat. Butnokon da yokwisi nandaŋek tepmɨ madepsi nandɨsat do iyoŋ iyoŋ yosot.
Not kabɨ, Judia mɨktɨmon Piŋkop dakon paŋmuwukbi morap Yesu Kristokon gadaŋbi da egɨ aŋaŋ kwaŋon, yo noman taŋ yomgwit, jikon yaŋ gɨn noman taŋ damgwit. Judia mɨktɨmon nandaŋ gadat amɨn Juda amɨn da jɨgɨ morapmɨ aŋyomgwit, yaŋ gɨn kokup ɨsalji da jiyo jɨgɨ morapmɨ aŋdamgwit.
Iyɨŋban kɨŋ Pol yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nayɨŋbɨ nandako. Gak Rom amɨn kɨnda?” Iyɨŋban yagɨt, “Asi nak Rom amɨn kɨnda.”
Nandani. Ninon amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dogɨn dɨma egɨsak, ae kɨmot ak do iyɨ dogɨn dɨma kɨmokdok.
“Amɨn bamorɨ bɨsit ak do Telagɨ Yut Madepmon wɨgɨgɨmal. Kɨnda uŋun Parisi amɨn, ae kɨnda uŋun takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn.
Usia uŋun Jotam dakon datni. Jotam uŋun As dakon datni. As uŋun Esekia dakon datni.
Yaŋ bɨsap morapmɨ asak tam, uŋun tepmɨ morapmɨ sigɨn paŋ aŋaŋ kɨsak, uŋun Piŋkop da yo morap wasaŋban noman tawiron da wɨŋ abɨsok bɨsapmon wɨsagon tepmɨ sigɨn paban. Mani dɨma. Abɨsok mibɨ bɨsapmon Kristo bɨsap kaloŋsi kɨnda mɨktɨmon pɨŋek yokwi wɨrɨrɨt do iyɨ naŋ paregek kɨmakgɨt.
Mani Piŋkop da yabekbi nin baŋ mibɨ amɨn nipgut yaŋ nandɨsat. Nin gen pikon nipmaŋek mɨŋat amɨn morap da dabɨlon ae aŋelo da dabɨlon kɨmotneŋ do yaŋ dagok aŋ nibi yombem da ekwamaŋ.
Yesu Matyu da yutnon yɨgek jap naŋek takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn morapmɨ ae yokwi pakpak amɨn morapmɨ da apba Yesu gat paŋdetni gat kɨsi yɨgek jap nawit.
Jiyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn ekwaŋ. Amɨn da dandaba ji amɨn kɨlegɨsi ekwaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ, mani butjikon ji jamba but amɨnsi ae gen teban yapyap amɨnsi ekwaŋ.
Yaŋ aban amɨn dɨwarɨ da kaŋek burɨ yokwi taŋba notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Nidosi pakbi kɨbaŋɨ toŋ tagɨsi uŋun yumsi tagaldak?
Yaŋ nandagɨl, do moneŋno beŋon yopgul tam uŋun tagɨ. Yaŋ agɨl tam abɨŋ nak da moneŋno gat ae beŋ da dɨwarɨ saŋbesak uŋun gat tagɨ tɨmɨkgom.’
Amɨn kɨsisi mɨrak paŋ egakwa Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Ji notji baŋgɨn gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ yoyɨni kaŋ, uŋun da tagɨ dɨma asak. Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn kabɨ kɨsi yaŋ gɨn aŋ.
Kɨŋek mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda mani Busuŋ Kɨdat uŋudon Yesu tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋagek yokwi pakpak kɨnda amɨn tet do, ae kɨnda gwandeŋ tet do yaŋ dapgwit.
Maria kanek kapbɨ Elisabet gat egek don kokupnikon tobɨl kɨgɨt.
Aŋek Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak dakon geni yoyɨŋ teŋteŋaŋek Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo do yoyɨŋ dekgɨt. Gen yaŋ teŋteŋok do dɨma pasalgɨt. Ae amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ sop dɨma aŋ ɨmgut.
Emaron teban taŋek geno guramɨgakwan wɨgɨ bɨsap madep apjak amɨn uŋun yaŋ mudaŋ ɨbo mɨktɨm morap kɨla akdɨsak.
“Kɨla Amɨn Madep uŋun da amɨnsi tet do amɨn yaŋ yoyɨsak, ‘Datno da gɨsam dabi amɨn, abɨŋek Datno dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni ji do aŋnoman abi uŋun abɨŋek abɨdoni. Uŋun mɨktɨm wasok wasogɨkon ji do kɨlɨ aŋnoman agɨt da tosok.
Mani amɨn yokwi tasɨk taŋ mudokdaŋ. Jareŋ gat joŋ gat da pasɨlgaŋ, uŋun da tɨlak Yawe dakon uwalni pasɨldaŋ. Asisi, mukwa da bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok taŋek pasɨlgaŋ, uŋun da tɨlak pasɨldaŋ.
Do jikon yɨpbo opjak do tagɨsi nandɨsat, nido ji uŋun aesi kaŋek but galaksi nandaŋek egɨpdaŋ, ae nak dakon but kɨsi yaworɨ tokdɨsak.
“Nak asisi dayɨsat, uŋun bɨsapmon egɨpni amɨn dɨma kɨmagakwa yo morap uŋun kɨsi altaŋ mudokdaŋ.
Ji nak da aŋpak uŋun at dakon mibɨlɨ kɨlɨ uŋun nandaŋ. Ji yaŋ gɨn ani kaŋ, kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdaŋ.
Nak yabekbi Pol da papia on mandɨsat. Yabekbi pi abeŋ do amɨn da dɨma yabekgwit, bo amɨn da dɨma manjɨŋ nepgwit. Yesu Kristo gat ae Piŋkop Datni kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt uŋun da nak yabekgɨmal.
Nak do bɨkbɨk naba nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn da yaŋ gen dɨ dayɨkeŋ. Mani bɨkbɨk kɨlɨ namgwit.
Aŋek kosit ɨleŋon pik kɨndap kɨnda akban kagɨt. Kaŋek kapmatjok da kɨŋ bamɨ dɨ dɨma pɨndakgɨt. Tamɨ gɨn pɨndagek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak buŋon ae bamɨ dɨmasi toki dosi nandɨsat!” Yaŋ iyɨŋakwan uŋudon gɨn wagɨlsi kɨbɨdagɨt. Tamɨ kɨsi alek taŋ mudawit.
Mɨŋat uŋun nandak nandak pak do tagɨsi nandaŋ, mani gen bamɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma nandaŋ pɨsoni.
Kalbi kɨndakon Amɨn Tagɨ da Pol burɨ pɨsaŋakwan dɨpmɨn yombem kɨnda kaŋakwan altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak dɨma pasalek nak dakon geno sigɨn yaŋ teŋteŋoki. Gen mapmɨt dɨma aki.
Aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Nak dakon yut uŋun amɨn da abɨŋ bɨsit aŋnamni do tosok.’ Mani ji da kulabɨk aba ‘kabo noknok dakon pasɨlɨ tamo yombem asak.’ ”
Amɨn madep kabɨkon Piŋkop gen tɨlak genon dagɨn yoyɨgɨt. Mani paŋdetni gat egek tɨlak gen dakon mibɨlɨ yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt.
Piŋkop gen papia da yosok uŋudeŋ akdosi nandɨsat. Uŋun yaŋ yosok: “Amɨn gen bini dɨma yoyɨwit amɨn da uŋun kokdaŋ, ae gen bini dɨma nandawit amɨn da nandaŋ pɨsokdaŋ.”
Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do aŋek nak do bupmɨ nandagɨt. Mɨŋat amɨnyo nagon yo agɨt uŋun kaŋek yaŋsi nandani: Yesu Kristo da yokwi pakpak amɨn do nandaŋ yawok yomɨŋek but tobɨl ani do bɨkbɨk madepsi yomɨsak. Yaŋ nandaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek egɨp egɨp teban abɨdoni, mibɨlɨ yaŋ do yokwi pakpak dakon mibɨltok amɨn nak do bupmɨ nandagɨt.
Piŋkop da Monji do yaŋ yagɨt: Uŋun da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni nimdosi yagɨt. Uŋun egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni Monjɨkon tosok.
Ae amɨn kɨnda tɨlak kɨndapni guramɨgek nak dɨma noljak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn nak dakon notno dɨma.
Kandap da “Nak kɨsit dɨma, do gɨptɨm dakon dɨwatni dɨma” yaŋ tagɨ yosak, mani uŋun gɨptɨm dakon dɨwatni sigɨn tosok.
Uŋun amɨn gen pap yaŋek geni ɨsalɨ do gɨptɨm pawɨgɨk aŋ. Uŋun da amɨn yumabi aŋpak gat ae gɨptɨm dakon aŋpak yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ ani do paŋgalak aba uŋun ak do but sulugɨk aŋ. Uŋun aŋpak aŋek abɨsok aŋpak yokwi yɨpmaŋ amɨn, uŋun ɨlɨkba kɨŋ uŋun amɨn yokwi yolgaŋ.
Gak da emat dakon tapmɨm namgul, aŋek uwal kɨsitnokon yopmaŋaki pabɨŋ yopgum.
Ji abɨŋek Piŋkop da yo agɨt uŋun pɨndatni. Yo masɨ masɨmɨ amɨn da binapmon agɨt uŋun do pɨndatni.
Maŋakwa dam teban yut dakon kɨla amɨn dɨpmɨnon da pɨdaŋ pɨndakban dam teban yut dakon yoma kɨsi pɨsawit. Yaŋ pɨndak amɨn kɨsi abɨgɨ mudaŋ yaŋ nandaŋek nak kɨla tagɨ dɨma at yaŋon da emat agak sɨbani ɨlɨk iyɨ naŋ sugok do agɨt.
“Yo morap aŋ uŋun amɨn da pɨndatni yaŋ do aŋ. Piŋkop dakon gen sop sɨmɨl sɨmɨl kɨnam madepsi ɨŋamɨkon wamaŋgaŋ, ae ɨmalnikon nap tɨlɨmɨ toŋ dubagɨsi uŋun baŋ paŋ.
Jon iyɨ teŋteŋɨ dɨma. Uŋun da teŋteŋɨ dakon but pɨso gen gɨn yagɨt.
Ji gen on do pakyaŋsi nandani. Amɨn morap Yawe dakon pɨŋbinisi ekwaŋ, uŋun iyɨ do manjɨgɨt. Nak uŋun do yaŋ tɨdoko bɨsitno nandɨsak.
Parisi amɨn kɨnda da Yesu yutnikon obɨŋ jap nosak do yaŋ ɨban yutnikon obɨŋ jap tamokon yɨkgɨt.
Do yokwi da kɨla amɨn madep da yaŋ yɨgek amɨn morap kɨmot aŋalon aŋ yomgut. Mani abɨsok Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni kɨla amɨn madep da yaŋ yɨkdak. Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo da pi agɨt do aŋek Piŋkop da nandaŋ yawok nimɨŋek amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ niyɨŋakwan egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdomaŋ.
Kaŋapbo Amɨn Tagɨ da yaŋ nayɨgɨt, ‘Gak tepmɨsi pɨdaŋ Jerusalem yɨpmaŋ kɨ. Nak dakon gen on kokup papmon yoyɨki kaŋ, amɨn da dɨma abɨdokdaŋ.’
Nak ji gat tɨmɨsok dɨ gat egɨpbeŋ bo ae sigɨn egapbo ais bɨsap mudosak uŋun dɨma nandɨsat. Ae kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon kɨkeŋ bɨsapmon ji da aŋpulugaŋakwa kɨkeŋ.
Butni tagɨsi taŋakwan yoŋ bo butni tagɨ dɨma taŋakwan yoŋ nak uŋun do nandaba kɨk dɨma asat. Yo madep uŋun Kristo dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋoŋ. Nak uŋun do but galaksi nandɨsat, ae don but galak madep sigɨn nandakeŋ.
Mani dɨsi Moses dakon gen maba kwanek yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Amɨn kɨnda da meŋi bo datni yaŋ iyɨsak, “Nak yo on kɨlɨ Piŋkop do manjɨgɨm. Dɨma tam tagɨ paŋpulugokom.” ’
Amɨn bamot yabekba Antiok pɨgɨ paŋmuwukbi kabɨ yaŋ yobal muwukba papia uŋun yomgumal.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yagɨt, “Uŋun do aŋek yaŋ dayɨsat, ji egɨp egɨpji do nandaba kɨk aŋek jap pakbiyo ni baŋ noneŋ yaŋ dɨma nandani. Ae gɨptɨmji do nandaŋek ɨmal dukon baŋ paneŋ, yaŋ nandaŋek nandaba kɨk dɨma ani. Egɨp egɨpji da jap yapmaŋdak, ae gɨptɨmji da ɨmal yapmaŋdak.
Yawe, uwal da nak aŋupbal akdaŋ, do kosit yɨpmaŋ namɨŋaki aŋpakgo kɨlegɨ uŋun yolbeŋ. Kosit agɨpbeŋ do nandɨsal uŋun nolɨki.
Aŋek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyoni yoyɨŋ dekbɨ mibɨlni nandaba pɨsosak. Piŋkopnin uŋun bupmɨni madepsi, do dɨwarɨni wɨrɨrɨk yomɨŋek pulugaŋ tɨmɨtdɨsak yaŋ nandani. Uŋun da Kwen Kokup dakon teŋteŋɨ madep yɨpban
Paŋmuwukbi dɨwarɨ da moneŋ naba uŋun da nak joŋɨkban ji paŋpulugok do pi agɨm. Yaŋ agɨm uŋun da kabo nagɨm yombem asak.
Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo dakon nandaŋ yawotni jikon tosak do bɨsit amaŋ.
Jikon jap dɨma tɨmɨtneŋ yaŋon da dɨma. Jap nimnisi do tagɨ dayɨnom, mani yaŋ dɨma agɨmaŋ. Nido, aŋpak tagɨsi dɨsi yolek ani, nin uŋun dolɨk do aŋek uŋun do yaŋ agɨmaŋ.
Dewit da yaŋ yagɨt: “Amɨn Piŋkop dakon gen tebani yapba gulusuŋni uŋun yopmaŋ yomɨŋek dɨwarɨni wɨrɨrɨkdak uŋun amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
Ji dɨsi gen on kokwin ani. Mɨŋat kɨnda busuŋni dɨma wɨtjɨŋek bɨsit asak kaŋ, uŋun aŋpak tagɨ naŋ asak?
Uŋun bɨsapmon Judia ae Galili ae Samaria provinskon paŋmuwukbi tagɨsi egɨpgwit. Amɨn da yokwi dɨma aŋ yomɨŋakwa paŋmuwukbi tapmɨm pawit. Aŋek Amɨn Tagɨ do nandaŋ gawagek egakwa Telagɨ Wup da nandak nandakni paŋteban agɨt. Aŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ paŋmuwukbikon saŋbeŋba madepsi sigɨn tagagɨt.
“Uŋun do aŋek ji kaŋ kɨmotni. Ji yut dakon ami ni bɨsapmon apjak uŋun dɨma nandaŋ. Apjak bɨsap uŋun pɨlɨndo bo kalbi binap bo pup da gen yosok bɨsapmon bo wɨsa dagokdo uŋun ji dɨma nandaŋ.
Monji do man madep ɨmdɨsak. Yaŋ uŋun tepmɨsi akdɨsak.
Saimon Pita da busuŋɨ da tɨlak aŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Namɨn do yosok yaŋ do iyɨŋ ka.”
Piŋkop gen papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: “Nak Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgum, do yaŋ teŋteŋok agɨm.” Ae yaŋ gɨn ninyo kɨsi nandaŋ gadat amaŋ, do yaŋ teŋteŋok amaŋ.
Butjap sigɨn nandaŋ yomɨŋek yo yokwisi aŋ yobi. Aŋek butjapgo da aban pasɨl mudoni.
Gɨldarɨ ae kalbi Piŋkop da nipban abɨŋ ji dandaŋek nandaŋ gadatji da tetgɨn yo nido wadaŋ uŋun damneŋ do bɨsit madepsi aŋek ekwamaŋ.
Apban Piŋkop da Abraham iyɨ do mɨktɨm tɨmjok kɨnda dɨmasi ɨmgut. Mani Abraham gat yawi dɨwatni gat da on mɨktɨm don abɨdoni do yaŋ teban tok gen kɨnda yagɨt. Gen uŋun iyɨgɨt bɨsapmon Abraham monjɨ mɨni egɨpgut.
Pɨlak pɨlak da yo tamɨ toŋ morap nawit. Aŋek Isip amɨn da jap kwaokgwit dakon bamɨ kɨsi nawit.
Piŋkop da Kristo dakon mani tagɨsi jikon yɨpgut, naŋ namɨn da uŋun do nandaban pɨŋakwan jɨgɨlak gen yoŋ? Uŋun yoni morapmɨ amɨn dagɨn yoŋ.
Aŋek daŋgap madep pekba tugoni ae ɨleŋ morap pasɨŋba kositni kɨlegɨsi asak. Ae kosit gɨreŋɨ paŋmɨlɨp aba kɨlegɨsi asak. Ae kosit yokwi paŋmɨlɨp aba wagɨl gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi asak.
Mani amɨn kɨnda gen tebani guramɨkdak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da Piŋkop pakyaŋsi but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsak. Yaŋ aŋek egɨp egɨpni Piŋkopmonsi taŋakwan egɨsak.
Yaŋ yaŋek tobɨl paŋdetni kapbɨ egɨpgwiron kɨŋ pɨndakban dɨpmɨn pakgwit pɨndagek Pita yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ji nak gat awa kaloŋɨ da arɨpmon gɨn Piŋkop do nandaŋek dɨma egɨpneŋ?
Gɨldat si pɨgɨk do aŋakwan amɨn da notni sot mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ awit uŋun Yesukon paŋopgwit. Paŋopba Yesu da kɨsitni kwenikon kaloŋ kaloŋ wutjɨŋek paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Mani nandaŋ gadatgo dɨma mosak yaŋ do bɨsit kɨlɨ agɨm. Gak tobɨl apbi bɨsapmon notgoni paŋteban abi.”
Yaŋban Amɨn Tagɨ da yagɨt, “Oman monjɨ kɨnda nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi ae pi agakni tagɨsi, uŋuden oman monjɨ amɨn tagɨni da oman monjɨni dɨwarɨ kɨlani asak do manjɨsak. Yaŋ aban jap yomyom bɨsapmon japni yomɨŋ yomɨŋ asak.
Gak da nin but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsal, do bɨsitno nandaki. Aŋek tapmɨm madepgokon da nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨgaki nin tagɨsi egɨpneŋ.
Pakbi madep uŋun ɨgek tɨmɨkban tagɨ kɨmak mudonom. Mani dɨma.”
Mani gak dakon yaŋ dagok dɨma kaŋek yo kɨnda dɨma abeŋ. Gak da ɨdon egek nak aŋpulugosak do nandɨsal kaŋ uŋun gak dakon galak tok. Nak tebai dɨma gayɨkeŋ.
Mɨktɨm amɨn da amɨn bamot uŋun kɨlɨ wagɨl kuŋwamal yaŋ pɨndagek, but kwaktok nandaŋek notni do but galak yo yomdaŋ, nido kombɨ amɨn bamot uŋun mɨktɨm amɨn tepmɨ madepsi yomgumal.
Gɨldatno tagɨ Andronikus gat ae Junias gat do yomni. Uŋun bamot nak dakon dɨwatno, nak gat kɨsi dam tebanon egɨpgumaŋ. Uŋun yabekbi kabɨkon man madepni toŋ. Uŋun da mibɨltok Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgumal, aŋakwal nak don nandaŋ gadat agɨm.
Pita da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaba burɨ sugaŋba amɨn da Pita gat yabekbi kabɨ dɨwarɨ gat yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Not kabɨ, nin abɨsok niaŋsi ano kɨlek tosak?”
Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo gat ae Piŋkop Datnin gat da nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimamal. Aŋek nandaŋ yawok nimɨsak do aŋek toktogɨsi butnin paŋteban aban tagɨsi tosok, ae nin paŋpulugaŋban nandaŋ gadat aŋek Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi aŋ nimjak do jomjom amaŋ.
Piŋkop da Telagɨ Wup damɨŋek wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ ji da bɨkbɨgon asak, mibɨlɨ nido yaŋ asak? Ji da gen teban yolakwa, uŋun do? Bo, Gen Bin Tagɨsi nandaŋek nandaŋ gadat aŋakwa, uŋun do asak?
Yaŋ do aŋek Rom amɨn jiyo kɨsikon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋokeŋ do galagɨ madepsi nandɨsat.
Uŋun papia da Elaija don apjak do yagɨt. Ji but bamot aŋ yaŋ nandɨsat. Gen on nandak do galak toŋ amɨn ji pakyaŋsi nandaŋek mibɨlɨ nandaŋ pɨsoni. Jon uŋun Elaija.
Yawe dakon tapmɨm madepni da nin paŋpulugaŋban emaron teban tagɨmaŋ! Yawe dakon tapmɨm madepni da yo uŋun agɨt!”
Gen on pasɨlɨ tawit, baŋ Yesu Kristo da paŋalon agɨt. Yesu da oman monjɨni yolɨsak do Piŋkop da ɨmgut. Yo uŋun tepmɨsi altokdaŋ. Yesu da aŋeloni yabekban abɨŋ pi monjɨni nak Jonon gen on nayɨgɨt. Nak da pi monjɨni dɨwarɨ yolɨkeŋ yaŋon da nayɨgɨt.
Gɨldat morapmɨ egɨ mudaŋakwa Juda amɨn da muwugek Sol aŋat do gen yawit.
Mɨrɨm da mukwa pɨsoŋba kɨŋ pasɨlgaŋ, yaŋ gɨn Piŋkop da uwal yoldɨsak. Kɨndap tedep da kendol pɨndakban pakbi dagoŋ, yaŋ gɨn amɨn yokwi Piŋkop da ɨŋamon tasɨk tokdaŋ.
Nak dakon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk da jikon taŋakwan ji dakon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk da madepsi tugosak, mibɨlɨ yaŋ do aŋek gen on dayɨsat.
do dɨma pasolni. Mɨnam monɨŋ monɨŋ morapmɨ dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun madep dɨma, mani ji dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun wukwisi.”
Wɨli 4 tausen da jap nawit. Ae mɨŋat monjɨyo jap nawit uŋun dɨma manjɨkbi.
Yaŋ yaŋek datni ni man naŋ yok do nandɨsak yaŋ do kɨsit tɨlak aŋ ɨmgwit.
aŋek Piŋkop Dat ya yaŋ iyɨni. Uŋun da ji paŋpulugaŋban yo ji do Kwen Kokup manjɨkbi da toŋ uŋun kɨsin da tɨmɨk tɨmɨk akdamaŋ. Asi Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo nin Piŋkop da teŋteŋɨkon ekwamaŋ uŋun yo abɨdokdamaŋ.
Ae joŋ kɨlap yokwisi gat, ae mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ dakon kɨla amɨn madepni gat ae emat amɨni gat da abɨŋ muwukgwit. Uŋun amɨn uŋun oskon yɨkgɨt gat ae emat amɨni gat emat wam do aŋek muwukgwit.
Yaŋ yaŋban yutnon wɨgek paŋdetni da uŋun gen dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do iyɨwit.
Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu da nandak nandakno aban pɨsaŋakwan yaŋsi nandako pɨsosok, jap kɨnda nono Piŋkop da nandaban yokwi tosak uŋun dɨma tosok. Mani amɨn kɨnda jap kɨnda dɨma noknogɨ yaŋ nandɨsak kaŋ, dɨmasi nosak, nido jap uŋun do iyɨ dɨma noknogɨ yaŋ nandɨsak.
Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen teban kɨnda mandabi naŋ yolek kɨgɨmal. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Mɨŋat kɨnda monjɨ mibɨltogɨ uŋun wɨli kaŋ, uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ do paret do.”
Yawe nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek mayagɨ dɨma nandaŋ.
Kɨŋ mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda mani Golgata uŋudon altawit. (Golgata dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun Busuŋ Kɨdat Ɨleŋ.)
nin kɨŋ Yesu dakon paŋdet kabɨni pɨndatno uŋun gat gɨldat 7 kabɨ egɨpgumaŋ. Egapno Telagɨ Wup da paŋtagap aban Pol yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak Jerusalem dɨma kɨki.”
Gɨldat wɨsagon da si pɨgɨsak tet uŋun dubagɨsi. Uŋun da tɨlak Piŋkop da dɨwarɨnin wɨrɨrɨkban dubagɨsikon toŋ.
Yaŋ asak, do butno da tagɨsi aŋakwan kɨsɨk kɨsɨk gen yosot. Ae gɨptɨmno Piŋkop da aŋpulugosak do jomjom asat.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Koŋ kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda yɨpmaŋ degek kɨŋ mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon agek yɨk yawot tamo wɨsisak. Mani tamo kɨnda dɨma kosok, do yaŋ yosok, ‘Nak aeno tobɨl yut kalɨp egɨpgumon kɨkeŋ.’
Top amɨn uŋun namɨn? Yesu uŋun Kristo, Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyoni yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak do manjɨkbi amɨn dɨma yaŋ yosok amɨn uŋun top amɨn. Uŋun amɨn uŋun Kristo dakon uwalni. Uŋun Dat gat ae Monji gat kɨsi do wasɨp yosok.
Amɨn morap kɨsi amɨn dɨwarɨkon top yoŋ. Paŋkewal do gen galagɨ yoyaŋ.
Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gɨldat kɨlɨ abɨk dakon gen dɨ nandani kaŋ, dɨma wɨrɨpdagek pasolni. Amɨn kɨnda da kombɨ gen yaŋek, bo ae Piŋkop gen yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek, bo ae nin da papia kɨnda mandaŋek Amɨn Tagɨ kɨlɨ abɨk yaŋ yɨpgumaŋ yaŋ amɨn da dayɨŋba kaŋ, geni dɨma nandaŋ yomni.
Yo madep ji da si nandaŋ pɨsoni uŋun yaŋ: Mibɨ gɨldaron yaŋsul amɨn noman tokdaŋ, aŋek butni dakon galaktok yokwi uŋun yoldaŋ.
Ae yo tɨmɨt do bɨsit aŋ bɨsapmon yo dɨma tɨmɨkgaŋ, nido nandak nandakji kɨlegɨ dɨma taŋakwan Piŋkop bɨsit aŋ ɨmaŋ. Ji but dakon galaktok yokwi yolek gɨptɨmji da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk asak uŋun dogɨn nandaŋ.
Gak dasi gɨldat kalba gat ae pɨlɨn gat wasagɨl. Ae gɨldat gat kanek gat kwen yopgul.
Ji dakon aŋpak kokwinɨgek gen morapmɨsi tagɨ yokeŋ. Mani Amɨn nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun top dɨma yosok. Gen morap uŋun yaŋban nandagɨm uŋun baŋ mɨktɨm amɨnon yaŋ teŋteŋosot.”
Nak Datno dakon gen teban guramɨgek but dasi galak taŋ namɨsak uŋun da kagagwan egɨsat. Ji yaŋ gɨn nak dakon gen teban guramɨtni kaŋ, but dasi galak taŋ damɨsat uŋun da kagagwan egɨpdaŋ.
Mani Yesu bɨsap morapmɨ mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma ekwaŋ tɨmon paŋkɨ egek bɨsit pi agɨt.
Nak gak goldat, do amɨn da manji gen yaŋ namaŋ. Yaŋ aŋakwa mayaktok pasat.
Amɨn nak gat agɨpgumaŋ uŋun teŋteŋɨ kawit. Mani gen uŋun nayɨgɨt uŋun dɨma nandawit.
Yabekbi kabɨ da mɨŋat amɨnyo da binapmon tɨlak tapmɨmɨ toŋ ae wasok masɨ masɨmɨ morapmɨ awit. Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn uŋun Solomon dakon Yɨk Nandat Tamo uŋudon muwuk muwuk awit.
Kɨla amɨnji kɨlasi aŋ uŋun don pi awit dakon mibɨlɨ Piŋkop iyɨkdaŋ, do gawak yomɨŋek geni guramɨtni. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, kɨsɨk kɨsɨgon da pini akdaŋ. Mani butjɨk pani kaŋ, uŋun da ji dɨma paŋpulugokdɨsak.
Not kabɨ, on gen teban mandaŋ damɨsat uŋun kalugɨ dɨma, uŋun kalɨpmɨ. Ji uŋun gen teban nandaŋ gadat si wasaŋek awit bɨsapmon kɨlɨ abɨdawit. Gen kɨlɨ nandawit uŋun gen teban kalɨpmɨ on uŋun gɨn.
Yaŋba amɨn kɨnda tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨŋ yo kɨnda gugɨdan yombem jol dɨwaron wamaŋ wain gat ae pakbi ɨsɨpmɨ gat uŋungwan sɨbɨŋek Yesu da nosak do aŋenakgɨt. Aŋenagek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji yɨpba koneŋ. Elaija da asi abɨŋ tɨlak kɨndapmon naŋ abɨdaŋ abɨŋban koneŋ, bo dɨma.”
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban mɨŋat kapbɨ uŋun pasal nɨmnɨmɨgek tɨp kɨnamon da wɨŋ tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨwit. Kɨŋ pasol pasol aŋek amɨn dɨ dɨma yoyɨwit.
Iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋ egapbo tapmɨmno wagɨlsi maŋ mudoŋ. Kalbi morap kunam pakbino da tamono wagɨlsi aŋgɨk asak. Kunam tagapbo busuŋ kɨdɨŋno madepsi gɨk tosok.
Amɨn da gen teban yapmaŋakwa Piŋkop da butjap nandaŋ yomɨsak. (Mani gen teban mɨni kaŋ, gen kɨrɨŋɨt dakon dɨwarɨni mɨni.)
Kalɨp yokwikon naŋ aŋpulugaŋbɨ kɨsɨk kɨsɨk nandagɨm uŋun aego nabi. Aŋpulugaŋbɨ gak dakon gen guramɨkgeŋ.
Mani mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon oman amɨn kɨnda, uŋun Pita da mɨragɨ mandaŋ dagagɨt amɨn uŋun dakon dɨwatni kɨnda, uŋun da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gakyo kɨsi Yesu gat pigaga ekwa dandat, ma?”
Notnonisi, nin mɨŋat amɨnyo Piŋkop manji ɨmaŋ amɨn do yomaŋ, mani nandamaŋ, ji jɨgɨ uŋuden dɨma tɨmɨtdaŋ. Piŋkop da ji paŋpulugaŋek yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgɨt.
Uŋun kɨlɨ kɨmakgɨt, mani abɨsok gak da Piŋkop yo niaŋen kɨnda do bɨsit iyɨŋbɨ uŋun da tagɨ gamjak yaŋ nandɨsat.”
Yaŋ yaŋakwan Sebedi dakon monji bamot gat meŋi gat Yesukon kɨŋ altaŋek meŋi da ŋwakbeŋ aŋek Yesu da yo kɨnda aŋ yomjak do iyɨgɨt.
Mani mɨktɨmni kalɨpmɨ uŋun yapmaŋek mɨktɨm wagɨl tagɨsisi uŋudon egɨp do galak tawit, mɨktɨm uŋun Kwen Kokup. Uŋun amɨn da Piŋkop do, “Gak nin dakon Piŋkop,” yaŋ iyɨŋakwa Piŋkop mayagɨ dɨma pasak, nido uŋun amɨn do kokup pap kɨnda kɨlɨ aŋnoman agɨt da tosok.
“Nak Klodias Lisias da papia on gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn madep Peliks do mandɨsat. Gɨldat tagɨsi.
Jon dakon paŋdetni gat ae Parisi amɨn gat uŋun bɨsapmon Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek egɨpgwit. Aŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋun Yesukon kɨŋek yaŋ iyɨwit: “Jon dakon paŋdetni gat ae Parisi amɨn dakon paŋdetni gat uŋun Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek egakwa gak dakon paŋdetgoni nido jap naŋek ekwaŋ?”
Piŋkop, kokwin tagɨsi aŋek nak dakon nandak nandak morap butnokon toŋ uŋun do nandaki. Aŋkewalek nandak nandak morapno do pakyaŋsi nandaki.
“Nin ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk garaŋɨ pudaŋkwi kon ɨmal dɨwat kalugɨ pakbikon dɨma sugaŋbi kɨnda naŋ dɨma bupmaŋgamaŋ. Yaŋ kaŋ, pakbikon sugono ɨmal dɨwat uŋun da garaŋɨ ɨlɨkban pudaŋ kɨ madepsi akdɨsak.
Uŋun wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ Yesu da Kana kokup Galili mɨktɨm uŋudon mibɨltoksi wasaŋek agɨt. Yaŋ aŋek tɨlɨmni yolɨŋban paŋdetni da uŋun kaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit.
Nido, Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni uŋun gen gɨn yogok dakon yo dɨma. Uŋun tapmɨm dakon yo.
Gaga da dabɨlon kɨndap kwɨk tosok uŋun do dɨma nandaŋek notgo da dabɨlon jɨmjɨm nido kosol?
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak Datnokon dɨma wɨgɨt, do nak dɨma abɨdoki. Kɨŋ notno kabɨ yaŋ yoyɨki, ‘Nak Datno ae ji dakon Datji uŋudon wɨgɨkeŋ. Piŋkopno ae ji dakon Piŋkopji uŋudon wɨgɨkeŋ.’ ”
Gen yaŋ yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn Kwen Kokup aŋelo morapmɨsi da pɨŋ notnikon muwugek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yaŋ yawit:
Mani Pita da wasɨp yaŋek yagɨt, “Mɨŋat, uŋun amɨn dɨma nandaŋ ɨmɨsat.”
Nin but kalɨpmɨ dakon galaktok yolgumaŋ bɨsapmon gen teban da gɨptɨmnin dakon galaktok yokwi yolneŋ do yabet aban yokwi agɨmaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek kɨmot aŋalon agɨmaŋ.
Pestus uŋun gat gɨldat 8 bo 10 egɨ mudaŋakwa Sisaria pɨgɨgɨt. Pɨgɨ pakgwit da wɨsa dagokdo gen pi aŋ yutnon yɨgek Pol aŋopni do yoyɨgɨt.
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Uŋun gaga nandaŋek yosol, bo amɨn dɨ da nak do yaŋ gayɨwit?”
Mani telagɨ aŋkɨsineŋ. Amɨn morap Yawe gawak ɨm do uŋun da kapmatjok kwaŋ uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madep ani.
Nin ɨleŋɨkon tagɨsi wɨgɨgɨmaŋ. Wɨgek mɨktɨm tɨmjok kɨnda tap binap tosok uŋun mani Malta uŋudon obɨmaŋ yaŋ kokup amɨn da niyɨŋba nandagɨmaŋ.
Asi, amɨn kɨmakbi arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨdoni kaŋ, Piŋkop da Kristo kɨmoron naŋ dɨma aban pɨdagɨt.
Sunduk da aeni Yesu iyɨŋ aŋaŋ ɨleŋ dubagɨsi kɨndakon awɨgɨgɨt. Awɨgɨ on mɨktɨmon mɨktɨm madep madep morap kɨsi ae uŋudon yo tɨlɨmni toŋ gat kɨsi yolɨgɨt.
Yo morap aki bɨsapmon, gak gaga aŋpak tagɨsi baŋgɨn abi, aŋaki amɨn da aŋpakgo kaŋek yolni. Mɨŋat amɨnyokon yoyɨŋdet pi aki bɨsapmon gen kɨlegɨsi yaŋaki amɨn da gandaba pi amɨn bamɨsi kɨnda yaŋ gandani.
Dɨwarɨno dɨma yaŋ teŋteŋagɨm bɨsapmon gɨldat kalba ae kalbi but yokwi nandaŋek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋek egɨpgum. Aŋek tapmɨmno wagɨlsi alek tawit.
Dɨpmɨn yɨpmaŋek pɨdokeŋsi. Gita ae kuleleyo tɨdokeŋsi. Wɨsa dɨma dagaŋakwan nak da kalɨp pɨdaŋek kap yokeŋ.
Pita yaŋ yaŋban amɨn muwuk yɨkgwit kɨsi tayaŋgok yɨgek Pol gat Banabas gat do mɨrak yopgwit. Mɨrak yopmaŋakwa Piŋkop da paŋpulugaŋakwan Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨmal uŋun do yoyɨgɨmal.
Bɨsap tagɨsi kalɨpmɨ do nandaŋek butno obɨsi yokwi tosok. Kalɨp nak amɨn morapmɨ Piŋkop da yutnon mibɨltaŋ yomɨŋek paŋkɨgɨm. Nin kɨŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk do yaŋ tɨdagɨmaŋ. Aŋek ya yaŋ yagɨmaŋ. Uŋudon gak gawak gam do muwuk mamno kɨgɨt.
Babɨkon da babɨkon pi madep aŋ aŋ agɨl uŋun do yaŋ yaŋ akdaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Gen yosok uŋun koŋni toŋ amɨn dakon gen naŋ dɨma yosok. Koŋ da dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋmɨlɨp agagɨ.”
Mani Erot da yaŋ yagɨt, “Jon dakon tegɨ kɨlɨ mandaŋ dagagɨm. Mani abɨsok namɨn amɨn kɨnda dasi yo madepsi aŋakwan gen bini nayɨŋba nandɨsat?” Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu kok do pini agɨt.
Yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek Yesu kunam takgɨt.
Uŋun mɨŋat amɨn morap uŋun nandaŋ gadat aŋek egɨ wɨgɨ kɨmot awit. On mɨktɨmon egɨpgwit bɨsapmon yo tagɨsi Piŋkop da yom do yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun dɨma tɨmɨkgwit, ɨsal nandaŋ gadaron da dubagɨkon pɨndagek but galak nandawit. Uŋun iyɨ do nin mɨktɨm ŋwakŋwarɨkon amɨn yombem da amɨn da mɨktɨmon bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok ekwamaŋ yaŋ yawit.
Apba kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap Yawe do yono! Piŋkop tɨp madepnin yokwikon baŋ pulugaŋ nipgut uŋun do nandaŋek yaŋ tɨdaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap yono.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, nandaŋ gadat asak amɨn uŋun egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do amɨn asak.
Dɨwarɨ kwen wɨgɨk aŋek nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn dagawit. Gulusuŋ morapmɨ awit, do jɨgɨ tepmɨyo madepsi pawit.
Yawe, nak nepmaŋek dubagɨkon dɨma egɨpbi. Paŋpulugokno, tepmɨ abɨŋ aŋpuluga.
Nido Yawe uŋun Piŋkop tapmɨmɨ toŋsi egɨsak. Uŋun Kɨla Amɨn Madep tapmɨmɨ toŋsi egek amɨn da piŋkopnin yaŋ yoŋ yo morap yapmaŋ mudosok.
Butjapgo da obɨsi abɨŋ nepgut. Tap ɨdap da yaŋ tamalɨgek wutjɨŋban tagɨm.
Uŋun amɨn bamot kɨŋek yo morap altawit dakon geni yaŋ nandat agɨmal.
Emat amɨn pi aŋ bɨsapmon, pi dɨ gat kɨsi dɨma aŋ. Uŋun mibɨltok amɨn madepni da pi agakni pɨndakban kɨlegɨsi asak do nandɨsak.
Lista kokup papmon amɨn kɨnda kandapmɨ alek taŋbi mibɨlɨkon gɨn yɨgek egɨpgut. Meŋi da yaŋ aŋalagɨt.
Opban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak ninaŋ aŋgabeŋ do nandɨsal?” Yaŋban dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, nak sɨŋtok do nandɨsat.”
Kabɨt, nomansi agek gen yaŋakwan gen kɨnda dɨma iyaŋ. Kɨla amɨn da asi uŋun Kristo yaŋ nandaŋ ɨmaŋ?
Mani, gak Piŋkop dakon amɨn egɨsal, do aŋpak yokwi uŋuden morap yopmaŋ degek pasal kɨki. Pi tebai aŋek yo oden baŋ tɨmɨkgi: aŋpak kɨlegɨ, ae Piŋkop dakon aŋpak, ae nandaŋ gadat, ae amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak, ae tebaisi agek jɨgɨ ɨmet ɨmet aŋpak, ae amɨn do yo yaworɨ aŋ yomyom aŋpak.
Yaŋdo, niaŋ abeŋ? Wup ae nandak nandakno kɨsi da bɨsit abeŋ. Wup ae nandak nandakno kɨsi da kap yokeŋ.
“Ji Abraham, Aisak, Jekop, ae kombɨ amɨn kɨsisi Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak kokupmon ekwa pɨndatdaŋ. Mani ji maba waŋga kɨŋ mudokdaŋ. Uŋun bɨsapmon ji kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋ tɨdaŋek egɨpdaŋ.
Ae nin Kristo dakon yabekbini bamɨsi yaŋ dɨsi kokwinɨgek nindani do nandɨsat.
Butgo oman amɨngo nagon yɨpmaŋek yo tagɨsi aŋ nabi. Gen teban morapgo do nayɨŋ dekgi.
Yokwisi agek Yawe do yaŋ tɨdaŋba paŋpulugaŋban jɨgɨni pasɨl yomgwit.
Pol da yut kabeŋ dakon ɨmal bupbup pi agɨt uŋun amɨn wamyo kɨsi pi yaŋ gɨn agɨmal, do Pol kwan egek uŋun pi awit.
Nak mani yaŋ aŋkɨsiŋek aŋpulugosak do yaŋ tɨdagɨm.
gen papmon da gak aŋkɨsiŋek pi tagɨsisi asal uŋun do amɨn yoyɨsat.
Do gen teban guramɨt kosiron da amɨn kɨnda Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlegɨsi dɨma egɨsak. Dɨmasi! Gen teban da nin dɨwarɨnin toŋ yaŋ nolɨsak, uŋun gɨn.
Pita gat Jon gat amɨn gen sigɨn yoyɨŋakwal mukwa sogok amɨn gat Sadyusi amɨn gat ae Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon obip amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn gat kɨsi apgwit.
Yawe da toktogɨsi but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak ae amɨn kabɨni tagɨsi paŋpulugosok, do ya yaŋsi iyɨni.
Butjɨk Piŋkop da paŋalon asak uŋun da ninon but tobɨl paŋalon asak. Ae but tobɨl ano Piŋkop da nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkdak, do butjɨk pamaŋ da jɨgɨ dɨma nimɨsak. Mani on mɨktɨm dakon butjɨk da kɨmot paŋalon asak.
Asi, Piŋkop da Pita do tapmɨm ɨban Juda amɨnon yabekbi pi asak, yaŋ gɨn nak do tapmɨm naban Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon yabekbi pi asat.
Piŋkopno, Piŋkopno, nido nipmaŋ dekgɨl? Iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋapbo nido dubagɨkon egek jɨgɨkon naŋ dɨma aŋpulugosol?
Ae kɨla amɨn madep man bini toŋ dapban kɨmakgwit. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨŋek “Dat” yaŋ iyaŋ. Dat uŋun da man tɨmɨkgamaŋ uŋun do nandaŋek kokwin dɨma asak. Nin kaloŋ kaloŋ da aŋpak amaŋ uŋun pɨndagek nin kokwin asak. Do on mɨktɨmon egɨpni bɨsap morapmon, on mɨktɨm uŋun nin dakon kokupsinin yaŋ dɨma nandani, ae Piŋkop do pasalek uŋun da yoŋgamgwan gɨn egɨpni.
Piŋkop da Wupni nimgut, do nin Piŋkopmon ekwamaŋ ae Piŋkop ninon egɨsak yaŋsi nandamaŋ.
Yawe aŋkɨsini! Yawe dakon oman amɨn, ji mani aŋkɨsini.
Gɨldat kɨnda kaloŋ nak do yaŋ asal. Pakbi da ɨgek mɨktɨm morap kɨsi wutjɨsak, uŋun da tɨlak amɨn da nak aŋgwaseŋ.
Ji yaŋ ani, nido nak yaŋ dayɨsat, Kristo uŋun Juda amɨn dakon oman amɨni dagagɨt. Aŋek Piŋkop uŋun gen bamɨ yogok amɨn yaŋ yolɨk do aŋek babɨkni do yaŋ teban tok aŋ yomgut uŋun arɨpmɨsi agɨt.
Tap Gami tebai iyɨŋban mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨm dagagɨt, do amɨn da mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon kwaŋ uŋun da tɨlak mɨŋat amɨnyo mibɨltaŋ yomɨŋek tap ɨdap pudaŋek paŋpaŋ kɨgɨt.
Yɨgakwan amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun abɨŋ burɨkon muwuk mudoni. Abɨŋ muwukba kɨla amɨn da sipsip ae meme kokwinɨkgaŋ uŋun da tɨlagon amɨn kokwinɨtdɨsak.
Yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn iyɨ dakon paba pɨgɨkni pudagɨt. Yaŋ aŋek yagɨt, “Mibɨlni nandak do amɨn nido saŋbeŋek yoyɨno apni?
Nin Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi baŋ yaŋ teŋteŋok amaŋ. Piŋkop yo morap dɨma wasagɨt bɨsapmon nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsikon da Kwen Kokup iyɨ gat tɨlɨmnikon egɨpneŋ do kosit kɨlɨ yɨpgut. Mani uŋun kosit dakon geni pasɨlɨ tagɨt.
‘Uŋun do aŋek wɨli da meŋi datniyo yopmaŋek mɨŋatni gat muwukbal
Uŋun bɨsapmon kaŋakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji gɨkwemon da tapmɨmni gat tɨlɨm madepni gat apdɨsak.
Piŋkop gak da nin gaga da mibɨlgwanjok nipgul. Gak da nin wasaŋek tɨlɨm gat ae man madep gat nimgul.
Amɨn tausen morapmɨ da abɨŋ muwugek gɨtni gɨtnisi aŋek notni bamaŋ bamaŋ aŋakwa Yesu da mibɨltok paŋdetni baŋ kalɨp yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Parisi amɨn dakon yisni do kaŋ kɨmotni. Uŋun jamba but amɨnsi ekwaŋ.
Pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo Yesu gat paŋdetni 12 kabɨ gat uŋun yutnon opgwit.
Kɨla amɨn madep egek tap terɨ kɨnda da tap terɨ kɨnda mɨktɨm daman tosok, gat ae Pakbi Yupretis kon da mɨktɨm morap taŋ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋun gat kɨsi kɨla akdɨsak.
Yoyɨŋban Saimon Pita da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nin namɨnon kɨneŋ? Gak dakon gen da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni nimɨsak.
Uŋun amɨn uŋun yabekbi toptopmɨ, mɨŋat amɨnyo paŋkewal do pi aŋ. Uŋun amɨn kulabɨk aŋek ji da Kristo dakon yabekbi bamɨsi yaŋ pɨndatni do topmon da pi aŋ.
Yaŋban amɨn morap kɨsi da iyɨwit, “Do asi gak Piŋkop dakon Monji, ma?” Iyɨŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Ji bamɨsi yoŋ. Nak uŋun mani.”
Ji kɨsisi teŋteŋɨ ae gɨldat dakon amɨn. Nin kalbi ae pɨlɨn tuk dakon amɨn dɨma.
Amɨn da mani pawɨgɨni do galagɨsi nandawit. Mani Piŋkop da mani pawɨgɨsak do dɨma nandawit.
Ae kaŋakwan sakwabat kɨnda uŋun yoni mɨni, uŋun da moneŋ gɨmanjok bamorɨ paret ɨdapmon yopgut.
Piŋkop da nak aŋupbal asak do yokdaŋ, mani gak da nak do yo tagɨ gɨn akdɨsal. Yokwi aŋ namaŋ amɨn pabɨŋ yopmaŋaki mayak tok pani do nandɨsat. Aŋaki pi amɨngo nak but kwaktok nandabeŋ.
bo notno ɨsal dogɨn yokwi aŋ ɨmgum, bo uwalno dakon yo ɨsal dogɨn kabo tɨmɨkgɨm kaŋ,
Dɨsi dogɨn dɨma nandani. Amɨn dɨwarɨyo kɨsi tagɨsi egɨpni do nandani.
Kundukon gɨk kanekyo kɨsitgo da wasaŋ kwen yopgul da toŋ uŋun pɨndagek yaŋ nandɨsat.
Yaŋban Yesu da mibɨlni amɨn dɨmasi yoyɨni do yoyɨgɨt.
Yokwi da kɨmot tapmɨm ɨban amɨn tepmɨ madep yomɨsak. Ae yokwi uŋun gen tebanon tapmɨm pasak.
Nak si egɨpbeŋ bɨsapmon mango yaŋ aŋkɨsiŋ wɨgɨkeŋ. Kɨsitno si paŋenagek gak do bɨsit aŋ aŋ abeŋ.
Emat amɨn da Yesu abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ gapman yut madep da nagalgwan pɨgɨwit. Pɨgek emat amɨn notni dɨwarɨ kɨsisi yaŋ yoba abɨŋ mudawit.
Oman monjɨ da tagap taŋek amɨn tagɨni da mɨŋat pakpak dakon soŋnogon da tobɨl apjak do jomjom aŋek ekwaŋ ji yaŋ gɨn tagap toni. Do ni bɨsapmon abɨŋ yoma domon tɨdosak ji yoma tepmɨ wɨtdal ɨmni.
“Amɨn kɨnda nagon toktogɨ dɨma saŋbesak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn kɨlɨŋɨ yokwi yombem. Kɨlɨŋɨ uŋuden amɨn da mandaŋ yopba kɨbɨdaŋba paŋ muwuk kɨndapmon sosoŋ.
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop kwen egɨsak uŋun da tapmɨm dɨma gamgut tam, gak da nak abɨŋ nepbi dakon tapmɨm kɨnda dɨma taŋ gaban. Do amɨn gak da kɨsiron nepmak uŋun dakon yokwi da gak dakon yokwi yapmaŋdak.”
Yesu saŋbek saŋbek kalugɨ dakon binap amɨnon apgwit. Ae Yesu dakon yawi mumumni mawiron apgwit. Uŋun yawi da yokwinin wɨrɨrɨkdak, do uŋun Abel dakon yawi yapmaŋdak. Abel dakon yawi da kobogɨ tɨmɨt do yosok.
Yaŋban Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Israel amɨn dakon yoyɨŋdet kɨnda da yo morap on dɨma nandabɨ pɨsosok, ma?
Yaŋ awit do Piŋkop da yum pɨndagakwan yokwi dakon galaktok yolek notni da gɨptɨmon yumabi aŋpak ɨŋanisi aŋ aŋ awit.
Yesu da paŋdetni 12 kabɨ yoyɨŋban apba koŋ yolyol ae sot mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ kɨsisi paŋmɨlɨp agak dakon pi ani do yaŋ mudaŋ yomgut.
Aŋakwa uŋudon gɨn paŋmuwukbi da tepmɨsi Pol yabekba tapmon pɨgɨgɨt. Pɨgakwan Timoti gat Sailas gat uŋun Beria sigɨn egɨpgumal.
Aŋakwan emat amɨn 100 dakon kɨla amɨn da Yesu ɨŋamɨkon kɨmakban kaŋek yagɨt, “On amɨn asisi Piŋkop dakon Monji egɨpgut.”
Yaŋ aba pi ami da aeni pi monjɨni mibɨltok yabekgɨt uŋun dakon tɨlak yapmaŋek morapmɨ yabekgɨt. Yabekban kwa pi kɨla amɨn da mibɨltok awit uŋudeŋ gɨn yokwi aŋyomgwit.
Mani amɨn morap Yawe do pasolgoŋ uŋun iyɨ kɨlani asak. Dagok dagogɨ mɨni amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak uŋun do nandaŋek jomjom aŋ amɨn uŋun kɨlani tagɨsi asak.
Yoyɨŋbal kalbi binap uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn dam teban yut dakon kɨla amɨn da amɨn bamot tɨmɨk paŋkɨ gɨptɨmni obip amɨn da baljaŋba dagawit uŋun pakbi baŋ sugagɨt. Yaŋ aŋek uŋudon gɨn iyɨ ae gwakni kɨsi telagɨ pakbi sowit.
“Nak ɨdon opgum bɨsapmon gen yaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn nak gat kɨsi opgumaŋ. Obɨŋek nak bɨsap noknok dɨma agɨm. Pakgɨmaŋ da wɨsa dagokdo gen pi yutnon yɨgek uŋun amɨn aŋopni do yoyɨgɨm.
Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu dakon nandaŋ yawotni uŋun Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨkon tosak.
Amɨn kɨnda abɨdok do gapma dubagɨ kɨnda wayɨkdak, mani iyɨ uŋun gapma wayɨkdakgwan mosok.
Kristo dakon Wup da kombɨ amɨn da butgwan yɨgek gen kagakon da Kristo da tepmɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ pakdɨsak aŋek don man madep pakdɨsak uŋun do yaŋkwok agɨt. Aŋakwan kombɨ amɨn da nandawit, “Ni bɨsapmon nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak amɨn apjak?” ae “Uŋun bɨsapmon ni yo da noman tokdɨsak?”
Nido, mɨŋat ji dandaba pɨlɨk bamok kɨlegɨsi aŋek pɨŋbisi ekwaŋ.
Uŋun amɨn kabɨ madepgwan da amɨn kɨnda da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, peno iyɨŋbɨ datnit da yo morap yopgut uŋun kokwinɨk dɨwarɨ nak do namjak.”
Kabap da galegɨkon mɨktɨmgwan pakbi dabɨl paŋnoman aŋaki pakbi pagek kuldugɨ tɨmon pukwaŋ.
Yaŋakwan os gami kɨnda apban kagɨm. Uŋun da kwenon amɨn yɨkgɨt uŋun do tapmɨm ɨbi. Uŋun tapmɨm uŋun on mɨktɨmon yaworɨ tosok uŋun paŋdagosak dakon tapmɨm. Paŋdagaŋban amɨn da notni dapmaŋ dapmaŋ aŋek kɨmotdaŋ. Uŋun pi asak do emat agak sɨba madepsi kɨnda ɨmgwit.
Paŋmuwukbi kabɨ da yabekbi dakon gen nandak do galagɨ madepsi nandawit. Ae but da notni baŋgal baŋgal aŋek, jap aŋwa nok do ae bɨsit ak do saŋbek saŋbek muwukgwit.
Nido, mɨŋat amɨnyo morapmɨ da Kristo dakon tɨlak kɨndap do uwal aŋek aŋpak yokwisi aŋ. Bɨsap morapmɨ mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋuden do kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm, ae abɨsok dabɨl pakbino si maŋakwa aŋpak yokwi aŋ uŋun do aeno dayɨsat.
Amɨn da gen yoŋ uŋun nandaŋ gadamaŋ, mani Piŋkop da Monji do gen yagɨt uŋun da amɨn dakon gen yapmaŋdak.
Yaŋ aŋakwa mɨŋat amɨn morapyo da Piŋkop da nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do aŋek pi asak uŋun koni.’ ”
Piŋkop da Gen Bin Tagɨsi kɨlani abi do gamgut, uŋun kɨlani tagɨsi aŋ kɨmokgi. Telagɨ Wup nin da butgwan yɨkdak uŋun da gak pi uŋun do tagɨ aŋpulugosak.
Yawe, gengo uŋun guramɨk kɨmokdot. Aŋkutnaŋaki mayaktok dɨma pakeŋ.
Teŋteŋɨgo gat ae gengo bamɨ gat yopbɨ nagon obɨŋek kosit nolɨnjil. Nolɨŋbal kaŋek nomansi telagɨ ɨleŋgokon gaga egɨsalon wɨgɨkeŋ.
Do yaŋsi nandani, amɨn kɨnda ɨsal nandaŋ gadat dogɨn Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ dɨma iyɨsak. Amɨn kɨnda aŋpak kɨlegɨ asak uŋun do nandaŋek amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ iyɨsak.
Mani nak meŋ da dɨma aŋalaŋakwan Piŋkop da nak kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt. Aŋek nandaŋ yawotni do aŋek iyɨ dakon amɨn egɨpbeŋ do yaŋ namgut.
Nak kaŋapbo Sipsip Monɨŋ da papia gɨroŋɨkbi abɨdaŋek kendol pakbi baŋ kosirɨ 7 kabɨ paŋteban abi uŋun mibɨltok nani pakdekgɨt. Pakdegakwan yo egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ 4 kabɨkon da kɨnda gen yagɨt. Geni uŋun kɨrɨrɨŋ da yaŋ yagɨt, “Gak op.”
Ae Piŋkop da tɨlak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, ae yo masɨ masɨmɨ, wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gat agɨt. Ae iyɨ da galaktogon Telagɨ Wup dakon but galak dakon yo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ kokwinɨk yomgut. Yo morap uŋun agɨt da Monji dakon gen uŋun bamɨsi yaŋ nolɨŋban komaŋ.
Yaŋban Pita da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn dɨwarɨ da manji gamɨŋakwa nak yaŋ dɨmasi abeŋ.”
Amɨn kɨnda amɨn do pakyaŋsi but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak uŋun pasol pasol dɨma nandɨsak. Butdasi galak taŋ yomyom dakon aŋpak egɨp egɨpninon bamɨsi tosak kaŋ, pasol pasol yolban kɨŋ mudosak. Kobogɨ yokwi tɨmɨtdamaŋ yaŋ do aŋek pasol pasol nandamaŋ. Amɨn kɨnda pasol pasol nandɨsak uŋun amɨn but dasi galak taŋ yomyom dakon aŋpak egɨp egɨpnikon bamɨsi dɨma tosok.
Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ egɨ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋun dakon amɨn yaŋ yoyɨni, “Yawe uŋun kɨla amɨn madep egɨsak. Uŋun da mɨktɨm daman aŋteban aban wayɨŋ dɨma asak. Yawe da don gen kokwin pi kɨlegɨsi aŋek amɨn dakon aŋpak kokwin akdɨsak.”
Nin manin madepsi dɨma pawɨkwamaŋ. Nin jikon pi agɨmaŋ, do uŋun da tɨlagon gɨn manin pawɨkwamaŋ. Nin jikon Kristo dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi dɨma yagɨmaŋ tam manin arɨpmɨ dɨma pawɨgɨnom. Nin da mibɨltok jikon abɨŋek Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ damgumaŋ.
Kombɨ amɨn da papiakon gen yaŋ toŋ: ‘Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨn morapyo yoyɨŋdetdɨsak.’ Amɨn morap Dat dakon gen do mɨrak paŋek nandak nandak paŋ uŋun nagon obaŋ.
Yawe, amɨn da yokwi aŋ nimɨŋakwa jɨgɨsi nandamaŋ, do bupmɨ nandaŋ nibi.
Gɨldatno tagɨ Asinkritus, ae Pegon, ae Emes, ae Patobas, ae Emas gat, ae nandaŋ gadat amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋun gat ekwaŋ uŋun do yomni.
Yaŋ dayɨsat, amɨn morapmɨsi da gɨldat wɨsak, ae si pɨgɨsak tetgɨn da apba Kwen Kokup Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan Abraham, Aisak, ae Jekop gat jap noknok tamo madepmon yɨtdaŋ.
Mani gen morap gat ae aŋpak morap gat kokwin tagɨsi ani. Aŋek yo tagɨsi baŋ tɨmɨgek
Yawe, gak da dɨwarɨnin manjɨŋek gen pikon nipbim tam, Amɨn Tagɨ namɨn da gengo yapban?
Yaŋ yaŋek yagɨt, “Ji gen uŋun nandaŋ uŋun pakyaŋsi nandani. Ji Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek guramɨtni kaŋ, Piŋkop da saŋbeŋek damdɨsak. Mani geni dɨma nandani kaŋ, saŋbeŋek dɨma damdɨsak.
Yawe dakon telagɨ amɨn uŋun iyɨ dakon wam tabɨlni, do kɨmokgoŋ bɨsapmon pɨndakban yo madepsi aŋ.
Yawe Piŋkop Tapmɨm Ami, mɨŋat amɨn kabɨgo bɨsit gayɨŋakwa bɨsap niaŋ da butjap nandaŋ yobi?
Yaŋban Saimon Pita da boron wɨgek tap kɨlap yɨk ɨlɨkban ɨleŋɨkon wɨgɨgɨt. Yɨgon tap kɨlap madep madep 153 yaŋ da pɨgɨ tugawit, mani yɨk uŋun dɨma dagagɨt.
Amɨn Tagɨnin uŋun wukwisi madep, ae tapmɨmni madepsi. Nandak nandakni uŋun tɨlakni mɨni.
Nin aenin ji da nin do nandaba wɨkwan nimni yaŋon da gen on yomaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Bo ae amɨn dɨwarɨ da aŋ uŋudeŋ nin da amɨn dɨwarɨ yoyɨno uŋun da nin amɨn tagɨsi yaŋ ji da nandani do papia mandaŋ niba damneŋ yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Bo ae nin da dayɨno ji da papia uŋuden kɨnda mandaŋ nimni yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Uŋun dɨmasi.
Mani sot awit bɨsapmon bupmɨ madepsi nandaŋ yomɨŋek bupmɨ dakon ɨmal wamgum. Nak jap kelek egek gak da paŋpulugoki do bɨsit agɨm.
Yaŋban Yesu da yagɨt, “Gen teban mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn jiyo kɨsi, awa! Ji amɨn gen teban mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ jɨgɨsi guramɨtni do yoyaŋ, mani kɨsitjok kɨnda yomɨŋek paŋpulugaŋek guramɨt do dɨmasi nandaŋ.
Yawe da yaŋakwan bɨgal gat ae gugɨm gugɨm kɨsi morapmɨsi ɨreŋ taŋek Isip mɨktɨm kɨsi tugawit.
Yawe uŋun aŋpak kɨlegɨ gɨn asak. Yo morap wasaŋ yopguron aŋpak tagɨsi baŋ aŋyomɨsak.
Yaŋ yaŋek monjɨ uŋun abɨdaŋ maba waŋga pɨgakwan aŋakba kɨmakgɨt. “Ji niaŋ nandaŋ? Don pi dakon ami da abɨŋ pi kɨla amɨn niaŋsi aŋyomdɨsak?
Mani Piŋkop da amɨn manjɨgɨt uŋun mɨktɨm amɨn da dabɨlon nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn yaŋ pɨndakgwit amɨn baŋ manjɨgɨt. Yaŋ aŋek mɨktɨm dakon nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ amɨn paŋmayak agɨt. Ae Piŋkop da amɨn manjɨgɨt uŋun mɨktɨm amɨn da dabɨlon tapmɨmni mɨni yaŋ pɨndakgwit uŋun baŋ manjɨgɨt. Yaŋ aŋek mɨktɨm dakon amɨn tapmɨmni toŋ paŋmayak agɨt.
Moneŋ ɨlɨt ɨlɨt amɨn uŋun da yaŋ yokdaŋ, ‘Yo tagɨsi morap uŋun butgo dasi tɨmɨkgeŋ yaŋ nandagɨl, uŋun yo morap gak da dubagɨsikon toŋ. Yo tagɨsi morapgo yumaŋ nogɨ wukwisi gat, ae tɨlɨmgo tagɨ tagɨ morapgo uŋun kɨsisi pasɨl mudaŋ. Ae saŋbeŋek dɨma pɨndatdɨsal.’
Not kabɨ, Piŋkop da Masadonia paŋmuwukbi do nandaŋ yawok yomɨŋek paŋpulugagɨt uŋun do dayɨkdɨsat.
Bɨlagɨ bɨlagɨ Yapyap Bɨlak bɨsapmon gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn da wasok kɨnda yaŋ agɨt. Mɨŋat amɨnyo da amɨn kɨnda dam tebanon yɨkdak uŋun mani yaŋakwa, Pailat da pulugaŋ yopban kɨŋ kɨŋ awit.
Yokwi ak do paŋkɨlɨt noman taŋ ɨba “Piŋkop da aŋkɨlɨkban asat” yaŋ amɨn kɨnda da dɨma yogogɨ. Nido, yokwi da Piŋkop arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋkɨlɨtjak, ae Piŋkop da amɨn kɨnda yokwi asak do dɨma aŋkɨlɨkdak.
Piŋkop uŋun kokwin agakni uŋun kɨlegɨsi, do ji da pi tagɨsi awit uŋun do dɨma ɨŋtokdɨsak. Ji Piŋkop but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨŋek uŋun da paŋtagap aban mɨŋat amɨni paŋpulugawit. Ae yaŋ gɨn sigɨn aŋ.
Yaŋdo, jap pakbiyo ani bo yo dɨwarɨ gat ani bɨsapmon Piŋkop man madep ɨm do nandaŋek ani.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban emat wasagɨt amɨn da Moses ukwayɨkban kɨŋakwan yaŋ iyɨgɨt: ‘Namɨn da kɨla amɨn ae gen kokwin amɨnin gepmak?
Ae amɨn kɨnda da kombɨ gen on papiakon toŋ dɨ wɨrɨrɨtjak kaŋ, Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi on papiakon toŋ uŋun wɨrɨrɨk ɨmjak. Aŋakwan uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp yomyom kɨndapmon jap dɨma paŋ nosak, ae Piŋkop da telagɨ kokup papmon uŋudon dɨma egɨpjak. On papiakon uŋun dakon geni toŋ.
Piŋkop, nak aŋpuluga! Pakbi wɨŋaŋek teknokon kɨlɨ wɨk.
Uŋun amɨn tap madepsi tamalɨkgaŋ uŋun yombem. Yokwini dakon mayagɨ tarak ae sɨbɨt sɨbɨt da yaŋ ɨleŋɨkon noman toŋ. Uŋun kundukon gɨk kositni baŋ dɨma yolek akwaŋ uŋun yombem. Do Piŋkop da kokup pɨlɨn tuk dakon pɨlɨn tugɨsi kɨlɨ aŋnoman aŋ yomgut, uŋudon kɨŋ toktok teban egɨ wɨgɨkdaŋ.
Nido, Piŋkop da nakyo kɨsi kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdokeŋ do nandɨsat.
Jesi uŋun kɨla amɨn madep Dewit dakon datni. Aŋakwan Dewit uŋun Solomon dakon datni. (Solomon dakon meŋi kalɨp Uria dakon mɨŋatni egɨpgut.)
“Buŋon don mɨŋat kabɨ pakbi do kɨwit uŋun abɨŋ yawit, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, amɨn tagɨ, abɨŋ yoma wɨtdal nim!’
Uŋun yo morap altaŋakwa Amɨn Tagɨ da kombɨ amɨn aŋtagap aban gen yagɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ tosok.
Nasaret kokup yɨpmaŋek Kapaneam kokupmon kɨŋ uŋudon egɨpgut. Kapaneam uŋun Galili Pakbi Ɨdap ɨleŋɨkon, Sebulan ae Naptali mɨktɨmon uŋudon tosok.
Piŋkop gawak ɨm do muwukgaŋ bɨsapmon Amɨn Tagɨ dakon telagɨ jap baŋ nomaŋ yaŋsi nandaŋek dɨma noŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋba Jon da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak amɨn pakbisi baŋ telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomɨsat, mani amɨn kɨnda ji da bɨkbɨgon akdak, uŋun amɨn ji dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ.
Piŋkop dakon Monji da nin yumaŋ naŋ nipmaŋek dɨwarɨnin wɨrɨrɨk nimgut.
Ae sɨkak kulabɨk aŋek ais gat ae mal gat baŋ yopban pɨwit.
Gak da mano abɨ madepsi sigɨn pap tokdɨsak. Aŋek butno aego aŋteban akdɨsal.
“Uŋun amɨn madep kɨlɨ agɨt, do iyɨ naŋ iyɨŋba kobogɨ dayɨsak.”
Aŋek dam tebanon amɨn jɨgɨ paŋek kunam tagakwa nandagɨt. Ae dapba kɨmotni do yaŋbi amɨn uŋun pulugaŋ yopban kɨwit.”
Moneŋ sɨmɨl kɨnam, ae yɨk, ae kandap gwɨl dɨma tɨmɨgek kɨni. Aŋek kosiron amɨn pɨndak ‘Gɨldat tagɨ!’ yaŋ dɨma yoyɨni.
Yawe, butnokon da ya yaŋsi gayɨkeŋ. Pi tagɨsi morap agɨl uŋun do mɨŋat amɨnyo yoyɨkeŋ.
Yaŋba Pita da yagɨt, “O, yopmaŋdak.” Pita da yaŋ yoyɨŋek yutnon wɨgɨ gen kɨnda dɨma yaŋakwan Yesu da kalɨp yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Saimon gak niaŋ nandɨsal? On mɨktɨmon kɨla amɨn madep madep takis tɨmɨkgaŋ, uŋun takis namɨn da yopmaŋgaŋ? Iyɨ dakon monjini da bo amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ da yopmaŋgaŋ?”
Akban kaŋek Sekaraia wurɨpdagek pasalgɨt.
Ae uŋudeŋ gɨn Moses da telagɨ ɨmal yut gat ae Piŋkop gawak ɨmɨm dakon yo morap toŋ uŋudon yawi pawɨlakwan mawit.
Bɨsap morapmɨ Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut tawiron agek uŋun amɨn Yesu manji ɨmni do pi madepsi agɨm. Nak butjap madepsi nandaŋ yomɨŋek yo yokwisi aŋ yobeŋ do kokup pap dubagɨkon kɨsi yol paŋkɨgɨm.
Ae uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da notni gat ae peni padɨk padɨkni yo yoyɨŋ degek “Ji Amɨn Tagɨ nandaŋ ɨmni” yaŋ dɨma yokdaŋ. Nido kɨsi morap nak nandaŋ namdaŋ gɨn. Uŋun amɨn ɨsalɨ bo ae man madepni toŋ uŋun nandaŋ namdaŋ gɨn.
