Nin kɨsi morap gulusuŋ morapmɨ amaŋ. Mani amɨn kɨnda gen kagani dakon kɨla aŋek gen yokwi kɨnda dɨma yosok kaŋ, uŋun amɨn gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi, ae uŋun da gɨptɨm dɨwat morapni kɨsi kɨla tagɨ asak.
Mani nak abɨsok yaŋ dayɨsat, gen yaŋ paŋteban ak dɨmasi ani. Kwen Kokup uŋun Piŋkop dakon kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamoni, do Kwen Kokup manon da genji dɨma paŋteban ani.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ae gen kɨnda babɨk da abɨdawit uŋun ji kɨlɨ nandawit. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda dakon dabɨl aŋupbal asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn dakon dabɨlniyo kɨsi aŋupbal ani. Ae amɨn kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda dakon geni aŋak bɨrɨpmɨtjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn dakon geni kɨsi aŋak bɨrɨpmɨtni.’
Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Gen teban dakon yoyɨŋdet amɨn Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ kaluk nandaŋek nandaŋ gadasak uŋun yut kɨnda dakon ami yombem. Uŋun amɨn yo kabɨ yopyop tamonikon kɨŋ yo kalugɨ ae kalɨpmɨ kɨsi paŋabɨŋ amɨn yolɨsak.”
Nido Piŋkop uŋun kaloŋɨ kɨndagɨn egɨsak, ae nandaŋ gadat kosiron da Juda amɨn gɨptɨmɨ mandabi ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ gɨptɨmɨ dɨma mandabi uŋun kɨsi nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋakwa tɨmɨkdak.
Yoyɨŋakwan amɨn kabɨ kɨnda apgwiron da amɨn 4 kabɨ da amɨn kɨsirɨ kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi kɨnda wamaŋ uŋudon aŋapgwit.
Nandaŋ gadat dakon aŋpak kɨsi yaŋ gɨn. Nandaŋ gadat ɨsal taŋek aŋpak tagɨ kɨnda dɨma noman tosak kaŋ, uŋun yo ɨsalɨ.
Aba Sekaraia da yo kɨnda kaŋ ɨba kɨlda mandɨsak do tɨlak aŋ yoban ɨba yaŋ mandagɨt, “Mani uŋun Jon.” Yaŋ mandaban nandaba yo ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
Mani amɨn morapmɨ abɨsok mibɨltok ekwaŋ uŋun da buŋon amɨn akdaŋ. Aŋakwa amɨn morapmɨ abɨsok buŋon ekwaŋ uŋun da mibɨltok amɨn akdaŋ.”
Do amɨn kɨnda uŋun joŋ kɨlap yokwisi dakon tɨlakni mɨni kaŋ, amɨnon yumaŋ nok dɨma asak, ae uŋudon yumaŋ nok dɨma ani. Joŋ kɨlap yokwisi dakon tɨlakni uŋun iyɨ dakon mani, ae mani dakon namba.
Yawe da amɨn iyɨ do nandaba paŋ uŋun paŋpulugosok. Mani yokwi pakpak amɨn pabɨŋ yopban mɨktɨmon maŋ pokgoŋ.
“Yesu, Nasaret amɨn, gak nibaŋ aŋnim do nandɨsal? Nin paŋupbal ak do abɨl? Nak nandaŋ gamɨsat, gak Piŋkop Dakon Telagɨ Amɨni.”
Yaŋdo, not kabɨno, ji tebaisi agek wayɨŋ wayɨŋ dɨma ani. Dɨsi nandaŋ, Amɨn Tagɨ dakon pi madepsi aŋ uŋun bamɨ mɨni dɨma akdaŋ, do ji bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Amɨn Tagɨ dakon pi aŋ kɨmotni.
Obip amɨn uŋun kaŋ pasal nɨmnɨmɨk maŋ pagek kɨmakbi yombem awit.
Ae kokup pap dakon nagal kɨsi tɨlak yɨpgut. Yaŋ aban nagal kwen wɨgɨgɨt dakon tɨlakni 65 mita da arɨp agɨt. Tɨlak yopyop uŋun amɨn da tɨlak yopmaŋgaŋ uŋun naŋgɨn aŋelo da nagal dakon tɨlak yopgut.
“Nin da kabɨkon amɨn dɨwarɨ da kɨŋ ji dakon nandak nandak paŋupbal awit dakon geni kɨlɨ nandagɨmaŋ. Nin da yaŋ yoyɨni yaŋ dɨma yoyɨŋapno kɨŋ dayɨwit.
Kundu gat mɨktɨm gat, jil kɨsɨk kɨsɨk anjil. Tap ɨdap, gak wayɨŋ madepsi aŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk abi. Ae yo morap tap kagagwan toŋ, jiyo kɨsi kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani.
Do top aŋpak uŋun yɨpni. Ji morap kɨsi paŋmuwukbi dɨwarɨ do gen bamɨ gɨn yoyɨni. Nido, nin morap kɨsi gɨptɨm kaloŋɨ dakon dɨwatni.
Aŋpulugaŋaki man madepni madepsi tosok. Kɨla amɨn madep dakon tɨlɨmni wagɨl tagɨsisi gak da ɨmgul.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ do manji gen yaŋ yomɨŋek yokwi aŋ yom do gen yoŋ. Uŋun kwen wugɨksi aŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ paŋupbal ak do gen madepsi yoŋ.
Kɨŋ jomjom aŋ egakwa amɨn uŋun tepmɨ dɨma abɨŋakwan dɨpmɨni wɨŋba dɨpmɨn pak mudawit.
Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ kokup kɨdatni dakon wupmɨ uŋun gol ae silwa baŋ wasoŋ. Uŋun amɨn kɨsit da wasoŋ.
Yɨpba taŋakwan don Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn da abɨŋ muwuk Pol aŋgwasɨŋek akgwit. Yaŋ aŋakwa pɨdaŋban kokup papmon aeni pɨgɨwit. Pɨgɨ pakgwit da wɨsa dagokdo Banabas gat uŋun kokup pap yɨpmaŋek Debe kokup pap kɨgɨmal.
Yaŋdo, amɨn kɨnda da Amɨn Tagɨ dakon bret ae wain kapni aŋpak kɨlegɨkon da dɨma nosak kaŋ, Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gɨptɨm ae yawi yokwi aŋɨmɨsak dakon gulusuŋni taŋ ɨmɨsak.
Yaŋ yaŋek boron wɨgek mɨktɨm amɨn da dɨma ekwaŋ tɨmon kɨwit.
Yawe, gak Piŋkop, gak da yokwi pakpak amɨn yokwi aŋ dakon kobogɨ yomɨsal. Do abɨsok butjapgo yolɨŋaki tɨlɨmgo koni.
“Mani pi asat uŋun yo kɨnda da joŋɨgek nak do yaŋ teŋteŋok asak uŋun da Jon da yaŋkwok agɨt uŋun yapmaŋdak. Yo uŋun pi morap Datno da aŋ mudokeŋ do namgut uŋun. Uŋun aŋapbo asi Dat da nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun nandaba bamɨsi asak.
“Amɨn tagɨni bɨsap dubagɨ egek aeni tobɨl apgut. Abɨŋ moneŋni yomgut uŋun dakon pini niaŋ awit uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do yoyɨgɨt.
Nin kalɨp Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgumaŋ bɨsapmon Piŋkop da Telagɨ Wupni but galak do nimgut. Ae uŋun amɨn kabɨ do yaŋ gɨn yomgut, do nak yombem da Piŋkop tagɨ dɨma kɨrɨŋɨk ɨbom?”
Yawe, gak Dewit do dɨma ɨŋtoki. Ae jɨgɨ morap pagɨt kɨsi do dɨma ɨŋtoki.
ae Simeon da kabɨkon 12 tausen ae Liwai da kabɨkon 12 tausen ae Isaka da kabɨkon 12 tausen
“Uŋun pakbi kɨbaŋɨ toŋ tagɨsi amɨnon moneŋ 300 danari da arɨp tɨmɨgek yoni mɨni amɨn do yomnom tam uŋun tagɨsi.”
Mɨŋat monjɨyono, Kristo dakon man do aŋek Piŋkop da yokwisi yopmaŋ damgut. Uŋun do aŋek on papia mandaŋ damɨsat.
Wɨgek gak da altakon opbeŋ. Piŋkop, gak da butno aŋtagap aŋaki kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi nandɨsat. Gak Piŋkopno, do nak gita tɨdaŋek kap yaŋek mango aŋkɨsikeŋ.
Tagɨ dɨma yolni yaŋ nandɨsak kaŋ, uwalni kapmat dɨma abɨŋakwa amɨn kabi kɨnda yabekban kɨŋ emat dɨma wamni do gen yoyɨŋ paŋyawot aŋ.
Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Nin niaŋsi aŋek Piŋkop dakon pi aneŋ?”
Yawe, gak da nak kɨla amɨn madep manjɨgɨl, mani uwal da yaŋsul aŋ namaŋ. Dukwan dukwan morap kɨsat yaŋsul aŋ namaŋ gɨn.
Gak bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ bɨsitno nandɨsal, mani abɨsok on amɨn ɨdon akgaŋ uŋun da gak da nak yabekbɨ pɨgɨm yaŋ nandani uŋun do aŋek gen uŋun gayɨsat.”
Uŋun but nandak nandaknikon da aŋpak yokwi ak do nandaŋ uŋun paŋalon aŋ.
Piŋkop do kuraktok aŋ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop do butjap madepsi nandawit, mani gak da butjap madepsi pakdɨsal bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun noman tosok. Abɨsok amɨn kɨmakgwit gen pigokon opni dakon bɨsap. Abɨsok pi monjɨgo do tomni tagɨsi yomdɨsal dakon bɨsap. Uŋun kombɨ amɨn, ae gaga dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ, ae gak dakon man do pasalek ekwaŋ amɨn, uŋun amɨn mani toŋ ae mani mɨni kɨsi do tomni tagɨsi yomdɨsal. Abɨsok mɨŋat amɨnyo paŋupbal awit amɨn, uŋun paŋtasɨk aki dakon bɨsap.”
Piŋkop, nak abɨsok gak do kap kalugɨ yokeŋ. Gita tɨdaŋek gak do kap yokdɨsat.
Isip amɨn morap kɨsi dakon monjɨ mibɨltogɨ dapban kɨmakgwit.
Mani Juda amɨn da yaŋ do dɨma galak tawit. Yaŋ awit do Sisa dagɨn geno nandɨsak do yagɨm. Mani nak naga dakon amɨn kabɨno gen pikon yopbeŋ yaŋon da dɨma agɨm.
Iyɨŋban Pita da yagɨt, “Dɨma!” Wasɨp yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn pup gen yagɨt.
Yaŋ yaŋban Maria da yagɨt, “Nak oman mɨŋatni gɨn, ae mano mɨnisi, mani nak do yo tagɨsi asak, do but dasi Amɨn Tagɨ aŋkɨsisat. Aŋakwan butno da Piŋkop Paŋpulugok Amɨno do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk asak. Piŋkop Tapmɨm Ami da nak do yo madepsi kɨnda asak, do abɨsok ae don kɨsi amɨn da Piŋkop da gɨsamni madepsi namɨsak uŋun do yokdaŋ. Mani uŋun telagɨsi tosok.
Nak mibɨlɨ nido yaŋ agɨm? Nak ji but dasi dɨma galaktaŋ damɨsat mibɨlɨ yaŋ do agɨm, ma? Uŋun dɨmasi. Piŋkop da nandɨsak, nak ji do but dasi galaktaŋ damɨsat.
Yokwi yaŋsi egek, Yawe do yaŋ tɨdaŋba yokwikon baŋ pulugaŋ yopgut.
Nak dakon gen nandaŋek burɨkon yɨpmaŋdak uŋun amɨn Piŋkop da saŋbeŋek nandak nandak ɨmdɨsak. Mani geno nandaŋek burɨkon dɨma yɨpmaŋdak uŋun amɨn geno dɨwarɨ nandagɨt uŋun pasɨl ɨmdaŋ.”
Gapman dakon kɨla amɨn madep mibɨltogɨ Erot da Yesu dakon gen bini nandagɨt. Dɨ da Yesu kaŋek Jon kɨmoron da aeni pɨdagɨt yaŋ yawit, do Erot but morap agɨt.
Stiwen da gen kokwin amɨn kabɨ saŋbeŋek tebaisi yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kwen wɨgɨk amɨn ji amɨn Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ da tɨlagon butji uŋun tebaisi ae mɨrakji da Piŋkop dakon gen dɨma nandabi yombem. Babɨkji da Telagɨ Wup do kurak tawit, jiyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn aŋ.
Nak gen uŋun dayɨsat, nido Piŋkop manji ɨmaŋ amɨn dɨ paŋmuwukbigwan pasɨlɨkon da kɨlɨ abɨŋ pɨgeŋ. Uŋun amɨn gen yokwisi yaŋ yoŋ, “Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni madepsi, do yumabi aŋpak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ tagɨ aneŋ.” Uŋun amɨn da Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo Kɨla Amɨn Madepnin kaloŋɨ manji ɨmaŋ, do kalɨpsigwan Piŋkop gen papia da yagɨt uŋun da arɨpmon uŋuden amɨn pasɨldaŋ.
Top gen uŋun yoyɨŋba amɨn ae kɨla amɨn ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn dakon butni madepsi pɨdawit. Yaŋ aŋek kɨŋ Stiwen abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ gen kokwin amɨn kabɨkon aŋkɨwit.
Babɨknin mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨm egɨpgwiron Moses uŋun gat kɨsi egɨpgwit. Sinai Kabapmon wɨkwan aŋelo kɨnda da gen iyɨgɨt. Moses da Piŋkop dakon gen egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ tɨmɨgek nin da nandaneŋ do nimgut.
Nido Yawe da amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨlani asak, mani yoki pakpak uŋun tasɨk tokdaŋ.
Dɨpmɨngo yopbɨ kɨt! Aŋpakgo dɨwarɨ dɨma kɨmakgwit uŋun paŋteban abi. Nido aŋpakgo kɨnda Piŋkopno da dabɨlon kɨlegɨsi yaŋ kɨnda dɨmasi kat.
Ninyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn, gen bamɨ dɨma nandaŋek egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon on mɨktɨm dakon gen teban ae aŋpakni uŋun dakon oman monjɨ egɨpgumaŋ.
Yesu da mibɨltaŋ nimɨŋek nin paŋpulugok do uŋungwan kɨlɨ wɨgɨgɨt. Uŋun mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dagaŋek dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨ wɨgɨkdɨsak. Uŋun Melkisedek yombem.
Amɨn kɨnda Piŋkop da dɨwarɨni wɨrɨrɨk ɨmɨsak, ae topni mɨni egɨsak amɨn uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ asak.
Ji nandaŋ, ae Piŋkop kɨsi nandɨsak, nin da ji dɨma paŋgalak agɨmaŋ, ae ji dakon yo kabɨ do pɨndak galaktok aŋek gen tagɨ uŋun dɨma dayɨgɨmaŋ.
Nawa gengo do but dasi galak tosot. Do nak do bupmɨ nandaŋaki tagɨsi egɨpbeŋ dosi nandɨsat.
Amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ Yawe do nandaŋek tobɨl iyɨkon apdaŋ. Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn kabi kabi ekwaŋ uŋun da abɨŋek gawak ɨmdaŋ.
Abɨsok teŋteŋɨ ji gat egakwan gɨn egɨp egɨpji teŋteŋɨkon tosok yaŋsi nandaŋek teŋteŋɨ dakon monjɨni dagoni.” Yesu gen uŋun yoyɨŋ mudaŋek dɨma koni do yopmaŋ kɨŋ pasɨlɨkon egɨpgut.
Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Saimon, nandaki. Wit dakon sɨbɨt sɨbɨtni tarapmɨkgaŋ uŋudeŋ Sunduk da nandaŋ gadatgo aŋkewalban moki do yagɨt.
Mani, amɨn kɨnda Piŋkop yolek yo kabɨni do nandaban arɨpmɨ taŋ namaŋ yaŋ nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yo bamɨsi tɨmɨkdak.
Piŋkop da yaŋ nimgut bɨsapmon niaŋ egɨpgumaŋ uŋun da arɨpmon gɨn egɨpneŋ.
“Nak pɨŋek gen dɨma yoyɨgɨm tam, yokwini dakon gen kɨnda dɨma tosok. Mani nak pɨŋek gen kɨlɨ yoyɨgɨm, do amɨn kɨnda da ‘nak dɨma nandaŋek suŋ agɨm’ yaŋ yogogɨ mɨni.
yo yokwisi gagon arɨpmɨ dɨma noman toni. Ae sot teban gak da yut da kapmatjok arɨpmɨ dɨma apni.
Gɨldat pɨgakwan pɨlɨndo koŋni toŋ amɨn morapmɨ paŋpaŋ apba gen yaŋek koŋ yol yomgut. Aŋek sot amɨn kɨsisi paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Asisi dayɨsat, ji kunam madepsi tatdaŋ, ae bupmɨ kunamyo kɨsi madepsi akdaŋ. Mani mɨktɨm amɨn da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdaŋ. Butji wagɨlsi yokwi tokdaŋ, mani but yokwisi dakon kulabɨgɨ don kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi nandakdaŋ.
Tap Gami pudaŋban tɨmɨ bamorɨ agɨt. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
“Sebulan mɨktɨm, ae Naptali mɨktɨm, Jodan Pakbi usugap tet do Galili mɨktɨmon tomal. Uŋun mɨktɨm bamot kosit tapmon pɨkwaŋ mɨktɨmon tomal. Galili mɨktɨmon Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon nani morapmɨ ekwaŋ.
Yaŋba yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji yɨkji bot amɨn tet do maba kwan tap kɨlap dɨ ɨlɨtni.” Yaŋ yaŋban yɨkni maba pɨkwan tap kɨlap morapmɨsi pɨgɨ tugaŋba yɨk ɨlɨk awɨk do aŋtɨdok awit.
Aŋakba kɨmagakwan Sol da yo tagɨsi kɨnda naŋ aŋ yaŋ pɨndakgɨt. Stiwen aŋagakwa Piŋkop aŋtelak aŋek egɨpgwit amɨn dɨ da Stiwen do bupmɨ kunamyo madepsi aŋek bumjotni aŋkɨ yɨpgwit. Uŋun gɨldaron da wasaŋek Piŋkop dakon gen dakon uwalni da paŋmuwukbi Jerusalem egɨpgwit uŋun paŋupbal ak do pi madepsi awit. Yaŋ aŋek paŋmuwukbi yolba waseŋ kɨ Judia tetgɨn do ae Samaria tetgɨn do kɨŋ kɨŋ awit. Kɨŋakwa yabekbi kabɨ dagɨn Jerusalem egɨpgwit.
Yesu gat paŋdetni gat pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda Gerasa amɨn da mɨktɨmon kɨwit.
Mani Telagɨ Wup jikon pɨŋban tapmɨm pakdaŋ. Tapmɨm paŋek nak dakon gen Jerusalem kokup papmon yaŋ teŋteŋoni. Ae uŋudon da Judia kokup morap kɨsi, ae Samaria mɨktɨm kɨsi, ae mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ kɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋoni.”
Pakbi kulabɨk aban yawi dagaŋek tap kɨlap kɨsi morap dapban kɨmak mudawit.
Saimon gat notni kabɨ gat tap kɨlap ɨlɨkgwit uŋun pɨndagek tamtam yawit. Ae Saimon dakon pi ɨsal bamotni Jems gat Jon gat Sebedi dakon monji yat uŋun kɨsi tamtam yagɨmal. Aŋek Saimon Pita da Yesu ŋwakbeŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nepmaŋ dek kɨ. Nak yokwi pakpak!” Yaŋban Yesu da Saimon yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak dɨma pasolbi. Abɨsok onda wasaŋek gak amɨn tɨmɨtdɨsal.”
Ae paret awit uŋun moneŋ baŋgɨn dɨma awit. Mibɨltok iyɨ baŋ Piŋkop do paret awit. Ae Piŋkop dakon galaktok yolek iyɨ baŋ nin do kɨsi paret awit.
Gapman mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ dakon geni guramɨtni, nido Amɨn Tagɨ da yaŋ ani do nandɨsak. Kɨla amɨn madep da ji dakon wukwisi egɨsak do geni guramɨtni,
Kalɨp ji Kristo dakon kosit naŋ tagɨsi agɨpgwit. Mani namɨn da kosit sopmaŋ damɨk da gen bamɨkon saŋbeŋek dɨma akwaŋ?
Pɨgɨ gɨldat kapbɨ egakwan dabɨlɨ dɨma pɨsagɨt. Ae jap pakbiyo dɨma agɨt.
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dabɨlji mɨni ekwaŋ tam, yokwisi mɨni. Mani ‘dabɨlnin toŋ’ yaŋ yoŋ, do yokwisi dakon gen uŋun sigɨn taŋ damɨŋ aŋaŋ kɨsak.”
Babɨknin mibɨltogɨ Abraham da yo tagɨ tagɨ morap emaron tɨmɨkgɨt uŋun kokwin aban kabi 10 aŋakwan uŋudon baŋ kabi kɨnda Melkisedek do ɨmgut. Do yaŋsi nandamaŋ, Melkisedek uŋun man madepni toŋ!
Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Kapaneam kokupmon kɨŋ altaŋakwa Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn da Pitakon kɨŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdetgo Telagɨ Yut Madep do takis yopmaŋdak bo dɨma?”
Amɨn da dɨma nandaŋ nimaŋ da tɨlak ekwamaŋ, mani nandaŋ nimaŋ. Kɨmoron kwamaŋ, mani sigɨn ekwamaŋ. Amɨn da nin tebaisi baljoŋ, mani dɨma nindapba kɨmokgomaŋ.
Mani gen paŋtobɨl amɨn mɨni kaŋ, gen ŋwakŋwarɨkon da gen yogok amɨn gen dɨma yosak. Gen iyɨ gat ae Piŋkop gat dogɨn yosak.
Moses uŋun bɨlakni 40 aŋakwan Israel amɨn notni kɨŋ pɨndat do nandagɨt.
Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Jerusalem kokup pap aŋkapmat aŋek Betpage ae Betani kokupmon kɨŋ altawit. (Kokup bamot uŋun Ɨleŋ Olipmon tomal.) Altaŋek Yesu da paŋdetni bamorɨ yabegek,
Dat da nak yabekban pɨgɨm. Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ da galak togon nagon arɨpmɨ dɨma apjak. Dat da nandak nandakni aŋtagap aban nagon tagɨ opjak. Ae mibɨ gɨldaron nak da kɨmoron naŋ abo pɨdokdɨsak.
Aŋek kokup amɨn kɨsi morap yut uŋun da yomakon muwukgwit.
“Amɨn kɨnda da niaŋ aŋek amɨn tebai kɨnda da yutnon wɨgɨ yo kabɨni tagɨ tɨmɨtjak? Mibɨltok amɨn tebai uŋun nap teban naŋ wamaŋ yɨpmaŋek yo kabɨni tagɨ tɨmɨtjak.
Yawe da aban Kenan mɨktɨmon jap do madepsi awit. Aŋek japni paŋpasɨl agɨt.
Aŋek egɨ pɨlɨndosi kɨŋ amɨn dɨwarɨ ɨsal agakwa pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Ji nido gɨldat daman pini mɨni ɨsal ekwaŋ?’
Nido, gak kaloŋgɨn tapmɨmgo madep ae gak dagɨn yo masɨ masɨmɨsi asal. Gak kaloŋgɨn Piŋkop bamɨsi.
“Yaŋ aba pi monjɨ dɨ gat aeni yabekgɨt. Yabegek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Ji kɨŋ mibɨltok but pɨso yoyɨŋbi amɨn uŋun yaŋ yoyɨni: Nandani, nak bapalo gat ae bulmakau binap amɨn nelagɨ toŋsi kɨlɨ dapmaŋ mandaŋ soŋ yopmat. Jap morap kɨlɨ soŋ paŋnoman aŋ yopmat. Do ji opba monjino do mɨŋat pagɨm uŋun dakon soŋnok aneŋ.’
Gɨptɨmni dɨma mandaŋek nandaŋ gadat aŋakwan Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt. Aŋek don Abraham uŋun amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨnda yaŋ dakon tɨlak do gɨptɨm mandak dakon aŋpak ɨmgut. Yaŋdo, Abraham uŋun amɨn morap gɨptɨm dɨma mandaŋek Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨba amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ yoyɨsak dakon datnisi egɨsak.
Yaŋ tɨdaŋban amɨn morapmɨ da gen tebai iyɨŋek dɨma yaŋ tɨdosak do iyɨwit. Mani madepsi sigɨn yaŋ tɨdaŋek yagɨt, “Dewit Dakon Monji, bupmɨ nandaŋ nam!”
Piŋkop da nandaŋ yawotni do aŋek nak kɨsit kɨlda nandak nandakni tagɨsi yombem kɨnda naŋ manjɨgɨt. Aban yut ak do gwak magɨm. Aŋapbo amɨn dɨwarɨ da yut uŋun gwak magɨmon wɨtjaŋ. Mani mɨŋat amɨnyo morap kaloŋ kaloŋ yut uŋun aŋ uŋun pakyaŋsi kaŋ kɨmagek wɨtjɨni.
Telagɨ Wup da nandɨsak, ninyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn nandaŋek yaŋ dayamaŋ, jɨgɨ morapmɨ dɨma damneŋ. Gen teban onjok baŋgɨn yolni.
Gaga da tapmɨmon da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨgo Jekop gat Josep gat dakon babɨkni yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgɨl.
Nak Piŋkop aŋkɨsikeŋ bɨsapmon mɨŋat amɨnyo jɨgɨ paŋ da uŋun kaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdaŋ. Ae mɨŋat amɨnyo Piŋkop wɨsɨŋ kok do pi aŋ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da butni paŋteban akdɨsak.
Yaŋ aba yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dɨwarɨ koleŋ paŋpaŋ jap noknok kɨla amɨnon paŋkɨt.” Yoyɨŋban paŋkɨ ɨmgwit.
Ais madep yopban tɨp da yaŋ mɨktɨmon moŋ. Aŋek uŋun da aba kokup mɨrɨmɨsi aŋakwan amɨn kɨnda da mɨrɨm abɨŋ yɨpmɨ mɨni.
Yoyɨŋban paŋdetni da notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn kɨnda da jap paŋabɨŋ ɨmɨk bo?”
Mani Juda amɨn kalɨp Piŋkop da iyɨ Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan pɨgɨni do manjɨkbi uŋun maban pɨlɨn tukgwan pɨgɨkdaŋ. Uŋungwan kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋ tɨdaŋek egɨpdaŋ.”
“Nak saŋbeŋek yaŋ dayɨsat, on mɨktɨmon amɨn bamorɨ bo kapbɨ nak da manon da muwutni kaŋ, nak bɨkbɨknikon egɨpbeŋ, do but kaloŋ aŋek yo kɨnda do bɨsit yoni kaŋ, Datno Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun da tagɨ damjak.”
Amɨn uŋun sot asak bɨsapmon Yawe da aŋmɨlɨp aban tapmɨm kaluk pakdɨsak.
“Ji Kristo do namɨn dakon monjɨ yaŋ nandaŋ?” Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Dewit dakon monji.”
Pita da gen morapmɨ saŋbeŋek nawa gen tebaisi yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kaŋ kɨmotni. Yokwi pakpak kabɨkon da tobɨl apba Piŋkop da ji tɨmɨtjak.”
Yaŋ yaŋban iyɨgɨt, ‘Padɨgɨgo tagɨsi egɨsak da abɨk do datgo da kaŋek bulmakau monjɨ nelagɨ toŋ aŋwak.’
Uŋun iyɨ dakon gwakni kɨla tagɨsi aŋakwan monjɨ gwayoni da gawat gawaron da geni tagɨsi guramɨkgaŋ.
Yaŋ egakwan wɨgɨ yo uŋun altoni do kalɨp yaŋkwok agɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Yawe dakon gen da Josep dakon gen uŋun bamɨsi yaŋ yolɨgɨt.
Mani ji Telagɨ Wup dakon but galak dakon yo wukwisi uŋun tɨmɨt do tek kɨndap pani. Abɨsok aŋpak wagɨl tagɨsisi kɨnda do dayɨkdɨsat.
Uŋun aŋelo bamot da buŋon ae kɨnda da abɨŋ gen papmon da yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda joŋ kɨlap yokwisi ae wupni gawak ɨmɨŋek tɨlakni ɨŋamɨkon ae kɨsirɨkon abɨdosak kaŋ
Iyɨ dakon gen teban do, “On uŋun Piŋkop dakon gen” yaŋ yaŋek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgaŋ. Nak gawak namaŋ uŋun koko yo ɨsalɨ asak.’
Ji but tobɨl bamɨsi aŋek aŋpakjikon but tobɨl dakon bamɨ aŋalon ani.
Nak bulmakau wɨli bo meme ji da nagalon baŋ tɨmɨt do dɨma nandɨsat.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yo morap altokdɨsak uŋun dakon bɨsap amɨn kɨnda da dɨma nandɨsak. Kwen Kokup aŋeloyo dɨma nandaŋ, ae Monjɨyo kɨsi dɨma nandɨsak. Dat da iyɨ gɨn nandɨsak.
Mani Piŋkop da uwalni dakon busuŋni paŋsulɨtdɨsak. Uŋun aŋpak yokwi toktogɨsi aŋ amɨn paŋtasɨk akdɨsak.
Bo pup kwap do dayɨŋban skopion kɨnda tagɨ ɨmni?
“Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn tagɨ bamorɨ dakon oman arɨpmɨ dɨma asak. Yaŋ kaŋ, kɨnda naŋgɨn galak taŋ ɨmɨŋek kɨnda do nandaban yokwi taŋ ɨmdɨsak. Ae kɨnda dakon gen guramɨgek kɨnda manji ɨmdɨsak. Ji Piŋkop gat ae moneŋ gat kɨsi dakon oman monjɨni arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ.”
Yaŋ yaŋban aeni Yesu abɨdok do awit, mani dɨma abɨdaŋakwa kɨgɨt.
Mɨŋat monjɨyo da yoyɨŋdetni da tɨlagon egɨpni kaŋ, uŋun tagɨ. Ae oman amɨn da madepni da tɨlagon egɨpni kaŋ, uŋun kɨsi tagɨ. Yut dakon ami nak do Belsebul yaŋ nayɨni kaŋ, gwakni ji do nandaba pɨŋbisi aŋakwa man wagɨl yokwisi damdaŋ.”
Amɨn bamot kɨsi tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨgɨmal, mani paŋdet kɨnda uŋun da Pita yapmaŋek uŋun da kalɨp kɨmakbi tamokon kɨŋ altagɨt.
Piŋkop uŋun Kɨla Amɨn Madep toktok teban egɨsak. Uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma kɨmorɨ, ae amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma kokogɨ. Uŋun kaloŋgɨn Piŋkop, do dagok dagogɨ mɨni man madepni gat ae tɨlɨm gulgwani gat taŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsak. Uŋun asi.
Piŋkop, nak naga do nandako pɨŋbisi asak uŋun da paret si galak tosol asak. Amɨn iyɨ do nandaba pɨŋakwa but tobɨl aŋ uŋun manji dɨma yomɨsal.
Uŋun mɨŋat Yesu da manjikon kapmatjok abɨŋek Yesu dakon ɨmal dubakni da ɨleŋɨkon ɨgayɨgɨt. Aŋakwan uŋudon gɨn yawini pasɨl ɨmgwit.
Kosit niaŋon da nin dakon gen kaloŋ kaloŋ yoŋ?
Joŋ kɨlap dia mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon pakbi do tep toŋ, uŋudeŋ nak Piŋkop gak gat egɨp do tagɨsi nandɨsat.
“Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨsak, ‘Nak asisi dayɨsat, yo morap amɨn mani mɨni do dɨma awit uŋun nak do awit.’
Yaŋba Pol da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak Juda amɨn da gen tebanon gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma agɨm. Ae Telagɨ Yut Madep do bo ae Sisa do gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma agɨm.”
Ae Kwen Kokupmon tɨlak masɨ masɨmɨ ae tapmɨmɨ toŋsi kɨnda noman taŋban kagɨm. Aŋelo 7 kabɨ pɨndakgɨm. Uŋun da amɨn paŋupbal ak do yo yokwisi 7 kabɨ tɨmɨkgwit. Yo yokwisi uŋun da mudaŋakwa ae yo kɨnda dɨma noman tosak, Piŋkop dakon butjapni wagɨl mudokdɨsak.
Gen on nak da naga mandɨsat. Kɨlda mibɨl madepmon da gen mandɨsat uŋun do koni.
Piŋkop gak dasi nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨk tɨmɨk aŋaki tagɨsi ekwamaŋ. Gak bɨsitnin nandaŋek pi tapmɨmɨ toŋ aŋek nin paŋpulugosol. Amɨn mɨktɨm dɨwarɨsikon ae tap dɨwarɨsikon ekwaŋ uŋun kɨsi gak da paŋpulugoki do jomjom aŋ.
Gɨldat yɨpban gɨldat kɨnda kɨla asak. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Mani Kristo da but galak do yo madepsi nimgut uŋudeŋ gɨn Piŋkop da nin morap kaloŋ kaloŋ do nandaŋ yawotni nimɨŋ nimɨŋ agɨt.
Amɨn madepsi Piŋkop gawak ɨm do muwutni bɨsapmon gak aŋkɨsikeŋ. Mɨŋat amɨnyo gak do pasolgoŋ uŋun da dabɨlon kalɨp gak do paret ak do yaŋ teban tagɨm uŋun akdɨsat.
Nak tapmɨmno kɨsi paregek tɨmtɨm yaŋek tɨlagon kɨŋ altaŋek tomnino uŋun abɨdokeŋ do pini asat. Tomni uŋun yaŋ: Nak Yesu Kristo pakyaŋsi nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek Piŋkop dakon yaŋ ɨlɨt yolek Kwen Kokupmon wɨgɨkeŋ.
Mani amɨn nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi Kwen Kokupmon nani baŋ tɨmɨkgaŋ uŋun da aŋpak yaŋ aŋ: Mibɨltok nandak nandak gwaljɨgɨ mɨni uŋun yolgaŋ, ae uŋun da buŋon amɨn gat but kaloŋsi ekwaŋ, ae aŋpak yaworɨ aŋ yomaŋ, aŋek pɨŋbisi egek amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon gen nandaŋek ekwaŋ, ae amɨn do bupmɨsi nandaŋ yomɨŋek aŋpak tagɨsi aŋyomaŋ. Uŋun amɨn morap kɨsi do aŋpak tɨlak kaloŋɨkon gɨn aŋyomaŋ. Ae jamba but aŋpak dɨma aŋ, uŋun aŋpak tagɨ yol kɨmokgoŋ.
Gen bamɨsi baŋ yaŋ teŋteŋomaŋ, ae Piŋkop da tapmɨmon pi amaŋ. Nin emat dakon yo amɨn da kɨsit terɨ terɨ da tebai tɨmɨkgaŋ uŋun da tɨlak aŋpak kɨlegɨ tɨmɨgek Piŋkop dakon pi amaŋ.
Amɨn morap Piŋkop bɨsit iyaŋ uŋun yo tɨmɨkgaŋ, ae yo wɨsaŋ amɨn uŋun bamɨ koŋ, ae yoma domon tɨdoŋ amɨn uŋun wɨtdal yomɨsak.
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, Abraham dɨma altaŋakwan nak kɨlɨ egɨpgum da egɨsat.”
Kɨlɨ Saimon Pita da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gak dukon kɨkdɨsal?” Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak da kokup kɨkdɨsat uŋudon abɨsok gak arɨpmɨ dɨma noldɨsal. Mani don nak noldɨsal.”
Aŋek Yut Burɨ Telagɨ da pomon ɨmal madepsi kɨnda abɨsɨŋba magɨt. Aŋek ɨmal uŋun da manjigwan yut burɨ kɨnda tagɨt uŋun Yut Burɨ Telagɨsi yaŋ yawit.
Nak yo kaloŋɨ kɨnda dogɨn dayɨkdɨsat: Ni kosiron da Telagɨ Wup abɨdawit? Gen teban yolyol kosiron da, bo Gen Bin Tagɨsi nandaŋek nandaŋ gadat aŋek uŋudon da abɨdawit?
Nin ji do but dasi galak taŋ damgumaŋ, do Piŋkop dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi damgumaŋ. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, notsi agɨmaŋ do aŋek ji paŋpulugok do egɨp egɨpnin kɨsi parekgɨmaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn gen uŋun nandaŋ japtaŋ yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Epesas nin dakon Atemis uŋun da wukwisi madep!”
Asi, kalɨp da wɨŋ ae abɨsok ekwamaŋon Moses dakon gen teban manjaŋ bɨsap morapmon ɨmal tɨm da nandak nandak kositni sopmaŋ yomɨsak.
Moses da gen teban morap mɨŋat amɨnyo do yoyɨŋ mudaŋek bulmakau monɨŋ gat ae meme gat dakon yawini tɨmɨk pakbi gat ɨktagɨlgɨt. Aŋek isop kɨndap dakon kɨlɨŋɨ nap gami baŋ wabi uŋun sipsip daŋgwan baŋ wasaŋbi uŋun yawikon sɨbɨgɨt. Aŋek abɨdaŋ awɨlakwan yawi dakon mumumɨ da Piŋkop dakon gen teban papia ae mɨŋat amɨn morap da kwenon mawit.
Yesu aeni bɨsap kɨnda gat Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgek amɨn kɨnda kɨsirɨ gɨreŋɨkbi kɨnda yɨkban kagɨt.
Kaŋek yaŋ yagɨmaŋ, “Nin kɨlɨ Yawe da yutnon wɨgɨno. Ae uŋun da kapmatjok kɨŋek gawak ɨmneŋ.”
Kɨla amɨn madep dakon mɨŋatni iyɨ dakon yutgwan egɨsak. Uŋun mɨŋat tagɨsi. Ɨmal pak uŋun malɨ gol baŋ wasaŋbi uŋun baŋ paŋtɨlɨm abi.
(Yesu uŋun kosit niaŋon da kɨmotjak uŋun nandani do tɨlak gen uŋun yagɨt.)
Yaŋba Yesu da paŋdet kabɨni pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn iyɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma ani, mani Piŋkop da yo morap ak do tagɨ asak.”
Amɨn dɨwarɨ do nandaŋ yawotjok dɨ dɨmasi aŋ yomaŋ. Gen pap yaŋek iyɨ dakon man pawɨkwaŋ.
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gen uŋun nandayɨŋ uŋun naga do aŋek dɨma, ji do aŋek altak.
Aŋakwan amɨn morap gen bamɨ dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋek aŋpak yokwi ak do madepsi galak tawit amɨn uŋun gen pikon atni bɨsapmon kobogɨ yokwisi tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Nido, Piŋkop da iyɨ dakon egɨp egɨp morap kɨsi ae tapmɨm morapni kɨsi Monji uŋudon tosak do tagɨsi nandagɨt.
Uŋun do nak yaŋsi dayɨsat, ji uŋun amɨn kabɨ do yo yokwi kɨnda dɨma aŋ yomni. Ɨsal yopba kɨni. Amɨn da nandak nandagon yo uŋun aŋ kaŋ, bamɨ dɨma asak.
Uŋun yɨk nandat tamokon sot amɨn morapmɨ egɨpgwit: dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn, ae kandapmɨ yokwi amɨn, ae kɨdarɨ alek taŋbi amɨn kɨsi egɨpgwit.
Gaga yagɨl uŋun da arɨpmon yo morap tawit da abɨsokyo kɨsi toŋ gɨn. Nido yo morap kɨsi da gak dakon pi aŋ.
Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu, sipsip dakon Kɨla Amɨn madep, uŋun da saŋbek saŋbek dagok dagogɨ mɨni uŋun aŋteban ak do yawini parekgɨt. Uŋun Piŋkop da kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt. Abɨsok Piŋkop but yawot ami da
Mani Yesu da mɨŋatjok kɨsirɨkon abɨdaŋek gen papmon da yagɨt, “Gwano, pɨda!”
Uŋun dakon man da wukwisi tosak, aŋakwan nak dakon man da pɨŋbi tosak.
Mani tuŋon amɨn da Ip aŋkewalgɨt uŋudeŋ jikon yaŋ gɨn noman tosak do pasoldot. Nandak nandakji upbal taŋba aŋpak gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi gat ae Kristo dogɨn nandaŋek egɨp egɨp uŋun dɨ yɨpmaŋ dekbam.
Nandaŋ gadatni dɨma teban taŋbi amɨn do bupmɨ nandaŋ yomni.
Nin Kwen Kokup dakon egɨp egɨp abɨdoneŋ do kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt. Egɨp egɨp uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma tasɨk togɨ, ae Piŋkop da dabɨlon gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi, ae mudok mudogɨ mɨnisi. Egɨp egɨp uŋun Piŋkop gat kɨsi Kwen Kokup egɨpneŋ bɨsapmon abɨdoneŋ do Piŋkop da kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt.
Nak da kapmatjok abɨŋek yokwikon baŋ yumaŋ naŋ nepbi. Uwalno da kɨsiron naŋ pulugaŋ nepbi.
Yesu Judia yɨpmaŋek Galili kɨŋ wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ uŋun aban kosit bamot agɨt.
Serubabel uŋun Abiut dakon datni. Abiut uŋun Eliakim dakon datni. Eliakim uŋun Aso dakon datni.
Pɨgɨ tugaŋba ɨlɨkba ɨleŋɨkon wɨkwan yɨgek tap kɨlap kokwinɨkgaŋ. Tagɨ amɨn ɨdap madepmon yopmaŋek yokwi amɨn maba kwaŋ.
Nandani, nin yaŋ yomaŋ, “Amɨn butni paŋteban aŋek yaworɨ egek jɨgɨ guramɨkgaŋ uŋun Piŋkop da gɨsamɨkban kɨsɨk kɨsɨksi ekwaŋ.” Jop dakon geni kɨlɨ nandawit. Uŋun butni aŋteban aŋek yaworɨ egek jɨgɨ morap noman taŋ ɨmgwit uŋun guramɨkgɨt. Dɨsi nandaŋ, don Amɨn Tagɨ da aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ ɨmgut. Asi nandamaŋ, Amɨn Tagɨ da amɨn nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsak, ae bupmɨ madepsi nandɨsak.
Yawe uŋun pini wagɨl tagɨsi asak. Amɨn morap Piŋkop dakon pi do galak toŋ pini uŋun do nandaŋ ekwaŋ.
Yesu da tebaisi yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨsak, uŋun amɨn nak kaloŋ naŋgɨn dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨsak. Uŋun Dat yabekban pɨgɨm uŋunyo kɨsi nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨsak.
Amɨn wuda tebani toŋ kɨnda da uŋudon kɨŋek ŋwakbeŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋek bɨsit tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlek tokeŋ do nandɨsal kaŋ, tagɨ aŋmɨlɨp abɨ kɨlek tokeŋ.”
Namɨn da iyɨ dakon aŋpak yokwini morap nandɨsak? Yokwi dɨwarɨ dɨma nandaŋek asat uŋun wɨrɨrɨkbɨ kɨlegɨsi egɨpbeŋ.
Abɨsok Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋok dakon pi do aŋek dam teban amɨn egɨsat bɨsapmon abɨdoko gak da tamokon pi asak kaŋ, nak uŋun do tagɨsi nandakeŋ.
Yaŋdo, nak japtaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨm, ‘Asi dayɨsat, ji nak dakon yɨk yawot kokupgwan dɨmasi pɨgɨni.’ ”
Ae gak dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋok amɨngo Stiwen aŋakba kɨmakgɨt bɨsapmon nak kapmatjok agek tɨp baŋ aŋakgwit amɨn dakon ɨmal dubakni ɨlɨk yopmaŋ naba kɨla agɨm. Aŋek pɨndagapbo Stiwen aŋakba kɨmakban nandako tagɨsi agɨt.’
Mɨŋat kɨnda sakwabat egek paŋpulugokni mɨnisi egɨsak kaŋ, uŋun mɨŋat Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋ kɨmagek Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi aŋ ɨmjak do nandaŋek jomjom asak. Aŋek gɨldarɨ ae kalbi Piŋkop da aŋpulugosak do bɨsit asak.
Nagal si gawut do asak uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma jokgaljak. Ae lam kɨmot do asak uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma aban kɨmotjak. Pi tebai aŋakwan wɨgɨ aŋpak kɨlegɨ da aŋpak yokwi wutjɨban tapmɨmɨ mɨni akdɨsak.
Yawe, nak Kwen Kokup sɨŋtoko wɨgakwan gandako kɨla amɨn madep yɨyɨt tamogokon yɨkdal.
dam tebanon kɨŋ Jon dakon busuŋɨ mandaŋ dagawit.
Yaŋban Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Nak ji 12 kabɨ manjɨgɨm, mani ji kabɨkon da kɨnda uŋun Sunduk yombem.”
Mani joŋ kɨlap da ekwaŋ tɨmon gak da nin paŋupbal agɨl. Aŋek pɨlɨn tuk madep naŋ nin wɨtjɨgɨl.
Mani iyɨ teŋteŋɨkon egɨsak uŋun da tɨlagon teŋteŋɨkon agɨpneŋ kaŋ, nin Piŋkop dakon amɨn kabɨni gat but kaloŋ amaŋ. Aŋek Monji Yesu dakon yawi da dɨwarɨnin kɨsisi sugaŋban jɨmjɨmɨ mɨnisi amaŋ.
Josep uŋun Pailat ron kɨŋ Yesu dakon bumjotni abɨdok do iyɨŋban nandaŋ ɨmgut.
Yaŋban yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Aŋabɨgɨt! Aŋabɨgɨt! Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakgɨt!” Yaŋba Pailat da yoyɨgɨt, “Kɨla amɨn madepji tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakgeŋ do nandaŋ?” Yaŋban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ da yaŋ yawit, “Ninon kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda dɨma egɨsak. Sisa kaloŋgɨn!”
Yaŋ iyɨŋek saŋbek saŋbek agɨmal dakon tɨlakni gɨptɨmni mandɨsak do iyɨgɨt. Aŋek don Abraham dakon monji Aisak altaŋban gɨldatni 8 kabɨ aŋakwan gɨptɨmɨ mandagɨt. Ae don Aisak da Jekop dakon datni agɨt. Ae Jekop da babɨknin 12 kabɨ dakon datni agɨt.
Yesu Betani kokupmon amɨn kɨnda mani Saimon uŋun da yutnon yɨkgɨt. (Saimon uŋun kalɨp wuda tebani toŋ egɨpgut.)
Yaŋdo, amɨn kɨnda gen ŋwakŋwarɨkon da gen yosak kaŋ, Piŋkop da gen uŋun tagɨ paŋtobɨljak dakon tapmɨm ɨmjak do bɨsit asak.
Yum nandaŋaki pakbi da ɨgek nak dɨma wɨtjisak, ae pakbi ɨlarɨgwan dɨma pɨgɨ pasɨlgeŋ. Yum nandaŋaki bumjot gapma da nak dɨma galautjak.
Aŋelogo da yolban kɨŋakwa kositni aban pɨlɨn tuk ae sagalegɨyo ani dosi nandɨsat.
Yaŋdo, ji aŋpakni pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek kombɨ amɨn toptopmɨ yaŋ pɨndakba pɨsoni.
Do yo morapmon iyɨ dakon notni yombemsi dagaŋek bupmɨkon da, ae pi agak tagɨsikon da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨni dagagɨt. Do Piŋkop dakon gen guramɨgek yokwi wɨrɨrɨt pi tagɨsi aŋ kɨmokdok, ae bupmɨni madepsi.
Yesu gat paŋdetni gat telagɨ yut madep dakon nagal yɨpmaŋ waŋga pɨŋakwa monjɨ kɨnda da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, tɨp madepsi baŋ yut tagɨsisi dɨ awit do dɨgo pɨndat!”
Yawe da amɨn kɨlegɨ ae amɨn yokwi kakgɨmansi kokwin asak. Emat do galak toŋ amɨn dɨmasi galak taŋ yomɨsak.
Pɨlɨn taŋakwan paŋmuwukbi da Pol gat Sailas gat yabekba Beria kɨgɨmal. Kɨŋ altaŋek Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgɨgɨmal.
Mani Yesu uŋun mɨŋat kabɨ tobɨl pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jerusalem dakon gwani, ji nak do kunam dɨma tatni. Dɨsi gat ae mɨŋat monjɨyosi gat do tatni.
Mani Amɨn Tagɨ Yawe, man bingo tagɨsi tosak do aŋek yo tagɨsi aŋ nabi. Gak nak do toktogɨsi but dasi galak taŋ namɨsal, do yokwikon naŋ abɨdoki.
Yesu da gen saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Abɨsok butno jɨk tosok. Ni gen naŋ yokeŋ? ‘Dat yo jɨgɨ nagon apdɨsak gwayeki’ yaŋ yokeŋ? Dɨma. Yo jɨgɨ nagon apdɨsak uŋun pak do apgum.
Aŋakwan dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Yum kaŋba koneŋ. Elaija da abɨŋ aŋpulugaŋban koneŋ bo dɨma?”
Nak Pol da naga gɨldat tagɨ on mandɨsat.
Asi, nak kalɨp uwalon da jɨgɨlak aŋ ɨmɨŋek manji gen yaŋ ɨmgum. Mani Piŋkop da bupmɨ nandaŋ namgut, nido yo nibaŋ agɨm uŋun dɨma nandaŋek Monji do dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgum.
Kɨŋ 3 kilok aŋakwan Yesu da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Eloi, eloi lama sabaktani?” Gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ yaŋ: “Piŋkopno, Piŋkopno, nido nepmaŋ dekdal?”
Aisaia da Yesu dakon tɨlɨmni kaŋek gen uŋun Yesu dosi yagɨt.
Mani Yawe egɨp egɨpno gagon tosok yaŋsi nandɨsat. Nak yaŋ yosot, “Gak Piŋkopno.”
Don Pol Atens yɨpmaŋek Korin kokup papmon kɨgɨt.
yaŋ iyɨwit, ‘Nin wɨsa dagokdosi abɨŋ pi aŋapno gɨldat da madepsi nindaŋakwan pɨlɨn tosok. Buŋonsi abeŋ uŋun bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok pi ayɨŋ, do nido moneŋ tɨlak kaloŋɨ kongɨn nimɨsal?’
Kalɨp kɨla amɨn bamot Orep gat ae Sep garon agɨl uŋudeŋ gɨn emat amɨni dakon mibɨltok amɨni paŋupbal aki. Kɨla amɨn madep bamot Seba gat ae Salmuna garon agɨl uŋudeŋ gɨn kɨla amɨni pabɨŋ yopbi.
Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon gwakni kɨla tagɨ dɨma asak kaŋ, Piŋkop dakon paŋmuwukbi kabɨ dakon kɨla arɨpmɨ dɨma asak.
Babilon paŋkɨ egɨpgwit bɨsapmon, Joiakin uŋun Sealtiel dakon datni. Sealtiel uŋun Serubabel dakon datni.
Monjɨ uŋun but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsak uŋun da manon, Piŋkop da nin do nandaŋ yawot madepsi yumsi agɨt. Do nandaŋ yawotni madepsi uŋun do nandaŋek Piŋkop dakon man aŋkɨsiŋ kɨmotneŋ.
Mani Piŋkop da Israel amɨn dakon nandak nandak dakon kositni wamaŋ sopgut, ae abɨsok yo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn tosok. Saŋbek saŋbek kalɨpmɨ dakon gen manjaŋ bɨsapmon ɨmal da yaŋ nandak nandak kositni wamaŋ sopmaŋakwan gen dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaŋ pɨsoŋ. Nido Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋapno uŋun kosiron dagɨn Piŋkop da ɨmal tɨm uŋun kwɨnɨkdak.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa amɨn kabɨ madep Jerusalem egɨpgwit da gen pɨsɨgon da gen yawit. Dɨwarɨ da “Uŋun amɨn tagɨsi” yaŋ yawit. Ae dɨwarɨ da “Dɨma, uŋun amɨn top paŋkewaldak” yaŋ yawit.
Notnoni, yo uŋun altokdaŋ uŋun ji kɨlɨ nandawit. Do ji dɨsi do kɨla tebaisi aŋ kɨmotni. Gen teban pabɨŋ yop amɨn dakon topni da ji ɨlɨk paŋgwa nandaŋ gadatjikon saŋbeŋek tebai dɨma dɨ akbam.
Aban pɨdaŋban awɨgɨ iyɨ da amɨnsi tet do yɨpgut da nin dakon kosit niyɨŋ nolɨk amɨn, ae yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨnin yɨkdak. Do Israel amɨn but tobɨl aŋapno yokwinin tagɨ wɨrɨrɨk nimjak.
Piŋkop gen papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: “Amɨn kɨnda egɨp egɨpni tagɨsi noman taŋakwan bɨsap tagɨsi kok do nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn gen yokwi dɨma yosak, ae top dɨma yosak.
Mɨŋat kɨnda uŋun kabɨgwan yɨkgɨt uŋun mani Lidia, kokupni Taitaira. Lidia ɨmal gami baŋ yopmaŋek moneŋ ɨlɨt pi aŋek egɨpgut. Uŋun Piŋkop gawak ɨmɨŋek egɨpgut. Amɨn Tagɨ da Lidia dakon but yomani wɨtdalban Pol da gen yagɨt do bamɨsi yosok yaŋ nandaŋek mɨrak pakyaŋsi yopgut.
“Nak asisi dayɨsat, Piŋkop da yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gat ae Piŋkop abɨŋ yɨp do manji gen yogok gat dakon dɨwarɨ tagɨ wɨrɨrɨtjak.
Yo uŋun akdɨsak uŋun yaŋ: iyɨ bɨsap yɨpguron yo morap Kwen Kokup toŋ ae mɨktɨmon toŋ uŋun yo morap kɨsi Kristo do paŋmuwutdɨsak. Aŋakwan Kristo da yo morap kɨsi dakon busuŋɨ yɨtdɨsak.
Uŋun amɨn sakwabat paŋkewalek yutni tɨmɨkgaŋ. Ae amɨn da pɨndatni yaŋ do bɨsit dubagɨsi aŋ. Uŋuden amɨn gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon kobogɨ do yo jɨgɨsi pakdaŋ.”
Yaŋba Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn mɨktɨmon ekwaŋ uŋun mɨŋat eyo aŋek ekwaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋek meŋi ae datni dɨma paŋpulugosok. Aŋek ji da uŋun amɨn do yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Uŋun amɨn tagɨ asak nido yo uŋun Piŋkop do kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt.’
Ɨgayɨŋek yaŋ nandagɨt, “Ɨlɨkba pɨgɨknikon ɨgayɨkeŋ kaŋ, kɨlek tokeŋ.”
Don yabekbi kabɨ da abɨŋ Yesu aŋgwasɨŋek yo awit ae Piŋkop gen yawit uŋun dakon geni iyɨwit.
Yesu kokup uŋun yɨpmaŋek Tair ae Saidon kokup bamot tomal uŋudon kɨgɨt.
Ji Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo ɨmal naŋ yaŋ pani. Ae but kalɨp dakon galaktok yol do nandak nandak dɨma ani.
Yaŋakwan amɨn da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Uŋun amɨn dɨma, piŋkop kɨnda da yosok.”
Yaŋban yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak Rom amɨnsi dagok do tomni madepsi yumgɨm.” Yaŋban Pol da iyɨgɨt, “Gak yaŋ agɨl mani nak altagɨmon da Rom amɨnsi kɨnda egɨpgum da egɨsat.”
Sabat kɨndakon Yesu jap nok do Parisi amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn kɨnda da yutnon kɨgɨt. Aŋakwan yɨpba kɨk aŋek kaŋ yɨkgwit,
Piŋkop, babɨknin da kalɨp egɨpgwit bɨsapmon pi tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨl uŋun dakon geni niyɨwit. Nin mɨrak yopmaŋek gen uŋun kɨlɨ nandagɨmaŋ.
Aŋakwan wuda wamak morapmɨ da aŋpulugok do pi aŋtɨdok aŋakwa tepmɨ madepsi nandaŋek egɨpgut. Wuda wamak yumaŋ nok do aŋek moneŋni kɨsi yomɨŋ mudagɨt. Aban sotni dɨma tagap tagɨt, si madep tagɨt.
Yawe, aŋpulugoki do yaŋ tɨdosot, do aŋpulugaŋaki mayagɨ dɨma pakeŋ. Yokwi pakpak amɨn paŋmayak abi. Aŋaki kɨmakbi tamogwan pagek gen dɨma yoni.
Nak aŋpak morap ani do dayɨŋ dekgo nandawit, ae aŋpak morap abo nandawit, uŋun aŋpak morap ji bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ aŋ kɨmotni. Aŋakwa Piŋkop but yawot ami da ji gat egɨpjak.
Gak kwensi kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamogokon yɨgek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ morap gak da kapmatjok abɨŋ muwutni do yoyɨki.
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak kɨŋ ego iyɨŋbɨ tobɨl apjil.”
Yaŋ yaŋban Pita gat notni kabɨ gat da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin Piŋkop dakon gen uŋun naŋsi guramɨtno tagɨ asak. Amɨn dakon gen dɨma guramɨtneŋ.
Muwugakwa Yesu da amɨn morapmɨsi sot mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ awit uŋun paŋmɨlɨp agɨt. Aŋek koŋni toŋ amɨn morapmɨ koŋni yol yomgut. Aŋek koŋ uŋun nandaŋ ɨmgwit, do yaŋsop aŋyomgut.
Pi morap agɨl uŋun do nandakeŋ. Pi tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨl uŋun kɨsi do nandakeŋ.
Juda amɨn da Yesu abɨdaŋ Kaiapas dakon yut yɨpmaŋek gapman dakon amɨn madep da yutnon aŋkɨwit. Uŋun kɨlɨ wɨsa dagagɨt, do iyɨ gapman dakon amɨn madep da nagalon dɨma pɨgɨwit, nido pɨgɨneŋ kaŋ Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlek taŋek Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap noknoknin aŋsuŋ akdamaŋ yaŋ nandawit.
Mani Piŋkop da bɨsap yɨpguron Monji yabekban pɨgɨt. Mɨŋat da aŋalaŋban gen teban da yoŋgamgwan egɨpgut.
Yolakwal Yesu da tobɨl pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yo ninaŋ wɨsamal?” Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Rabai, gak dukon egɨsal?” (“Rabai” uŋun gen dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun “Yoyɨŋdet.”)
Bɨsit yaŋ aŋek namɨn da noman tosak yaŋ do wasok kɨnda awit. Tɨp wasok aba Matias da noman tagɨt. Noman taŋek yabekbi 11 kabɨkon saŋbegɨt.
Yaŋ do aŋek on mɨktɨmon amɨn kɨlegɨ morap dapba kɨmakgwit uŋun dakon kobogɨ ji da tɨmɨtdaŋ. Wasok wasok do amɨn kɨlegɨ Abel aŋagek ae amɨn kɨlegɨ morapmɨ kɨsi dapgwit. Egɨ wɨgɨ wasɨp do ji da Berekia dakon monji Sekaraia Telagɨ Yut Madep ae altayo da binapmon aŋakba kɨmakgɨt. Uŋun dakon kobogɨ yo jɨgɨsi ji da tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Ji nandaŋ gadat wasaŋek awit bɨsapmon gen nandawit uŋun tebaisi abɨdoni. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, egɨp egɨpji Monjɨ gat Dat garon taŋakwan egɨpdaŋ.
Mani nandaki. Piŋkop da gak wagɨlsi aŋupbal akdɨsak. Gak tebaisi abɨdaŋek yutgokon naŋ maban abɨgɨkdɨsal. Aŋek obɨsi gɨkban pasɨlaki mɨktɨmon saŋbeŋek dɨma egɨpbi.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu da donki kɨnda kaŋ uŋun da kwenon yɨkgɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun bamɨ toŋ agɨt.
Gak da nak yokwikon naŋ abɨdoki do jomjom aŋek butjɨksi nandɨsat, aŋek tapmɨmno mɨnisi ayɨŋ. Mani gengo da nak tagɨ aŋpulugosak yaŋ nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom asat.
Telagɨ papiakon Isip dakon kɨla amɨn madep Pero Piŋkop da yaŋ iyɨgɨt: “Nak da jɨgɨ madepsi gabo mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨŋat amɨnyo da tapmɨmno kaŋek man madep namni yaŋ do aŋek nak da kɨla amɨn madep man gamgum.”
Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma. Nin da binapmon daŋgap dubagɨsi kɨnda tosok. Yaŋ tosok do ɨdon ekwaŋ amɨn jikon arɨpmɨ dɨma kɨkɨgɨ, ae uŋudon ekwaŋ amɨn ɨdon arɨpmɨ dɨma obopmɨ.’
Gak do yaŋ tɨdaŋba jɨgɨkon baŋ pulugagɨl. Nandaŋ gadaŋ gamɨŋakwa paŋpulugagɨl, do nandaŋ gadatni uŋun ɨsalɨ dɨma agɨt.
Yaŋba Jon da kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda paba pɨgɨkni bamorɨ kaŋ, mɨnini amɨn do kɨnda ɨmjak. Ae japni taŋ ɨmaŋ amɨnyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn asak.”
Yut uŋudon but yawot amɨn kɨnda ekwan kaŋ, but yawot genji dakon bamɨ uŋudon tosak. Mɨnini da egɨpjak kaŋ, but yawotji dakon bamɨ jikon aeni tobɨljak.
Uŋun aŋpak yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ aŋek, wagat wagat, ae nandaba yokwi tok, ae pɨndak galaktok, ae amɨn dapba kɨmot dakon aŋpak, ae emat, ae top gen, ae gwayeŋ yok uŋun amɨnon tugosok.
“Mani babɨni kabɨ nawa geno pabɨŋ yopni, ae nak dakon gen dɨma yolni kaŋ,
Yaŋdo, nin yɨpmaŋ derɨ mɨni Yesu da manon Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋ kɨmotneŋ. Yaŋ aneŋ uŋun da gen dulumnin dakon paret asak.
Sekaraia Telagɨ Yut Madepmon pi agak bɨsapni mudaŋakwan tobɨl kokupnikon kɨgɨt.
Kokup pap dukwan dukwan amɨn da amɨn dɨwarɨ gat ae yo morap gat paŋupbal aŋ. Kosit ɨleŋon notni pabɨŋ yopmaŋek yoni gwayek do paŋkewalgaŋ.
Gen yaŋ yoyɨŋakwan meŋi padɨk padɨkni da abɨŋ yomakon agek Yesu yomakon pɨsak do gen yɨpba wɨgɨgɨt.
Tɨmɨk paŋgwan jɨgɨni mɨni egɨpgwit, do dɨma pasalgwit. Mani tap ɨdap da uwalni wɨtjɨgɨt.
Yesu bɨsit aŋ mudaŋban paŋdet kabɨni gat kɨsi Kidron Pakbi Kɨdat yapmaŋek kɨwit. Uŋun pakbi da usugap da pigaga kɨnda tosok. Yesu gat paŋdet kabɨni gat uŋun pigagagwan pɨgɨwit.
Piŋkop da busuŋ daŋgwanji niaŋ da toŋ uŋun kɨsisi nandaŋ mudosok, do ji dɨma pasolni. Mɨnam monɨŋ monɨŋ morapmɨ dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun madep dɨma, mani ji dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun wukwisi.”
Yaŋban paŋdetni nandaŋ wɨrɨpdagek yaŋ yawit, “Yaŋ kaŋ namɨn amɨn da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdosak?”
Dat da mɨŋat monjɨyoni do bupmɨ nandaŋ yomaŋ uŋun da tɨlak Yawe da amɨn iyɨ do pasal ɨmaŋ amɨn do yaŋsi nandaŋ yomɨsak.
Abraham uŋun bɨlakni 100 do monjɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋaŋalagɨ, ae mɨŋatni Sara uŋun yo kɨsi monjɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋalagɨ agɨt, mani nandaŋ gadatni dɨma yawogek tebaisi tagɨt.
Nayɨŋ dekbɨ gengo dakon mibɨlɨ nandaŋ pɨsokeŋ. Ae wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ morapgo uŋun do nandaŋ egɨpbeŋ.
Dɨwarɨno aego dɨma pɨndakgi. Yokwino kɨsi wɨrɨrɨk mudoki.
Juda amɨn ji yaŋ nandaŋ, Piŋkop da gen tebani nin do nimgut, do nin do tagɨsi nandɨsak. Ae ji dɨsi dakon man pawɨgek, “Nin Piŋkop dakon notnisi ekwamaŋ” yaŋ yoŋ.
Dat kɨnda da mɨŋat monjɨyonikon aŋpak asak, uŋun da arɨpmon nin da jikon aŋpak yaŋ gɨn agɨmaŋ, uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ.
Nak dakon amɨno kɨlegɨsi uŋun nandaŋ gadaron egɨpdɨsak. Mani duwalɨk pɨgɨsak kaŋ, tagɨ dɨma nandaŋ ɨbeŋ.”
Amɨn morap kɨsi do nandaba wukwan yomni, aŋek Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨwarɨ do but dasi galak taŋ yomni. Piŋkop do si pasalek egɨpni. Aŋek kɨla amɨn madep do man madep ɨmni.
Kalbi dɨpmɨn dɨma pokdot. Toktogɨsi yaŋ teban tok gengo dogɨn nandaŋ egɨsat.
Ji kɨsi morap Kristo dakon gɨptɨm tɨm ekwaŋ, ae ji kaloŋ kaloŋ gɨptɨm dɨwatni ekwaŋ.
Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da koŋni toŋ amɨn kɨnda aŋaŋ Yesukon aŋopgwit. Uŋun amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni ae kadɨm. Yesu da aŋmɨlɨp aban gen yaŋek dabɨlɨ pɨsagɨt.
Wɨgɨ Yesu da manjikon kandapnikon paŋkɨ agek kunam tagakwan dabɨl pakbini da kandapnikon maŋ guktaŋba busuŋ daŋgwani baŋ ɨkdɨgagɨt. Yaŋ aŋek kandapmɨkon mandaŋ naŋek pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi naŋ soŋ ɨmgut.
Tap gat kɨndap gat amɨn kɨsikon altosak.
Uŋun amɨn mɨŋat amɨnyo dakon moneŋni tɨmɨt do nandaŋek yoyɨŋdet gulusuŋ aŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨwarɨ gat ae gwakni morap kɨsi gat dakon nandaŋ gadat paŋupbal aŋ. Do gen uŋuden dɨma yoni do yaŋsop aŋ yobi.
“Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda da ‘Kristo oni!’ bo ‘Asoni!’ yaŋ yaŋban kaŋ, geni dɨma nandaŋ gadani.
Jon pini aban mudok do aŋakwan yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Ji nak do namɨn yaŋ nandaŋ? Nak ji da jomjom aŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn dɨma. Mani nandani, amɨn wukwisi kɨnda nak da buŋon noldak. Nak uŋun amɨn dakon pɨŋbisi egɨsat do uŋun dakon kandap gwɨl napni nak da arɨpmɨ dɨma wɨtdalɨ.’
Amɨn kɨnda nak nandaŋek nandaŋ gadatni dɨma wɨtdal kɨsak uŋun amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨgɨ toŋ egɨsak.”
Yaŋban paŋdetni kɨnda da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nandaŋ namɨŋaki kɨŋ datno wayɨk yɨpmaŋek don abɨŋ golgeŋ.”
Pol kokup gwasɨk aŋakwan Juda amɨn kɨnda mani Apolos uŋun Aleksandria kokup papmon amɨn kɨnda uŋun paŋabɨŋ Epesas egɨpgut. Uŋun amɨn gen yogokni tagɨsi, ae Piŋkop dakon gen dakon mibɨlɨ pakyaŋsi nandagɨt.
Aŋakwan mɨŋat da pasol pasol madepsi nandaŋek mukgwan gawagakwa amɨn bamot da yaŋ yoyɨgɨmal, “Ji nido kɨmakbi tamokon amɨn egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋun wɨsaŋ?
Jon dam teban yutnon yɨpba yɨgakwan Yesu Galili Provinskon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋ Piŋkop dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek yaŋ yagɨt,
Mani mɨktɨm da nap kelɨ toŋ ae joŋ yokwi baŋ gɨn paŋalon asak kaŋ, mɨktɨm uŋun yokwi. Do bɨsap dubak dɨma Piŋkop da yokwi tosak dosi yokdɨsak. Aŋakwan kɨndap da soŋban pasɨldɨsak.
Aŋpak gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi baŋ amaŋ, ae nandak nandak tagɨsi baŋ tɨmɨkgamaŋ. Jɨgɨ noman taŋ niba but yaworon da ekwamaŋ, ae mɨŋat amɨnyo do aŋpak tagɨsi aŋyomamaŋ. Telagɨ Wupmon tapmɨm uŋudon tɨmɨkgamaŋ. Amɨn do bamɨsi but dasi galaktaŋ yomamaŋ.
Nak yaŋ abeŋ kaŋ, gak dakon gen teban do nandaŋ egɨpbeŋ bɨsapmon mayagɨ dɨma pakeŋ.
“Wain sop pakpak bɨsap kwaŋ taŋakwan oman monjɨ kɨnda yabekban wain bamɨ tɨmɨk paŋopjak do kɨgɨt.
Mani yaŋ dɨma. Kristo kɨmoron da kɨlɨ pɨdagɨt. Uŋun pigaga jap bamɨ mibɨltoksi tosok uŋun da tɨlak kɨlɨ kɨmakgwit amɨn dakon wasok wasok amɨni pɨdagɨt.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji nido nak Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ nayɨŋek geno dɨma guramɨkgaŋ?
Yaŋban dɨ da Pol da gen yagɨt do nandaba bamɨ agɨt, ae dɨwarɨ da nandaŋ gadat ak do dɨma galak tawit.
Ae gen morap yoni, ae pi morap anikon nin Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo yaŋ nandaŋek ani. Aŋek Yesu da manon yo morap do Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨni.
Uŋun Piŋkopnin egɨsak. Nin sipsip kabɨni, do nin dakon kɨla aŋek japnin nimɨsak. Abɨsok geni nandaŋ ɨmni.
Yaŋ asal, do pasalek moneŋgo 5 tausen danari namgul uŋun aŋkɨ mɨktɨm kagagwan yɨpbo tagɨt. Moneŋgo uŋun oni.’
Wigat kɨla amɨn da uŋun amɨn do yoma wɨtdal ɨban pɨgɨsak. Pɨgɨ sipsipni kaloŋ kaloŋ dakon mani yaŋban tegɨ nandaŋakwa mibɨltaŋ yoban waŋga kwaŋ.
Yaŋ agɨt do niaŋ yoneŋ? Piŋkop da nin paŋpulugosok, do namɨn da uwal aŋek nin pabɨŋ nipjak?
Yo morap ani uŋun si teban taŋek ani. Amɨn dogɨn dɨma, Amɨn Tagɨ do pi amaŋ yaŋ nandaŋek ani.
Iyɨŋban Pilip tɨmtɨm yaŋek kapmatjok da kɨŋ nandaŋakwan Aisaia dakon gen uŋun manjɨgɨt. Manjɨŋakwan Pilip da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak gen uŋun manjɨsal dakon mibɨlɨ nandɨsal bo dɨma?”
Aŋakwan Yesu Liwai da yutnon kwan yɨgek jap nawit. Moneŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn ae yokwi pakpak amɨn morapmɨ Yesu gat paŋdetni gat jap nawit. (Uŋuden amɨn morapmɨsi da Yesu yolgwit.)
Ae jap yet dɨwarɨ da mɨktɨm tagɨsikon maŋ kwawit. Maŋ kwaŋakwa dɨwarɨ da bamɨ 100, ae dɨwarɨ da 60, ae dɨwarɨ da 30 yaŋ tawit.
“Kɨŋakwa don gɨldat binap aeni makeron kɨŋ dɨ gat tɨmɨkgɨt. Aeni 3 kilok kɨŋ yaŋ gɨn pi monjɨ dɨ gat tɨmɨkgɨt.
Yaŋ yaŋban gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋudon yɨkgwit uŋun da burɨ da yaŋ nandawit,
Yawe, nak amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsal, ae amɨn dakon aŋpak kokwin kɨlegɨsi asal uŋun do kap yokeŋ. Nak gak aŋkɨsik do kap yokeŋ.
Kɨla amɨn madep da uwal morapni tebaisi tɨmɨtdɨsak. Amɨn dɨma galak taŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn kɨsirɨ amɨn tet da tebaisi tɨmɨtdɨsak.
sot amɨn da Yesu dakon paba pɨgɨk dɨwatni ɨgayɨk do bɨsit tebai iyɨwit. Ɨgayɨwit amɨn uŋun kɨlek taŋ mudawit.
Mani Yesu da mibɨlni nandaŋ mudagɨt, do but uŋun do dɨma yopgut. Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn dakon mibɨlni iyɨŋdetjak do dɨma nandagɨt, nido iyɨ amɨn dakon butni kɨlɨ pɨndak mudagɨt.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ da uŋun aŋpak yopmaŋek gen ɨsalɨ baŋgɨn yaŋek ekwaŋ.
Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda yoyɨŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji pik kɨndap ae kɨndap morap kɨsi do pɨndatni.
“Not kabɨ, nandani. Nak ji gat egek Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak dakon gen dayɨŋ teŋteŋagɨm. Nak abɨsok nandɨsat, ji depmaŋ kɨŋapbo jikon da kɨnda da nak ae buŋon dɨmasi nandakdaŋ.
Muwugek Yesu ni kosiron da pasɨlek abɨdaŋ aŋatno kɨmotjak uŋun dakon gen yawit.
Gak da nak yabekbɨ mɨktɨmon pɨgɨm. Yaŋgɨn nak da amɨn kabɨno mɨktɨmon yabekdat.
Juda amɨn dakon Yapyap Bɨlak kapmat taŋakwan Yesu Jerusalem kɨgɨt.
Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do Piŋkop dakon gen da yaŋ yosok: “Uŋun kwensi wɨgek amɨn morapmɨ iyɨ teban taŋek tɨmɨkgɨt uŋun tɨmɨkban kɨsi wɨgɨwit. Wɨgek amɨn do but galak do yo yomgut.”
Gɨkwem kagagwan kɨwit ae tap pakbi binapmon da kɨwit uŋun da telagɨ pakbi sowit yombem asak. Uŋun awit da Moses dakon amɨn kabɨ egɨpgwit dakon tɨlak.
Mɨktɨm kɨnda mani Mɨktɨm Kunam Pakbi Kulduk Gɨbaŋ, uŋudon kɨŋakwa uŋun mɨktɨmon pakbi gapma morapmɨ noman toŋ. Aŋakwa sɨkak maŋakwa pakbi gapmakon wɨŋoŋ.
Yaŋban paŋdetni kɨnda mani Andru, uŋun Saimon Pita dakon padɨge, uŋun da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
Uŋudon kanek kapbɨ egɨpgut. Egek don tap wakgakon da Siria mɨktɨmon kɨk do tagap tagɨt. Mani Juda amɨn da Pol aŋat do aŋek yaŋ nandat aŋ dakon geni nandagɨt. Do yum pɨndagek Masadonia mɨktɨmon ae tobɨl kɨk do nandagɨt.
Bo amɨn da ‘Oni obɨk’, bo ae ‘Asoni obɨk’ yaŋ dɨma yokdaŋ. Nandani, Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni uŋun jikon kɨlɨ abɨk.”
Yaŋdo, Amɨn Tagɨ da sigɨn yaŋ yagɨt: “Ji uŋun yopmaŋ degek dɨsi dage egɨpni. Uŋun amɨn dakon yoni Piŋkop da pɨndakban ɨŋani aŋ uŋun dɨma ɨgayɨni. Yaŋ aŋakwa nak da ji but dasi tɨmɨgek
Piŋkop gen da uŋun do yaŋ yosok: “Gak da mukwa sogok amɨn dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨpdɨsal. Gak mukwa sogok amɨn Melkisedek yombem.”
Yaŋban paŋdetni da yaŋ iyɨwit, “On mɨktɨm amɨni mɨnikon bret morapmɨ dukon baŋ on mɨŋat amɨn morapyo yomno noni?”
Uŋun mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ da apgwit. Abɨŋ Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ gat ae kokup pap Piŋkop da si galak taŋ ɨmɨsak uŋun gat aŋgwasɨwit. Mani Kwen Kokup da kɨndap da pɨŋ emat amɨn uŋun soŋ yoban mɨni awit.
Uŋun kokupmon amɨn da kaŋba Pol da kɨsiron tuŋon amɨn uŋun telɨŋ telɨŋ aban kawit. Yaŋ kaŋek iyɨ gɨn notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yawit, “Koni, on amɨn uŋun amɨn kɨnda aŋakban kɨmakgɨt. Tap kaga pɨgɨ dɨma kuŋwak, mani abɨsok kobogɨ yomyom piŋkop da dɨma egɨpjak do nandɨsak, do kobogɨ ɨmɨsak.”
Yawe, nak amɨn gak do kuragɨ nandaŋ amɨn do kuragɨ nandaŋ yomɨsat. Ae amɨn kwen wɨgɨk aŋgamaŋ amɨn do nandaba yokwi tok aŋ yomɨsat.
Kabap uŋun meme da yaŋ wɨgɨ mokmok awit, ae ɨleŋ uŋun sipsip da yaŋ wɨgɨ mokmok awit.
Yoni morapmɨ amɨn da yutnon kwoba ɨdapyo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ toŋ. Dɨwarɨ gol ae silwa baŋ wasaŋbi, ae dɨwarɨ kɨndap baŋ wasaŋbi, ae dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm baŋ wasaŋbi. Uŋun kabɨkon dɨwarɨ pi tagɨsi ak do toŋ, ae dɨwarɨ pi ɨsalɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ ak do toŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu da mɨŋat monjɨyo tɨmɨgek kɨsirɨ kwenikon wɨtjɨŋek gɨsam yomgut.
Amɨn da yokwi aŋdamni kaŋ, Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi aŋyomjak do bɨsit iyɨni. Paŋupbal asak do bɨsit dɨma iyɨni.
Aŋpak yokwi ak do dɨmasi nandɨsat, nido gengo baŋgɨn guramɨt do nandɨsat.
Yutni uŋun Jerusalem tosok. Saion Kabapmon tosok.
Mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat Parisi amɨn gat da amɨn yaŋ kɨlɨ yoyɨwit, “Amɨn kɨnda da Yesu uŋudon egɨsak yaŋ nandɨsak kaŋ, niyɨŋban abɨdaŋ dam tebanon yɨpneŋ.”
Yawe da yaŋ yosok, “Amɨn nak do but dasi galak taŋ namaŋ uŋun yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgeŋ. Amɨn nak dakon man do nandaŋ teban toŋ uŋun paŋkutnokeŋ.
Aŋakwan oman mɨŋatjok uŋun da Pita aeni kaŋek amɨn uŋudon akgwit yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn uŋun Yesu da kabɨkon nani kɨnda.”
Ɨsal gen binogɨn nandawit: “Kalɨp nin yo yokwisi aŋnim do agɨt amɨn abɨsok nandaŋ gadat aŋupbal ak do agɨt uŋun dakon yaŋ teŋteŋok asak.”
Rom amɨn, Piŋkop da ji do but dasi galak taŋ damɨŋek iyɨ dakon amɨn kabɨ ani do yaŋ damgut. Nak on papia ji do mandaŋ damɨsat. Piŋkop Datnin ae Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo dakon nandaŋ yawotni gat ae but yawotni gat jikon tosak do bɨsit asat.
Ais bɨsapmon tap wakga uŋun tamokon tagɨ dɨma paŋkɨ akgaŋ. Do amɨn morapmɨ da but kaloŋ aŋek yum Piniks kokup papmon paŋkɨ egɨp do aŋkɨlɨk koneŋ yaŋ nandawit. Uŋudon ais bɨsapmon tagɨ egɨpneŋ yaŋ nandawit. Piniks uŋun Krit mɨktɨmon saut tet do tosok, ae uŋudon da gɨldat pɨgɨsak tetgɨn do noman tagɨ kokogɨ. Piniks uŋun Krit dakon tap wakga paŋkɨ akgaŋ tamo kɨnda. Uŋudon mɨrɨm madep dɨma asak.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yoni morapmɨ amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut, uŋun bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni kɨldani toŋ tagɨsi ae ɨmalni gami baŋ paŋek yoni arɨpmɨsi taŋ ɨmɨŋakwa yaworɨsi egɨpgut.
Nak Yawe yaŋ iyɨgɨm, “Gak Amɨn Tagɨno. Yo tagɨsi morap tɨmɨkdat uŋun gak da kɨsiron dagɨn abaŋ.”
Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkop Tapmɨm Ami, abɨsok egɨsak, ae kalɨpsigwan egɨpgut, ae don apdɨsak, uŋun da yaŋ yosok, “Nak Wasok Wasoksi ae Mibɨsi egɨsat.”
Gulusuŋno da kɨlɨ wɨtjɨŋ namgut. Ae uŋun jɨgɨno yɨk yombem jɨgɨni madepsi, do nak da arɨpmɨ dɨma ɨmerɨ.
nido amɨn kɨlɨ kɨmakgɨt uŋun yokwi dakon oman amɨni dɨma egɨsak.
Yaŋ do aŋek not kabɨ ji yaŋ ani. Disi da kabɨkon amɨn 7 kabɨ manjɨŋba uŋun da jap kokwin pi ani. Amɨn nandak nandakni tagɨsi, ae amɨn da dabɨlon tagɨsi ekwaŋ, ae Telagɨ Wup da burɨkon tugaŋbi uŋuden amɨn baŋ pɨndagek tɨmɨtni. Tɨmɨkba uŋun amɨn do jap kokwin pi yomɨŋek
yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, ji kulabɨk aŋek amɨn monɨŋ da tɨlagon dɨma egɨpni kaŋ, ji Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan dɨma egɨpdaŋ.
Aŋakwa Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo kɨnda Sekaraia altaŋ ɨmgut. Uŋun alta mukwa kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi sosoŋ da tosok uŋun da amɨnsi tet do akgɨt.
“Yoyɨŋdet, ni gen teban da gen teban morap kɨsi yapmaŋ mudosok?”
nido ji but kalɨp dakon aŋpak sigɨn yolgaŋ. Asi, notji do nandaba yokwi tok aŋek gen emat agak uŋun jikon sigɨn tosok. Ji uŋun aŋpak aŋ uŋun but kalɨp dakon aŋpak baŋ aŋ. Ji on mɨktɨm dakon aŋpak gɨn aŋ.
Yut agak amɨn da gwak yokwi yaŋ yaŋek maba kɨgɨt, uŋun gwak tɨp kɨnda naŋ tɨdawit da akdak.
Gak bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ mɨŋat amɨnyo paŋpulugaŋbɨ gen uŋun do nandani. Uŋun gen emat aŋek gen dakon mibɨlɨ do notni pabɨŋ yop do pi dɨma ani do Amɨn Tagɨ da manon gen tebaisi yoyɨki. Gen uŋuden da amɨn kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋpulugogɨ. Uŋun da amɨn mɨrak paŋek nandaŋ uŋun dakon butni paŋupbal asak.
nido bulmakau wɨli gat ae meme gat dakon yawini da yokwi arɨpmɨ dɨmasi wɨrɨrɨrɨ.
Yapmaŋ kɨŋakwan Liwai amɨn kɨnda obɨŋ kaŋek yaŋ gɨn aŋpekwolek yapmaŋ kɨgɨt.
Gen on paŋdagok do yaŋ yosot. Ji morap kɨsi but kaloŋ egek amɨn morap kɨsi do bupmɨ nandaŋ yomni. Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨwarɨ do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek nandaŋ yawok yomɨŋek dɨsi do nandaba pɨsak.
Iyɨŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Monjɨsok mɨŋat pak do aŋ uŋun bɨsapmon notni gat jap kelek tagɨ egɨpni? Dɨma. Monjɨsok egakwan jap kelek arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ.
Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do jɨgɨ uŋun guramɨkdat. Mani uŋun do mayagɨ dɨma pasat, nido amɨn uŋun nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨsat uŋun kɨlɨ nandaŋ ɨmgum. Ae nak da kɨsitnikon yo yɨpgum uŋun kɨlani tagɨsi aŋakwan wɨgɨ Kristo apjak Gɨldaron wugɨsak yaŋsi nandaŋ kɨmokdot.
Yawe da Saion kokup pap iyɨ do tɨlak agɨt da uŋudon toktogɨsi egɨp do nandɨsak.
Aŋelo morapni aŋkɨsini. Kwen Kokup emat amɨn kabɨ morapni aŋkɨsini.
Uŋun kɨla amɨn da Yesu Judia yɨpmaŋek Galili abɨk uŋun dakon geni nandaŋek Yesukon kɨŋek monji sot aŋ palɨ kɨmot do agɨt uŋun aŋmɨlɨp asak do bɨsit tebai iyɨgɨt.
Mani Solomon da uŋun yut awalgɨt.
Amɨn mibɨltok kɨwit ae buŋon yolgwit kɨsi da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Osana! Piŋkop aŋkɨsino! ‘Piŋkop dakon gɨsamɨ toŋ amɨn uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ da manon abɨsak.’
Yaŋakwan papia uŋun kɨsirɨkon naŋ abɨdaŋek nagɨm. Naŋek gen kaganokon kabaŋ pakbi yombem galagɨni tagɨsi nandagɨm, mani si naŋ mudaŋek butnogwan emat aban nandagɨm.
Wigat, ji wɨtdal kɨni. Yoma kalɨpmɨ, ji madepsi pɨsoni. Aŋakwa Kɨla Amɨn Madep tɨlɨmɨ toŋsi da wɨgɨsak.
Yawe da kɨla amɨni pabɨŋ yopban mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ ae kosit mɨnikon ɨsal yumgɨn akwaŋ.
Ji amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomni, nido uŋun aŋpak da aŋpak morap yapmaŋ mudosok. Ae uŋun da aŋpak tagɨsi morap kɨsi joŋɨkban pi kaloŋɨ aŋ.
Yawe uŋun Piŋkop. Uŋun da teŋteŋɨ nimɨsak. Kɨndap kɨlɨŋ tɨmɨgek kɨŋ alta aŋgwasɨni.
kalɨp babɨknin Abraham da monji Aisak altakon yɨpmaŋek Piŋkop do paret aban Piŋkop da yo agɨt uŋun kaŋek amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt.
Do pi uŋun aŋ mudoni kaŋ tagɨsi. Kalɨp butji pɨdaŋba pi uŋun ak do galagɨsi nandawit, do abɨsokyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn yo taŋ damaŋ uŋun da arɨpmon tepmɨ aŋ mudoni kaŋ tagɨsi.
Not kabɨ, nak kalɨp ji gat egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon gen dayɨgɨm uŋun Telagɨ Wup yolgaŋ amɨn yoyɨsat uŋun da arɨpmon dɨma dayɨgɨm. Amɨn but kalɨp aŋpak aŋakwa yoyɨsat uŋun da tɨlagon dayɨgɨm. Uŋun bɨsapmon ji Kristo da aŋpagon amɨn monɨŋ da tɨlagon egɨpgwit.
Pakbi ɨlarɨsi da binapmon mɨktɨm wasagɨt. Mɨktɨm dakon mibɨlɨ tap binap yɨpgut.
Yokwi pakpak gat egɨp do dɨmasi nandɨsat. Ae uŋun gat yɨt do dɨmasi galak tosot.
Mani butnikon gelɨ tagɨ dɨma yɨpban kɨgɨt do bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok akgaŋ. Jɨgɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ ae Piŋkop dakon gen dakon uwal apni bɨsapmon nandaŋ gadatni yopba wɨtdal kɨkdaŋ.
Aŋakwa pɨndagek Parisi amɨn da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Pɨndat, paŋdet kabɨgo Sabat bɨsapmon nido gen teban yapmaŋek pi aŋ?”
Nido nak naga da nandak nandagon da dɨma yosot. Dat yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun da iyɨ niaŋ yokeŋ ae niaŋon da yokeŋ do nayɨgɨt uŋun baŋ yosot.
Piŋkop iyɨ dakon tapmɨm nin da buron pi asak, ae uŋun tapmɨm da nin dakon nandak nandak yapmaŋ mudosok. Yo morap Piŋkop da asak do bɨsit iyamaŋ, uŋun tapmɨmni da arɨp dɨmasi.
Nandani, oman monjɨ bo oman monjɨ dɨma mani amɨn kɨnda pi tagɨsi asak kaŋ, Amɨn Tagɨ da yumaŋ nogɨ tagɨsi ɨmdɨsak.
“Iyɨŋban yagɨt, ‘Pi dɨma akeŋ.’ Mani don nandak nandakni kulabɨk aŋek kɨŋ pi agɨt.
Yaŋ iyɨŋban mɨŋat uŋun yutnikon kɨŋ kaŋban gwi koŋni mɨni da tamokon pakban kagɨt.
Iyɨŋban Yesu da yagɨt, “Kɨlɨ op.” Yaŋ yaŋban Pita da bot yɨpmaŋek pɨŋ pakbi kwenon bamaŋek Yesukon kɨgɨt.
Abɨsok mɨŋat amɨnyo nawa gengo kɨrɨŋɨkgaŋ uŋun Yawe gak da kobogɨ yobi dakon bɨsap.
Aŋakwa mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep Yesu kaŋek but galak nandaŋek uŋudon gɨn Yesukon kɨŋek “Gɨldat tagɨ!” yaŋ iyɨwit.
“Mani kɨla amɨn da monji kaŋek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, ‘Amɨn on da egɨ don datni dakon yo morap tɨmɨtdɨsak, do aŋatno kɨmagakwan wain pini nin do aŋawatneŋ.’
Yawe da gen yaŋakwan mal asak.
Nin morap kɨsi 276 yaŋ da tap wakgakon agɨpgumaŋ.
Not kabɨno, nak mibɨ gen kɨnda gat dayɨsat, uŋun yaŋ. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ ji uŋun dogɨn nandani: aŋpak bamɨsi, ae tagɨsi ae kɨlegɨsi, ae aŋpak wagɨl jɨmjɨmɨ mɨnisi, ae yo gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi, ae yo tagɨsi morap, ae aŋpak nomanisi, ae aŋpak tagɨsi morap amɨn da aba pɨndatneŋ do tagɨsi nandamaŋ, ji yo uŋuden dogɨn nandaŋek egɨpni.
Uŋun oman mɨŋat dakon monji uŋun amɨn da monjɨ paŋalaŋ kosiron da altagɨt. Mani mɨŋatsini ɨsal egɨpgut dakon monji uŋun, Piŋkop da yaŋ teban tok aŋakwan altagɨt.
Amɨn kɨnda amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak kaŋ, uŋun teŋteŋɨkon egɨsak. Teŋteŋɨkon agakwan yo kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨma kesalban aŋatjak.
Kɨŋ altaŋban wain pi dakon kɨla amɨn da uŋun pi monjɨ abɨdaŋ aŋagek bamɨ kɨnda dɨma ɨmɨŋek yɨpba kɨgɨt.
“Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn Judia mɨktɨmon egɨpni uŋun pasal kabapgwan tepmɨsi wɨgɨni.
Amɨn kɨnda notni do nandaba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn uŋun amɨn dapdap amɨn kɨnda. Dɨsi nandaŋ, amɨn dapdap amɨn uŋun egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni dɨma tɨmɨkgaŋ.
Nin Kristo wasaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgumaŋ bɨsapmon gen kɨlɨ nandagɨmaŋ uŋun yaŋ: Nin kaloŋ kaloŋ paŋmuwukbi notnin do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ yomɨŋ aneŋ.
Nit kaloŋɨ ekwamak yaŋ gɨn uŋun amɨn kaloŋɨsi egɨpni, yaŋ do tɨlɨm namgul uŋun kɨlɨ yomgum.
Kaŋakwa yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak ji gat egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon yaŋ kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm: Moses da gen tebanon, ae kombɨ amɨn da genon, ae Kap Papiakon nak do gen mandabi da toŋ uŋun kɨsisi bamɨ altaŋ mudokdaŋ.”
“Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopnin, gak da yo morap galaktokgokon wasagɨl da abɨsok toŋ. Yaŋ agɨl do mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi da gak do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi aŋek mango awɨgɨni, ae tapmɨmgo madepsi da yoŋgamgwan pɨŋbi egɨpni kaŋ tagɨsi.”
Piŋkopno, egɨp egɨpno gagon tosok yaŋsi nandɨsat. Aŋpulugaŋaki mayagɨ dɨma pakeŋ, ae uwalno da abɨŋ nepmaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk dɨma ani.
Do mɨrɨm da gen kagakon noman taŋek tepmɨsi pasɨlgaŋ uŋun da tɨlak tepmɨsi paŋpasɨl agɨt. Uŋun paŋupbal aban pasol pasol madepsi aŋek kɨmakgwit.
Kɨŋ altaŋek wain gat ae pakbi ɨsɨpmɨ kɨnda gat ɨktagɨlek ɨmɨŋba naŋ nandat aŋek nok do kurak tagɨt.
Piŋkop da ji do tagɨsi nandaŋek Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni do bɨkbɨk damgut. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, Kristo dakon man do jɨgɨyo kɨsi pani do nandaban tagɨsi asak.
Aŋakwan nugɨm yokwisi madep uŋun mɨŋat do butjap madepsi nandagɨt, do mɨŋat uŋun dakon monjɨ dɨwarɨ gat emat wam do kɨgɨt. Mɨŋat dakon monji uŋun Piŋkop dakon gen teban morap guramɨk kɨmokgoŋ, ae Yesu dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek Yesu yolgaŋ amɨn uŋun.
Mani nak do amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ nayɨki do nandaŋ amɨn, uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk dakon yaŋ tɨdok aŋek burɨ tagɨsi toni dosi nandɨsat. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ yaŋ yoni, “Yawe uŋun mani wukwisi! Oman amɨni tagɨsi egɨpjak do but galaksi nandɨsak.”
Maŋakwal aŋelo da Pita yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak ɨmalgo paŋek kandap gwɨlgo yopmaŋ.” Iyɨŋban yaŋ gɨn aŋakwan aeni iyɨgɨt, “Ɨmal dubakgo paŋek nak nol.”
Telagɨ Wup da butjikon yo kɨnda ani do kɨndap da yaŋ soŋban kaŋ dɨma abɨ kɨmotjak.
Dagaŋakwan boron yɨkgwit amɨn uŋun Yesu gawak ɨmɨŋek yawit, “Asisi, gak Piŋkop dakon Monji.”
Paŋdetgoni da yol ɨmni do bɨsit tebai yoyɨgɨm, mani aŋtɨdok awit.”
Uŋun do Piŋkop da mɨŋat wɨli kɨlɨ paŋmuwukgɨt, do amɨn da dɨma paŋwasekdo.”
Piŋkop, amɨn da gak aŋkɨsini do nandɨsat. Amɨn morap kɨsi da gak aŋkɨsini dosi nandɨsat.
Yaŋban Yesu da monjɨ bamot yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil gen uŋun yomal dɨma nandaŋ pɨsaŋek yomal. Nak da tepmɨ madep pakdɨsat uŋun tagɨ panjil?” Yaŋban iyɨgɨmal, “Tagɨ pandeŋ.”
Piŋkop da dɨpmɨnon Erot do dɨma tobɨl kɨni do yoyɨŋban nandaŋek kosit ŋwakŋwarɨ naŋ mɨktɨmnikon si kɨwit.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ da yaŋ yoŋ, “Pol da papiakon gen tebai morapmɨ yosok, mani iyɨ abɨŋ nindasak bɨsapmon tapmɨmni mɨni komaŋ, ae gen yogokni uŋun tagɨ dɨma.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ae gen kɨnda babɨk da abɨdawit uŋun ji kɨlɨ nandawit. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn Tagɨ da dabɨlon gen yaŋ paŋteban asal uŋun dɨma yapmaŋek kɨsi guramɨgek abi.’
Yawe, niaŋ egɨpbeŋ do nandɨsal uŋun nolɨki. Kositgo nolɨki.
Asisi, bɨt madepsi kamel uŋun da ɨmal bupbup da kosit gwagagon arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨgɨgɨ asak. Mani uŋun yapmaŋek yoni morapmɨ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun da kagagwan arɨpmɨ dɨmasi pɨgɨgɨ asak.”
Yaŋ yaŋek aeni tobɨl kɨŋ bɨsit yaŋ agɨt, “Datno, jɨgɨ pakeŋdosi nandɨsal kaŋ, tagɨ pakeŋ.”
Pol da gen kokwin amɨn kabɨ dɨ uŋun Sadyusi amɨn ae dɨ Parisi amɨn yaŋ nandaŋ yomgut. Do gen papmon da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Not kabɨ, nak Parisi amɨn kɨnda. Datno kɨsi uŋun Parisi amɨn kɨnda. Nak amɨn kɨmakbi da kɨmoron da don pɨdokdaŋ uŋun do nandaŋ teban taŋek egɨsat. Yaŋ nandɨsat do aŋek gen pikon nepmaŋ.”
Yaŋban emat amɨn da bot monɨŋɨ aŋteban awit nap uŋun mandaŋ dagaŋban tap da aŋaŋ kɨgɨt.
Ae amɨn morapmɨ koŋni toŋ uŋun yol yomgut. Yolakwan koŋ da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Gak Piŋkop dakon Monji.” Yesu uŋun Kristo yaŋ nandaŋ ɨmgwit, do Yesu da koŋ gen dɨmasi yoni do kɨrɨŋɨk yomgut.
Ji yokwi morapmɨ aŋ, mani yo tagɨsi monjɨsi do yom do nandaŋ. Do yaŋsi nandani. Bɨsit iyɨŋba Datji Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun da but galagon da yo tagɨsi damdɨsak.
Piŋkop da yaŋ yosok: “Nak ji paŋpulugokeŋ bɨsap yɨpgumon bɨsitji nandagɨm. Ae yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt gɨldaron ji paŋpulugagɨm.” Nandani. Abɨsok Piŋkop da nin paŋpulugosak dakon bɨsap. Abɨsok nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak dakon gɨldat.
Pi uŋun sigɨn taŋ aŋaŋ kɨŋakwan wɨgɨ nin morap kɨsi but kaloŋsi egek nandaŋ gadat bamɨsi aŋek Piŋkop dakon Monji pakyaŋsi nandaŋ ɨmneŋ. Yaŋ aŋapno paŋmuwukbi egɨp egɨpnin teban taŋakwan Kristo iyɨ dakon aŋpak tagɨsi, uŋun dakon tɨlak abɨdoneŋ.
Uŋun amɨn bamot da yaŋ tɨdaŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Piŋkop dakon Monji, niaŋsi aŋnim do abɨsal? Tepmɨ yomyom bɨsap dɨma noman taŋakwan tepmɨ pi nimdɨsal?”
Israel amɨn da gen morapni gat ae gen teban morapni guramɨk kɨmotni do yaŋ agɨt. Yawe dakon man awɨgɨni!
Tɨmɨkba pakgɨmaŋ da wɨsa dagokdo Pol nin gat kɨsi Jems kok do kɨgɨmaŋ. Kɨŋ altaŋek paŋmuwukbi dakon kɨla amɨn kɨsi morap uŋudon gɨn Jems gat ekwa pɨndakgɨmaŋ.
Juda amɨn nin da mibɨltok butnin Kristokon yɨpmaŋek yolgɨmaŋ. Ae nin da bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Piŋkop dakon tɨlɨm madepni do nandaŋek mani aŋkɨsineŋ do nin manjɨgɨt.
Ji bɨsit yaŋ ani: ‘Datnin Kwen Kokup egɨsal, gak dakon man telagɨ tosak.
Bumjotni dukwan tosok yaŋ nandaŋek but morap aŋek egakwa uŋudon gɨn amɨn bamorɨ kapmatjok altaŋek akbal pɨndakgwit. Uŋun dakon ɨmalni da mal dakon teŋteŋɨ yombem madepsi teŋteŋawit.
Mani mɨŋat uŋun monjɨ tagɨ paŋalani. Yaŋ aŋek nandaŋ gadat aŋek amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek ae telagɨ egek aŋpak tagɨsi aŋek egɨpni. Uŋun aŋpak morap yɨpmaŋ derɨ mɨni ani kaŋ, Piŋkop da yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtdɨsak.
Nido, meŋ da aŋalaŋban gɨldat 8 yaŋ mudaŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn da gɨptɨmno mandawit. Nak Israel amɨn kɨnda, Benjamin da kabɨkon nani. Nak Ibru amɨnsi kɨnda, nak Ibru amɨn dakon yawi dɨwatsi. Nak Parisi kabɨkon nani kɨnda, nak gen teban morap guramɨk kɨmokdot.
Ji amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ kɨmotni, topmon da dɨma ani. Ji aŋpak yokwi do nandaba yokwisi asak. Aŋek aŋpak tagɨ baŋ pabɨdaŋ kɨmotni.
Piŋkop uŋun pasɨkno. Butni kɨlegɨsi amɨn yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkdak.
Amɨn kɨnda nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨŋek telagɨ pakbi sosak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Kwen Kokup do amɨn asak. Ae amɨn kɨnda nak dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Tɨpdom do amɨn asak.
Yesu yutnon wɨgakwan amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni bamot uŋudon wɨŋbal yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak da dabɨljil paŋmɨlɨp abeŋ do nandaŋ gadaŋ namamal bo dɨma?” Yaŋban iyɨgɨmal, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nandaŋ gadaŋ gamamak.”
Pakbi yɨpmaŋek wɨŋakwal uŋudon gɨn Amɨn Tagɨ dakon Wup da Pilip aŋaŋ kɨgɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan amɨn madep uŋun saŋbeŋek Pilip dɨma kagɨt. Mɨni kagɨt mani amɨn uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek aeni tamonikon pawɨŋ yɨgek kɨgɨt.
Nak Yawe da aŋpulugosak do tebaisi yaŋ tɨdosot. Bupmɨ nandaŋ namɨŋek aŋpulugosak do bɨsit asat.
Gak Kɨla Amɨn Madepno ae Piŋkopno. Gak da yaŋaki Jekop dakon amɨn kabɨ da emaron teban toŋ.
Yaŋ aŋakwa aŋelo da mɨŋat bamot yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil dɨma pasoljil. Yesu tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakbi naŋ wusɨk do abamal yaŋ nandɨsat.
Yawe uŋun gak da ɨleŋonjok egek kɨlago aŋek gak aŋyoŋgam asak.
Uwalnin da gak dakon telagɨ yutgo dakon yo morap kɨlɨ paŋtasɨk awit. Abɨŋek yo morap paŋtasɨk awit uŋun pɨndakgi.
Piŋkop da Jekop do geni yomgut. Israel dakon babɨni da guramɨtni do yomgut. Kalɨpsigwan babɨknin yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji monjɨ gwayosi nak dakon gen teban morapno pakyaŋsi yoyɨŋdetni.”
“Yaŋ yaŋban ji da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨkdaŋ, ‘Nin gak gat kɨsi egek jap pakbiyo agɨmaŋ. Ae kokup papnin dakon kosit madepmon agek niyɨŋ dekgɨl.’
Mani nak Amɨn Tagɨ da galak tosagon jikon tepmɨsi opdɨsat. Opbeŋ bɨsapmon kwen wɨgɨk aŋ amɨn dakon gen nandak do aŋek dɨma opdɨsat. Ni tapmɨm da taŋ yomɨsak uŋun pɨndak nandaŋyo ak do opdɨsat.
Uŋun amɨn yo yokwi ak do gen paŋkosit aŋ. Ae amɨn da notni yo yokwi aŋyomni do amɨn do tomni yomaŋ.
Josep gat Nikodemus gat da Yesu dakon bumjotni abɨdaŋek yo kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi uŋun tagal ɨmgumal. Yaŋ aŋek ɨmal tagɨsi baŋ gwɨlɨkgɨmal. Uŋun Juda amɨn da aŋpagon amɨn kɨmakbi do yaŋ aŋ.
ae Ase da kabɨkon 12 tausen ae Naptali da kabɨkon 12 tausen ae Manase da kabɨkon 12 tausen
Nak amɨn dakon nandak nandak yolek gen on dɨma yosot. Gen teban yo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn yosok.
Aŋek amɨn bamot yoyɨŋba gen kokwin tamo yɨpmaŋek waŋga pɨgɨgɨmal. Pɨgakwal yaŋba yok aŋek yaŋ yawit,
Yesu Betani kokupmon altaŋek Lasarus uŋun kɨlɨ kɨmakgɨt da gɨldat 4 kabɨ kɨmakbi tamogwan tosok yaŋ nandagɨt.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn tagɨni da uŋun oman monjɨ iyɨŋban yo morapni kɨla akdɨsak.
Gak egɨp egɨp dakon mibɨlɨsi. Gak gaga teŋteŋɨ amisi, do teŋteŋɨgokon yo morap tagɨsi pɨndakgamaŋ.
Amɨn yokwi kɨnda manjɨkbɨ uŋun da uwalno tagɨ abɨŋ yɨpjak. Iyɨ dakon uwalni kɨnda da gen tagɨ yaŋ ɨmjak.
“Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat ae Parisi amɨn gat da kalɨp Moses da man madepni gat yɨgek gen teban yoyɨŋ dekgɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn dayɨŋ dekgaŋ.
Aŋpak yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ aŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ paŋupbal awit, do yokwi awit dakon kobogɨ yokwisi tɨmɨtdaŋ. Gɨldaron jap morapmɨsi ae pakbi teban noknok do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk bamɨsi dakon aŋpak uŋun yaŋsi nandaŋ. Ji gat kɨsi jap noŋ, aŋek yaŋ aba ji garakji toŋ dagaŋakwa man binji tagɨ uŋun paŋupbal aŋ. Mani aŋpak toptopmɨ uŋun aŋ uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋ.
Aŋpak morap asal uŋun nandaŋ mudosot. Gak amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsal, ae nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨsal, ae amɨn dɨwarɨ paŋpulugok do pi asal. Nak nandɨsat, pi mibɨltok agɨl uŋun yapmaŋek abɨsok pi madepsi asal.
“Yaŋdo, nak yaŋ dayɨsat: Ji Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨŋba tagɨ damdɨsak, ae wɨsɨŋek bamɨ kokdaŋ, ae yoma domon tɨdaŋba wɨtdal damdɨsak.
Gak da nin dakon yokwi morap kɨsi pɨndak mudosol. Yokwi morap pasɨlɨ amaŋ, uŋun gak da nomansi yopmaŋek pɨndak mudosol.
“Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ amɨn jobɨt yomɨŋek paŋtasɨk ak do gen yoŋ.”
Yaŋsi ani, nido Piŋkop gen papia da yaŋ yosok. “Ji bulmakau wit gɨp golek do bamaŋ mɨsɨŋɨkgaŋ bɨsapmon jap noni do gen kagani dɨma sopni.” Ae kɨnda yaŋ yosok: “Pi amɨn yumaŋ nogɨni arɨpmɨ tagɨ tɨmɨtjak.”
Ae egɨp egɨp kalugɨ egɨpdamaŋ do yomaŋ uŋun aŋelo da kɨla ani do Piŋkop da dɨma yaŋ mudaŋ yomgut.
Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn morapmɨ da paŋdet kabɨkon saŋbeŋba paŋdet morapmɨsi awit. Aŋakwa uŋun kabɨkon da amɨn dɨwarɨ Grik gen yawit uŋun da Aram gen yawit amɨn uŋun do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Ji gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ bupmɨ amɨn do jap yomɨŋek sakwabat ninon ekwaŋ uŋun do jap dɨma yomaŋ. Uŋun tagɨ dɨma.”
Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn morap mɨktɨmon altoŋ uŋun Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn da yapmaŋ mudosok. Mani amɨn morap Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan pɨŋbisi ekwaŋ uŋun da Jon yapmaŋgaŋ.
Not kabɨno nandani. Mɨktɨm amɨn da dabɨlon yoni mɨni ekwaŋ amɨn, uŋun baŋgɨn Piŋkop da nandaŋ gadat madepsi tugaŋ yomɨŋakwan egɨpni do kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt. Kalɨp yaŋ teban tok yaŋ agɨt, amɨn but dasi galak taŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun yopban iyɨ amɨn kɨla asak da kagagwan egɨpdaŋ, do yoni mɨni amɨn iyɨ amɨn kɨla asak da kagagwan egɨpni do kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt.
Nido Gen Bin Tagɨsi wasaŋek nandawit gɨldaron da wɨŋ abɨsok ekwamaŋon ji da nak aŋpulugaŋba Gen Bin Tagɨsi uŋun dakon yaŋ teŋteŋok pi amaŋ.
Yoyɨŋakwan Parisi amɨn dɨwarɨ da abɨŋ Yesu gen yokwi kɨnda yaŋban kaŋek gen pikon yɨpneŋ yaŋ nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gen tebanin da amɨn kɨnda mɨŋatni tagɨ kwɨnɨtjak do yosok bo dɨma?”
Abraham yaŋ agɨt nido nandaŋ gadat aŋek kokup pap toktogɨsi uŋudon don egɨpbeŋ yaŋ nandagɨt. Piŋkop da kokup pap uŋun niaŋ wasogɨ uŋun iyɨ nandaŋ mudaŋek wasagɨt.
Pol yaŋ yaŋban kɨla amɨn madep, ae gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn madep, ae Benaisi, ae amɨn dɨwarɨ amɨn madep gat yɨkgwit uŋun kɨsi pɨdaŋ akgwit.
Yesu dakon bumjotni dɨma taŋban kaŋek tobɨl abɨŋ yaŋ niyɨmal, ‘Nin kɨŋ dɨpmɨn yombem kɨnda kaŋapno aŋelo da yaŋ niyeŋ “Uŋun kalugɨ egɨsak.” ’
“Yesu, Nasaret amɨn, gak nibaŋ aŋnim do nandɨsal? Nin paŋupbal ak do abɨl? Nak nandaŋ gamɨsat, gak Piŋkop Dakon Telagɨ Amɨni.”
On amɨn da Telagɨ Yut Madep aŋupbal aban telagɨ dɨma tosak do pini aŋakwan abɨdagɨmaŋ. Do gak da gaga iyɨŋaki gen morap yaŋ ɨmamaŋ uŋun bamɨ yomaŋ yaŋ iyɨ yaŋakwan nandaki.”
Ae amɨn morapmɨsi da yaŋ, gen yaŋba nandagɨm. Wuwɨkni uŋun pakbi madepsi pokdok uŋun dakon wuwɨk yombem. Ae uŋun kɨrɨrɨŋ da yaŋ madepsi yawit. Uŋun da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Piŋkop aŋkɨsino! Amɨn Tagɨnin Piŋkop Tapmɨm Ami kɨla amɨn madep egek pini asak.
Meŋ datyo da manji namjil kaŋ, Yawe da kɨlano sigɨn akdɨsak.
Amɨn Tagɨ iyɨ dakon gen dayamaŋ uŋun yaŋ: Amɨn Tagɨ tobɨl apjak bɨsapmon nin kalugɨ ekwamaŋ amɨn da amɨn kɨmakbi mibɨl taŋ yomɨŋek dɨma kɨkdamaŋ.
Yaŋdo, not kabɨ, Yesu dakon yawini da yokwinin kɨlɨ wɨrɨrɨk mudagɨt, do nin pasol pasolɨ mɨni Yut Burɨ Telagɨsi uŋungwan tagɨ wɨgɨneŋ.
Dɨsi do kɨla tebai aŋek nandaŋ gadaron tebai atni. Tebaisi agek yo kɨnda do pasol pasol dɨma ani.
Dewit uŋun Jesi dakon monji. Jesi uŋun Obet dakon monji. Obet uŋun Boas dakon monji. Boas uŋun Salmon dakon monji. Salmon uŋun Nason dakon monji.
Yaŋban gen kobogɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma iyɨgɨ yaŋ kawit.
Yawe, gak tɨp madepno, bɨsitno nandaŋek aŋpuluga. Dɨma aŋpulugoki kaŋ, nak amɨn kɨmakbi da tɨlak egɨpbeŋ.
Uŋun yutnon amɨn morapmɨ da mɨŋatjok do bupmɨ nandaŋek kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋek egɨpgwit. Aŋakwa Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kunam yopgut. Dɨma kuŋwak, ɨsal dɨpmɨn pokdok.”
Nak dakon man abɨŋ yɨp do aŋek ji tɨmɨk paŋpaŋ gapmanon ae kɨla amɨn madepmon paŋkɨkdaŋ. Paŋkwa kɨla amɨn madepmon ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon nak dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋoni.
Yaŋba Yesu da yagɨt, “Yo amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma agagɨ, uŋun Piŋkop da arɨpmɨ tagɨ asak.”
Piŋkop iyɨ da telagɨ yutnon tapmɨmɨ toŋsi yɨkdak, do pasal ɨmɨŋ kɨmotneŋ. Israel amɨn dakon Piŋkop mɨŋat amɨni do tapmɨm madepni yomɨsak. Piŋkop aŋkɨsino!
Uŋun da yaŋ dayɨwit, “Mibɨ gɨldaron jɨgɨlak gen yogok amɨn noman tokdaŋ. Aŋek Piŋkop manji ɨmɨŋek iyɨ dakon galaktok yokwi yoldaŋ.”
Ji nak nolgaŋ do aŋek yokwi aŋdamdaŋ, nido Dat nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda amɨn monɨŋ da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun abɨdoŋ uŋun da tɨlak dɨma abɨdoni kaŋ, uŋungwan arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨgɨkdaŋ.”
Disi jap morap kɨsi tagɨ noknogɨ yaŋ nandaŋ, mani uŋun amɨn yaŋ dɨma nandɨsak. Nak jap morap kɨsi tagɨ noknogɨ yaŋ nandɨsat. Do nido amɨn kɨnda da jap uŋun noneŋ kaŋ uŋun suŋ amaŋ yaŋ nandaŋakwan jap uŋun yopbeŋ?
Muwut muwut tamokon amɨn da nak do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ. Ae pakbi teban naŋek but upbal aŋ amɨn da abɨŋ nep do kap yoŋ.
Bɨsit aban dagaŋban abɨŋ pɨndakban paŋdetni dɨpmɨn do yokwisi aŋek aeni dɨpmɨn sigɨn pakgwit.
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Joŋ pɨŋan uŋun mɨktɨmgwan yutni toŋ. Ae mɨnam kwen akwaŋ uŋun yutni toŋ. Mani Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun dɨpmɨn potpot tamoni mɨni.”
Gen yosot uŋun ji da dɨma nandaba pɨsosok. Nido geno abɨdok do dɨma nandaŋ.
Gɨldatno tagɨ Maria do ɨmni. Uŋun da ji paŋpulugok do pi madepsi morapmɨ agɨt.
Mani ji tagɨsi ekwaŋ amɨn do nandaba yokwi tok aŋ kaŋ, ae bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ ji dɨsi dakon man pawɨgɨk do kosit wusɨk aŋ kaŋ, nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi gat ae nandak nandakji tagɨsi gat do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk dɨma ani. Top aŋakwa aŋpakji da gen bamɨ dɨ abɨŋ yɨpban.
Yaŋban koŋ da madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek monjɨ uŋun maban bumjot yombem pagakwan koŋ yɨpmaŋek wɨŋ kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da monjɨ kaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Kuŋwakni.”
Yaŋ aŋek Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da Piŋkop dakon bupmɨni do nandaŋek mani aŋkɨsini do nandagɨt. Piŋkop gen papia da uŋun do yaŋ yosok: “Yaŋdo, nak Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon mango yaŋ aŋkɨsikeŋ. Aŋek gak dakon man awɨgɨk do kap yokeŋ.”
“Yaŋ yaŋban kɨlegɨ kabɨ da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨni, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ, ni bɨsapmon jap do abɨ gandaŋek jap gamgumaŋ, ae ni bɨsapmon pakbi do asal yaŋ gandaŋek pakbi gamgumaŋ?
Gak oman amɨn yoyɨŋbɨ madepni dakon pɨŋbini egek pi tagɨsi madepni da galak tosak uŋun baŋ ani. Aŋek madepni da gen yoyɨŋba kobogɨ do gen yokwi dɨma yoyɨni,
Bɨlagɨ bɨlagɨ Yapyap Bɨlak bɨsapmon wasok kɨnda yaŋ awit: Juda mɨŋat amɨnyo da dam tebanon yɨkdak amɨn kɨnda dakon man yaŋakwa, Pailat da yopban kɨŋ kɨŋ awit.
Nak Onesiporus dakon gwakni Amɨn Tagɨ da bupmɨ nandaŋ yomjak dosi nandɨsat. Bɨsap morapmɨ Onesiporus da nak dakon but aŋteban aban butno tagɨsisi agɨt. Ae dam tebanon yɨkgɨm uŋun do mayagɨ dɨma pagɨt.
Banabas uŋun Jon mani kɨnda Mak uŋun kɨsi abɨdaŋbal agɨpni do nandagɨt.
Piŋkop da ji kɨlɨ yaŋ damgut, uŋun telagɨ, do yo morap anikon jiyo kɨsi telagɨ egɨpni.
jikon da kɨnda da yaŋ iyɨsak, “Butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan paŋkɨ ŋaŋalɨ egɨpbi, ae kɨŋ jap naŋek butgo tugosak”, mani ɨmal bo jap dɨma ɨmɨsak. Ɨsal gen gɨn iyɨk uŋun da niaŋ aŋpulugosak?
Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨsak mɨŋat kɨnda da yutgwan mɨŋat dɨwarɨ sakwabat ekwaŋ kaŋ, mɨŋat uŋun da iyɨ kɨlani asak. Yaŋ aŋakwan paŋmuwukbi mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨwarɨ da kɨlani ak do jɨgɨ dɨma pani, ae sakwabat morap paŋpulugokni mɨnisi ekwaŋ uŋun baŋ kɨlani tagɨ ani.
Nak abɨsok ji gat dɨma ekwamaŋ. Nak ji gat kɨsi ekwamaŋ tam, gen tagɨsok dɨ tagɨ dayɨkom. Nak ji do nandaba kɨk asat. Niaŋon da ji paŋpulugokeŋ uŋun dɨma nandɨsat.
Japno tagɨsi uwalno da dabɨlon nomansi paŋnoman asal. Yutgokon but galagon da abɨdaŋek bɨt nelak busuŋnokon tagaldal. Yo galagɨ ɨreŋɨsi ɨdawukbɨ ɨdapno si tugosok.
Yaŋba Pol da yoyɨgɨt, “Not kabɨ, Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Ji kɨla amɨnji kɨnda do yaŋba yokwi tok dɨma ani.’ On amɨn uŋun mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn yaŋ dɨma koko pɨsak.”
Amɨn wup uŋun da tebaisi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn Tagɨ Tapmɨm Ami, gak telagɨsi egɨsal, ae aŋpakgo wagɨl bamɨsi gɨn. Nin bɨsap niaŋdasi gak do jomjom aŋapno mɨktɨm amɨn gen pikon yopmaŋek yawinin dakon kobogɨ yobi?”
Yaŋban Pailat da yagɨt, “Nak Juda amɨn kɨnda dɨma! Gaga dakon amɨn kabɨgo gat ae mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨgo gat da gak abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ nagon aŋobeŋ. Gak ninaŋ agɨl?”
Pailat da Yesu tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋatni do emat amɨn da kɨsiron yɨpban abɨdaŋ aŋkɨwit.
Wɨsawɨsa do mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ ae kɨla amɨn ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae gen kokwin amɨn kabɨ morap gat da muwugek gen kɨnda aŋteban awit. Aŋek Yesu nap teban naŋ wamaŋ ɨlɨk aŋaŋ Pailat da kɨsiron aŋkɨ yɨpgwit.
Amɨn do butjap madepsi nandaŋek kobogɨ yokwisi yomdamal dakon gɨldat madep kɨlɨ uŋun abɨk. Namɨn amɨn dasi tapmɨmni uŋun abɨŋ yɨpmaŋek tagɨ egɨpjak?”
Kɨŋ Sisaria kokup papmon altaŋek uŋudon da Jerusalem wɨgɨ paŋmuwukbi gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ yoyɨŋek Antiok kokup papmon pɨgɨgɨt.
wain kɨnam kɨnda kapmatjok tagɨt. Do yo kɨnda gugɨdan yombem abɨdaŋ wainon sɨbɨŋba tugaŋban, isop kɨndap dakon kɨlɨŋɨkon walɨk yɨpba Yesu da dulumon wɨgɨgɨt.
Yaŋ aŋaki Datgo yo pasɨlɨ pɨndakdak uŋun da kobogɨ do yo tagɨ gamdɨsak.”
Kwen tebai sɨŋtaŋakwa uŋudon gɨn amɨn bamorɨ ɨmalni kwakwagɨ uŋun da altaŋbal yabekbi kabɨ gat akgwit.
Gen teban uŋun amɨn kɨlegɨ do dɨma tosok. Uŋun gen teban pabɨŋ yopmaŋgaŋ amɨn, ae kwen wɨgɨk aŋ amɨn uŋun do tosok. Uŋun Piŋkop manji ɨmɨŋek yokwi aŋ amɨn, ae Piŋkop gawak ɨm do dɨma galak taŋek Piŋkop dakon yo do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ amɨn do tosok. Gen teban uŋun amɨn meŋ datni gat ae amɨn dɨwarɨ gat dapba kɨmokgoŋ amɨn do tosok.
Mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon egek dɨ da Moses gat Aron Yawe dakon mukwa sogok amɨni telagɨ gat do nandaba yokwi tok aŋ yomgwit. Aŋek Piŋkop da nin do tapmɨm yaŋgɨn nimɨsak tam tagɨ yaŋ nandawit.
Jon dakon paŋdetni da Yesu da yo morap agɨt dakon geni Jon iyɨwit.
Mal yɨpbɨ noman taŋek uwal yolban kɨŋ mudoni. Gobɨŋgo yamaŋaki pasal kɨŋ mudoni.
Yaŋba Pol da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jon da amɨn telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomgut uŋun but tobɨl aŋek telagɨ pakbi soni do agɨt. Jon da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Amɨn kɨnda nak da buŋon noldak uŋun amɨn naŋ nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni.’ Jon da gen yagɨt uŋun Yesu do yagɨt.”
Dewit iyɨ Kwen Kokup dɨma wɨgɨgɨt mani yaŋ yagɨt: ‘Amɨn Tagɨ da nak dakon Amɨn Tagɨno yaŋ iyɨsak, Gak nak da amɨnsi tet do yɨgaki
Uŋun da mibɨlno nandaŋek uŋudon gɨn geno guramɨkgaŋ. Mɨktɨm dubagɨkon amɨn da nak do pasalek abɨŋ ŋwakbeŋ aŋ namaŋ.
nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgɨt. Nin da nin aŋpak kɨlegɨ kɨnda agɨmaŋ do aŋek nin yokwikon baŋ dɨma tɨmɨkgɨt. Iyɨ dakon bupmɨ do aŋek yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgɨt. Nin sugaŋban monjɨ ŋakŋak kalugɨ yombem aŋapno Telagɨ Wup da egɨp egɨp kalugɨ nimgut.
Erot da gen uŋun nandaŋek Israel amɨn dakon mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat yaŋ yoban abɨŋ muwukgwit. Muwukba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kristo ni kokupmon altosak do yaŋbi?”
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn morap on pakbi naŋek ae pakbi do akdaŋ.
Aŋelo gen uŋun iyɨŋek kɨŋakwan Konilias da oman monjɨni bamorɨ ae emat amɨni kɨnda gat yaŋ yoban opgwit. Emat amɨni uŋun Piŋkop do pasal gawak ɨmɨm amɨn kɨnda. Uŋun bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Konilias aŋpulugaŋban egɨpgumal.
Amɨn da Jems, Pita ae Jon uŋun paŋmuwukbi dakon kɨla amɨn yaŋ pɨndakgwit. Uŋun kɨla amɨn da Piŋkop da nandaŋ yawotni do aŋek pi uŋun namgut uŋun nandaŋek Banabas gat nit dakon kɨsit ɨlɨgek notninsi yaŋon da nit tɨmɨkgwit. Aŋek nit Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon pi aŋapdo uŋun da Juda amɨn nandaŋ gadat dɨma abi kabɨkon pi ani do but kaloŋ agɨmaŋ.
Mani don Pilip da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi gat ae Yesu Kristo dakon man yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan mɨŋat wɨliyo kɨsi uŋun do nandaŋ gadaŋek telagɨ pakbi sowit.
Ae ji uŋun da Piŋkop do yaŋba yokwi tok awit uŋudeŋ dɨma ani. Yaŋ aba kɨmot yomyom aŋelo da abɨŋ dapban kɨmakgwit.
Piŋkop dakon galaktok yolakwa ɨsal dogɨn tepmɨ daba tepmɨ uŋun tagɨ pamaŋ yaŋ nandani kaŋ, Piŋkop da uŋun do tagɨsi nandakdɨsak.
Saimon Pita gat ae paŋdet kɨnda gat Yesu yol aŋaŋ kɨgɨmal. Mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da uŋun paŋdet nandaŋ ɨmgut, do Yesu yol aŋaŋ mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da nagalon pɨgɨgɨt.
Nin da Judas gat Sailas gat gen on mandamaŋ uŋun naŋ gɨn dayɨnjil do yabekgamaŋ.
Gobɨŋgo uŋun kɨsɨgɨsi do uwalgo wamɨ gamikon obɨsi sugaŋ yomɨsak. Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ pabɨŋ yopmaŋaki gak da kandap mibɨlgogwan ekwaŋ.
Mɨŋat ji amɨn da dandaba tagɨsi ani yaŋ do busuŋji dɨma paŋtɨlɨm ani, ae gɨptɨmji gol baŋ dɨma paŋtɨlɨm ani, ae ɨmal tagɨsi baŋ dɨma pani.
Yaŋ yaŋakwan Juda amɨn kɨsi da Tetulus dakon gen joŋɨgek yaŋ yawit, “Gen morap yosok uŋun bamɨsi yosok.”
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban Juda amɨn dɨwarɨ da Pol gat Sailas gat dakon gen nandaŋek nandaŋ gadat aŋek amɨn bamoron saŋbewit. Aŋakwa Grik amɨn morapmɨ Piŋkop gawak ɨmgwit amɨn ae kɨla amɨn mɨŋat morapmɨ kɨsi amɨn bamot yolgwit.
Aŋakwan don paŋdetni iyɨ gɨn obɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin nido koŋ uŋun yol do aŋtɨdok amaŋ?”
Yaŋba aŋtobɨlek yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da kombɨ amɨn Aisaia dakon nandak nandakni aŋtagap aban jamba but amɨn ji do gen yaŋ mandagɨt: ‘Uŋun amɨn kabɨ gen kaga dagɨn nak man madep namaŋ, mani but dasi nak dɨma nandaŋ namaŋ.
Yo uŋun Yawe da asak uŋun papiakon mandano babɨ kabɨ don altoni da Yawe da pi uŋun agɨt dakon gen nandaŋek mani awɨgɨni.
Kristo da paŋmuwukbi do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek paŋpulugok do iyɨ dakon egɨp egɨpni parekgɨt, yaŋ gɨn wɨli ji mɨŋatji but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ kɨmotni.
Yawe, gak Idom amɨn da kalɨp Babilon dakon emat amɨn joŋɨkgwit uŋun do aego nandaki. Babilon amɨn da emat wamaŋek Jerusalem abɨdawit bɨsapmon Idom amɨn da gen yaŋ yawit, “Yut morapni kɨsi tuwɨl mudaŋek paŋupbal aŋ mudoni.”
Uŋun bɨsapmon meŋi padɨk padɨkyo Yesu kok do opgwit. Mani amɨn morapmɨ, do Yesu da kapmatjok kɨk do aŋtɨdok awit.
Yesu da uŋun amɨn kaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn 10 kabɨ kɨsi gɨptɨmni kɨlek taŋ, ma? Mani 9 kabɨ uŋun dukwan ekwaŋ?
Yawe apjak dakon kosit yul ɨm do kaŋ, amɨn da aŋpak kɨlegɨ aba kaŋek uŋudon tagɨ apjak.
Gak dasi mɨktɨm morap dakon wasɨpni yopgul. Ae bɨlagɨ bɨlagɨ dakon gɨldat ae sɨkak bɨsap yopgul.
Do jiyo kɨsi nak gat but galak nandaŋek egɨpneŋ.
Piŋkop da dabɨlon amɨn kɨnda da iyɨ dakon man arɨpmɨ dɨma awɨgɨsak yaŋ do yaŋ agɨt.
Nak Datno da manon apbo ji da nak dɨma abɨdoŋ. Mani amɨn kɨnda da iyɨ da manon apjak kaŋ, ji tagɨsi abɨdoni.
Uwal da jɨgɨlak yaŋ namaŋ. Kokup ɨsalno da nak do nandaba yokwitok aŋ namaŋ. Aŋakwa notnoni da nak do pasol pasol madepsi aŋ. Kosiron agapbo nak nandaŋ amɨn uŋun pasal si kwaŋ.
Nin mɨktɨmon ekwamaŋ, mani mɨktɨm amɨn da emat aŋ uŋudeŋ dɨma amaŋ.
Uŋun amɨn da mɨleŋ asɨp madepsi sogɨt uŋun aba kɨmakgɨt. Ae emat agak sɨba paŋpekwolakwa dɨma dapgwit. Uŋun amɨn tapmɨmni mɨni, mani don tapmɨm pawit. Uŋun emat amɨn tebaisi dagaŋek mɨktɨm ŋwakŋwarɨ dakon emat amɨn kabɨni yolba pasal kɨwit.
yaŋ iyɨwit, “Kristo gak namɨn da gɨkdak? Kombɨ gen ya!”
Piŋkop da jap kwaokdak amɨn do jap yet ɨmɨsak, ae jap ɨban nosok. Uŋudeŋ gɨn Piŋkop da yo morapmɨ daban arɨpmɨsi akdaŋ. Ae amɨn da pigaga jap yet kwaogek don bamɨ morapmɨsi toŋ uŋun da tɨlak aŋpakji kɨlegɨ da morapmɨsi tokdaŋ.
Yesu da Lasarus kɨmakbi tamokon naŋ yaŋ ɨban pɨdagɨt bɨsapmon amɨn morapmɨ da kaŋek kɨŋ gen bini yaŋba ɨreŋ tagɨt.
Amɨn bamot donki bɨlagɨ uŋun aŋobɨŋek ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk dubakni donki kwenon yopmaŋek Yesu yɨpba uŋun kwenon yɨkgɨt.
Altaŋ gɨldatni 8 mudaŋakwan gɨptɨmni mandak do apgwit. Abɨŋek datni Sekaraia dakon man naŋ iyɨk do nandawit,
Yaŋ yaŋban binap gen kɨnda paŋmuwukbi kabɨkon kɨŋ ɨreŋ tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Uŋun paŋdet dɨma kɨmotdɨsak.” Mani Yesu da paŋdet uŋun dɨma kɨmotjak yaŋ dɨma yagɨt. “Egakwan gɨn nak aeno tobɨl apbeŋ do nandakeŋ bo dɨma, uŋun nak dakon yo”, uŋun gɨn yagɨt.
Yawe ya yaŋ iyɨŋek kap yaŋ ɨmno. Gita tɨdaŋek Piŋkopnin aŋkɨsino.
Iyɨŋban emat amɨn 100 dakon kɨla amɨn da yaŋ yagɨt, “Asi kuŋwak.” Yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek Josep da bumjot aŋkɨsak do yaŋ mudaŋ ɨmgut.
