Mibɨlɨ nido Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ nandaŋ gadat awit uŋun da Juda amɨn dakon aŋpak yol kɨmotnidosi nandɨsal?”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yo jɨgɨ dakon bɨsap mudaŋakwan, ‘Gɨldat dabɨl pɨlɨn tuk akdɨsak, ae kanek dɨma teŋteŋokdɨsak. Ae gɨk kundu yɨpmaŋek mokdaŋ. Aŋakwa kwen kundukon yo tebai toŋ uŋun da kwakwalɨtdaŋ.’
Ji yokwi dakon oman amɨn egɨpgwit, mani Piŋkop da yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨgek aŋpak kɨlegɨ dakon oman amɨn depgut da ekwaŋ.
Amɨn da jap galagɨsi nelagɨ toŋ naŋek arɨpmɨ aŋ uŋudeŋ wupno galagɨsi nandɨsak. Do nak kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap yaŋek mango yaŋ aŋkɨsisat.
Abɨsok nak ji paŋpulugok do gɨptɨmnokon tepmɨ pak do tagɨsi nandɨsat. Nak paŋmuwukbi paŋpulugok do nandɨsat, uŋun Kristo dakon gɨptɨmni. Kristo paŋmuwukbi paŋpulugok do tepmɨ pagɨt uŋun aban dɨma dagagɨt. Gɨptɨmnokon tepmɨ pasat uŋun Kristo da tepmɨ pagɨt uŋun arɨpmɨ ak do nandak nandak asat.
Nin nandaŋ gadat amaŋ do yaŋsi nandamaŋ, Piŋkop mɨktɨm gat ae kundukon yo morap toŋ uŋun yaŋban genikon da noman tawit. Do yo morap abɨsok dabɨl da pɨndakgamaŋ, uŋun yo amɨn da dɨma pɨndarɨ baŋ wasagɨt.
Gɨldat binap 12 kilok mɨktɨm kɨsi pɨlɨn tuk aŋakwan kɨŋ pɨlɨndo 3 kilok agɨt.
Ae wit bo ae jap dɨwarɨ dakon yerɨ kwaokdal uŋun jap bamɨ don kwokdɨsak uŋun yombem dɨma.
Amɨn kaloŋ kɨnda da gen kɨrɨŋɨt aban uŋun dakon yokwini da kɨmot aŋalon aban kɨmot da kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda da yaŋ amɨn morap pabɨŋ yopgut. Mani Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawok gat ae but galak yoni gat dakon tapmɨm da kɨmot dakon tapmɨm yapmaŋek madepsi daman. Do nin yaŋsi nandamaŋ, mɨŋat amɨn morap Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawot uŋun abɨdoŋ Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ yoyɨŋakwan amɨn kaloŋɨ Yesu Kristo da pi agɨt do aŋek mɨktɨmon egɨpjak bɨsapmon tebaisi atdaŋ.
Aŋakwa Pol da emat amɨn 100 dakon kɨla amɨn gat ae emat amɨni gat yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn kabɨ tap wakgakon dɨma egɨpni kaŋ, ji kɨsi pasɨldaŋ.”
Nak nawa gengo do dɨma ɨŋtosot, do jɨgɨno madepsi uŋun kaŋek aŋpulugoki.
Piŋkop da tepmɨsi abɨŋek uwalni yoljak. Piŋkop do uwal aŋ amɨn pasalek kɨŋ mudoni dosi nandɨsat.
‘Gak kɨŋ on amɨn kabɨ yaŋ yoyɨki: Ji bɨsap morapmɨsi gen nandakdaŋ, mani mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaba pɨsokdɨsak. Ji bɨsap morapmɨsi sɨŋtaŋek kokdaŋ, mani dɨma kaŋ nandaŋyo akdaŋ.
Ae aŋelo 4 kweŋni pɨsogɨt. Aŋakwan gɨldat ae kanek ae gɨkyo uŋun kokwin aba kabi kapbɨ aŋakwa gɨldat kabi kɨnda ae kanek kabi kɨnda ae gɨk morap dakon kabi kɨnda paŋupbal aŋakwan pɨlɨn tuk awit. Yaŋ awit do gɨldarɨ dakon ae kalbi dakon teŋteŋɨ tagɨ dɨma teŋteŋawit.
“Mani babɨkji da nak dakon gen nandak do dɨma galak tawit. Asisi, Israel amɨn nak dakon gen guramɨt do dɨma galak tawit.
Nak da gak uŋun amɨn kabɨkon yolɨgɨm. Ae gak da but dasi galak taŋ namɨsal yaŋ gɨn uŋun amɨn kabɨ da amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomni, ae nak uŋun amɨn kabɨkon egɨpbeŋ, yaŋ do sigɨn saŋbeŋek gak yolɨkdɨsat.”
Moses dakon meŋi datniyo nandaŋ gadat agɨmal. Do Moses altaŋban kanek kapbɨ aŋkɨsɨbɨgɨmal, nido monjɨ uŋun wagɨl tagɨsisi kɨnda kagɨmal, ae kɨla amɨn madep dakon gen teban kɨrɨŋɨt do pasol pasol dɨma agɨmal.
Kalɨp Piŋkop da kokupni aŋkutnaŋek yo agɨt uŋun dakon geni nandagɨmaŋ. Abɨsok aeni yaŋ gɨn aŋakwan komaŋ. Nin Piŋkopnin Yawe Tapmɨm Ami da kokup papmon ekwamaŋ. Piŋkop da kokupni aŋteban aŋakwan bɨsap mudok mudogɨ mɨni tebai taŋ aŋaŋ wɨgɨkdɨsak.
Parisi amɨn moneŋ do galagɨsi nandaŋ, do Yesu da gen yagɨt uŋun nandaŋek yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmgwit.
Do ji abɨsok nido Piŋkop aŋkewalek paŋmuwukbi da kwapmon yo jɨgɨ yopmaŋgaŋ? Kalɨp babɨknin da Moses dakon gen teban uŋun guramɨt do aŋtɨdok awit, ae ninyo kɨsi uŋun guramɨt do aŋtɨdok amaŋ.
Nak gak dakon oman monjɨgo. Pasɨlɨkon dɨma egɨ nabi. Nak jɨgɨkon egɨsat, do bɨsitno tepmɨsi nandaŋek bamɨ nabi.
Mɨŋat monjɨyono, amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomneŋ uŋun genon dagɨn dɨma yoneŋ, aŋpagon da bamɨsi aneŋ.
Aŋek yokwi pakpak amɨn aŋpakgo yoyɨŋ dekgo tobɨlek gagon opni.
Piŋkop da ji kaloŋ kaloŋ do but galak dakon yo damgut, do ji kaloŋ kaloŋ Piŋkop dakon oman monjɨ tagɨsi da egek, ni pi ani do tapmɨm damgut uŋun aŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ paŋpulugoni.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ da yaŋ yoŋ, “Yo morap tagɨ agagɨ.” Gen uŋun bamɨ, mani yo dɨwarɨ da nin tagɨ dɨma paŋpulugogɨ. “Yo morap tagɨ agagɨ”, mani yo dɨwarɨ da butnin tagɨ dɨma paŋteban asak.
Dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon agɨpgwit. Kokup pap kɨnda aŋalon aŋek uŋudon paŋkɨ egɨpni dakon kosit kɨnda dɨma kawit.
Aŋakwa Parisi amɨn da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Pɨndat, amɨn Sabat bɨsapmon nido gen teban yapmaŋek pi aŋ?”
Piŋkop da iyɨ kɨla amɨn madep 10 kabɨ uŋun do nandak nandak yomdɨsak. Yoban yo morap noman toni do kɨlɨ nandagɨt, uŋun noman tokdaŋ. Uŋun but kaloŋ aŋek kɨla amɨn madep tapmɨm pawit uŋun tapmɨm kɨsi joŋ kɨlap yokwisi dogɨn ɨmdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋakwa wɨgɨ Piŋkop da yo morap altaŋ mudoni do yagɨt uŋun altaŋ mudokdaŋ.
Not kabɨ, nin mibɨ genin uŋun yaŋ: Ji Piŋkop da nin paŋpulugosak do bɨsit ani. Aŋakwa Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen da tepmɨsi kɨŋ ɨreŋ taŋakwan ji da geni do nandaba wɨgɨgɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn amɨn da yaŋ gɨn nandani.
Mani uŋun bɨsapmon kɨsi nak Dewit but dasi galak taŋ ɨmdɨsat. Aŋek dɨma yɨpmaŋ dekgeŋ, ae uŋun do yaŋ teban tok agɨm uŋun dɨma aŋsuŋ abeŋ.
Gen bamɨkon ae but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpagon Piŋkop Dat ae Monji Yesu Kristo uŋun da gɨsam dabal nandaŋ yawotni gat ae bupmɨni gat ae but yawotni gat da ji da egɨp egɨpmon tosak do bɨsit asat.
Kɨla amɨn madep Tiopilas, amɨn morapmɨ da Piŋkop da yo morap nin da binapmon agɨt uŋun dakon geni papiakon mandak do awit. Yo morap wasaŋek altaŋakwa dabɨl da si pɨndagek yaŋ teŋteŋok awit amɨn dakon gen yolek mandawit. Uŋun amɨn Piŋkop gen do pi awit. Ae nak uŋun yo morap si wasaŋek noman taŋ aŋaŋ opgwit uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ pakyaŋsi nandak do pini madepsi agɨm. Do gen morap on papiakon kɨlegɨsi mandaŋ yɨpbo gagon opjak kaŋ nandabo tagɨsi asak.
Aŋek amɨn da madepsi abɨŋ yɨpmaŋek gen pikon yɨpmaŋek yaŋ dagok kɨlegɨ dɨma aŋɨmgwit. Mɨktɨmon egɨp egɨpni gwayeŋba yerɨ mɨni agɨt.”
Dabɨlgo dakon pakbi mawit, nak uŋun do nandaŋek abɨŋ aeno gandakdosi nandɨsat, aŋek but galaksi nandakeŋ.
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Dɨma kɨrɨŋɨk ɨmni. Amɨn kɨnda nak dakon man yaŋek wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ asak uŋun amɨn nikon da nak do yaŋba yokwi tok asak? Uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma.
Kɨŋ kɨla amɨn da yomakon altaŋek amɨn da upbalap madep ae gen kunamyo aŋakwa pɨndak nandaŋyo agɨt.
Aŋek yaŋ yoyɨsak, “Ji bɨsap niaŋ da gen kokwin pi gulusuŋ ani? Ji yokwi pakpak amɨn nido paŋpulugoŋ?
Yaŋ aba gen teban papianikon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun bamɨ toŋ agɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Ɨsal dogɨn amɨn da nandaba yokwi tok aŋ namgwit.’
Yawe da yaŋban mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨkon pakbi noman toŋ, ae mɨktɨm pakbini mɨnikon pakbi dabɨl morapmɨ noman taŋek pokgoŋ.
Nido ɨmal uŋun wamneŋ bɨsapmon nin molaŋ dɨma egɨpdamaŋ.
Uŋun Dat dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ, ae nakyo kɨsi dɨma nandaŋ namaŋ. Yaŋdo, yo morap uŋun aŋ damdaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋban takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn dɨwarɨ telagɨ pakbi sok do apgwit uŋun da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, nin niaŋsi aneŋ?”
Aŋakwal Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Dɨma pasoljil. Jil kɨŋ notnoni kabɨ yoyɨŋbal Galili kɨŋ uŋudon nandani.”
Yaŋakwan amɨn Pol baljok do awit pasalek dɨma baljawit. Aŋakwa mibɨltok amɨn da Pol Rom amɨn kɨnda naŋ yoyɨko nap teban naŋ aŋteban ayɨŋ yaŋ kaŋ nandaŋyo aŋek uŋun kɨsi pasol pasol agɨt.
Ji Yesu Kristokon gadaŋek yɨpba Amɨn Tagɨsi egɨpgut, do uŋun da aŋpagon sigɨn egɨpni.
Mani nak asi pini asat. Yaŋdo, ji geno do nandaba bamɨ dɨma asak kaŋ, pi asat uŋun kaŋek nandaŋ gadat ani. Aŋek yaŋsi nandani, Dat uŋun nagon egɨsak ae nak Daron egɨsat.”
Yaŋ aŋakwa yabekbi bamot Banabas gat Pol gat paret aŋ yom do aŋ dakon geni nandaŋ wurɨpdak ɨmalni pɨdaŋek mɨŋat amɨn morap kabɨkon pɨgɨ yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨmal,
Ae amɨn dɨwarɨ da gen yokwi yaŋ yoŋ, “Kɨlɨ aŋpak yokwi aŋapno uŋudon da aŋpak tagɨ noman taŋban.” Amɨn dɨwarɨ da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ namɨŋek gen yokwi uŋuden nak da yosot yaŋ yoŋ. Piŋkop da kokwin agakni kɨlegɨkon da uŋun amɨn kobogɨ yokwisi yomdɨsak.
Ji gen teban on dayɨsat uŋun guramɨtni kaŋ, ji nak dakon notnoni kabɨ akdaŋ.
Aŋakwa Kapaneam kokupmon amɨn, ason Kwen Kokup nin da wɨgɨkdamaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨmasi. Ji mibɨlɨgwan Tɨpdomon pɨgɨkdaŋ.”
Gɨldat wɨsak bɨsapmon tamonigwan si paŋkɨ pokgoŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋba Pailat da Barabas pulugaŋ yɨpban mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyokon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan emat amɨn yoyɨŋban Yesu baljawit. Aba don tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotjak do yoyɨgɨt.
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi gayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda pakbi ae Telagɨ Wupmon dɨma altosak kaŋ, Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asagon arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨgɨsak.
Yaŋdo, gen kɨnda yoŋ uŋun bamɨ, ‘Amɨn kɨnda da jap kwaokdak, ae kɨnda da bamɨ pasak.’
Amɨn dɨwarɨ ɨsal dogɨn uwal aŋ namaŋ. Yum pɨndakbɨ nak abɨŋ nepmaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk dɨ abam. Uŋun ɨsal dogɨn nandaba yokwi tok aŋ namaŋ. Do yum pɨndagaki nak dakon jɨgɨ do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk dɨma ani.
Piŋkop da yaŋ agɨt nido amɨn morap Kwen Kokupmon ae mɨktɨmon ae amɨn kɨlɨ kɨmakbi ae wup mɨktɨm kagagwan ekwaŋ uŋun kɨsi da Yesu dakon man madep do aŋek ŋwakbeŋ aŋ ɨmni yaŋ do agɨt.
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn sotni mɨni uŋun wuda wamagon dɨma kwaŋ. Amɨn sotni toŋ uŋun dagɨn wuda wamagon kwaŋ.
Ji paŋmuwukbi dɨwarɨ do but dasi galak taŋ yomaŋ yaŋ yolɨkdo, kɨsitni ɨlɨgek si bedoni. Kristo dakon paŋmuwukbi morap da gɨldatni tagɨ yɨpba jikon obɨsak.
Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Gerasa mɨktɨm tetgɨn kɨŋ altawit. (Gerasa mɨktɨm uŋun terɨ kɨnda taŋakwan Galili mɨktɨm uŋun pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda tosok.)
Yɨgek mibɨltok kɨsirɨ dɨma sugaŋek jap naŋban Parisi amɨn uŋun da kaŋek dɨma agagɨ asak yaŋ nandagɨt.
Amɨn da gandaba mano abɨdosol do yo yokwisi aŋgamaŋ. Mani tebaisi agek jɨgɨ uŋun ɨmegek kuraktok dɨma asal.
Yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji mɨktɨm ae tap ae kɨndap tepmɨsi paŋtasɨk ak do dɨma nandani. Mibɨltok Piŋkopnin dakon tɨlak pi monjɨni da ɨŋamon yopdamaŋ. Yaŋ aŋapno don yo morap tagɨ paŋtasɨk ani.”
Gen kɨnda yɨpmaŋdak uŋun tepmɨsi mɨktɨmon pɨsak.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Dabɨl uŋun gɨptɨm dakon teŋteŋɨ. Dabɨlgo tagɨsi kaŋ, gɨptɨmgo kaloŋ teŋteŋɨni toŋ.
Kɨŋ ɨleŋɨkon wɨgek yaŋ pɨndakgwit: kɨndap kɨnda sogɨt da patderɨkon tap kɨlap kɨnda tagɨt, ae bretyo kɨsi taŋba pɨndakgwit.
Yaŋban mɨŋat da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, bamɨ yosol, mani pɨŋan tewɨgɨ da tamokon da jap jɨmjɨm moŋ uŋun tagɨ noŋ.”
Gɨldat kɨnda kaloŋ nak gak dakon man awɨgɨsat, aŋek mɨŋat amɨnyokon gak dakon tɨlɨmgo do yaŋ teŋteŋok asat.
Mani emat amɨn 100 dakon kɨla amɨn da Pol aŋkutnaŋek dɨma dapba kɨmotni do nandagɨt, do dɨma dapni do emat amɨn yaŋsop aŋyomgut. Aŋek tap pudaŋ nandaŋ amɨn tap pakbigwan maŋek uŋun da kalɨp ɨleŋon wɨgɨni do yoyɨgɨt.
Pol, Sailas, ae Timoti nin da paŋmuwukbi Tesalonaika kokup papmon ekwaŋ ji do papia on mandamaŋ. Ji Piŋkop Datnin ae Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo gat kɨlɨ gadawit.
Mani nak da ji do bret galagɨsi, ae kabaŋ kok koron nani dabeŋ, aŋapbo butji tugokdaŋ.”
Yaŋban Samaria mɨŋat da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Juda amɨn kɨnda, ae nak Samaria mɨŋat kɨnda, do nido pakbi nabɨ noko yaŋ nayɨsal?” (Mɨŋat uŋun mibɨlɨ yaŋ do yagɨt, Juda amɨn da Samaria amɨn gat not dɨma aŋek egɨpgwit.)
Aŋek yaŋ yagɨt: “Yawi on Piŋkop da saŋbek saŋbek uŋun yolnisi do yagɨt uŋun aŋteban asak.”
Mɨŋat eyo kɨlɨ abi do gen teban on damɨsat. Uŋun nak dakon gen teban dɨma, uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen teban. Uŋun yaŋ: mɨŋat da eni dɨma yɨpmaŋdetjak.
Jɨgɨ bɨsap morapmon butnin paŋteban asak. Piŋkop da butnin paŋteban asak, uŋudeŋ gɨn nin da jɨgɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ paŋ amɨn morap burɨ paŋteban amaŋ.
Ji Kwen Kokup dakon yo dogɨn nandaŋek mɨktɨm dakon yo do dɨma nandani.
Uŋun nak kutnok do aŋek palɨ kɨmakgɨmal. Do nak gɨn dɨma, Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ dakon paŋmuwukbi morap kɨsi da uŋun bamot do but galak nandaŋek ya yaŋ yomaŋ.
Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Gak namɨn? Gak da gen kobogɨ niyɨŋbɨ kɨŋ amɨn yabekba abɨmaŋ yoyɨno. Gak gaga do namɨn yaŋ yosol?”
Aŋek ji Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo dakon Piŋkopni ae Datni uŋun but kaloŋ ae gen kaloŋon da mani aŋkɨsini do nandaŋek bɨsit asat.
Mɨktɨm amɨn morap, ji yaŋ tɨdaŋek Yawe aŋkɨsini. Kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap yaŋek aŋkɨsini.
Not kabɨ, gen madepsi kɨnda uŋun yaŋ: Ji Kwen Kokup bo mɨktɨm bo ae yo dɨ da manon genji dɨma yaŋ paŋteban ani. Yo kɨnda ak do nandaŋ kaŋ “Asi” yaŋ gɨn yoni. Mani dɨma ak do nandaŋ kaŋ “Dɨma” yaŋ gɨn yoni. Genji yo dɨ da manon yaŋ paŋteban aba Piŋkop da kobogɨ yokwi dɨ daban.
Amɨn kɨnda yo kabɨni amɨn do yum yomɨsak, bo ae goman do yaŋba nandaŋ yomɨsak, ae yumaŋ gwayek kosit kɨlegɨkon da asak uŋun amɨn tagɨsi egɨpjak.
Saimon Pita kɨndapni alɨŋ agakwan yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak Yesu dakon paŋdetni kɨnda, ma?” Yaŋ iyɨŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Nak paŋdetni kɨnda dɨma.”
Ji kalugɨ egek dɨsi do kɨla tagɨsi aŋek egɨpni. Sunduk uwalji uŋun laion yombem, uŋun da madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo nok do wusɨsak.
Ji Amɨn Tagɨ da kalɨp yo agɨt uŋun kɨlɨ nandawit, mani butji pabo pɨsaŋban uŋun do sigɨn nandani do dayɨsat. Amɨn Tagɨ da kalɨp Israel amɨn uwal da kɨsiron baŋ tɨmɨkban Isip yɨpmaŋ kɨwit. Aŋek don nandaŋ gadat dɨma awit amɨn uŋun paŋtasɨk agɨt.
Ae dɨ da yawit, “Elaija da noman tak.” Ae dɨ da “Kombɨ amɨn kalɨpsi egɨpgwit uŋun kɨnda da kɨmoron da pɨdak” yaŋ yawit.
Aŋakwan yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ da nak aŋpulugaŋban monjɨ kwap awɨldat. Kalɨp monjɨ mɨni egek amɨn da dabɨlon mayagɨsi nandagɨm, mani abɨsok kɨlɨ uŋun mayagɨno mudosok.”
Ɨleŋ Olipmon wɨgek Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Sipsip dakon kɨla amɨn aŋakgo kɨmagakwan sipsip bɨrapmɨgɨ iyɨ iyɨ kɨkdaŋ.’ Gen uŋun da arɨpmon abɨsok kalbi yo morap nagon noman taŋakwa pɨndagek ji manji namdaŋ.
Not kabɨ, paŋmuwukbi notji dɨwarɨ do yaŋba yokwi tok dɨma ani. Amɨn dɨwarɨ do yaŋba yokwi tok asak bo ae notni dakon aŋpak kokwin asak, uŋun gen teban do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋek gen teban kokwin asak. Ae gen teban kokwin asal kaŋ, gak gen teban dɨma guramɨkdal, uŋun gen teban dakon kokwin agak amɨn dagal yaŋ asak.
Yo morap abeŋ do nak da manon da nayɨni, uŋun akdɨsat. Yaŋ abo Dat da Monjikon man madep pakdɨsak.
Paŋkutnosak do Yawekon kwaŋ, do amɨn yokwi da kɨsiron baŋ tɨmɨgakwan tagɨsi ekwaŋ.
Yaŋsi awit, mani Telagɨ Wup da Stiwen da buron pɨgɨ tugaŋban Kwen Kokup sɨŋtaŋek Piŋkop dakon tɨlɨmni kagɨt. Ae Yesu Piŋkop da amɨnsi tet do akban kagɨt.
Ae Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen teban yolek paret ak do kɨgɨmal. Gen teban uŋun yaŋ tosok: “Kɨnarɨm bamorɨ bo ae yɨgɨ yɨgɨ bulagɨ bamorɨ baŋ mukwa soni.”
Kɨla amɨn madep aŋpak kɨlegɨ asak, uŋun do ɨleŋ madep ae monɨŋɨkon jap bamɨ tagɨsi pani.
Yawe da nin nandaŋ yaworon dasi yo tagɨsisi aŋnimɨsak. Piŋkopnin da bupmɨ nandaŋ nimɨsak.
Damaskus da wasaŋek Jerusalem ae Judia mɨktɨm kɨsi, ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon agek Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋ teŋteŋaŋek yaŋ yagɨm, ‘Ji but tobɨl aŋek Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni. Yaŋ aŋek asi but tobɨl ayɨŋ yaŋ amɨn da dandani do aŋpak kɨlegɨsi ani.’
Uŋun yoyɨŋdet toptopmɨ pakbi dabɨl da yaŋ wagɨl kɨbɨdaŋ mudaŋ, ae gɨkwem madepsi baŋ mɨrɨm da pɨsoŋban dukwan dukwan kwaŋ uŋun yombem. Uŋun Piŋkop da kokup pɨlɨn tuk pɨlisi uŋun kɨlɨ aŋnoman agɨt, do uŋudon paŋkɨ egɨpdaŋ.
But kalɨp dakon aŋpak uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ. Aŋpak uŋun yaŋ: yumabi aŋpak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ,
Yabekbi kabɨ da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ aŋakwa amɨn morapmɨ uŋudon kɨŋ gadaŋakwa mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn gat dabɨni gat da pɨndagek nandaba yokwi tok aŋ yomgwit. Uŋun amɨn uŋun Sadyusi da kabɨkon nani.
Aŋakwa mɨŋat uŋun pasal kɨŋ mɨktɨm amɨni mɨnikon kɨgɨt. Uŋudon Piŋkop da tamoni kɨlɨ aŋnoman agɨt. Uŋudon kɨlani aŋek jap ɨmɨŋakwa wɨgɨ gɨldat 1,260 yaŋ asak.
Yaŋ yaŋek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji don Amɨn Dakon Monji dakon bɨsap kɨnda kok do galagɨsi nandakdaŋ. Mani dɨma kokdaŋ.
Nit yabekbi dɨwarɨ ae Amɨn Tagɨ dakon padɨge ae Pita yo da aŋ uŋudeŋ Yesu yolyol mɨŋat paŋek kɨsin agek pi agagɨ.
Amɨn da ji tɨmɨk paŋpaŋ gen pikon depni bɨsapmon dɨma pasolni. Ni gen baŋ yoyɨneŋ yaŋ dɨma nandani. Uŋun bɨsapmon Piŋkop da ni gen dayɨsak uŋun baŋ yoyɨni. Yaŋ aŋakwa ji dakon gen dɨma asak, uŋun Telagɨ Wup dakon gen asak.
Aŋek yaŋ yokdaŋ, ‘On amɨn yutni aŋ dɨwarɨkgɨt, mani wasɨp ak do aŋtɨdok asak.’
Yesu da gen yokwi kɨnda yaŋban gen pikon yɨpneŋ yaŋ nandaŋek aŋkewalgwit. Mani Yesu gawak pɨgek kɨsirɨ da mɨktɨmon kɨlda mandagɨt.
Piŋkop dakon gen uŋun yaŋ tosok naŋ manjɨgɨt: “Sipsip dap do aŋ ae sipsip monɨŋ daŋgwi mandak do aŋakwa gen dɨma yoŋ, uŋun da tɨlagon gen kɨnda dɨma yagɨt.
Yaŋ aban paŋdet kabɨni da kaŋek burɨ yokwi taŋba yaŋ yawit, “Nidosi aŋek pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi uŋun yumsi tagaldak?
Nak da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni yobo arɨpmɨ dɨmasi pasɨlni. Amɨn kɨnda da nak da kɨsiron baŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma gwayesak.
Ae bɨgal morapmɨ yabekban ɨnjɨŋ yomgwit. Ae meŋgak morapmɨ yabekban yo morapni paŋupbal awit.
abɨdaŋek naŋban kawit.
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep uŋun yo ŋwakŋwarɨsi kaŋek pasalgwit. Aŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yaŋ yawit, “Mao, Piŋkop da tapmɨm madepsi amɨn do yomɨsak!”
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Nak naga pɨdot pɨdot ae egɨp egɨp ami. Amɨn kɨnda nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨŋek kɨmotjak kaŋ, kalugɨ sigɨn egɨpdɨsak.
Aŋakwan pi ɨsalni dɨwarɨ da kaŋek burɨ yokwi taŋba kɨŋ amɨn tagɨnikon yo uŋun agɨt do iyɨwit.
Yawe, bɨsitno nandaki. Nak gak da aŋpulugoki do yaŋ tɨdosot. Nak dakon kunamno nandaŋ nabi.
Yawe aŋkɨsineŋ. Uŋun Israel amɨn nin dakon Piŋkop abɨsok ae don egɨ aŋaŋ kɨneŋ kɨsi dakon. Amɨn morap kɨsi da yoni, “Uŋun asi!” Yawe aŋkɨsini!
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nandani, nak da ji sipsip yombem baŋ joŋ pɨŋan da bɨkbɨgon yabekdat. Do tuŋon amɨn da nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi aŋek akwaŋ uŋun da tɨlagon agɨpni. Ae kɨnarɨm dakon aŋpak yolek yaworɨsi agɨpni.
Ɨmal dubaknikon, ae suŋɨlɨkon man yaŋ mandabi: “Kɨla Amɨn Madep Dakon Kɨla Amɨn Madepni, ae Amɨn Tagɨ Dakon Amɨn Tagɨni.”
Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Mani abɨsok moneŋ sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨk monɨŋji taŋ damaŋ kaŋ, uŋun si tɨmɨtni. Ae yɨk madepji kɨsi tɨmɨtni. Ae emat agak sɨbani mɨni amɨn uŋun ɨmal dubakni yumaŋ naŋek uŋun dakon moneŋ baŋ emat agak sɨbani yumni.
Ji on amɨn do nandaba kɨk dɨma ani. On amɨn kosit yolɨk amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni yombem. Dabɨlɨ mɨni kɨnda da notni kɨnda kosit yolɨsak kaŋ, kɨsi bamot gapmakon mokdamal.”
Gak kɨla amɨn madep egek aŋpak kɨlegɨkon da amɨn kɨlani aŋek gen kokwin pi kɨlegɨsi asal. Gak mɨŋat amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek gengo aŋteban aŋek tagɨsi paŋpulugosol.
Uŋuden amɨn da Piŋkop wɨsɨŋek Jekop dakon Piŋkop da kapmatjok kɨsak.
Uŋun da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gak paŋmuwukbi Laodisia kokup papmon ekwaŋ uŋun dakon aŋeloni do gen yaŋ mandaki: Nak Piŋkop dakon geni gat ae yaŋ teban tok geni gat do gen uŋun asisi yaŋ yogok amɨn. Nak Piŋkop dakon gen bamɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋok amɨn. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ geni bamɨsi gɨn yaŋ teŋteŋosot. Piŋkop da yo morap wasagɨt dakon mibɨlɨsi nak da gen on yɨpbo gagon obɨsak.
Ji teban taŋek bɨsit aŋek egɨpni. Yaŋ aŋek egɨpni kaŋ, paŋkewalon arɨpmɨ dɨma moni. But da nak nol do galak tosok mani gɨp dakon teban tokni mɨni.”
Nak Daron da mɨktɨmon pɨgɨm. Ae abɨsok mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋek Daron wɨgɨkdɨsat.”
Gen uŋun yaŋ teŋteŋaŋban Pita da Yesu abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ ɨleŋɨkon agek tebai iyɨgɨt.
Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨn morap nandak nandak on abɨdaŋek yolgaŋ uŋun bupmɨ nandaŋ yomɨŋek butni paŋ yawot aban yaworɨ toni. Uŋun mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋun Piŋkop dakon Israel amɨn kabɨsini.
Joŋ kɨlap morap koron ekwaŋ gat ae bulmakau ɨleŋ tausenon ekwaŋ gat uŋun kɨsi nak dakon gɨn.
Yaŋdo, nak dakon aŋpak pakyaŋsi yolni.
Yaŋ yaŋek tobɨl Yesu akban kagɨt. Mani Maria da uŋun Yesu yaŋ dɨma kaŋban pɨsagɨt.
Parisi amɨn ae Juda amɨn kɨsisi babɨkni dakon gen teban yolek kɨsirɨ sugaŋek gɨn jap naŋ naŋ aŋ.
“Amɨn yoni taŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun nak da saŋbeŋek yo ɨbo morapmɨsi taŋ ɨmdaŋ. Ae amɨn yoni kaloŋɨsok taŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun nak da uŋunjok gwayeŋ mudokeŋ. Yaŋdo, on amɨn moneŋni uŋun gwayeŋ moneŋ 50 tausen danari taŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun amɨn do ɨmni.
Yaŋ nandaŋek egakwa bot dɨwarɨ Taiberias kokup da apgwit. Abɨŋ Amɨn Tagɨ da bret gɨsamɨgek yoban nawit, uŋun kokup da kapmatjok paŋabɨŋ akgwit.
Mani gagon dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt tosok, do nin gak do pasal gamneŋsi.
Yɨgek Piŋkop da uwalni kandap mibɨlnikon yopban geni guramɨtni do jomjom aŋegɨsak.
Yesu uŋun Piŋkop dakon Monji egɨpgut, mani tepmɨ pagɨt uŋun da Piŋkop dakon galaktok yolyol dakon aŋpak iyɨŋ dekgɨt.
Dat da Monji do man ɨmgut uŋun wukwisi, uŋun da aŋelo dakon mani yapmaŋ mudosok, do Monjɨ uŋun da aŋelo dakon wukwisini egɨsak.
Ae uŋun Wup kaloŋ dagɨn nandaŋ gadat tebaisi amɨn kɨnda do ɨmɨsak. Ae uŋun Wup kaloŋ dagɨn amɨn kɨnda tapmɨm ɨban sot amɨn paŋmɨlɨp asak.
Amɨn yokwi da nak pɨŋan da yaŋ aŋgwasaŋ. Aŋek kɨsit kandapyo nokon ɨnjɨŋba geni da gɨptɨmnogwan pɨgeŋ.
Aŋakwa amɨn pɨdaŋ kɨŋ pini aŋakwa wɨgɨ gɨldat pɨgɨsak.
Ji kɨŋ Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandaŋ kɨmotni. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Ji da paret aŋ uŋun do dɨma galak tosot. Ji da amɨn do bupmɨ nandaŋ yomni uŋun do galak tosot.’ Gen yaŋ tosok, do nandani, amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ ɨlɨt do dɨma pɨgɨm. Yokwi pakpak amɨn yaŋ ɨlɨt do pɨgɨm.”
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji gen emat nido aŋ?”
Yaŋdo, nak naga aŋpak yokwi uŋun dɨma asat. Yokwi nak da buron egɨsak uŋun da asak.
Mani, Piŋkop da nak yokwikon naŋ abɨdokdɨsak. Aŋakwan amɨn kɨmakbi tamo da nak abɨdosak dakon tapmɨm dɨma taŋ ɨmdɨsak.
Uŋun amɨn da gak do gen yokwi yoŋ, ae gak dakon man do gen gɨreŋ yoŋ.
Yɨpmaŋakwan Isip ae Kenan mɨktɨmon jap kaloŋɨsok tawit do babɨknin jap do aŋek jɨgɨ madepsi pawit.
Kɨlɨ paret paŋmuwutdaŋ uŋun do nandak nandak dabeŋ. Apma bɨlak do ji pi uŋun wasaŋek paret ak do galagɨsi nandawit.
Nak pɨrɨropmaŋ dubagɨsi kɨndakon kɨŋ mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma ekwaŋon egɨpbeŋ.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon obip amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn gat obip amɨn kabɨni gat da kɨŋ yabekbi kabɨ tɨmɨk paŋopgwit. Mani mɨŋat amɨnyo da tɨpbaŋ nindapni yaŋ do pasalek yo jɨgɨ dɨ dɨma aŋ yomɨŋek tayaŋgok paŋopgwit.
Abraham uŋun Piŋkop da yaŋ teban tok aŋ ɨmgut uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨmasi noman tokdaŋ yaŋ nandagɨt, mani mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn egɨ aŋ aŋ kwaŋ uŋun dakon datni egɨpdɨsat uŋun do nandaŋ gadat tebaisi agɨt. Piŋkop da kɨlɨ iyɨgɨt: “Babɨkgo da madepsi ɨreŋ tokdaŋ.”
Ji bɨsit ani bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda da yokwi aŋ damgut kaŋ, yokwini yopmaŋ ɨbi. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, Kwen Kokup Datji da yokwisi yaŋ gɨn yopdɨsak.”
Nido nin yaŋsi nandamaŋ, Kristo kɨmoron da kɨlɨ pɨdagɨt, do ae kɨmot kɨnda gat arɨpmɨ dɨma asak. Kɨmot tapmɨmɨ mɨni do saŋbeŋek arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨŋ yɨpjak.
Aŋakwan aŋpak morap nandaŋ kokwin aŋek aŋpak tagɨsi baŋgɨn paŋ egɨpni. Aŋek Kristo da tobɨl apjak bɨsapmon ji wagɨl gwaljɨgɨ mɨni ae dɨwarɨsi mɨni egɨpni.
“Ji dakon Yoyɨŋdetji kaloŋɨ kɨnda dagɨn egɨsak, do amɨn da ji gawak damɨŋek ‘Yoyɨŋdet’ yaŋ dɨma dayɨni. Ji kɨsi morap not dagɨn ekwaŋ.
uŋun amɨn aŋpak tagɨsisi naŋ asak. Gen on do pakyaŋsi nandani. Amɨn kɨnda yokwi pakpak amɨn kɨnda aŋpulugaŋek kosit yokwikon naŋ abɨdaŋ Piŋkopmon ae aŋopjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yokwi pakpak amɨn kɨmoron naŋ abɨdaŋakwan kɨmot dɨma asak. Ae Piŋkop da yokwi pakpak amɨn dakon yokwini morapmɨ yopmaŋ yomgut.
Mɨŋatni pasak do manjɨkbi Maria uŋun gat kɨsi mani mandani do kɨgɨmal. Uŋun bɨsapmon Maria monjɨ kwapni toŋ da kɨgɨt.
Yawe, gak bɨsitno do mɨrak pakyaŋsi yopbi. Nak do bupmɨ nandaŋ nabi do yaŋ tɨdosot. Yaŋ ɨlɨtno nandaki.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋek Peliks do papia kɨnda yaŋ mandagɨt,
Bɨsap morapmɨ nak kosit dubagɨkon kɨŋapbo pakbi da palɨ aŋkɨwit, ae kabo noknok da jɨgɨ namgwit, ae naga dakon amɨn Juda amɨn da jɨgɨ namgwit, ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da jɨgɨ namgwit. Ae kokup papmon, ae mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon, ae tap kwenon palɨ kɨmakgɨm. Ae paŋmuwukbi toptopmɨ da jɨgɨ madepsi namgwit.
Pol da Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ do gen uŋun yaŋakwan amɨn da nandaŋek yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Aŋakba kɨmakban. Uŋuden amɨn mɨktɨmon tagɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ.”
Kristo da iyɨ yo morap wasagɨt. Mɨktɨmon yo pɨndakgamaŋ uŋun gat ae Kwen Kokup yo dɨma pɨndakgamaŋ uŋun gat kɨsi wasagɨt. Ae kɨla amɨn madep gat ae aŋelo madep gat ae wup tapmɨmɨ toŋ gat ae yo kɨla ani do yaŋdagok aŋyobi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gat kɨsi wasagɨt. Asi, Piŋkop da yo morap Yesu da kɨsiron da wasagɨt, ae yo morap uŋun iyɨ dakon.
Babɨkji mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon mana nawit uŋun kɨmak mudawit.
Dɨpmɨn tamokon pokdok bɨsapmon yokwi asak dakon kosit dakon nandak nandak asak. Kosit yokwisi baŋgɨn agek aŋpak yokwi manji dɨma yomɨsak. Piŋkop dakon aŋpak tagɨsi
Yesu da “Nak uŋun mani” yaŋ yaŋakwan amɨn uŋun tɨmɨsok dɨ duwalɨk kɨŋek mɨktɨmon pɨlɨgɨ pakgwit.
Paŋmuwukbi Masadonia ae Akaia provins bamoron ekwaŋ uŋun da Jerusalem telagɨ paŋmuwukbi kabɨkon wadak wadak amɨn ekwaŋ uŋun paŋpulugok do tagɨsi nandaŋek moneŋ paŋmuwukgwit.
Uŋun da yaŋ yak, ‘Wɨgapbo ji nak wɨsɨkdaŋ, mani dɨma nandakdaŋ.’ Ae ‘Ji nak da kokup egɨpbeŋ uŋudon arɨpmɨ dɨma wɨgɨkdaŋ’ yaŋ yak. Gen uŋun niaŋon da yak?”
Piŋkop dakon aŋpak ak do gɨp dagɨn akdaŋ. Aŋek Piŋkop da egɨp egɨpnikon pi asak dakon bɨkbɨk dɨma ɨmdaŋ. Gak uŋuden amɨn da dubagɨkon egɨpbi.
Nido jɨgɨ morapmɨ noman taŋ namaŋ, uŋun manjɨrɨ mɨni. Yokwino morapmɨ da wɨtjɨŋ namɨk da tagɨ dɨma sɨŋtosot. Aŋpakno yokwi morapmɨ da busuŋ daŋgwano dakon tɨlak yapmaŋdak. Butno tagɨ dɨma taŋakwan tapmɨmno mɨnisi asak.
Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ do nandaban pɨŋakwan amɨn monɨŋ da tɨlagon egɨpjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan man madepni toŋ.
Piŋkop tɨp madepno yaŋ iyɨsat, “Gak nido ɨŋtaŋ namɨsal? Yum pɨndagaki uwal da abɨŋ nepmaŋakwa butno nido obɨsi jɨk tosok?”
Ae Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨŋba nakyo kɨsi aŋpulugosak. Aŋakwan geni nak da gen kagakon yɨpmaŋakwan pasol pasol abɨŋ yɨpmaŋek Gen Bin Tagɨsi dakon gen pasɨlɨ yaŋ teŋteŋokeŋ.
Enok Piŋkop do nandaŋ gadat agɨt. Aban aŋpakni do tagɨsi nandagɨt, do dɨma kɨmagakwan Piŋkop da abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ Kwen Kokup wɨgɨgɨt. Amɨn da wɨsɨŋek dɨma kawit, nido Piŋkop da kɨlɨ abɨdagɨt.
Amɨn yokwi uŋun jɨgɨ dɨ dɨma noman taŋ yomaŋ. Aŋakwa yoni morapmɨsi, ae sigɨn ɨreŋ toŋ.
Yawe Tapmɨm Ami nin gat egɨsak. Jekop dakon Piŋkop uŋun dam tebanin arɨpmɨ dɨmasi tuwɨlɨ egɨsak.
Jap naŋba arɨpmɨ aŋakwa Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jap dɨwat naŋ dɨwaraŋ uŋun kɨsi tɨmɨk paŋmuwutni. Jɨmjɨmɨ kɨnda dɨma taŋ yokwi toni.”
Telagɨ yut madep da nagalgwan pɨgek ya yaŋ iyɨŋek aŋkɨsineŋ. Nin ya yaŋ iyɨŋek mani yaŋ aŋenotneŋ.
“Kwen Kokup gat, ae Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ gat, ae yabekbi kabɨ gat, ae kombɨ amɨn kabɨ gat, ji kɨsi uŋun kokup papmon abɨsok yo noman tosok uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani. Piŋkop da uŋun kokup pap da jikon aŋpak yokwi aŋdamgut uŋun kokwinɨgek uŋun dakon kobogɨ ɨmɨsak.”
Uŋun bɨsapmon sot aŋek kɨmakgɨt. Kɨmakban bumjotni pakbinaŋ sugaŋ awɨgɨ yut kɨnda kwen nani tagɨt uŋudon yɨpgwit.
Yaŋ yaŋek wigaron pɨgakwan oman mɨŋat kɨnda Pita kaŋek amɨn uŋudon akgwit yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn uŋun Yesu Nasaret amɨn gat kɨsi egɨpgwit.”
Kundu da Piŋkop dakon tɨlɨmni nolɨsak. Kwen yo morap da Piŋkop uŋun napbɨsap amɨnsi yaŋ nolɨsak.
Yesu yaŋ yaŋakwan obip amɨn kɨnda da mogɨm kulbak aŋagek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon geni kobogɨ gen tagɨ naŋ iyɨsat yaŋ nandɨsal ma?”
Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ae dɨsi nak do namɨn yaŋ yoŋ?” Yaŋban Pita da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Kristo.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji butji dɨma jɨk toni. Egɨp egɨpji Piŋkopmon tosok yaŋsi nandani, ae egɨp egɨpji nagon tosok yaŋsi nandaŋ namni.
Kɨlɨ kɨmot gat ae Amɨn Kɨmakba Yopbi Tamo uŋun maban pakbi ɨdap kɨndap sosok uŋudon pɨgɨgɨmal. Pakbi ɨdap uŋun kɨndap sosok uŋun amɨn kosirɨ kɨnda gat kɨmokgoŋ dakon tamoni.
Gak da pi morap namgul, uŋun pi aŋ mudoko mɨktɨm amɨn da tɨlɨmgo kɨlɨ kawit.
Yaŋ aba pi ami da aeni oman monjɨ kɨnda yabekgɨt. Mani uŋun pi monjɨ kɨsi obɨsi aŋagek yo yokwisi aŋ ɨmɨŋek bamɨ dɨ dɨma ɨmɨŋek yɨpba kɨgɨt.
Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Dewit ae amɨn kabɨni jap do aŋek yo awit uŋun ji manjɨŋ nandaŋyo awit bo dɨma?
Aŋek Yesu kɨsirɨ wamaŋ aŋkɨ gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn Pailat da kɨsiron yɨpgwit.
“Mɨktɨm saut tetgɨn dakon kɨla amɨn mɨŋat madep uŋun Solomon dakon nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi iyɨŋakwan nandak do mɨktɨm dubagɨsikon da apgut. Mani amɨn kɨnda oni egɨsak, uŋun da Solomon yapmaŋdak, mani geni dɨma nandaŋ. Do gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon uŋun kɨla amɨn mɨŋat madep da pɨdaŋ agek abɨsok ekwaŋ amɨn kabɨ dakon aŋpak yokwi uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋokdɨsak.
Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Jerusalem kɨŋ altawit. Kɨŋ altaŋek Yesu Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan pɨgɨ pɨndakban amɨn moneŋ ɨlɨt pi awit. Uŋun wasaŋek amɨn yolban waŋga abɨgɨwit. Yaŋ aŋek moneŋ kulabɨk awit amɨn dakon tamo, ae mɨnam baŋ moneŋ ɨlɨt awit amɨn dakon tamo uŋun kɨsi paŋtobɨlban tagal kɨwit.
Egɨ Amɨn Tagɨ da paŋdet 72 gat manjɨgɨt. Aŋek iyɨ kokup dukwan dukwan kɨk do agɨt, uŋudon mibɨltok uŋun da kalɨp kɨni do bamot bamot yabekgɨt.
Yaŋban mɨŋat da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, gak pakbi tɨbɨtgo mɨni, ae pakbi gapma uŋun dubagɨ. Do gak pakbi egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋun dukon naŋ aŋapbi?
Yaŋ yaŋban Sakius da tepmɨ pɨŋ but galak nandaŋek Yesu abɨdaŋban yutnikon wɨgɨgɨmal.
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gɨldat kɨnda dakon teŋteŋɨ uŋun 12 awa toŋ. Amɨn kɨnda gɨldat kalba kosit agɨpjak kaŋ, mɨktɨm dakon teŋteŋɨ kosok, do arɨpmɨ dɨma maŋ potjak.
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop dakon pi uŋun yaŋ: Ji Piŋkop da amɨn yabekban apgut uŋun nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni.”
Amɨn kɨnda Piŋkop da butni kaŋban tagɨsi asak uŋun amɨn Juda amɨn bamɨsi. Gɨptɨm mandak dakon aŋpak bamɨsi uŋun Piŋkop dakon gen teban guramɨt aŋpak da dɨma aŋalon asak, Piŋkop dakon Wup da amɨn buron aŋalon asak. Uŋun amɨn amɨn da mani dɨma awɨkwaŋ, Piŋkop da mani awɨgɨsak.
Yawe da amɨn kɨlegɨ yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkdak. Jɨgɨ altaŋ yomaŋ bɨsapmon dam tebani arɨpmɨ dɨma tuwɨlɨ egɨ yomɨsak.
Nak mɨŋat amɨn kabɨgo pɨndagapbo tagɨsi yɨgek yo tagɨsi tɨmɨtni do nandɨsat. Ae amɨn kabɨgo da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋakwa nak uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk abeŋ. Aŋek nin gak dakon amɨn kabɨgo ekwamaŋ do mango aŋkɨsineŋ dosi nandɨsat.
Kɨndap madep da yo sosoŋ, uŋun da tɨlak noman altosak bɨsapmon uwalni dapban pasɨldaŋ. Yawe da butjap nandaŋ yomɨŋek pabɨŋ yopmaŋakwan kɨndap da soŋ yomɨŋ mudokdaŋ.
Yoban uŋun da paŋmuwukbi paŋtagap aba Piŋkop dakon pi aŋakwa Kristo dakon gɨptɨm teban taŋek tagɨsi tosak.
Aban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak amɨn dɨmasi yoyɨŋek kɨŋ mukwa sogok amɨnon gɨptɨmgo yolɨki. Aŋek Moses da yagɨt uŋun da tɨlagon paret aŋaki amɨn da asi kɨlek tal yaŋ gandani.”
Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan ae yurɨ yurɨ muwuk muwuk awit. Aŋek Yesu uŋun Kristo uŋun dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi amɨn yoyɨŋ teŋteŋawit.
Juda uŋun Jekop dakon monji. Jekop uŋun Aisak dakon monji. Aisak uŋun Abraham dakon monji. Abraham uŋun Tera dakon monji. Tera uŋun Nao dakon monji.
Ae paŋdet uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “On gak dakon meŋgo.” Uŋun bɨsapmon da wasaŋek paŋdet uŋun da Maria aŋkɨ yutnikon kɨla agɨt.
Korin amɨn, gen dayamaŋ uŋun nomansi dayamaŋ. Nin but dasi galaktaŋ damamaŋ.
Abɨsok uŋun gak dakon oman monjɨgɨn dɨma. Asi uŋun gak dakon oman monjɨgo egɨsak, mani abɨsok gak dakon notgosi dagak do but dasi galak taŋ ɨbi. Naga koko notnosi aban but dasi abɨdosot. Mani nandɨsat, gak da but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨŋ kɨmotdɨsal. Oman monjɨ pini aban kaŋ galaktokdɨsal, ae Kristo do aŋek gak da kaŋbɨ notgosi aŋakwan but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨŋ kɨmotdɨsal.
‘Manji gen yogok amɨn ji yo abeŋ uŋun kaŋek but morap aŋek wagɨl tasɨk toni. Ji da bɨsapmon yo ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda akdɨsat. Amɨn kɨnda da yo uŋun akdɨsat uŋun do dayɨsak kaŋ, ji arɨpmɨ dɨma nandaŋ gadakdaŋ.’ ”
Yaŋ aŋakwa paŋdet Yesu da galak taŋ ɨmgut uŋun da Pita yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ mani!” Saimon Pita uŋun pi do aŋek ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk kadɨmni kɨlɨ ɨlɨk yɨpgut. Do notni da “Uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ mani!” yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk kadɨmni ae paŋek pakbigwan paŋ magɨt.
Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn iyɨ yokwi agɨt bo ae meŋ datniyo da yokwi agɨmal uŋun do dɨma. Piŋkop da wasok kɨnda on amɨnon noman aban amɨn da koni do dabɨlɨ mɨni altagɨt.
Bɨsap dagok dagogɨ mɨni nawa gengo guramɨk kɨmokgeŋ.
Mani amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt uŋun amɨn gɨptɨmni dɨma mɨktagɨt.
Nak amɨn kɨnda gen arɨpmɨ dɨma nandagɨ, ae kobogɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma yogogɨ yombem.
Mani mɨŋat amɨnyo aŋpakni yaworɨ, uŋun Piŋkop da mɨktɨm morap kɨsi yomdɨsak. Uŋun yɨyɨt wagɨl tagɨsi aŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk egɨpdaŋ.
Amɨn kɨnda da notni kɨnda aŋpulugaŋban gengo dakon mibɨlɨ nandɨsak kaŋ, teŋteŋɨkon egɨpdɨsak. Gengo uŋun da nandak nandakni mɨni amɨn nandak nandak yomɨsak.
Yesu da gen uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Sotni mɨni amɨn wuda wamagon dɨma kwaŋ. Sotni toŋ amɨn dagɨn wuda wamagon kwaŋ.
Amɨn da Apolos Amɨn Tagɨ dakon mibɨlɨ do iyɨŋ dekba kɨlɨ nandagɨt. Ae Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen but dasi nandaŋek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt. Yaŋ aŋek Yesu dakon mibɨlɨ suŋ dɨma yagɨt. Bamɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Mani Jon da telagɨ pakbi sogɨt uŋun dogɨn nandagɨt.
Nak yaŋ dayɨsat: Ji yum kaŋakwa Telagɨ Wup da dayɨŋ pawɨlakwan egɨpni. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, but kalɨp dakon galaktok arɨpmɨ dɨma yoldaŋ.
Amɨn bamot Jon dakon gen nandaŋek Yesu yolgɨmal, kɨnda mani Andru uŋun Saimon Pita dakon padɨge.
Kalɨp ji yokwi dakon oman amɨn egɨpgwit, mani abɨsok Piŋkop da geni daban but dasi nandaŋek guramɨkgaŋ, do ya yaŋ iyɨneŋ.
Yaŋ iyɨŋek abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ Yesukon kɨŋ altaŋbal Yesu da Saimon kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Saimon, Jon dakon monji. Buŋon amɨn da Sipas yaŋ gayɨni.” (“Sipas” uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun “Pita”)
Yawe, butno tapmɨmɨ mɨni aban nandɨsat, do bɨsitno nandaŋek tepmɨsi aŋpulugoki. Dɨma pasɨl nabi. Yaŋ abi kaŋ, amɨn kɨlɨ kɨmakgwit uŋun da tamokon kɨkeŋ.
Aban Yesu uŋun tapmɨmni abɨkwa nandaŋek tobɨlek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkno namɨn da ɨgayɨsak?”
Nak pi tebaisi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ agɨm. Kalbi morapmɨ pi aŋek dɨpmɨn dɨma pakgɨm. Nak jap pakbiyo do madepsi aŋek bɨsap morapmɨ japmɨ mɨni egɨpgum. Ae bɨsap morapmɨ mɨrɨmɨsi nandaŋek mɨrɨm ɨmalno mɨni da egɨpgum.
Yaŋdo, gɨptɨmgo dakon teŋteŋɨ uŋun pɨlɨn tuk asak yaŋ do kaŋ kɨmokgi.
Altaŋ ɨban kɨŋ Yesu dakon paŋdet kabɨni kunam takba pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Nido, Amɨn Tagɨ da amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨlani aŋek bɨsitni do mɨrak yopmaŋdak, mani yokwi pakpak do nandaban yokwi taŋ yomɨsak.”
Ji yumabi aŋpak yɨpmaŋek pasal kɨŋ mudoni. Yokwi dɨwarɨ amɨn da aŋ uŋun gɨptɨm da waŋga aŋ, mani yumabi aŋpak asak amɨn iyɨ dakon gɨptɨm naŋ aŋupbal asak.
Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun yaŋ gɨn kɨlɨ agɨt. Amɨn da oman aŋ tyuɨmni do dɨma pɨgɨt. Iyɨ mɨŋat amɨn morap paŋpulugokdo, ae iyɨ dakon gɨptɨmnaŋ paregek yumaŋ naŋ yop do pɨgɨt.”
Nak naga egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ dɨma egɨsat, Kristo nak da buron egɨsak. On mɨktɨmon egɨp egɨp asat uŋun Piŋkop dakon Monji nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek egɨsat. Uŋun da nak do but dasi galak taŋ namɨŋek egɨp egɨpni nak aŋpulugok do parekgɨt.
Gen tebango nagon toktogɨsi tosok, do nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi amɨn kɨnda dagaŋek uwalno dakon nandak nandak yapmaŋdat.
Amɨn kɨnda Telagɨ Wup da aŋtagap aban nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi aŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo paŋpulugosok. Ae uŋun Wup kaloŋ dagɨn kɨnda aŋtagap aban nandak nandak tagɨsi mɨŋat amɨnyo yoyɨsak.
Yoyɨŋ degakwan amɨn kɨnda man madepni toŋ da gen ŋwakŋwarɨsi niyɨsak yaŋ nandawit.
Butjikon da nandaba yokwi tok, ae butjapmon da gen pap yogok, ae butjap, ae but sɨgok, ae yaŋba yokwi tok, ae aŋpak yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ uŋun wagɨlsi yopmaŋ mudoni.
Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ yomdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek kɨlegɨsi egek but yaworon da tagɨsi egɨpdaŋ.
Amɨn da gɨp dapba kɨmokgoŋ uŋun do dɨma pasolni, wupji arɨpmɨ dɨma dapba kɨmotdaŋ. Ji Piŋkop dosi pasolni. Uŋun da gɨp gat wup gat kɨsi Tɨpdomon maban pɨgɨ tasɨk tokdaŋ.
“Nayɨŋban iyɨgɨm, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ, nak ninaŋ abeŋ?’ “Gen uŋun yoko Amɨn Tagɨ da nayɨgɨt, ‘Gak pɨdaŋ Damaskus kokupmon pɨgaki amɨn kɨnda da pi morap aki do yaŋ mudaŋ gamgum uŋun do gayɨsak.’
Asisi, amɨn Piŋkop do pasal ɨmaŋ uŋun yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtdɨsak. Aŋakwan tɨlɨmni mɨktɨmninon tokdɨsak.
Uŋudon egek bɨlak kapbɨ mudaŋakwan Pita kaŋ nandaŋyo ak do Jerusalem kɨko uŋun gat gɨldat 15 yaŋ egɨpgumak.
Gak da yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun arɨpmɨ akdɨsal yaŋ do jomjom aŋek sɨŋtaŋ egɨt da dabɨlno tep namaŋ. Aŋek yaŋ yosot, “Ni bɨsapmon butno aŋteban abi?”
Jerusalem amɨn gat ae kɨla amɨn gat da Yesu uŋun namɨn amɨn kɨnda yaŋ uŋun dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt. Ae kombɨ amɨn dakon gen Sabat bɨsap morap manjɨwit, mani dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt. Do uŋun amɨn gen pikon yɨpmaŋek aŋakba kɨmakgɨt. Yaŋ aba kombɨ amɨn da gen yawit uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt.
Kɨŋ gɨldat kapbɨ wusɨŋ mudaŋek don Telagɨ Yut Madepmon aŋalon agɨmal. Uŋudon kaŋbal yoyɨŋdet amɨn da binapmon yɨgek gen yaŋakwa nandaŋek mibɨlɨ nandak do yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ agɨt.
Piŋkop da nin paŋpulugaŋakwan emaron teban toneŋ. Iyɨ uwalnin pabɨŋ yopdɨsak.
Amɨn Tagɨ da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gen kokwin kɨla agak amɨn yokwi uŋun da gen yagɨt uŋun do nandani.
Piŋkop uŋun but dasi galak taŋ yomyom dakon ami, do amɨn kɨnda amɨn do but dasi dɨma galak taŋ yomɨsak uŋun Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmɨsak.
Piŋkop kaloŋ dagɨn aŋpaknin kokwin asak. Uŋun da amɨn dɨwarɨ pabɨŋ yopmaŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ pawɨgɨsak.
Amɨn muwukgwit uŋun nandaŋ upbal madepsi awit. Yaŋ aŋek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek gen mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yawit. Ni mibɨlɨ do muwukgamaŋ uŋun dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt.
Pol Debe kokup pap kɨŋek uŋudon da Lista kokup pap kɨŋ altagɨt. Uŋun kokupmon Yesu dakon paŋdetni kɨnda egɨpgut mani Timoti. Meŋi uŋun Juda mɨŋat kɨnda. Uŋun mɨŋat Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgut. Mani datni uŋun Grik amɨn kɨnda.
Yo uŋun pɨndagek paŋdet bamot tobɨl kokupmon kɨgɨmal.
Jɨgɨ tepmɨyo uŋun da noman taŋ daba dɨ da nandaŋ gadatji dɨma yɨpmaŋ detni yaŋ do yabekgɨmak. Dɨsi nandaŋ, jɨgɨ ae tepmɨyo uŋuden paneŋ do Piŋkop da kɨlɨ nandagɨt.
Gak gen teban nandaŋ mudosol, uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn dɨma dapba kɨmotni; mɨŋat eyo kɨlɨ abi ji yumabi dɨma ani; yo kabo dɨma noni; top dɨma yoni; top gen yaŋek amɨn notji yum dogɨn gen pikon dɨma yopni; amɨn dakon yo kabɨ paŋkɨlɨgek dɨma tɨmɨtni; meŋ dat do nandaba wukwanek geni guramɨtni.’ ”
Aŋelo 7 kabɨ uŋun amɨn paŋupbal ak do yo yokwisi 7 kabɨ tɨmɨkgwit, uŋun Piŋkop dakon yut yɨpmaŋek waŋga pɨwit. Uŋun ɨmal gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi teŋteŋɨni toŋ baŋ pawit. Ae pɨbɨrɨkon ɨmal dak gol baŋ wasaŋbi baŋ paŋgwasɨŋek wamgwit.
Mani nak gen dɨma yosot. Nak gen mapmɨt gɨn asat. Nido, gak da gaga nak do yo uŋun asal.
“Jikon da amɨn kɨnda sipsipni 100 baŋ kaloŋɨ da pasɨljak kaŋ niaŋ asak? Uŋun da sipsip 99 joŋ tɨmon yopban egakwa kaloŋɨ pasɨldak uŋun wɨsɨŋek don aŋalon asak.
Uŋun kokupmon yokwi pakpak mɨŋat kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun mɨŋat Yesu Parisi da yutnon yɨgek jap nosok yaŋ amɨn da yaŋba nandaŋek pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi kɨnamɨ kɨnda abɨdaŋek yutnon wɨgɨgɨt. Tɨbɨrɨ uŋun tɨpnaŋ wasaŋbi.
Uŋun amɨn kabɨ kalɨp nin gat egɨpgumaŋ da nipmaŋ kɨwit. Mani uŋun nin da kabɨkon nani dɨma. Nin da kabɨkon nani tam nin gat sigɨn egɨpnom. Mani kɨlɨni kɨwit uŋun da nolɨsak, uŋun nin da kabɨkon nanisi dɨma.
Uŋun bɨsapmon kombɨ amɨn dɨ Jerusalem yɨpmaŋek Antiok pɨwit.
Uwalgo da telagɨ yutgokon wɨgek yaŋ tɨdaŋek galak toknikon yo awit. Gak dakon yo kulabɨk aŋek iyɨ emaron teban tawit uŋun dakon tɨlakni baŋ yopgwit.
Mani Piŋkop dakon aŋpagon kɨlɨ tagaŋ teban tawit amɨnon nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi uŋudon yaŋ teŋteŋomaŋ. Uŋun nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi uŋun mɨktɨm amɨn dakon nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi yombem dɨma. Ae on mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn si pasɨldaŋ uŋun dakon nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi yombem dɨma.
Yaŋ niyɨŋba notnin dɨ da tɨp kɨnamon kɨŋ yo mɨŋat da niyeŋ yaŋ gɨn taŋba pɨndaŋ. Mani Yesu iyɨ dɨma kaŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋbal Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Jil abɨŋ konjil.” Yaŋ yaŋban kɨŋ yutni kagɨmal. Kaŋek pɨlɨndo 4 kilok agɨt do Yesu gat egɨpgwit.
Yaŋban yawit, “On amɨn gulusuŋni dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do amɨn dɨ gat yaŋ yomno nido apni? Iyɨ dakon gen kaga da kɨlɨ uŋun yaŋban nandamaŋ.”
Ji Piŋkop dakon gen teban aŋelo da gen kagakon baŋ tɨmɨkgwit, mani dɨmasi guramɨkgwit.”
Aleksanda, uŋun ain baŋ yo wasok amɨn, uŋun da nak do yo yokwisi agɨt. Uŋun aŋpak agɨt dakon kobogɨ do Amɨn Tagɨ da yo yokwisi don aŋ ɨmdɨsak.
Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn dɨwarɨ kapmatjok akgwit uŋun nandaŋek yawit, “Nandaŋ, uŋun Elaija do yaŋ ɨmɨsak.”
Kalɨp Janes gat Jambres gat da Moses uwal aŋ ɨmgumal, yaŋ gɨn, amɨn aŋpak uŋun aŋ uŋun gen bamɨ naŋ uwal aŋ ɨmaŋ. Uŋun nandak nandakni wagɨlsi upbal tawit, ae Piŋkop dɨmasi nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ.
Yesu Kristo da gen yaŋban nandagɨmaŋ uŋun naŋ gɨn dayamaŋ. Gen uŋun yaŋ: Piŋkop uŋun teŋteŋɨ. Uŋudon pɨlɨn tukjok kɨnda dɨmasi tosok.
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn bamorɨ uŋun amɨn kɨndakon gomani toŋ. Kɨnda dakon gomani uŋun moneŋ 500 danari, ae kɨnda dakon gomani uŋun moneŋ 50 danari.
Ae teŋteŋɨ da yo kɨnda aŋalon asak bɨsapmon, uŋun yo kɨsi amɨn da tagɨ pɨndarɨ asak. Yaŋ do aŋek gen on tosok: “Dɨpmɨn pokdol amɨn gak pɨdoki. Kɨmoron da pɨdaŋaki Kristo da teŋteŋaŋ gamjak.”
Mani Yesu da tobɨl paŋdetni pɨndagek Pita gen tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Sunduk, gak nepmaŋ det. Gak Piŋkop dakon nandak nandak dɨma yoldal, amɨn dakon nandak nandak yoldal.”
Nak Masadonia mɨktɨm naŋ kɨk do nandɨsat. Uŋunaŋ kɨŋek don jikon abɨŋ altokeŋ.
Gak kɨla amɨn madep mibɨltogɨ man madepgo toŋ. Oskon yɨgek emaron kɨŋek teban toki. Yaŋ aŋaki amɨn da gen bamɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨŋ yɨpni. Ae amɨn da kosit kɨlegɨ naŋ yolek agɨpni do emat asal yaŋ nandani. Pi tapmɨmɨ toŋ aŋaki gandaŋek tamtam yokdaŋ.
Tebaisi iyɨŋban kɨrɨŋɨk ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak yutgokon kɨŋ Amɨn Tagɨ da gak do bupmɨ nandaŋek wasok madep ak uŋun dakon gen bin yawi dɨwat kabɨgo yoyɨŋ mudoki.”
Piŋkop da emat dakon yo kabɨ nimɨsak uŋun pani. Paŋek tebaisi agek Sunduk dakon paŋkewal mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ uŋun tagɨ pabɨŋ yopni.
Mani amɨn kɨnda nandaŋ gadat aŋakwan Piŋkop da uŋun do amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ iyɨsak uŋun amɨn da yaŋ yosok, “Ji dɨsi butjikon da ‘Namɨn da Kwen Kokup wɨgɨsak?’ yaŋ dɨma yoni. Gen uŋun yoni uŋun da Kristo mɨktɨmon abɨk do nandaŋ yaŋ asak.
Nak Datno arɨpmɨ tagɨ iyɨko uŋun da aŋelo 72 tausen yabekban abɨŋ nak tagɨ aŋpulugoni. Gak uŋun dɨma nandɨsal, ma?
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak yaŋ gayɨsat, yokwini kosirɨ 7 kabɨ dɨma, yokwini yopmaŋ ɨbɨ kosirɨ 77 kabɨ yaŋ asak.
Asisi, Yawe da yo tagɨsi nimɨŋakwan mɨktɨmnin da jap morapmɨsi paŋalon akdɨsak.
Yaŋ aŋakwa Pita da gen dɨma yaŋek tayaŋgok yɨtni do kɨsirɨ da tɨlak aŋ yomgut. Aŋek Amɨn Tagɨ da damon naŋ wɨtdal aŋaŋ obɨk uŋun do yoyɨgɨt. Yoyɨŋ mudaŋek yoyɨgɨt, “Ji da Jems gat not kabɨ gat yo on altaŋ namɨk uŋun do yoyɨni.” Yaŋ yoyɨŋek Pita si abɨgɨgɨt.
Uŋun yɨpmaŋek oman monjɨ kɨnda dakon aŋpak yolek amɨn dagaŋek altagɨt.
Yawe aŋpakni uŋun tagɨsisi, do ya yaŋ iyɨneŋsi. Dagok dagogɨ mɨni nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsak.
Yawe Kwen Kokupmon kɨla amɨn madep yɨgek yo morap kɨla asak.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Notgo kɨnda yokwi aŋgaban kaŋ, kɨŋ kaŋbɨ dɨsilgɨn gen uŋun yaŋ aŋmɨlɨp ak do pi anjil. Gengo nandaŋ yawokban kaŋ notgo abɨdaŋbɨ gagakon apjak.
Nin yaŋ teŋteŋok aŋek nin do dɨma yomaŋ, nin yaŋ teŋteŋok aŋek yaŋ yomaŋ, “Yesu Kristo uŋun Amɨn Tagɨnin, ae uŋun dakon man pɨdosak do aŋek ji dakon oman monjɨ ekwamaŋ.”
Yawe bɨsit yaŋ iyɨgɨm, “Egɨp egɨpno dakon wasɨp nayɨŋbɨ nandako. Bɨsap niaŋ da egɨpbeŋ uŋun nayɨŋbɨ nandakeŋ. Egɨpbeŋ dakon bɨsap uŋun pɨsɨpmɨsok uŋun do nayɨki.
Gak nandɨsal, Esia provinskon amɨn morap nak kɨlɨ nepmaŋ dekgwit. Ae Pigelus gat ae Emogenes kɨsi nak kɨlɨ nepmaŋ dekgɨmal.
Iyɨŋban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da mibɨlɨ dɨma nayɨsak kaŋ, arɨpmɨ dɨma nandabo pɨsosak.” Yaŋ yaŋek Pilip amɨn pawɨl pawɨl tamokon wɨŋban yɨtjil do iyɨgɨt.
Aŋakwan yaŋ pɨndakgwit: mɨleŋ asɨp amɨn mel yombem da noman taŋ waseŋ kɨ amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ da kwenon yɨkgwit.
Jekop gen uŋun nandaŋek kɨŋ Isip mɨktɨmon egek kɨmakgɨt. Ae babɨknin dɨwarɨ kɨsi kɨmakgwit.
Nandaŋapbo Piŋkop da Telagɨ Yut Madepgwan tek madepsi kɨnda nandagɨm. Uŋun aŋelo 7 kabɨ tebai yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Piŋkop dakon butjap uŋun ɨdap madep 7 kabɨkon toŋ uŋun pabɨdaŋ paŋkɨ mɨktɨmon tagalni.”
Nak Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨsat! Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo dasi pulugaŋ nepdɨsak. Yaŋdo, nak nandak nandaknokon Piŋkop dakon gen teban yol do nandɨsat, mani but kalɨp egɨp egɨpmon nak yokwi dakon oman amɨn egɨsat.
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ egɨ aŋ aŋ kwaŋ kobogɨ yokwi yomɨsak, do ji do kobogɨ yokwi arɨpmɨ dɨma damjak, ma? Uŋun mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi dakon yoyɨŋdetni. Uŋun nandak nandakni mɨni, ma?
Gɨldatno tagɨ Pilologus gat, Julia gat, ae Nerus gat sami gat, ae Olimpas gat ae telagɨ paŋmuwukbi morap uŋun gat ekwaŋ uŋun do yomni.
Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdetni burɨ yokwi taŋba kaloŋ kaloŋ yaŋ yawit, “Nak dɨma, ma?”
Yaŋ yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Nak eno mɨni.” Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gak kalɨp amɨn paŋ kwɨnɨt abɨ kosirɨ 5 agɨt, da abɨsok amɨn yɨkgamal uŋun ego dɨma. Gak eno mɨni yaŋ bamɨsi yosol.”
Do ji bamɨ pakpak dakon Amɨn Tagɨni bɨsit iyɨŋba pi amɨn paŋalon aŋ yopban pinikon kɨŋ jap paŋ paŋmuwutni.”
Yawe bɨsit iyɨŋek ya yaŋ iyɨno. Pi madep madep agɨt uŋun dakon geni yoyɨno mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn da nandani.
Yaŋ aŋakwa paŋmuwukbi morap gat ae amɨn dɨwarɨ gen bin uŋun nandawit amɨn kɨsi madepsi pasalgwit.
Don Erot dakon altok altok bɨsap do nandaŋek jap noknok awit bɨsapmon Erodias dakon gwi da kap aban Erot da kaŋek nandaban yo madepsi agɨt.
Uŋun kokup papmon Telagɨ Yut Madep kɨnda dɨma taŋban kagɨm. Nido, Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkop Tapmɨm Ami gat ae Sipsip Monɨŋ gat da iyɨ Telagɨ Yut Madep da yaŋ egɨpgumal.
Yaŋ yaŋek aeni wain kɨnam abɨdaŋek, Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek, yoban kɨsi da nawit.
ae Gebal amɨn, ae Amon amɨn, ae Amelek amɨn, ae Pilistia amɨn ae Tair amɨn, uŋun mɨktɨm morap dakon amɨn da yo uŋun ak do nandaŋ.
Kwen Kokup kwensi ason tosok uŋun Yawe iyɨ dakon. Mani mɨktɨm uŋun amɨn nin do nimgut.
Mani don gen pikon iyɨ agek mibɨlɨ nido aŋpak uŋun awit uŋun do yokdaŋ. Piŋkop da amɨn si ekwaŋ gat, ae amɨn kɨlɨ kɨmakgwit gat kɨsi aŋpakni kokwin ak do kɨlɨ tagap tak.
Uwalgo da gen pap yaŋek gen yokwi yaŋ gamaŋ. Uŋun toktogɨsi madepsi yaŋ tɨdoŋ. Piŋkop, aŋpak yokwini do dɨma ɨŋtaŋ yobi.
Yesu da mukwa sogok amɨn tagɨ gat ae kɨla amɨn gat saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda monjɨ bamorɨ gat egɨpgwit. Egek monji mibɨltogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Monjɨno abɨsok kɨŋ wain pinokon pi aki.’
Yesu uŋun Jeriko kokup pap wɨgɨ yapmaŋek kɨk do agɨt.
Amɨn Tagɨ da mɨŋat amɨni do gen yomgut, aban mɨŋat morapmɨ da kɨŋ gen uŋun yaŋ teŋteŋawit.
Yaŋ yaŋba Pita da tebaisi yaŋek yagɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, amɨn uŋun yoŋ nak dɨmasi nandaŋ ɨmɨsat. Top yosot kaŋ, jobɨt tagɨ tɨmɨkgeŋ.”
Iyɨŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Monjɨsok kɨnda mɨŋat pak do asak bɨsapmon monjɨsok notni gat kɨsi ekwaŋ, do bupmɨ dɨma nandaŋ. Mani don monji uŋun gwayeŋ aŋaŋ kɨŋakwa notni uŋun bɨsapmon Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek ekwaŋ.”
Nido nak Amɨn Tagɨkon gen tɨmɨkgɨm uŋun kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ. Gen uŋun yaŋ. Kalbi Judas da Amɨn Tagɨ uwal da kɨsiron yɨpgut bɨsapmon uŋun kalbi Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu da bret abɨdaŋek
Notnonisi, mibɨltok nak Piŋkop da nin morap yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do aŋek pi madepsi agɨt uŋun do papia mandaŋ dam do galagɨ madepsi nandat, mani abɨsok gen kɨnda mandakeŋ yaŋ nandɨsat uŋun yaŋ: ji nandaŋ gadatji kɨlani tebaisi aŋek uwalji dakon gen pabɨŋ yopni. Piŋkop da nandaŋ gadat kaloŋɨ on mɨŋat amɨni nin do nimgut, do amɨn kɨnda da yo nin da nandaŋ gadamaŋ uŋun kulabɨk arɨpmɨ dɨmasi asak.
Kɨmagakwan Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon yoma ɨmal uŋun kwen da sulugɨ pɨŋ mibɨlɨkon dagaŋ kɨ tɨmɨ bamorɨ agɨt.
Pita yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek burɨ maŋakwa Piŋkop dakon man awɨgek yaŋ yawit, “Nin abɨsok asisi nandamaŋ, Piŋkop da Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ kɨsi nandaŋ yomɨŋakwan but tobɨl aŋek egɨp egɨp abɨdoŋ.”
Uŋun amɨn da Pol abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ gen kokwin amɨn kabɨ kɨnda Ɨleŋ Areopaguskon muwukgwit uŋudon aŋkɨŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin gak da gen kalugɨ uŋun amɨn yoyɨŋ dekdal uŋun niyɨki do nandamaŋ.
Aŋpakgo tagɨsi uŋun amɨn don altaŋek egɨpdaŋ kabɨkon toktogɨsi taŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsak. Mɨktɨm yɨpgul da tamonikon taŋek dɨma dɨwalɨk kɨsak.
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo madepsi pɨndakban paŋpulugogɨ mɨni yokwi egɨpgwit. Sipsip kɨla amɨni mɨni yombemsi ekwa pɨndagek bupmɨsi nandaŋ yomgut.
Sipsip bulmakau, ae joŋ bɨt kɨlapyo gat,
Gak da man madep gamni do mɨŋat monjɨyo gat ae monjɨ ŋakŋak gat yoyɨŋ dekdal. Man madep gamɨŋakwa uwalgo da gak abɨŋ gep do aŋtɨdok aŋek gen mapmɨt aŋ.
Aŋek mɨnam morapmɨsi, kɨmbabaŋ ae tap nɨman da tɨlak, morapmɨsi yopban bɨkbɨknikon mawit.
Gɨldat dabɨl uŋun kundu dakon dɨwarɨkon da altaŋ wɨŋek terɨ kɨnda kɨsak. Tedepnikon yo kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma pasɨljak. Piŋkop dakon geni uŋun wagɨl tagɨsi
nido nin kɨsi morap Kristo da ɨŋamon gen pikon atdamaŋ. Agek mɨktɨm gɨptɨmon egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon aŋpak tagɨ bo yokwi agɨmaŋ uŋun da arɨpmon tomni tɨmɨtdamaŋ.
Mani gak wɨsɨŋ gandak do pi aŋ amɨn burɨ tagɨsi aŋakwa but galaksi nandaŋ. Mɨŋat amɨnyo gak da yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgɨl uŋun do but galaksi nandaŋ amɨn, uŋun da, “Yawe uŋun wukwisi” yaŋ tagɨ yoni.
Juda amɨn da Pol ni gulusuŋ naŋ agɨt do yoŋ, emat amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ pakyaŋsi nandak do pi agɨt. Do gɨldat kɨnda do mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ ae Juda amɨn dakon gen kokwin amɨn morap abɨŋ muwutni do gen tebai yɨpgut. Yɨpban abɨŋ muwugakwa Pol dakon nap teban wɨtdal ɨmɨŋek abɨgɨ yɨpban uŋun da ɨŋamon akgɨt.
Yaŋsi ani, nido Piŋkop da iyɨ jikon pi asak. Uŋun da geni guramɨtni do ji dakon but paŋtagap asak, ae galaktokni yolni do tapmɨm damɨsak.
Jap yet kwaokdak amɨn gat ae pakbi yomɨsak amɨn gat uŋun kɨsi bamot Piŋkop dakon pi naŋgɨn amal. Do kɨsi bamot pi agɨmal da arɨpmon tomni tɨmɨk tɨmɨk akdamal.
Wɨli kɨnda busuŋni wɨtjɨŋek bɨsit asak, bo kombɨ gen yosak kaŋ, uŋun da busuŋni Kristo abɨŋ yɨpmaŋdak.
Ji bupmɨ amɨn do but dasi galak taŋek paŋpulugoni kaŋ, ji amɨn kɨlegɨsi.
On mɨktɨm gat ae yo morap mɨktɨmon toŋ uŋun do but dasi dɨma galak toni. Amɨn kɨnda on mɨktɨm do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsak amɨn Dat but dasi dɨma galak taŋ ɨmɨsak.
Piŋkop da oman amɨni Dewit manjɨŋek sipsip kɨla agɨron naŋ abɨdagɨt.
Gen yaŋ namaŋ amɨn uŋun pabɨŋ yopmaŋek dapbɨ pasɨlni. Nak aŋupbal ak do nandaŋ, do gak da paŋɨŋtok aŋek madepsi paŋmayak abi dosi nandɨsat.
Uŋun pakbi teban naŋek but upbal dɨma asak, ae emat pɨdokyo dɨma asak, yaworɨ egɨsak, ae gen emat dɨma asak, ae moneŋ tɨmɨt do tek kɨndap dɨma asak.
Nak da gen dayɨŋ dolɨgɨm uŋun kɨsisi guramɨtni do yoyɨŋdetni. Nandani, nak ji gat gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ egapno mɨktɨm dakon bɨsap mudosak.”
Mani yum pɨndagakwan Saŋbek Saŋbek Kɨnam uwal da abɨdawit. Uŋun tamo tɨmon tapmɨmni gat ae tɨlɨmni uŋudon tagɨt.
Piŋkop da Moses gen iyɨgɨt yaŋ nandamaŋ, mani uŋun amɨn dukwan da apgut uŋun nin dɨma nandamaŋ.”
Yaŋ aneŋ do Jekop dakon Piŋkop da Israel amɨn nin do gen teban uŋun nimgut.
Epesas kokupmon amɨn dɨwarɨ joŋ bɨt kɨlapyo yokwisi da yaŋ emat aŋek nak nɨt do awit. Kɨmakbi kɨmoron da dɨma pɨdoni tam, mibɨlɨ mɨni emat agɨm. Ae amɨn kɨmakbi kɨmoron da dɨma pɨdoni tam, “aŋwa wagɨl kɨmotdamaŋ, do jap pakbiyo madepsi aneŋ.”
Laion da amɨn dakon gɨpni paŋdagoŋ, uŋun da tɨlak dɨ aŋupbal abam. Ɨlɨk aŋaŋ tɨmɨ kɨndakon aŋkɨŋakwa amɨn da nak yokwikon naŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma dɨ abɨdaŋbam.
Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo dakon nandaŋ yawot da ji dakon wup gat egɨpjak do bɨsit asat.
Nak yaŋ nandaŋek yagɨm, “Piŋkop Wukwisi, gak abɨsok nak dɨma aŋpulugosol, do nak uŋun do butno obɨsi jɨk tosok.”
Amɨn kɨnda suŋ kɨnda aban amɨn da yaŋba yokwi tok dɨma aŋ ɨmgwit, ae aŋpakni kɨlegɨsi, ae burɨkon da nandaŋek gen bamɨ gɨn yosok, uŋun amɨn da tagɨ egɨpjak.
Piŋkop da yo morap galak tosol uŋun gamjak, ae pi morap ak do nandɨsal uŋun da aŋpulugaŋakwan arɨpmɨ tagɨ abi dosi nandɨsat.
Kɨlɨ aeno kaŋ egapbo aŋelo morapmɨsi dakon geni nandagɨm. Uŋun aŋelo dakon tɨlakni milion morapmɨsi ae tausen morapmɨsi da arɨp. Uŋun aŋelo kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamo ae yo egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ ae kɨla amɨn kabɨ baŋ paŋgwasɨŋek akgwit.
Yo kaloŋɨ kɨndagɨn andeŋ do niyɨwit. Nit yoni mɨni amɨn uŋun do nandaŋ yomɨŋek paŋpulugondeŋ do niyɨwit. Uŋun dakon pi ak do tagɨsi nandagɨm.
Ae Piŋkop dakon telagɨ kokup pap uŋun kagɨm. Uŋun Jerusalem kalugɨ. Uŋun koko Piŋkop gat egɨpgumal, da Kwen Kokup yɨpmaŋ dek pɨgɨt. Uŋun tɨlɨmni tagɨsi, mɨŋat da amɨn pak do tagap taŋek tɨlɨmni tagɨsi pasak uŋuden.
Mɨktɨm dakon bɨsap mudosak bɨsapmon yaŋ gɨn altokdɨsak. Aŋelo kabɨ da abɨŋ amɨn yokwi amɨn kɨlegɨ da bɨkbɨgon ekwaŋ uŋun tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Namɨn amɨn da kalɨp Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek kwen wɨgɨk aŋek geni abɨŋ yɨpgwit? Mɨŋat amɨnyo Moses da tɨmɨkban Isip yɨpmaŋ opgwit uŋun dagɨn aŋpak uŋun awit.
Ji mɨnam pɨndakgaŋ uŋun do nandani. Jap yet dɨma kwaokgaŋ, ae jap paŋmuwut yutnon jap dɨma paŋek paŋmuwuk yopmaŋgaŋ. Mani Datji Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun da jap upmokdok. Ji pɨŋbi aŋakwa mɨnam da yo madep yaŋ nandaŋ, ma?
Ji kurak togɨ mɨni pisi aŋ kɨmotni. Butjikon Telagɨ Wup da kɨndap da yaŋ soŋek paŋtagap aban Amɨn Tagɨ dakon pi aŋ kɨmotni.
Gak amɨn sugaŋek aŋpakni kokwin asal, mani gagayo kɨsi aŋpak yokwi yaŋ gɨn asal. Gak Piŋkop da gen yaŋ gaban tagɨ pulugaŋ kɨkeŋ yaŋ nandɨsal, ma?
Aŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak nin gat tɨmɨsok dɨ gat egek don kɨki.” Yaŋ iyɨŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpneŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋban mɨŋat da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, uŋun pakbi nam. Nabɨ naŋek pakbi do dɨma akeŋ. Aŋek buŋon pakbi kolek do ɨdon saŋbeŋek dɨma apbeŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋba mɨŋat amɨnyo da gen uŋun do nandaba galagɨ aban amɨn 7 kabɨ yaŋ manjɨwit. Kɨnda Stiwen, uŋun nandaŋ gadatni tebaisi ae Telagɨ Wup da burɨkon tugaŋbi, ae Pilip, ae Pokorus, ae Nikano, ae Timon, ae Pamenas ae Nikolas. Nikolas uŋun Antiok kokup pap amɨn kɨnda. Uŋun Juda amɨnsi dɨma mani kulabɨk aŋek Piŋkop gawak ɨmɨŋek Juda amɨn kabɨkon saŋbegɨt.
Piŋkop da Sodom gat Gomora gat tasɨk tonjil do yaŋek uŋun kokup bamot soŋbal abɨlakni dagɨn taŋek wagɨlsi tasɨk tagɨmal. Piŋkop da yaŋ aban mɨŋat amɨnyo Piŋkop manji ɨmni amɨn da uŋun do nandaŋek yo yokwisi ninon kɨsi yaŋ gɨn noman taŋ nimdaŋ yaŋsi nandani.
Jɨgɨ pasat uŋun gak da nandɨsal. Aŋek nak uŋun do jɨgɨsi nandaŋek kunam tagegɨsat. Kunam pakbino niaŋ da moŋ uŋun gak da manjɨŋek papiagokon kɨlɨ mandal.
Sunduk da galaktokni yolni do iyɨ da paron depban yokwalgwit. Mani gen bamɨ nandani kaŋ, nandak nandakni ae pɨsaŋakwa Sunduk da paron da kukwaŋ kɨkdaŋ.
Yaŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae obip amɨn gat da Yesu kaŋek tebai yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmakban! Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmakban!” Yaŋba Pailat da yoyɨgɨt, “Dɨsi abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotjak. Nak da gulusuŋni kɨnda agɨt do gen yaŋ ɨmneŋ da arɨp dɨma kat.”
Mɨŋatniyo kɨsi amɨn da kaŋba mɨŋat tagɨsi asak, ae amɨn do yaŋba yokwi tok dɨma asak. Uŋun iyɨ dakon kɨla tagɨsi aŋek yo morap asak uŋun kɨlegɨsi gɨn asak.
Mani Kristo da Telagɨ Wup kɨlɨ daban abɨdawit. Uŋun ji gat sigɨn egɨsak, do namɨn amɨn da dayɨŋdet asak yaŋ do wɨsɨk wɨsɨk agagɨ mɨni. Telagɨ Wup da iyɨ yo morap do dayɨŋ dekdak. Ae gen morap dayɨsak uŋun top dɨma, bamɨsi baŋ dayɨsak, do Telagɨ Wup da dayɨŋ dekdak uŋun da arɨpmon Kristokon gadaŋek egɨpni.
Gen uŋun yoyɨŋba yabekbi kabɨ da nandaba ŋugɨgɨ gen aban dɨma nandaŋ yomgwit.
Asi nak but galaksi nandaŋek egɨpbeŋ. Nido, ji da nak Piŋkop da aŋpulugaŋakwan Telagɨ Wup Yesu Kristo da yabekgɨt uŋun da nandaŋ gadatno aŋteban asak do bɨsit aŋ yaŋ kɨlɨ nandagɨm. Yaŋ aŋ do nak nandɨsat, abɨsok yo noman taŋ namaŋ uŋun da nak aŋpulugaŋban tagɨsi egɨpdɨsat.
Ji da Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨŋba nandaŋakwan yo uŋun ais bɨsapmon bo Sabat bɨsapmon dɨma noman toni.
Mani Yawe, nak gak do jomjom asat. Amɨn Tagɨ, gak Piŋkopno, do gaga geno dakon kobogɨ aŋtobɨlbi.
Yum pɨndagaki uwalno da emaron dɨma abɨŋ nepni. Yo uŋun ak do nandaŋ uŋun paŋtobɨlbɨ iyɨkon noman toni.
Nak gak dakon yut do madepsi galak tosot, do yutgo da tagɨsi tosak do pi madepsi asat. Amɨn da gak do gen yokwi yaŋ gamaŋ uŋun yaŋba nagon obɨsak.
Gak da yaŋ yosol, “Mɨŋat amɨnyo ji aesi mɨktɨm dagoni.” Yaŋ yaŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo abɨ kɨmagek ae mɨktɨm dagoŋ.
Nak toktogɨsi but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨŋ kɨmotdɨsat. Aŋek uŋun gat saŋbek saŋbek aŋapdo saŋbek saŋbek uŋun toktok teban taŋ wɨgɨkdɨsak.
Amɨn uŋun kɨmokdok kaŋ, but pɨso gen uŋun pini toŋ asak. Mani but pɨso mandagɨt amɨn egɨsak kaŋ, but pɨso mandagɨt uŋun ɨsal tosok.
Yuodia gat ae Sintiki gat yaŋsi dayɨsat, jil Amɨn Tagɨ nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmamal do jil pɨdok pɨdok yɨpmaŋek but kaloŋ anjil.
Uŋun bɨsapmon emat wuwɨk gat ae dubagɨkon emat aŋ uŋun dakon gen bin apba nandaŋek butji dɨma pasolni. Uŋun yo morap altokdaŋ, mani mɨktɨm da mudosak bɨsap madep kɨlɨ uŋun noman tosok yaŋ dɨma nandani.
“Yaŋban amɨn madep uŋun da iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak oman monjɨ tagɨsi! Pi tagɨsi agɨl! Yo monɨŋɨsok mani kɨlani tagɨsi agɨl, do kokup pap 10 kabɨ kɨlani abi do man madep gamɨsat.’
Agakwa Telagɨ Wup da nak yaŋ nayɨgɨt, ‘Gak but bamot dɨma aŋek pɨgɨ uŋun gat kɨni.’ Yaŋ nayɨŋban pɨgapbo notno 6 kabɨ on akgamaŋ uŋun kɨsi buŋon nolba kɨŋ Konilias da yutnon wɨgɨgɨmaŋ.
Yaŋ nandagɨt, Kristo dakon man do mayaktok pakeŋ kaŋ, uŋun da Isip dakon yoni tagɨsi morap uŋun yapmaŋdak. Yaŋ nandagɨt nido Piŋkop da tomni do yo tagɨsi ɨmdɨsak uŋun do nandaŋek egɨpgut.
Mani dɨma. Kɨsi morap kosit kɨlegɨ kɨlɨ yɨpmaŋ dekgwit. Uŋun amɨn wagɨl amɨn yokwisi, kɨsi morap arɨp gɨn. Kɨndasok da aŋpak tagɨsi kɨnda dɨmasi asak.
Mani Amɨn Tagɨ, gagon bupmɨ ae nandaŋ yawotyo tugagɨt da tosok. Gak butjap tepmɨ dɨma nandɨsal. Gak nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋek gengo aŋteban aŋek nin paŋpulugaŋ wɨgɨsal.
Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Kɨnda nak gat jap ɨdapmon kɨsitnit kaloŋɨ yɨpmaŋgamak, uŋun amɨn da nak uwalno da kɨsiron nepdɨsak.
Ae sot teban kɨnda da kalbi altaŋ gamjak, bo gɨldat binap yo yokwisi kɨnda da gak aŋupbal asak yaŋ do pasol pasol dɨma abi.
Ɨleŋ Olipmon wɨgakwa Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun da arɨpmon ji manji namdaŋ. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Sipsip dakon kɨla amɨn aŋakgo kɨmagakwan sipsip waseŋ kɨ iyɨ iyɨ kɨkdaŋ.’
Do Yesu da Pita gat Jon gat yabegek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil kɨŋ Yapyap Bɨlak uŋun dakon jap paŋkosit abal noneŋ.”
Gen pasɨlɨ on dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun madepsi, mani nak uŋun yaŋ yosot, gen on Kristo gat paŋmuwukbini gat do yosok.
Yaŋ yaŋba Pailat da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep, ma?” Yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yagɨt, “Yosol uŋun mani.”
“Uŋun kwensi wɨgɨgɨt” yaŋ gen tɨm tosok, uŋun da yaŋ nolɨsak, Kristo uŋun kwen gɨn dɨma wɨgɨgɨt. Uŋun mibɨltok mɨktɨm dakon dɨwarɨ mibɨlɨsigwan kɨsi pɨgɨgɨt.
“Mani Parisi amɨn, awa! Ji jap tam galagɨsi pi kagasi toŋ uŋun paŋ kabi 10 kabɨ yopmaŋek uŋun kabɨkon baŋ kabi kɨndanaŋ Piŋkop do paret aŋ. Mani gen kokwin kɨlegɨ agak gat, ae Piŋkop do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨm uŋun ji dɨma aŋ. Aŋpak kɨlegɨ uŋun gat ae paretyo kɨsi ani kaŋ tagɨsi.
Telagɨ ɨmal yut gat yo morapni gat uŋun yo Kwen Kokup toŋ dakon wupmɨ gɨn. Uŋun yo daŋgwi toŋ dakon yawini tɨmɨgek uŋudon tagalba Piŋkop da dabɨlon gwaljɨgɨ mɨni awit. Mani, yo Kwen Kokup nani paŋtelak ak do paret wagɨl tagɨsi yo daŋgwi toŋ yapmaŋdak uŋun baŋ awit. Yaŋ dɨma awit tam dɨma telak taŋbam. Do uŋun agagɨsi awit.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ aŋpak kɨlegɨsi ak do pi madepsi aŋ kɨmagek Piŋkop gat Kwen Kokupmon tagɨsi egek man madep gat tɨlɨmni gat ae egɨp egɨp teban tɨmɨt do wusɨk wusɨk aŋ. Piŋkop da uŋun amɨn do egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni yomdɨsak.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji Piŋkop dakon gen teban yum pɨndagek dɨsi dakon yaŋ teban tok gen guramɨkgaŋ.
Amɨn kapmatjok akgwit da gen uŋun nandaŋek Pol yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak Piŋkop dakon mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨsal, ma?”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji wigat gɨtni naŋ pɨgɨni. Amɨn wagɨl tasɨk tokdaŋ dakon kokupmon pɨgɨk dakon wigat gat ae kositni gat uŋun ɨlalogɨsi, do uŋun naŋ yolek pɨgɨk uŋun tagapmɨsi. Amɨn morapmɨsi da wigat uŋun naŋ pɨkwaŋ.
Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn kabɨ Yesu gat jap naŋek yɨkgwit uŋun iyɨ gɨn yaŋ yawit, “On niaŋen amɨn kɨnda da dɨwarɨ yopyop asak?”
Kɨnda da yaŋ yosok, “Nak Pol yoldat” ae kɨnda da “Nak Apolos yoldat” yaŋ yosok. Uŋun aŋpak aŋek mɨktɨm amɨn da yaŋ ekwaŋ.
Yesu amɨn morapmɨsi apba pɨndagek Pilip yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “On mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ do bret dukon baŋ yumaŋ yomno noni?”
Mani kɨmoron da pɨdaŋek nak da kalɨp Galili mɨktɨmon mibɨltaŋ damɨŋek kɨkeŋ.”
Mani Pita pɨdaŋ tɨmtɨm yaŋek tɨp kɨnamon kɨŋ pagadaŋek pɨndakban ɨmal dagɨn tawit. Yaŋ pɨndagek yutnon tobɨl kɨŋek uŋun yo morap niaŋon da altawit yaŋ do nandak nandak agɨt.
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ morap ji Piŋkopnin aŋkɨsiŋakwa amɨn da wɨwɨkni nandani.
Not kabɨno, yaŋsi nandani. Dam tebanon nepmaŋ uŋun da Gen Bin Tagɨsi dakon kosit sopsop dɨma asak. Uŋun da Gen Bin Tagɨsi aŋɨreŋ asak.
Moneŋ do galagɨ nandak nandak uŋun yokwi morap dakon mibɨlɨ. Amɨn dɨwarɨ moneŋ do galak tawit, uŋun da ɨlɨkban nandaŋ gadatni yɨpmaŋ dekgwit aŋek jɨgɨ morapmɨ paŋek bupmɨsi nandaŋ.
Piŋkop da amɨn kɨmakbi ae wayɨŋ abi uŋun kɨsi aŋpakni kokwin asak do uŋun amɨn manjɨgɨt. Nin da gen uŋun amɨn yoyɨneŋ do Yesu da yaŋ nimgut.
waŋga kɨŋ mudokdaŋ. Aŋpak kɨlegɨ awit amɨn uŋun pɨdaŋek kalugɨ egɨpdaŋ. Ae aŋpak yokwi awit amɨn uŋun pɨdaŋek gen kokwin tamokon kwa gen kokwin amɨn da pasɨlni do yoyɨkdɨsak.”
Ji nandaŋ teban taŋek Amɨn Tagɨ da yo tagɨsi aŋ damjak do jomjom aŋ, do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek egɨpni. Ae jɨgɨ noman taŋ daba kaŋ, butji yaworɨ taŋakwa tebaisi atni. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ bɨsit aŋ kɨmotni.
Kalɨp Taitus da niaŋon da paret wasaŋek ani uŋun do dayɨgɨt, do jikon tobɨl kɨŋek paret dakon pi aŋ mudoni yaŋ dayɨsak do nin da tebai iyɨgɨmaŋ.
Ji dɨsi dakon man paukwaŋ, uŋun aŋpak tagɨ dɨma. Yis kaloŋɨsok dɨ da bret kɨsi paŋpap aŋ, ji uŋun dɨma nandaŋ, ma?
Jɨgɨ tepmɨyo noman taŋ damdaŋ nin uŋun do nandaŋek Piŋkop da ji paŋpulugosak do bɨsit yɨpmaŋ derɨ mɨni amaŋ. Nin Piŋkop da paŋpulugaŋban aŋpak ani do yaŋ damgut uŋun arɨpmɨ tagɨ ani do nandamaŋ. Nandaŋ gadaron da pi morap ak do nandaŋ, ae aŋpak tagɨsi morap ak do nandaŋ uŋun Piŋkop da tapmɨm daban ani do bɨsit amaŋ.
Monjɨ tagaŋ teban taŋek nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi taŋ ɨmgut. Ae Piŋkop dakon gɨsamni madepsi taŋ ɨmgut.
Yaŋ aban kaŋakwa Elaija gat Moses gat altaŋbal Yesu gat gen yaŋ nandat aba pɨndakgwit.
Mani ni gen bamɨ kɨnda naŋ mandaŋ yɨpbo amɨn madepninon kɨsak uŋun dɨma nandako pɨsosok. Dam tebanon amɨn kɨnda yɨpbo kɨŋakwan gen yaŋ ɨmgwit dakon but pɨso gen kɨnda gat dɨma yɨpbo kɨsak kaŋ uŋun tagɨ dɨma. Do kɨla amɨn madep Agripa, gak ae amɨn kabɨ ji kɨsi da on amɨn dakon mibɨlɨ nandani do aŋek muwamaŋ. Mibɨlni pakyaŋsi nandano pɨsaŋakwan gen bamɨ papiakon tagɨ mandakeŋ.”
Mani uŋun amɨn yo morap mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaŋ pɨsoŋ uŋun do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ. Uŋun bɨt kɨlapyo burɨ mɨni yombem da gɨptɨm dakon galaktok yolgaŋ. Uŋun aŋpakni da obɨsi paŋupbal aŋ.
Amɨn kabɨ uŋun manjɨŋ yabekbi kabɨ da ɨŋamon yopba akgwit. Agakwa pi uŋun ani do kɨsitni kwenikon wutjɨŋek gɨsam yomɨŋek bɨsit awit.
Nak gapma dubagɨsikon maŋ neŋak kagagwan egapbo Yawe da ɨlɨkban wɨgɨm. Awɨŋ tɨp kwenon nepban kosit tagɨ agɨpgum.
Gak da not tetgɨn dakon mɨktɨm wasagɨl, ae saut tetgɨn dakon mɨktɨm kɨsi wasagɨl. Ɨleŋ Tabor gat ae Ɨleŋ Emon gat gak do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek kap yaŋ gamamal.
Bɨsit nayɨŋbɨ mɨŋat amɨn morap mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun gak do gabo mɨktɨm kɨsisi kɨla abi.
Nak aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ yomɨsat, mani kobogɨ do aŋpak yokwi aŋ namaŋ. Nak aŋpak kɨlegɨ yolapbo uŋun do nandaŋek nak dakon uwal dagoŋ.
Ji yokwi pakpak amɨn, mani monjɨsi do yo tagɨ yomaŋ. Do yaŋsi nandani. Ji bɨsit iyɨŋba Datji Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun da Telagɨ Wup tagɨ damjak.”
Kwen Kokup kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamonikon yɨkdak amɨn jɨkgo yanjaŋ yomɨsak. Amɨn Tagɨ da jɨgɨlagon da pabɨŋ yopmaŋdak.
Nak Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni yɨpbo yo ɨsalɨ dɨma asak. Gen teban yolek amɨn kɨlegɨ tagɨ aneŋ kaŋ, Kristo ɨsal dogɨn kɨmakgɨt.
Wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ asal uŋun oman amɨngo nin do nolɨŋbɨ pɨndatneŋ. Ae tɨlɨmgo tagɨsi mɨŋat monjɨyonin do yolɨŋbɨ pɨndatni dosi nandɨsat.
Yawe butjɨgon da egɨsak amɨn da kapmatjok egɨsak, ae nagon yo tagɨ dɨ dɨma noman tokdaŋ yaŋ nandɨsak amɨn uŋun aŋpulugosok.
Yo yokwi aŋnamaŋ uŋun iyɨkon noman toni. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ dɨma nepmaŋ dekdal, do uwalno dapbɨ pasɨl mudoni.
Uŋun da but galak do yo yaŋ baŋ yomgut: Amɨn dɨwarɨ yabekbi pi ani do yomgut, ae amɨn dɨwarɨ kombɨ amɨn pi yomgut, ae amɨn dɨwarɨ amɨnon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋok ani do pi yomgut, ae amɨn dɨwarɨ pasto pi yomgut, ae dɨwarɨ yoyɨŋdet pi yomgut.
Gak mɨŋat amɨnyo aego butni pabɨ pɨsaŋba kɨla amɨn madep gat ae gapman dakon pɨŋbini egek geni guramɨk kɨmotni. Aŋek bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ pi tagɨsi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ morapmɨ ak do tagap toni.
Piŋkop, dubagɨkon dɨma egɨpbi. Piŋkopno, tepmɨsi abɨŋek nak aŋpulugoki.
Yaŋ yaŋek Galili Provinskon dukwan dukwan kɨsi agek Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut morapmon Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋek koŋ yol yomɨŋek agɨpgut.
Uwalno kɨsi da muwugek gen pɨsɨgon da yo yokwisi kɨnda da altaŋ ɨmɨk yaŋ yaŋek yaŋ yoŋ,
Kristo pakyaŋsi nandaŋ ɨm do nandɨsat. Uŋun kɨmagek aeni pɨdagɨt, do tapmɨmni nagon tosak do nandɨsat. Ae tepmɨ pagɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn pakeŋ do nandɨsat. Ae kɨmot do aŋek nandak nandak pagɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn pakeŋ do nandɨsat.
Yaŋ yaŋakwal mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da pɨdaŋ agek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma yoyɨki? On amɨn morap gen yaŋ gaba niaŋ nandaŋ yomɨsal?”
Amɨn morap kɨsi do aŋpak tagɨsi aŋyomɨsak. Aŋek yo morap wasagɨt uŋun do bupmɨkon da kɨlani asak.
Mukwa sogok dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ. Piŋkop da amɨn kɨnda abɨdaŋ mɨŋat amɨnyo dakon binap amɨni egɨpjak do manjɨsak. Uŋun Piŋkop do but galak dakon yo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ ɨmɨm gat ae yokwi wɨrɨrɨt dakon paret mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ agak dakon pi baŋ asak.
“Ae kɨnda yoŋ uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn kɨnda da alta do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, tagɨ kɨrɨŋɨtjak. Mani amɨn kɨnda da altakon paret toŋ do geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, tagɨ dɨma kɨrɨŋɨtjak.’
Nin wain nok do wain sop pamaŋ, aŋek but galaksi nandamaŋ. Ae tomno dabɨlnin sono gulgwa ani yaŋ do olip dakon nelagɨ pamaŋ. Ae jap da gɨptɨmnin paŋteban ani do pigaga jap pamaŋ.
“Jareŋ oni taŋ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋun do nandani. Pi madep aŋek ɨmal dɨma bupmaŋgaŋ. Mani yaŋ dayɨsat, jareŋ pɨndakgaŋ uŋun dakon tɨlɨmni da kalɨp kɨla amɨn madep Solomon dakon tɨlɨmni tagɨsi pagɨt uŋun yapmaŋdak.
Mukwa sogok amɨngo paŋpulugaŋaki toktogɨsi aŋpak kɨlegɨ ani. Aŋaki uŋun aŋpakni kɨlegɨ da ɨmalni tagɨsi da yaŋ asak. Ae mɨŋat amɨnyogo paŋpulugaŋaki kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek kap yoni dosi nandɨsat.
Yesu da gen uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Mɨŋat on yum koni. Nak kɨmokgo soŋ namɨŋek kɨmakbi tamokon nepni uŋun bɨsap do pakbi on aŋnoman agɨt.
Monjɨ uŋun Amɨn Dakon Monji egɨsak, do Dat da yaŋ mudaŋ ɨban gen kokwin asak.
Gagon opbeŋ do nayɨsal, do Yawe nak kɨlɨ uŋun obɨsat.
Aŋek gɨldat kɨnda do tap wakga dakon pi monjɨ da tap wakga dakon yoni dɨwarɨ maba pɨgɨwit.
Ae uwal da dɨwarɨ jɨgɨlak gen yoyɨŋek baljawit, ae dɨwarɨ nap teban baŋ paŋteban aŋek dam tebanon yopgwit.
Abɨsok jap do aŋ amɨn ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ. Don jap naŋ tugokdaŋ. Abɨsok kunam takgaŋ amɨn ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ. Don jɨkgo yanjakdaŋ.
Kɨlɨ Yesu pakbi ɨdap yɨpmaŋek ɨleŋ kɨndakon wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨgek yabekbini dagoni do nandagɨt amɨn yoyɨŋban iyɨkon abɨŋ muwukgwit.
Luk, wuda wamaknin uŋun but dasi galak taŋ ɨmamaŋ, uŋun gat ae Demas gat da gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ dayamal.
Ae don, yo morap Kristo dakon pɨŋbini taŋakwa Monjɨ da iyɨ naŋ Piŋkop dakon pɨŋbini yɨpdɨsak. Mibɨltok Piŋkop da yo morap Monji dakon pɨŋbini yopgut, mani Monji da iyɨ naŋ Piŋkop dakon pɨŋbini yɨpjak bɨsapmon Piŋkop da yo morap dakon wukwisini yɨtdɨsak.
‘Amɨn Tagɨ da yaŋ yosok, “Dewit dakon dɨwatni uŋun yut kɨnda yombem. Uŋun yut da maŋ tuwɨl kɨgɨt, mani nak da aeno don abɨŋ aŋmɨlɨp aŋek wɨtjɨkeŋ.
Amɨn yokwi da iyɨ do nandaba wɨgakwa aŋpak yokwini aŋ uŋun do pɨbɨt tɨdok aŋ.
Nin nandamaŋ, gen teban Piŋkop da ni pi naŋ asak do nandagɨt uŋun asak kaŋ, gen teban uŋun yo tagɨsi kɨnda.
Gen teban uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp yom do noman tagɨt. Mani uŋun da egɨp egɨp dɨma namgut, kɨmot namgut.
Nin Yesu Kristo nandaŋ ɨmamaŋ, ae iyɨ uŋun Piŋkop do tapmɨm madepnikon da egɨp egɨpnin paŋteban asak dakon yo morap gat ae Piŋkop dakon aŋpak aneŋ dakon yo morap arɨpmɨsi nimgut. Nin da man madepni gat, ae tapmɨmni gat, ae aŋpakni tagɨsi gat tɨmɨtneŋ do aŋek, nin yaŋ nimgut.
“Ae kɨnda da abɨŋ yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, gol moneŋ tabɨlgo oni. Gak teban teban amɨn kɨnda yaŋ gandɨsat. Yo amɨn da yopmaŋgaŋ uŋun gak da sɨgo tɨmɨkdal. Ae jap amɨn da kwaokgaŋ uŋun yo kɨsi sɨgo pasal. Yaŋ asal do pasalek ɨmal dɨwatjok kɨndakon wamaŋ yɨpbo tagɨt.’
Pailat da Yesu pulugaŋ yɨpban kɨsak dosi nandagɨt, do mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep dakon burɨ moni do aeni gen yoyɨgɨt.
Aŋek amɨn bamot tɨmɨgek gen pikon yop do nandawit, mani pɨlɨn tok do agɨt do aŋwa don yaŋ nandaŋek dam teban yutnon yopgwit.
Amɨn morapmɨ emat aŋ, bo gapman gat emat aŋ, uŋun dakon geni apba nandaŋ kaŋ dɨma pasolni. Yo uŋun da mibɨltok altokdaŋ. Mani mibɨ bɨsap madep uŋudon gɨn dɨma altokdɨsak.”
Nak kalɨp Moses dakon gen teban yol kɨmagek Piŋkop da dabɨlon man kɨlegɨ pak do pi madep agɨm da don Yesu nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek uŋun nandak nandak wagɨl yɨpgum. Do uŋun nandak nandak aeno abɨdokeŋ kaŋ, nak yokwi pakpak amɨn kɨnda.
Yɨgakwa Yesu da tɨlak gen morapmɨ yoyɨŋek kɨnda yaŋ yagɨt,
Yaŋdo, amɨn kɨnda nak tebaisi akdat yaŋ nandɨsak amɨn uŋun kaŋ kɨmotjak. Yokwikon dɨ maŋban.
Jap dogɨn aŋek Piŋkop da amɨnon pi tagɨsi asak uŋun dɨma aŋupbal ani. Jap morap kɨsi noknogɨ gɨn, mani gak da jap kɨnda naŋaki uŋun do aŋek notgo dakon nandaŋ gadatni wɨtdal kɨsak kaŋ, gak yokwi asal.
Paŋmuwukbi dukwan dukwan waseŋ kɨwit uŋun agek amɨnon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋawit.
Yawe da amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon man mandakdɨsak. Aŋek paŋmuwugek Jerusalem mɨŋat amɨnyo gat kɨsi manjɨkdɨsak.
Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon yoma wɨtdal gabeŋ. Gen mɨktɨmon yaŋ aŋteban abi, Kwen Kokupmon Piŋkop da yaŋ gɨn yaŋ aŋteban asak. Ae gen mɨktɨmon yaŋ wɨtdalbi, Kwen Kokup-mon Piŋkop da yaŋ gɨn yaŋ wɨtdaljak.”
Nak bret do yat yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Dɨma. Ji Parisi gat ae Sadyusi amɨn gat dakon yisni do pakyaŋsi kaŋ kɨmotni, nak uŋun do dayɨt.”
Aŋek teŋteŋaŋ niban nin kɨsi mɨktɨmon maŋpak mudagɨmaŋ. Maŋ pagek nandaŋapbo Ibru genon da gen kɨnda yaŋ nandagɨm, ‘Sol, gak nido nak aŋupbal ak do pi asal? Gak nak dakon galaktok yol do kurak taŋek gaga naŋ tepmɨ ɨmɨsal.’
Uŋun kɨmagek yo dɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma pabɨdaŋek kɨkdaŋ. Yo morapni tɨlɨmɨ toŋ uŋun gat kɨsi tɨmɨgek kɨmakbi kokupmon arɨpmɨ dɨma kɨkdaŋ.
Kɨŋ egɨ don wain sop pakpak bɨsap kwaŋ taŋakwan oman monjɨ kɨnda yabekban wain bamɨ tɨmɨk paŋopjak do kɨgɨt. Mani pi kɨla awit amɨn da oman monjɨ obɨsi aŋagek bamɨ dɨ dɨma ɨmɨŋek yolba kɨgɨt.
Juda amɨn Maria dakon but aŋteban ak do yutnon egɨpgwit uŋun da kaŋba Maria tepmɨsi pɨdaŋ waŋga pɨkwan kaŋ, kɨmakbi tamokon kunam tat do kɨsak yaŋ nandaŋek buŋon yolgwit.
Nak Jerusalem wɨgɨgɨm bɨsapmon Juda amɨn dakon mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨni gat, ae kɨla amɨni gat da uŋun amɨn gen yaŋ ɨmgwit. Yaŋ ɨmɨŋek suŋ agɨt dakon kobogɨ nak da yaŋ dagok aŋapbo kobogɨ yokwi abɨdosak do yawit.
Nak amɨn dakon gen mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ ae aŋelo dakon gen kɨsi yokeŋ, mani amɨn do but dasi galaktaŋ yomyom aŋpak nagon dɨma tosak kaŋ, nak goŋgoŋ bo ae dubaŋ mibɨlɨ mɨni tɨdoŋ uŋun yombem.
Mani eni yɨpmaŋdetjak kaŋ ɨsal egɨpjak, bo tobɨl kwan eni gat but kaloŋ anjil. Ae eni mɨŋatni dɨma kwɨnɨtjak.
Ae dabɨlni abɨ pɨlɨn taŋakwa yo dɨma pɨndatni, ae jɨgɨ morapmɨ ɨmek yomɨŋaki manji gɨroŋɨtni, aŋek yaŋ gɨn egɨ wɨgɨni dosi nandɨsat.”
Yesu Ɨleŋ Olipmon yɨgakwan Telagɨ Yut Madep ason tet tagɨt. Aŋakwan Pita, Jems, Jon ae Andru da iyɨ gɨn Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit,
Yaŋdo, amɨn kɨnda Kristokon gadasak kaŋ, Piŋkop da aŋkaluk aban amɨn kalugɨ kɨnda dagosok. Mao! Aŋpak kalɨpmɨ pasɨlakwan aŋpak kalugɨ kɨlɨ noman tak.
Yaŋba Yesu da paŋdet kabɨni pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn iyɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma ani, mani Piŋkop da arɨpmɨ tagɨ asak. Piŋkop da yo morap ak do tagɨ asak.”
Nak Pol, Piŋkop dakon oman monjɨ ae Yesu Kristo dakon yabekbini. Nak mɨŋat amɨnyo Piŋkop da iyɨ do manjɨgɨt uŋun dakon nandaŋ gadatni paŋteban abeŋ do nak yabekgɨt, ae paŋpulugoko gen bamɨ nandaŋ pɨsaŋek Piŋkop dakon aŋpak yolek ani yaŋ do nak yabekgɨt.
Mani gen mandagɨm dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ: Amɨn kɨnda Kristo dakon man paŋek yumabi aŋpak asak, bo amɨn dakon yo do pɨndak galaktok asak, bo kokup kɨdat gawak yomɨsak, bo amɨn do yaŋba yokwi tok asak, bo pakbi teban naŋek but upbal asak, bo amɨn dakon yo kabo tɨmɨkdak kaŋ, ji uŋun amɨn gat kaloŋɨ dɨma egɨpni. Ae uŋun gat jap pakbiyo kaloŋɨ dɨma ani.
Yawe da saŋbek saŋbek agɨt uŋun yolek geni guramɨkgaŋ amɨn do yo tagɨsi aŋ yomdɨsak.
Israel mɨŋat amɨnyo, ji Yawe aŋkɨsini. Yawe dakon mukwa sogok amɨn, ji mani aŋkɨsini.
Mani kalɨp Piŋkop da kombɨ amɨn kɨsi da gen kagakon da Kristo tepmɨ pasak do yagɨt. Do ji da Yesu aŋakba gen uŋun bamɨ toŋ agɨt.
Gen dayɨsat uŋun amɨn morap kɨsi do yosot. Kaŋ kɨmotni.”
Amɨn egɨp egɨpni moneŋon gɨn toŋ yaŋ nandaŋek pɨbɨt tɨdok aŋ amɨn uŋun da nak aŋgwasɨŋek aŋupbal ak do aŋ. Mani uŋun aŋ amɨn do dɨma pasolgeŋ.
Nin Babilon amɨn dakon pakbini da ɨleŋɨkon yɨgek Saion kokup pap do nandak nandak aŋek kunam takgɨmaŋ.
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨgo yokwikon baŋ pulugaŋ yopbi. Gaga do manjɨgɨl amɨn kabɨ yo tagɨsi aŋ yobi. Kɨla amɨni egek dagok dagogɨ mɨni kɨlani abi.
Asi gak tɨp madepno ae dam tebano arɨpmɨ dɨma tuwɨlɨ egɨsal. Gak dakon man dɨma yokwi tosak do mibɨltaŋ namɨŋek kosit nolayɨki.
Yesu uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋek Galili Pakbi Ɨdap da ɨleŋɨkon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋek uŋudon da ɨleŋ kɨndakon pawɨgɨ yɨkgɨt.
Saŋbek saŋbek kalɨpmɨkon mɨŋat amɨnyo Piŋkop da dabɨlon garak aba mukwa sogok amɨn da meme gat ae bulmakau wɨli dakon yawi, ae bulmakau mɨŋat soŋba soŋ pasɨlgaŋ dakon abɨlakni uŋun baŋ tɨmɨgek uŋun mɨŋat amɨnyokon tagal yomgwit. Uŋun Piŋkop da dabɨlon gwaljɨgɨ mɨni egɨpni do aŋek yaŋ awit.
amɨn wam kɨlɨ abi da yumabi aŋpak, pɨndak galaktok, aŋpak yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, top gen yogok, kwen wɨgɨk, tagɨsi ekwaŋ amɨn do nandaba yokwi tok nandak nandak, ae not do yokwi yogok, gen kɨrɨŋɨt, ae ŋugɨgɨ aŋpak.
Uŋun kokup papmon pɨlɨn kɨnda dɨma tokdɨsak, do kokup pap dakon nagal dakon yoma dagok dagogɨ mɨni pɨsokdaŋ.
Naga pi teban yaŋ aŋek dayɨŋ dolɨgɨm. Jiyo yaŋ gɨn aŋek teban tokni mɨni amɨn uŋun paŋpulugoni. Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu iyɨ gen kɨnda yagɨt uŋun dɨma ɨŋtoneŋ. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Yo ɨmɨsak amɨn dakon kɨsɨk kɨsɨkni wukwi, aŋakwan ɨban abɨdosok amɨn dakon kɨsɨk kɨsɨkni pɨŋbi.’ ”
Gengo da nak tagɨ aŋpulugosak yaŋ nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom asat. Do mɨŋat amɨn morap gak do pasolgoŋ amɨn nak nandani bɨsapmon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani dosi nandɨsat.
Kɨmakban uŋun da buŋon nani da sakwabat paŋek yaŋ gɨn monji mɨni egɨ kɨmakgɨt. Ae uŋun da buŋon nani yaŋ gɨn agɨt.
Wɨsa dagokdo Yesu Galili Provinskon kɨk do aŋek Pilip kaŋ kwaŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋ nak nol.”
Yaŋba Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Uŋun asi, nak naga joŋɨgek yaŋkwok asat. Nak dukwan da apgum ae dukwan kɨkeŋ uŋun nandɨsat, do yaŋkwok asat uŋun bamɨsi yosot. Mani nak dukwan da apgum ae dukwan kɨkeŋ uŋun ji dɨma nandaŋ.
Kɨŋakwan yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jikon da kɨnda dakon monji bo bulmakauni Sabat bɨsapmon pakbi gapmakon maŋban tepmɨ tagɨ ɨlɨkba wɨsak bo dɨma?”
Ji altok altok kalugɨ kɨlɨ awit, do aŋpak yokwi morap yɨpmaŋ mudoni. Top yogok aŋpak gat, ae jamba but aŋpak morap gat, ae tagɨsi ekwaŋ amɨn do nandaba yokwi tok gat, ae yaŋba yokwi tok morap gat uŋun kɨsi yɨpmaŋ mudoni.
Yaŋ yaŋban gen kɨnda kalɨp yagɨt uŋun bamɨ toŋ agɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Amɨn kabɨ uŋun nak do namgul uŋun kɨnda dɨma yɨpbo pasɨlgɨt.”
Yumaŋ naŋek amɨn kɨla ani do manjɨŋ yopgul, ae nin dakon Piŋkop dakon oman ani do mukwa sogok amɨni manjɨŋ yopgul. Uŋun da kɨla amɨn madep egek mɨktɨmon amɨn kɨlani akdaŋ.”
yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil ason kokup komaŋ uŋudon kɨŋ altaŋek uŋudon gɨn donki bɨlagɨ kɨnda napmon akban konjil. Uŋun donki amɨn da kwenikon dɨma yɨkbi. Napmɨ wɨtdalek aŋopjil.
Yaŋ agɨt do Saion mɨŋat amɨnyo da Yawe dakon man yaŋ teŋteŋoni. Jerusalem mɨŋat amɨnyo da aŋkɨsini.
Dɨsi nandaŋ, mɨŋatjok sakwabat dɨwarɨ kosit kɨlegɨ kɨlɨ yɨpmaŋ dekgwit da Sunduk yolgaŋ.
Amɨn agɨpgwit gat akwaŋ bo yaŋ nandaŋek agakwal gɨldat kɨnda mudagɨt. Don dɨwatni ae notni agɨpgwit da bɨkbɨknikon wusɨgɨmal.
Yaŋ nandaŋakwa Yesu uŋun burɨkon da pɨndak nandaŋ yomɨŋ mudaŋek yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido butjikon da nandak nandak uŋun nandaŋ namaŋ?
Yawe, yo morap wasagɨl uŋun da mango aŋkɨsini. Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨgo da mango aŋkɨsini.
Pita gen sigɨn yaŋakwan gɨkwem da pɨŋ ɨlɨmɨk yomaŋakwan pasalgwit.
Ae Kristo yolyol mɨŋat kɨnda eni nandaŋ gadat dɨma asak, mani mɨŋatni gat egɨp do nandɨsak kaŋ, eni dɨma yɨpmaŋdetjak.
Pi jikon agɨm uŋun ɨsalɨ asak yaŋ do ji dakon aŋpak do nandaŋek si pasoldot.
Iyɨ do pasolgoŋ amɨn jap yomɨsak. Saŋbek saŋbek agɨt uŋun dɨma ɨŋtosok.
Notnoni gat ae gen kaloŋno gat nak da kapmatjok ap do dɨma galak toŋ, nido wudano yokwisi. Gwakno kɨsi dubagɨkon ekwaŋ.
Nak Piŋkop Wukwisi do yaŋ tɨdosot. Uŋun da aŋpulugaŋban galaktokni tagɨ yolgeŋ.
Ae Erot yo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn nandaŋek aeni yɨpban ninon tobɨl abɨsak. Aŋatno kɨmotjak da tɨlak yokwi kɨnda dɨma agɨt kosot.
Gak da egɨp egɨp papiakon mani wɨrɨrɨkgi. Ae amɨn kɨlegɨ dakon man gat kɨsi mani dɨma mandaki dosi nandɨsat.
Mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek yaŋ tɨdaŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsini.
Uŋun da Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun dakon but paŋteŋteŋ aban Piŋkop dakon mibɨlɨ nandakdaŋ. Aŋek gak dakon amɨn kabɨgo Israel dakon tɨlɨmni egɨpdɨsak.”
Nandak nandakno mɨnisi agɨt. Joŋ kɨlap burɨ mɨni da yaŋ gak da dabɨlon aŋpak agɨm.
Nak Pol, Yesu Kristo dakon yabekbini. Iyɨ da galak togon Piŋkop da yabekbi pi namgut. Papia on telagɨ paŋmuwukbi kokup pap Epesas egek Yesu Kristo yol kɨmokgoŋ amɨn ji do mandɨsat.
Obɨŋ dandak do nandak nandak agɨm uŋun kalkalɨ agɨm yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Nak yo ak do nandak nandak asat uŋun mɨktɨm amɨn da gen kaga da “Akeŋ” yaŋ yaŋek dɨma aŋ, nak yaŋ asat yaŋ nandaŋ, ma?
Ae on mɨktɨm dakon yo tɨmɨgek pi aŋ amɨn uŋun yo morap pɨndakba egɨp egɨpnikon yo madep dɨma ani. Nido bɨsap dubak dɨma on mɨktɨm gat yo morapni gat pasɨldaŋ.
Gak kokupgokon kwen egek sɨkak yɨpbɨ kabap morapmon moŋ. Pi asal dakon bamɨ da on mɨktɨmon tugosok.
Ji da gen uŋun yoŋ, mani Piŋkop da pi morap agɨt uŋun pɨndagek nandano nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi gɨn asak.”
Mani Piŋkop da iyɨ nandaŋ kokwinɨgek yerɨ kaloŋ kaloŋ do obi tamɨyo iyɨkon iyɨkon wasosok.
Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdetni amɨn kabɨ madep yopmaŋ degek boron wɨkwa paŋdetni gat kɨsi kɨwit. Ae bot dɨwarɨ gat kɨsi kɨwit.
Mani Yawe da yo morap ak do yosok uŋun joŋɨgek aŋ mudosok. Pi morap ak do nandɨsak uŋun toktogɨsi kulabɨk arɨpmɨ dɨma asak.
Nak bulmakau dakon sabamni gat ae meme dakon yawi gat uŋun nosot yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Uŋun dɨmasi.
Bɨsitno da mukwa kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi da yaŋ gagon opjak dosi nandɨsat. Ae gak do kɨsitno paŋenokdot uŋun da pɨlɨndo dakon paretno yaŋ asak.
Mɨktɨm gat ae yo morap uŋungwan toŋ uŋun Yawe dakon. Ae kokup morap gat ae mɨŋat amɨn morap uŋungwan ekwaŋ kɨsi uŋun dakon gɨn.
Piŋkop da namɨn amɨn kabɨ da yɨk yawot kokupmon arɨpmɨ dɨma kɨni do gen tebaisi yaŋ aŋteban agɨt? Mɨŋat amɨnyo geni abɨŋ yɨpgwit uŋun dogɨn agɨt.
Uŋuden amɨn Piŋkop da gɨsamɨtjak. Yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨgek amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ iyɨsak.
paŋdetni gat boron wɨgek mɨktɨm Dalmanuta tetgɨn do kɨwit.
Yawe, gak Piŋkop Wɨkwisi egɨsal. Ya yaŋ yaŋek kap yaŋek mango aŋkɨsineŋ kaŋ uŋun tagɨsi.
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nakyo kɨsi gen kɨnda dayɨko kobogɨ nayɨni.
Nak ji mayagɨ dam do gen on dɨma mandɨsat. Ji monjɨ gwayono but dasi galak taŋ damɨsat, do nawa gen on dayɨsat.
Jap yet kwaŋek bamɨ tok do aŋakwa joŋ yokwi kɨsi kwaŋ wɨwit.
Ae amɨn kɨnda Kwen Kokup do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, Piŋkop dakon kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamo gat ae Piŋkop iyɨ tamonikon yɨkdak uŋun gat kɨsi do geni yaŋ aŋteban asak.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu da mɨŋat uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nandaŋ gadatgo do aŋek Piŋkop da gak yokwikon naŋ abɨdosok. Butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan kɨki.”
uŋun dagɨn kalɨp Kristokon pi agɨt. Kristo kɨmakban Piŋkop dakon tapmɨm madepnikon da Piŋkop da aban pɨdaŋban awɨgɨ Kwen Kokup iyɨ da amɨn tet do yɨpban yɨkgɨt.
Gak da nandaŋ yawot aŋ nabi do yaŋ teban tok agɨl, do yaŋsi abi do bɨsit gayɨsat.
Abɨsok nak nandɨsat. Yawe da kɨla amɨn madepni iyɨ manjɨgɨt aŋpulugosok. Uŋun Kwen Kokup kokupni tagɨsikon egek bɨsitni nandɨsak. Iyɨ da tapmɨmon aŋpulugaŋek uwalni da kɨsiron naŋ abɨdosok.
Uŋun da Piŋkop tɨlɨmni toŋ egɨp egɨp teban egɨsak uŋun manji ɨmɨŋek dɨma gawak ɨmgwit. Yum kaŋek amɨn egɨ kɨmak kɨmak amaŋ uŋun dakon wupmɨ gat, ae mɨnam, ae bɨt kɨlapyo gat, ae bɨrombak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ dakon wupmɨ wasaŋek gawak yomgwit.
Aŋakwa amɨn dɨ da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Meŋgo padɨk padɨkgoyo yomakon agek gak gandak do yoŋ.”
Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn notni dakon nandak nandak arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨndatjak. Amɨn uŋun dakon wupni butnigwan yɨkdak uŋun dagɨn pɨndakdak. Yaŋgɨn, amɨn kɨnda da Piŋkop dakon nandak nandak arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨndatjak. Piŋkop iyɨ dakon Wupni da iyɨ gɨn kaŋ nandaŋyo asak.
Nido nin yaŋsi nandamaŋ, Piŋkop da Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt, ae uŋun da nin Yesu gat kɨsi kɨmoron baŋ paban pɨdokdamaŋ, ae uŋun da nin gat ae ji gat kɨsi tɨmɨk paŋkɨ nipban iyɨ da kapmatjok egɨpdamaŋ.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Uŋun bɨsapmon tɨlak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gɨldat dabɨlon, ae kanegon, ae gɨgon noman tokdaŋ. Aŋakwa mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ morapmɨ nandaŋakwa tap da madepsi tamalɨgakwan pasol pasol madepsi aŋek butni tagɨ dɨma tokdɨsak.
Piŋkop da yaŋ iyɨŋban Kaldia mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋek Aran mɨktɨmon paŋkɨ egɨpgut. Paŋkɨ egakwan datni kɨmagakwan Piŋkop da yabekban ji da abɨsok on mɨktɨm ekwaŋon apgut.
Kɨlɨ kundukon tɨlak ŋwakŋwarɨsi kɨnda noman tagɨt. Tɨlak uŋun yaŋ: Mɨŋat kɨnda gɨldat dabɨl naŋ ɨmalɨ do wamgut. Aŋakwan kanek kandapni da mukgwan tagɨt, ae gɨk 12 kabɨ da busuŋɨkon pelɨrɨ do taŋ ɨmgwit.
Uŋun da yaŋ yoŋ, “Piŋkop da arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋpulugokdɨsak.”
Piŋkop aŋkɨlɨt do aŋek yaŋ awit, jap si galak tawit uŋun si yomjak dosi tebai iyɨwit.
Amɨn kɨmakba ɨŋtaŋ yomamaŋ uŋudeŋ amɨn morap kɨsi nak do ɨŋtaŋ namaŋ. Nak mɨktɨm kwoba pudaŋ kwa maba kwaŋ uŋun yombem.
Aso uŋun Sadok dakon datni. Sadok uŋun Akim dakon datni. Akim uŋun Eliut dakon datni.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae kɨla amɨn da “Tɨlak gen uŋun nin do yosok” yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu abɨdok do nandawit. Mani mɨŋat amɨn do pasalek yɨpba si kɨgɨt.
