Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Amɨn tagɨ, uŋun bret bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ nin do nibi.”
Amɨn da monjɨ ŋakŋak Yesu da kɨsitni kwenikon wutjɨsak do paŋopgwit. Uŋun pɨndagek paŋdetni da kɨrɨŋɨk yomgwit.
Yaŋ aŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da kosiron ɨmalni kukwaŋ yalɨwit. Aŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ da kɨŋ kɨndap kɨlɨŋ mandaŋ paŋobɨŋ kosiron yalɨwit.
Bɨsit yɨpmaŋ derɨ mɨni aŋek egɨpni.
Ae Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo da manon da bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ yo morap do Piŋkop Dat ya yaŋ iyɨŋ kɨmotni.
Kɨŋakwal Antiok kokupmon Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn burɨkon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk nandawit, ae Telagɨ Wup da tugaŋ yomgut.
Piŋkop dakon Wup da pi asak bo dɨma yaŋon da kaŋ nandaŋyo ani: Amɨn kɨnda da Yesu Kristo uŋun amɨnsi dagagɨt yaŋ yosak kaŋ, uŋun Piŋkop da yabekdak yaŋ nandaŋ ɨmni.
Kɨla amɨn madep uŋun bɨlak morapmɨ egɨpjak dosi nandɨsat. Arebia mɨktɨm amɨn da gol ɨmni. Gɨldat kɨnda kaloŋ Piŋkop da aŋpulugosak do mɨŋat amɨnyo da bɨsit aŋ ɨmni dosi nandɨsat.
Kɨlɨ aŋelo 4 da ɨdap madepni gɨldaron tagalgɨt. Tagalakwan Piŋkop da gɨldat do tapmɨm ɨmɨŋakwan gɨldat da madep taŋek amɨn soŋ yomgut.
Abɨsok gen teban yapyap aŋpak uŋun pasɨlɨkon da asak. Pasɨlɨkon taŋakwan don Piŋkop da bɨkbɨk ɨmɨŋakwan noman tokdɨsak.
Ji da si anisi do gen teban dɨma yɨpmaŋdat. Masadonia paŋmuwukbi da paret ak do burɨ pɨdoŋ, jiyo yaŋ gɨn paret ak do butji pɨdoni kaŋ, nak da ji asisi amɨn do but dasi galaktaŋ yomaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ dabeŋ.
Egek amɨn morapmɨsi Yesu iyɨ dakon geni nandaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit.
Gak amɨn pelaŋ gen tebai dɨma yoyɨki. Datgo gen yaworɨkon da yoyɨŋ paŋmɨlɨp asal, yaŋ gɨn gen yaworɨkon da yoyɨŋ paŋmɨlɨp abi. Ae gaga dakon padɨk padɨkgo do aŋpak niaŋ asal, monjɨ bulagɨ do yaŋ gɨn abi.
Egɨp egɨp namɨŋaki mango aŋkɨsikeŋ. Gengo da aŋpulugosak do nandɨsat.
Nak abɨsok bɨt kɨlapyo kokup kɨdat do parekbi uŋun dakon geni yokdɨsat. Nin kɨsi morap nandak nandaknin toŋ, yaŋ nandamaŋ. Nandak nandak uŋun da kwen wɨgɨk aŋpak paŋalon asak, mani but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak da paŋmuwukbi paŋteban asak.
Yesu Jon dam tebanon yɨpgwit yaŋ nandaŋek tobɨl Galili mɨktɨmon kɨgɨt.
Nak gen yaŋ yosot, ‘Ji piŋkop ekwaŋ. Ji Piŋkop Wukwi Madep dakon monjini ekwaŋ.
Piŋkop, gak tapmɨmgo kalɨp nolɨgɨl, uŋun naŋ abɨsok nomansi nolɨki.
Yaŋ aŋek uŋun kɨla amɨn madep dakon mɨktɨmni amɨn kabɨni Israel do yomgut.
Ji gat but kaloŋ egɨp do nandaŋ kaŋ, amɨn morap kɨsi gat but kaloŋon da egɨp do pi madepsi ani.
Piŋkop, gak yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt Piŋkopnin. Man madepgo do nandaŋek nin paŋpulugaŋek dɨwarɨnin wɨrɨrɨkgi.
Piŋkop da aŋelo do gen kɨnda yaŋ yagɨt: “Uŋun da aŋeloni aban mɨrɨm dagoŋ. Uŋun da oman amɨni aban mɨleŋasɨp dagoŋ.”
“Amɨn da ji do Yesu dakon amɨn kabɨ yaŋ yaŋek yaŋba yokwi tok, ae top gen mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yaŋ damni, ae yokwiyo kɨsi aŋdamni kaŋ, ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani.
Wɨgakwal pɨndagek amɨn da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ yawit, “Uŋun yokwi pakpak amɨn kɨnda da yutnon wɨgɨk.”
Not, nandaki. Amɨn Tagɨ da manon gak aŋpak tagɨ on nak do abi do nandɨsat. Nit Yesu Kristo dakon amɨn ekwamak do uŋun aŋpak aŋek nak dakon but aŋteban abi.
Aŋakwan Judia mɨktɨmon ae Jerusalem kokup papmon egɨpgwit amɨn Jonon kɨwit. Yokwini yaŋkwok aŋakwa Jodan Pakbikon telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomgut.
Not kabɨ, Piŋkop da yaŋ ɨlɨkgɨt bɨsapmon niaŋ egɨpgwit uŋun da arɨpmon Piŋkop gat egɨpni.
Wɨsa dɨma dagaŋakwan Yesu pɨlisisok pɨdaŋ yut yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon paŋkɨ egek bɨsit pi agɨt.
Nandani. Gen pasɨlɨ kɨnda dayɨkdɨsat. Nin morap kɨsi dɨma kɨmotdamaŋ. Nin kɨsi morap kulabɨk aŋ mudokdamaŋ.
kaŋek nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi aban yaŋ nandawit, “Mao! On amɨn yoma kaga mani Kɨldani Tagɨsi uŋudon yɨgek amɨn da moneŋ ɨmni do bɨsit asak amɨn oni. Uŋun da kɨlek tak!”
Mani Israel amɨn Moses dakon gen teban yolek mɨŋat amɨn kɨlegɨ egɨp do pi tebaisi awit, mani dɨma kɨlek tawit,
Yawe Piŋkop Tapmɨm Ami, kalɨp egɨp egɨp tagɨsi egɨpgumaŋ uŋun aego aŋkaluk abi. Butgo ninon yɨpmaŋek yo tagɨsi aŋ nibi. Aŋek yokwikon baŋ pulugaŋ nipbi.
Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn uŋun nak aŋmɨlɨp ak uŋun da yaŋ nayɨk, ‘Gak pɨdaŋ yalɨŋ potgo tɨmɨgek kosit agɨp!’ ”
yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji da on amɨn nagon aŋabɨŋ uŋun da amɨn kwen wɨgɨk ani do yoyɨsak yaŋ nayeŋ. Mani kɨsin egek uŋun yo morap dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do iyɨt. Ji da gen morap yaŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun nak da koko bamɨ dɨma asak.
Nin nandaŋ kokwinin tagɨsi yaŋ yawit, mani nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn dagawit.
Yesu da aeni tɨlak gen kɨnda gat yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun yis yombem. Mɨŋat kɨnda da plaua ɨdap madep kɨnda gat ɨktagɨldak. Yaŋ aŋakwan plaua uŋun kɨsisi paptaŋ madep tawit.”
Abraham yaŋ nandagɨt, “Aisak kɨmotjak kaŋ, Piŋkop da tagɨ aban pɨdosak.” Yaŋsi nandagɨt, do monji kɨmoron naŋ abɨdagɨt yaŋ asak.
Mani uŋun amɨn iyɨ do Yesu da amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨnda yaŋ kosak do nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak namɨn amɨn baŋ but dasi galak taŋ yobeŋ do yosol?”
Sunduk do yoma dɨma wɨtdal ɨmni.
Mani, Kristo uŋun tɨlak kɨndapmon kɨlɨ kɨmakgɨt, yaŋ aban Piŋkop da ji paŋpulugaŋban iyɨ gat but kaloŋ awit. Uŋun iyɨkon paŋap do aŋek yaŋ agɨt. Ae iyɨ da dabɨlon gulusuŋni mɨni telagɨ ae gwaljɨgɨ mɨni egɨpni do yaŋ agɨt.
Pɨlɨn tuk tamogwan ekwaŋ amɨn da wasokgo tapmɨmɨ toŋ uŋun dɨ pɨndakgaŋ? Amɨn gak da kɨlɨ ɨŋtaŋ yomgul tamokon ekwaŋ uŋun da aŋpakgo kɨlegɨ dɨ pɨndakgaŋ? Uŋun dɨmasi!
Yaŋban yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakbɨ kɨmotjak!”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji amɨn dakon aŋpak dɨma kokwinɨtni kaŋ, Piŋkop da jiyo kɨsi dɨma kokwinɨtjak. Ji amɨn yokwi aba uŋun do kobogɨ tɨmɨtni do dɨma yoyɨni kaŋ, Piŋkop da jiyo kɨsi yokwisi do tebai dɨma dayɨkdɨsak. Ji amɨn dakon dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ yomni kaŋ, Piŋkop da ji dakon dɨwarɨsi yaŋ gɨn yopmaŋ damdɨsak.
Piŋkop dakon oman amɨni dakon dɨwatni da uŋun mɨktɨm abɨdokdaŋ, ae mɨŋat amɨn Piŋkop but dasi galak taŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun da uŋun mɨktɨmon egɨpdaŋ.
Uŋun bɨsapmon Juda amɨn dakon Yapyap Bɨlak Madep kwaŋ tagɨt.
Mani Piŋkop dakon gen da ɨreŋtaŋ kokupmɨ kokupmɨ kɨgɨt.
Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn dɨwarɨ kapmatjok akgwit uŋun nandaŋek yawit, “Nandaŋ, uŋun Elaija do yaŋ ɨmɨsak.”
Kɨrɨrɨŋ 7 kabɨ yaŋakwa gen yawit uŋun mandak do agɨm, mani Kwen Kokupgwan da tek kɨnda yaŋ noman tagɨt, “Kɨrɨrɨŋ 7 kabɨ dakon gen uŋun nandak nandakgokon gɨn toni. Dɨma mandabi.”
Nin but kaloŋ ekwamaŋ, nido Kristo obakon da nin kabi bamorɨ kɨsi Wup kaloŋɨ da Daron tagɨ kɨneŋ dakon kosit yɨpmaŋ nimɨsak.
Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Saion kokup pap dakon amɨn, ji dɨma pasolni. Kabɨt, ji dakon kɨla amɨn madep donki bɨlagɨ da kwenon yɨgek abɨsak.”
Ae yaŋsi nandani, amɨn kɨnda madepni dakon pi asak, uŋun amɨn madepni dakon gen kakgɨmansi guramɨtjak.
Do Piŋkop da galak togon amɨn dɨwarɨ tepmɨ pani do nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨpni Piŋkop nin wasagɨt da kɨsiron yɨpmaŋek aŋpak tagɨsi baŋgɨn ak do. Uŋun da bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ kɨlanin tagɨsi aŋkɨmokdok.
Mani abɨsok Piŋkop da nomansi paŋteŋteŋ asak. Kalɨpsigwan Piŋkop egɨp egɨp teban egɨsak uŋun da kombɨ amɨn yoyɨŋban geni mandawit. Nin mɨŋat amɨn morapyo mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun da nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek geni guramɨtni do aŋek uŋun gen baŋ dayamaŋ.
Yaŋ aŋek pakbi tagalban ɨdap madep kɨndakon pɨgakwa paŋdetni dakon kandap wasaŋek sugagɨt. Yaŋ aŋek pakbi soŋ wɨrɨrɨt ɨmal kogɨkon wamgut uŋun naŋ wɨrɨrɨkgɨt.
Yawe, gak da amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsal, uŋun do nak toktogɨsi kap yokeŋ. Gak gengo aŋteban aŋek nin tagɨsi paŋpulugosol uŋun dakon geni babɨkon da babɨkon yaŋ teŋteŋokeŋ.
Yesu paŋdetni kapbɨ gat kɨŋ notni kabɨkon altawit. Kɨŋ altaŋek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep notni paŋgwasɨŋba pɨndakgwit. Ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn dɨwarɨ da apba notni gat gen emat aba pɨndakgwit.
Ji uŋun dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ, mani nak nandaŋ ɨmɨsat. Nak naga dɨma nandaŋ ɨmɨsat yaŋ yokeŋ kaŋ, ji yombem gɨn top amɨn akeŋ. Mani nak nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek geni guramɨkdat.
Gen morap kalɨp Piŋkop gen papiakon mandabi uŋun da nin niyɨŋdetjak do mandawit. Gen uŋun da butnin paŋteban aŋakwan tebaisi agek Piŋkop da abɨŋ tɨmɨtjak uŋun do jomjom aŋek egɨpneŋ.
On mɨktɨm dakon aŋpak yokwi morap uŋun Daron da dɨma abaŋ. Aŋpak uŋun yaŋ: yokwi ak do but kɨndap agak, ae pɨndak galaktok, ae yo kabɨni morapmɨ taŋ yomaŋ uŋun do pɨbɨt tɨdok aŋpak. Uŋun kɨsi on mɨktɨm dakon aŋpak.
Oman monjɨ pini gɨn asak, do amɨn tagɨni da ya yaŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma iyɨgɨ.
Uŋun amɨn kosit agek tapmɨm kaluk sigɨn paŋ. Uŋun Saion kɨŋ Piŋkop da ɨŋamon altokdaŋ.
Iyɨŋban monjɨsok uŋun aŋkɨŋek mibɨltok amɨn yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Dam tebanon egɨsak amɨn Pol da yaŋ naban opbo on monjɨ gagon aŋopbeŋ do nayɨŋban aŋobɨsat. Gen kɨnda nandak uŋun gayɨkdɨsak.”
Dɨkdɨk gat ae gwawiya gat tɨmɨgek nak aŋ sopmaŋgaŋ amɨnon emat abi. “Nak yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨngo!” yaŋ nayɨki.
Nido Yawe uŋun tagɨsi. Dagok dagogɨ mɨni amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak. Babɨkon da babɨkon geni aŋteban aŋek amɨn kabɨni paŋpulugaŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsak teban.
Mani Amɨn Dakon Monji Piŋkop Tapmɨm Ami da amɨn tet do kɨlɨ uŋun yɨtdɨsak.”
Ji da nak Yoyɨŋdet ae Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ nayaŋ. Uŋun tagɨsi yoŋ. Nak uŋun mani.
Aŋakwa sakwabat yoni mɨni kɨnda da abɨŋ moneŋ gɨmani tabɨlɨ bamorɨ monɨŋɨsisok paret yopyop tamokon yopgut.
“Kalɨp Israel amɨn da Moses abɨŋ yɨpmaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, ‘Namɨn da mibɨltok amɨn ae gen kokwin amɨnin manjɨŋ gepmak?’ Piŋkop da uŋun Moses naŋgɨn mibɨltok amɨni ae jɨgɨkon baŋ tɨmɨtjak amɨni yabek yomgut. Aŋelo kɨndap monɨŋon akgɨt uŋun da Piŋkop dakon gen abɨdaŋek Moses yabekgɨt.
Do Piŋkop gen papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Abraham uŋun Piŋkop do nandaŋ gadat aban, Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt.” Ae amɨn da Abraham do Piŋkop dakon notnisi yaŋ iyɨwit.
Uŋun bɨsapmon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋoni dakon bɨkbɨk pɨsaŋ damdɨsak.
Yaŋban mɨŋat da yagɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, amɨn kɨnda dɨma akdak.” Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Nakyo kɨsi gen pikon dɨma gepbeŋ. Gak kɨŋ aego yo yokwi dɨma aki.”
Piŋkop da dɨ dapban kɨmakgwit bɨsapmon dɨwarɨ but tobɨl aŋek tobɨl abɨŋ yolgwit.
Piŋkop gen papia da yaŋ yosok: “Mɨŋat gak bupmɨkon egek monjɨ dɨma paŋalasal, gak kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aki. Mɨŋat gak monjɨ paŋalak do tepmɨ dɨma nandagɨl, gak but galak nandaŋek yaŋ tɨdoki. Nido, mɨŋat eni toŋ dakon gwakni yapmaŋek gwakgo morapmɨsi akdaŋ.”
Mani ji uwalji do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ yomni. Aŋek amɨn do yo yomɨŋek sopni do dɨma yoyɨni. Piŋkop da yokwi pakpak ya yaŋ dɨma iyaŋ amɨn uŋun do yo tagɨ yumsi yomɨsak, do ji aŋpak tagɨsi ani kaŋ, Piŋkop Wɨkwisi da kobogɨ do yo tagɨsi damɨŋakwan monjinisi egɨpdaŋ.
Piŋkop, yo kɨnda do pasoldot bɨsapmon, egɨp egɨpno gagon tosok yaŋsi nandɨsat.
Do nin kalɨp Kristo dakon gen niyɨŋdet abi uŋun dogɨn dɨma yoneŋ. Nin yaŋ gɨn sigɨn aneŋ kaŋ, nin yut dakon gwak bɨsap morapmɨ maŋek yut dɨma wɨtjamaŋ da yaŋ asak. Do nin saŋbeŋek gen yaŋ baŋ gɨn dɨma yoneŋ: but tobɨl aŋek aŋpak morap kɨmot paŋalon aŋ uŋun manji yomyom dakon gen, ae Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨm dakon gen, ae telagɨ pakbi sogok dakon gen mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, ae kɨsit amɨn da kwenon wutjɨk dakon gen, ae amɨn kɨmakbi kɨmoron da pɨdokdaŋ dakon gen, ae nin morap kɨsi Piŋkop da kokwin aŋek kobogɨ dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokdamaŋ, uŋun dakon gen. Uŋuden gen baŋgɨn dɨma tɨmɨk egɨpneŋ. Nin amɨn madep kɨlɨ abi dakon yoyɨŋdet baŋ aneŋ.
Juda amɨn dakon Ɨmal Yut Kabeŋ Bɨlak uŋun dakon bɨsap kwaŋ taŋakwan
Parisi amɨn dɨwarɨ da kɨŋ Yesu suŋ kɨnda yaŋban nandaŋek gen pikon yɨpneŋ yaŋ do gen paŋkosit awit.
Paŋmuwukbi notji gat domdom ani bɨsapmon but dasi tɨmɨtni.
Iyɨŋba nandaŋek Yesu uŋun boron wɨgakwan amɨn koŋ gat egɨpgut uŋun da Yesu yol do bɨsit tebai iyɨgɨt.
Yaŋ awit, do Piŋkop da gen tebaisi yomɨŋek mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon kɨmotni do yagɨt.
nak Yesu Kristo dakon pi amɨni egek Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon pi abeŋ do nak manjɨgɨt. Nak uŋun pi aŋek Piŋkop dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋok aŋek mukwa sogok amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ egɨsat. Egek nak Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ baŋ Piŋkop da paret si galak tosok yombem kɨnda naŋ Piŋkop do ɨmɨsat. Ɨmɨŋapbo Telagɨ Wup da paŋtelak asak.
Ae abɨsok Piŋkop da yaŋban kundu gat mɨktɨm gat kɨndap da noman taŋek paŋupbal ani do jomjom aŋ. Uŋun bɨsapmon gen kokwin bɨsap madep noman tosak, ae amɨn Piŋkop do manji ɨmgwit uŋun wagɨlsi tasɨk tokdaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋban mɨŋat da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mesaia, mani Kristo yaŋ iyaŋ, uŋun don apjak yaŋ nandɨsat. Uŋun da abɨŋ yo morap niyɨŋ paŋteŋteŋ aŋ mudokdɨsak.”
Mani dɨwarɨ da Parisi amɨnon kɨŋek Yesu da yo agɨt uŋun do yoyɨwit.
Nido, gen teban ɨsal dogɨn nandaŋ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da dabɨlon amɨn kɨlegɨ dɨma. Gen tebani guramɨkgaŋ amɨn baŋgɨn Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ yoyɨsak.
Asisi dayɨsat, oman monjɨ amɨn tagɨni dɨma yapmaŋdak. Ae gen aŋkɨsak amɨn da yabet amɨn dɨma yapmaŋdak.
Amɨn Tagɨ emat amɨni gat os da emat amɨn ɨlɨk pawɨlgaŋ tamo tausen morapmɨ kon da apgut. Sinai Kabap yɨpmaŋek pɨgɨt da iyɨ da telagɨ yutnon egɨsak.
Yaŋ do aŋek nin nandaŋ gadat ano Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨlegɨ yaŋ niyɨsak. Do Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo da paŋpulugaŋban nin Piŋkop gat but kaloŋ ekwamaŋ.
Gen teban uŋun kɨla amɨnin da yaŋ egek nin Kristokon paŋkɨsak. Paŋkwan nandaŋ gadat aŋapno Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨlegɨ yaŋ niyɨsak.
Amɨn morap uŋun moneŋni morapmɨ taŋ yomaŋakwa dɨwarɨ gɨn paret ɨdapmon yopmaŋ. Mani on mɨŋat wadak wadaksi aŋek moneŋni kɨsi yopmaŋdak. Kɨlɨ jap yumaŋ nosak moneŋni dɨ dɨma taŋ ɨmaŋ.”
Kabap morap nido meme da yaŋ wɨgɨ mokmok awit? Ae ɨleŋ monɨŋ monɨŋ ji nido sipsip da yaŋ wɨgɨ mokmok awit?
Uŋun dɨmasi! Asi, amɨn morap top amɨn gɨn, mani Piŋkop kaloŋ gɨn bamɨ yogok amɨn. Uŋun do Piŋkop gen papia da yaŋ yosok: “Piŋkop gak aŋpak kɨlegɨkon da gen yaŋ namɨsal. Ae gen pikon gepni kaŋ teban tokdɨsal.”
Yoyɨŋban yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nit sɨŋtok do nandamak.”
Gak da egɨp egɨp dakon mɨrɨm yobɨ egɨp egɨp kalugɨ abɨdoŋ. Yo morap paŋkaluk aŋaki mɨktɨmon kalugɨsi toŋ.
Yawe, jɨgɨkon naŋ tagɨ abɨdoki? Yawe, tepmɨsi abɨŋek nak aŋpulugoki.
Iyɨŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Ji takis gapman da dayɨsak uŋun da arɨpmon gɨn tɨmɨtni. Ae saŋbeŋek dɨ gat dɨma tɨmɨtni.”
Mukwa Yawe da tomnokon da pɨdawit. Aŋakwan mɨleŋ asɨp gen kaganikon da baljaŋek yo morapmɨ sowit. Aŋakwan kɨndap patdet yaban dukwan dukwan kɨsi kɨwit.
Nak gengo do but dasi galak tosot, do gengo guramɨkdat.
Aŋakwan pɨlak pɨlak da mukwa kagagwan da mɨktɨmon mawit. Uŋun pɨlak pɨlak do skopion dakon tapmɨm yomgwit.
Yesu paŋdetni gat Galili mɨktɨmon muwugek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Dakon Monji amɨn da uwal da kɨsiron yɨpba
Nin nandamaŋ, gɨptɨmnin kaloŋɨ mani dɨwatni morapmɨ, ae pini kaloŋɨ dɨma aŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨsok kɨnda dɨmasi yaŋakwan Pailat da Yesu do nandaban ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
Mani Piŋkop genon ni gen tosok? Gen yaŋ tosok: “Oman mɨŋat uŋun gat monji gat yolni. Nido oman mɨŋat dakon monji uŋun da dat gat ae mɨŋatsini dakon monji gat dakon yo dɨwat dɨma tɨmɨtjak.” Uŋun Piŋkop gen da yosok.
Piŋkop gen papia da uŋun do yaŋ yosok: “Nin gak dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo ekwamaŋ, do bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ amɨn da nin si nindapba kɨmokgomaŋ. Uŋun da nindaba nin sipsip si dapba kɨmorɨ yombem da ekwamaŋ.”
Yesu ɨleŋon egakwan paŋdet kabɨni boron da kɨŋ dubak taŋakwa mɨrɨm da abɨŋ bot tomnikon tɨdaŋakwan pakbi da madepsi tamalɨgakwan bot tobɨl tobɨl agɨt.
Aŋpak uŋuden do galak toni. Nido kalɨp bɨsapmon mɨŋat telagɨ egek Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi yom do yaŋ teban tok aŋyomgut uŋun do jomjom aŋek uŋun tɨlɨm pawit. Aŋek eni dakon pɨŋbini egɨpgwit. Sara uŋun aŋpak yolek Abraham dakon gen guramɨgek amɨn madepno yaŋ iyɨgɨt. Ae ji aŋpak kɨlegɨsi yolek yo kɨnda do dɨma pasolni kaŋ, ji uŋun Sara dakon gwakni.
Gak dakon gen uŋun gen bamɨsi. Amɨn kabɨnokon pi abɨ gengo bamɨsi uŋun da burɨkon pi aban gakdosi amɨn ani.
Amɨn kɨnda nak do ae nak dakon gen do mayagɨ nandɨsak kaŋ, Amɨn Dakon Monji iyɨ dakon tɨlɨmni gat ae Datni dakon tɨlɨmni gat ae Piŋkop dakon telagɨ aŋelo kabɨ dakon tɨlɨmni gat apjak bɨsapmon uŋun amɨn do mayagɨ yaŋ gɨn nandaŋ ɨmdɨsak.
Jerusalem yaworɨsi tosak do bɨsit ani. Bɨsit yaŋ ani, “Yawe, Jerusalem do galagɨ nandaŋ amɨn paŋpulugaŋbɨ tagɨsi egɨpni.
Ae kɨla amɨn kɨnda yokwi asak kaŋ, paŋmuwukbi morap da dabɨlon aŋmɨlɨp abi, aŋaki dɨwarɨ pasol pasol tɨmɨtni.
Ae Piŋkop gen tosok uŋun da arɨpmon amɨn da kɨmakbi tamogwan yɨpgwit, ae gɨldat kapbɨ aŋakwan kɨmoron da pɨdagɨt.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji kombɨ amɨn toptopmɨ uŋun do pɨndak kɨmotni. Gɨptɨmni yaworɨsi sipsip yombem, mani burɨgwan joŋ pɨŋan butni taŋ yomaŋ.
Papia on manjɨŋek amɨn da gen morap gayɨwit uŋun nandabɨ bamɨsi asak.
Telagɨ yutnon gandagɨm. Tapmɨmgo madep gat ae tɨlɨmgo gat pɨndakgɨm.
Nit ji do bɨsit amak bɨsap morapmon Piŋkop, Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo dakon Datni, ya yaŋ iyamak.
Pol yaŋ yaŋek aeni kwen wɨgɨ bret pɨdaŋban nawit. Yaŋ aŋek gen sigɨn yoyɨŋakwan wɨgɨ wɨsa dagaŋakwan yopmaŋ kɨgɨt.
Piŋkop, Yawe, gak paŋpulugokno. Gɨldarɨ ae kalbi gak do yaŋ tɨdosot.
Uŋun kɨsi tagɨ dɨma abɨŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsini? On amɨn mɨktɨm ŋwakŋwarɨkon nani dagɨn abɨk.”
Amɨn dɨwarɨ paŋupbal ak do yawit, do Piŋkop da paŋupbal akdɨsak. Amɨn morap uŋun pɨndatni amɨn da jɨkgo yokwisi yanjaŋ yomɨŋek wɨnda kwakwal aŋ yomdaŋ.
Yaŋ do aŋek kɨmagapbo yo morap do dayɨgɨm uŋun do bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ tagɨ nandani do aŋek pi tebaisi abeŋ.
Yoni morapmɨ amɨn on mɨktɨmon ekwaŋ yoyɨŋbɨ iyɨ dakon man dɨma pawɨgɨni. Ae yo morapni tepmɨ bɨsal kɨgɨ do nandaŋ gadat dɨma ani. Uŋun Piŋkop dosi nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni. Uŋun Piŋkop da nin da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aneŋ do yo tagɨsi morapmɨ nimɨsak.
Mani nak gak gat gen toŋ. Gak Jesebel yɨpbi gak gat ekwamal. Mɨŋat uŋun da nak kombɨ amɨn kɨnda yaŋ yosok, mani pi monjɨno top paŋkewalek yumabi aŋpak, ae jap kokup kɨdat do paret abi uŋun noni do yoyɨŋ dekdak.
Tebaisi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Mɨktɨm morap dakon amɨn Babilon gat yumabi morapmɨ awit. Uŋun dakon waini tebaisi baŋ yaŋ nawit. Ae mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ dakon kɨla amɨn madepni gat kɨsi yumabi uŋun gat awit. Babilon amɨn uŋun yoni morapmɨ ae yaworɨsi egek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk egɨpgwit, do mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ moneŋ ɨlɨt pi aŋ amɨn uŋun yoni morapmɨ amɨn dagawit. Aŋpak yokwisi uŋun agɨt do kokup pap madep Babilon uŋun kɨlɨ tasɨk tak! Uŋun kɨlɨ tasɨk tak! Uŋun abɨsok koŋ da egɨpni dakon tamo dagak. Koŋ yokwisi gat, ae mɨnam ɨŋani yokwisi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gat kɨsi uŋudon ekwaŋ.”
Uwalno da gandaŋek pasal kwaŋ. Maŋ pagek kɨmak mudoŋ.
Nak dakon gen uŋun yaŋ: monjɨ kɨnda egɨsak kaŋ, don uŋun monjɨ da datni dakon yo morap tɨmɨtjak. Uŋun yo morap monjɨ dakon da toŋ yaŋ asak, mani monjɨsok egɨsak bɨsapmon uŋun dat dakon oman monjɨ da arɨpmon egɨsak.
Sisa Ogastus da gen teban yaŋ yɨpgut, do amɨn kɨsisi mani mandani do kokupni kokupni kɨŋ mudawit.
Piŋkopnin Kwen Kokup egɨsak. Uŋun yo kɨnda ak do nandɨsak kaŋ si akdɨsak.
Nak aeno yokeŋ. Ji nak do asi nandaŋ kokwino tagɨ dɨma yaŋ dɨma nandaŋ namni. Mani ji da nak nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋ kaŋ, uŋun kɨsi tagɨ gɨn. Mani bɨkbɨk namɨŋakwa mano tɨmɨsok dɨ awɨgɨkeŋ.
Tapmɨmno mɨni aŋakwan melno tɨptaŋ gen kaganogwan tegosok. Gak da nepbɨ kɨmot da tamokon pokdot.
Nak bɨsit yaŋ iyɨsat, jikon apbeŋ do nandɨsak kaŋ, kosit kɨnda yɨpmaŋ naban jikon tagɨ apbeŋ.
Ae jap yet dɨwarɨ da joŋ kelɨ toŋ tɨmgwan mawit. Uŋun joŋ kelɨ toŋ gat kɨsi kwaŋek wutjɨŋba kɨmak mudawit.
Ae aŋelo 3 ɨdap madepni pakbi madep ae pakbi dabɨl da kwenon tagalgɨt. Tagalban pakbi morap kɨsi yawi dagawit.
Uŋun bɨsapmon gen teban yapyap amɨn da noman tokdɨsak. Noman taŋban Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu da iyɨ dakon gen mɨgan naŋ aŋakban kɨmotdɨsak. Amɨn Tagɨ tɨlɨm gulgwani gat abɨŋ noman taŋek uŋun dakon teŋteŋɨ da gen teban yapyap amɨn obɨsi aŋupbal akdɨsak.
Aŋek laion da madepsi yaŋ tɨdoŋ, uŋudeŋ madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋakwan kɨrɨrɨŋ 7 kabɨ da madepsi yawit.
Joŋ kɨlap yokwisi 2 uŋun da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ madep madep baŋ agɨt. Wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda agɨt uŋun yaŋ: Amɨn da dabɨlon wasok aban kɨndap si soŋek Kwen Kokup yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨmon pɨwit.
Aban Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Gak emat agak sɨbago yɨgɨkon sɨmɨl. Emat agak sɨba pawɨlgaŋ amɨn uŋun emat agak sɨba da mandaŋ yoba kɨmokgoŋ.
Amɨn kɨnda but dasi dɨma galak taŋ namɨsak, uŋun amɨn nak dakon gen dɨma guramɨkdak. Gen on nandaŋ uŋun nak dakon gen dɨma, gen on Dat yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun dakon gen.
Uŋun aŋelo da yaŋ egɨpdaŋ, do ae kɨnda gat arɨpmɨ dɨma kɨmotni. Uŋun kɨmoron da pɨdokdaŋ, do Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat monjɨyo egɨpdaŋ.
Mibɨltok yo noman taŋ namdaŋ uŋun pɨndagek don Timoti tepmɨsi yabekgo opjak.
Aŋek kabap aŋyoŋgam aŋek uŋun dakon kɨlɨŋɨ da sida kɨndap madepsi uŋun kɨsi wɨtjɨgɨt.
Nomansi yaŋsi dayɨsat, uŋun da iyɨ dakon galaktok yolek paret awit. Moneŋ yomyomɨ dakon tɨlak yapmaŋek madepsi yomgwit.
Bupmɨsi nandaŋ yomɨŋek saŋbek saŋbek agɨt uŋun do ae nandagɨt. Ae amɨn kabɨni do but dasi galak taŋ yomgut, do nandak nandakni ae kulabɨk agɨt.
Amɨn kabɨgo nin yokwi morap agɨmaŋ dakon dɨwarɨnin uŋun wɨrɨrɨk nimgul.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Kalɨp gen yaŋ yawit: ‘Amɨn kɨnda mɨŋatni kwɨnɨt do kaŋ, mɨŋat paŋkwɨnɨt dakon but pɨso papia kɨnda mɨŋatni do mandaŋ ɨmjak.’
Yaŋ aban wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ uŋun agɨt dakon gen bini yoyɨŋba uŋun mɨktɨm dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨsi da nandawit.
Yaŋsop aŋyomɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨŋ dekgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ mandabi: ‘Nak dakon yut uŋun amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun da abɨŋ bɨsit aŋnamni do tosak.’ Mani ji da kulabɨk aba ‘kabo noknok dakon pasɨlɨ tamo asak.’ ”
Kɨlɨ Sabat bɨsap dakon yo paŋtagap ak gɨldat agɨt. Uŋun Sabat uŋun bɨsap madepsi kɨnda, do Juda amɨn da tɨlak kɨndapmon bumjot dɨma toni do nandawit. Yaŋ nandawit do amɨn tɨlak kɨndapmon akgwit dakon kandapni dapmaŋ jokgal do Pailat iyɨwit. Yaŋ aba tepmɨ kɨmakba bumjotni paŋkɨni yaŋon da yawit.
Do mukwa sogok kalugɨ uŋun altak uŋun Melkisedek yombem, ae yaŋsi nandano pɨsosak, uŋun da Liwai kabɨkon mukwa sogok amɨn yapmaŋ mudosok.
On mɨŋat da mibɨltok gɨptɨmnokon pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi naŋ soŋ namɨŋek kɨmakbi tamokon nepni do aŋtagap asak.
Ji kalɨp Yesu yolek jɨgɨ noman taŋ daba jɨgɨ ɨsal dogɨn pawit, ma? Nak da ɨsal dogɨn pawit yaŋ dɨma nandɨsat.
Kabo noknok kabo saŋbeŋek dɨma noni. Kɨsitji da pi bamɨsi aŋ kɨmagek yo morapmɨ tɨmɨgek wadak wadak amɨn paŋpulugoni.
Kwen Kokupmon wɨgɨkeŋ kaŋ, gak uŋudon egɨpdɨsal. Ae kɨmakbi tamogwan pɨgɨkeŋ kaŋ, uŋudon kɨsi egɨpdɨsal gɨn.
Abɨsok gɨldat dakon jap arɨpninon nibi.
Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni ji kɨsikon tosak do bɨsit asat.
Nak Pol da naga dakon kɨsit da papia on mandɨsat. Nak da naga goman uŋun sopbeŋ. Mani nandaki! Nak da gen bamɨ gayɨko nandaŋ gadat agɨl, do gak nagon gomango toŋ. Goman uŋun gaga dakon egɨp egɨpgo. Mani uŋun do dɨma yokeŋ.
Kwen Kokup Datji gwaljɨgɨ mɨni kɨlegɨsi egɨsak, do jiyo yaŋ gɨn gwaljɨgɨ mɨni kɨlegɨsi egɨpni.”
Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨt uŋun do japmɨ nandawit. Ae mɨŋat monjɨyo da Telagɨ Yut Madepmon yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Osana! Dewit Dakon Monji aŋkɨsino!” Yaŋ yaŋba uŋunyo kɨsi do japmɨ nandawit.
Uŋun mastat yet yombem. Amɨn kɨnda da mastat yet kɨnda pigagani kwaokgɨt. Aŋakwan mastat uŋun kwaŋ madep taŋ kɨndap kɨnda da yaŋ agakwan mɨnam da abɨŋ kɨlɨŋɨkon yutni uŋudon awit.”
Gɨptɨmgo kaloŋ teŋteŋɨni toŋ ae pɨlɨn tuk kɨnda dɨma tosak kaŋ, gɨptɨmgo lam dakon teŋteŋɨ dakon paŋop pɨndakdal uŋudeŋ teŋteŋokdɨsak.”
Do ji abɨsok Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo altaŋ teŋteŋokdɨsak uŋun do jomjom aŋek Telagɨ Wup dakon but galak dakon yo do wadak wadak dɨma aŋ.
Kalɨp Erot gat Pailat gat uwal aŋek egɨpgumal, mani uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn not agɨmal.
Ae Adam top gen do dɨma nandaŋ gadagɨt. Mɨŋat da top gen nandaŋ gadaŋek yokwi agɨt.
Amɨn Kɨla Agakgo yɨpbɨ ninon apjak. Gak dakon gen guramɨt Kwen Kokup tosok, mɨktɨmon ninon yaŋ gɨn tosak.
Monji da Piŋkop dakon tɨlɨm gɨlgwani gat teŋteŋosok. Iyɨ uŋun Piŋkop yombemsi asak. Geni tapmɨmɨ toŋ uŋun da mɨktɨm gat ae kundu gat joŋɨkban tebai tomal. Uŋun da amɨn dakon yokwini sugaŋ paŋmɨlɨp aban kɨlegɨsi awit, aŋakwa Kwen Kokupmon Piŋkop Kɨla Amɨn Madep Wɨkwisi da amɨnsi tet do yɨkgɨt.
Yaŋ aŋakwa kombɨ amɨn Aisaia da gen yagɨt uŋun bamɨ toŋ agɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Amɨn Tagɨ, gen yagɨmaŋ uŋun namɨn da nandaban bamɨ agɨt? Ae Amɨn Tagɨ da tapmɨmni namɨn do yolɨŋban kagɨt?”
Gaga da tapmɨmon da amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ mɨktɨmnikon egɨpgwit uŋun yolbɨ kɨwit. Aŋek uŋun mɨktɨm babɨknin do yomɨŋaki uŋudon tebai egɨpgwit. Gak da Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ paŋupbal agɨl, mani babɨknin paŋpulugaŋaki tagɨsi egek madepsi ɨreŋ tawit.
Amɨn da yokwi aŋ daba kaŋ, kobogɨ do yokwi dɨma aŋ yomni. Ae yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ daba kaŋ, kobogɨ do yaŋba yokwi tok dɨma aŋ yomni. Kobogɨ do Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi aŋyomjak do bɨsit ani. Piŋkop da ji yaŋ aŋek dɨsi gɨsam tɨmɨtni do yaŋ damgut.
Pita gat amɨn kɨwit uŋun kosiron dɨpmɨn kɨnda pakgwit da wɨsa dagokdo Sisaria kokupmon kɨŋ altawit. Altaŋakwa Konilias uŋun do jomjom aŋek egɨpgut. Ae yawi dɨwatni gat ae notsini gat yaŋ yoban apgwit uŋun gat kɨsi jomjom aŋek egɨpgwit.
Pita uŋun do nandaŋek nagalon da waŋga pɨgɨ kunam madepsi takgɨt.
Kalɨp Israel mɨŋat amɨnyo gen teban abɨdawit, ae uŋun gen teban da yaŋ yosok, Liwai amɨn kabɨ uŋun mukwa sogok pi ani. Mani, Liwai dakon mukwa sogok pini da mɨŋat amɨnyo arɨpmɨ tagɨ paŋmɨlɨp agagɨ kaŋ, mibɨlɨ nido Piŋkop da mukwa sogok amɨn kɨnda don yabekgɨt, uŋun Melkisedek yombem, ae uŋun Aron yombem dɨma?
Tobɨl nagon abɨŋek bupmɨ nandaŋ nabi. Meŋno da kalɨp gak dakon pi agɨt, abɨsok monji nakyo kɨsi pigo asat, do nak dakon but aŋteban aŋek yokwikon naŋ pulugaŋ nepbi.
Yawe dakon man awɨgɨni. Yawe aŋpakni uŋun tagɨsisi, do ya yaŋ iyɨneŋsi. Dagok dagogɨ mɨni nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsak.
Do nido nak nayɨsal? Gen yaŋapbo nandawit amɨn baŋ yoyɨ. Gen yagɨm uŋun da nandaŋ.”
Gaga da dabɨlon kɨndap kwɨk tosok uŋun dɨma kaŋek niaŋon da notgo ‘Dabɨlgokon jɨmjɨm tosok uŋun paŋ gamdɨsat’ yaŋ iyɨki? Gak jamba but amɨn. Mibɨltok gaga da dabɨlon kɨndap kwɨk tosok uŋun abɨ kɨŋakwan notgo da dabɨlon jɨmjɨmjok tosok uŋun kaŋbɨ pɨsaŋakwan tagɨ paki.”
Tɨpbaŋ aŋagakwa Stiwen bɨsit yaŋ agɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu, wupno abɨda.”
Gen tebani uŋun yaŋ: Monji Yesu Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmneŋsi, ae iyɨ niyɨgɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomneŋ.
Abɨŋ pasolɨsi kaŋ pasal si kɨwit.
Yaŋban nandaŋek Pita Yesu da gen yagɨt uŋun do burɨ pɨsagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ yagɨt: “Pup da gen dɨma yaŋakwan gak da nak do wasɨp yaŋbɨ kosit kapbɨ akdɨsak.” Pita da gen uŋun do burɨ pɨsaŋban waŋga pɨgɨ kunam madepsi takgɨt.
Not kabɨnosi, kalɨp nak ji gat egapbo geno nandaŋek guramɨkgwit. Abɨsok nak ji gat dɨma ekwamaŋ, mani yaŋ dayɨsat, ji nak da abɨsok gen on mandaŋ damɨsat uŋun guramɨk kɨmotni. Piŋkop da ji yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgɨt, do pasal nɨmnɨmɨkyo aŋek pi madepsi aŋek Piŋkop da ji do but galak do wup dakon yo tagɨsi tɨmɨtni do manjɨgɨt uŋun tɨmɨtni.
Gak da yaŋ aŋaki mɨŋat amɨn kabi morapmɨ kɨsi gak gawak gamdo muwutnikon ya yaŋ gayɨkeŋ. Asisi, mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi da binapmon mango awɨgɨkeŋ.
“Yaŋ iyɨko Pol yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak Sisa da geno nandɨsak do nandɨsat. Do ɨdon dam tebanon egapbo don nepbɨ Sisakon kɨkeŋ.’ Yaŋ yagɨt do dam tebanon sigɨn egɨpjak do yaŋ dagagɨm. Uŋudon egakwan Sisakon kɨgɨk dakon kosit aŋnoman aŋek don yɨpbo kɨsak.”
Luk kaloŋ dagɨn nak gat ekwamak. Mak abɨdaŋbɨ gak gat kɨsi opjil, nido uŋun da nak pikon aŋpulugosak amɨn tagɨsi.
Pakbi ɨsal dogɨn tagal kɨ mudoŋ, uŋun da tɨlak tapmɨmno mɨnisi aŋ. Kɨdatno dakon saŋbekni kɨsi kalkalaŋ mudoŋ. Bɨt nelak da pakbi dagoŋ uŋun da tɨlak butno wagɨlsi tapmɨmɨ mɨni pakbi ɨdap asak.
Gak namɨn da amɨn kɨnda dakon oman amɨni dakon aŋpakni kokwin asal? Pi tagɨ asak bo ae yokwi asak, uŋun amɨn tagɨni dagɨn yogogɨ. Mani uŋun tebai tagɨ atjak, nido Amɨn Tagɨni da iyɨ aŋteban aŋakwan tebaisi atjak.
Piŋkop da saŋbek saŋbek kalugɨ do yaŋek, uŋun da yaŋ nolɨsak, saŋbek saŋbek mibɨltogɨ uŋun kalɨpmɨ dagak. Ae yo kalɨpmɨ dagaŋek si pasɨl do aŋ, uŋun bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok gɨn tokdaŋ, aŋek wagɨl pasɨldaŋ.
Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Moses da ni gen teban naŋ damgut?”
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ morap, yaŋ sɨmɨl aŋek Yawe dakon tɨlɨmni gat ae tapmɨm madepni gat do yoni.
Uŋun mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma ekwaŋ tɨmon nak aŋkewalgwit. Aŋek bɨlak 40 da arɨpmon pi tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨm uŋun kawit.
Yesu da gen saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji amɨn da yo yokwi aŋ damni do dɨma pasolni. Yo wɨtjɨŋbi da toŋ uŋun don noman tokdaŋ. Ae gen pasɨlɨ toŋ uŋun don amɨn kɨsi da nandakdaŋ.
Yaŋdo, nak abɨsok yaŋ dayɨsat, nak ji paŋpulugok do aŋek tepmɨ pasat uŋun do butjɨk dɨma pani. Yo uŋun noman tak uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani. Nido, uŋun da ji paŋpulugaŋban Piŋkop gat tagɨsi egɨpdaŋ.
Mani Pol da obip amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Manit Rom gapmanon tosok. Do nidosi nit dakon mibɨlnit pakyaŋsi dɨma kokwinɨgek amɨn morapmɨ da dabɨlon nindapmaŋek dam teban yutnon nipmaŋ? Yaŋ ayɨŋ da abɨsok nit pasɨlɨkon da nipba kɨkdamak? Uŋun tagɨ dɨma. Amɨn madep uŋun da iyɨsi abɨŋ pulugaŋ nipba kɨndeŋ.”
Gengo da nandak nandak tagɨsi namɨsak, do aŋpak yokwi morap do dɨmasi galak tosot.
Yesu aeni Galili mɨktɨmon Kana kokupmon kɨgɨt. Kalɨp uŋun kokupmon uŋun da wasok aban pakbisi uŋun da wain dagagɨt. Kana kokupmon kɨla amɨn madep dakon kɨla amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut. Monji Kapaneam kokupmon sot agɨt.
Ae kaŋapbo joŋ kɨlap yokwisi kɨnda tap kagagwan da noman taŋ wɨgɨt. Uŋun busuŋɨ 7 kabɨ. Aŋakwan jomɨ 10 kabɨ da busuŋɨkon kwawit. Aŋakwa kɨla amɨn madep dakon pelɨt 10 kabɨ jomɨkon tawit. Ae busuŋɨkon man taŋ taŋ awit. Man uŋun Piŋkop jɨgɨlak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yaŋ ɨmɨm dakon man da tawit.
Yawe aŋpulugosak do jomjom aki. Tebaisi agek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek but pasol dɨma abi. Yawe do jomjom aki.
Dɨsi dakon tapmɨm do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk dɨma ani, ae madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek manji gen dɨma yaŋ namni.’ ”
Uŋudeŋ gɨn yo morap dayɨt uŋun da altaŋakwa Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Akdɨsak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ kwaŋ tosok yaŋsi nandani.
Uŋun yo morap ninon noman toŋ uŋun ji paŋpulugok do noman toŋ. Ae Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni da mɨŋat amɨnyo morapmɨkon ɨreŋ taŋ yomɨŋ yomɨŋ aŋ aŋ kɨŋakwan uŋun da Piŋkop do ya yaŋ madepsi iyɨŋakwa Piŋkop dakon tɨlɨmni madepsi teŋteŋosak.
Aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Uŋun asi! Nin dagok dagogɨ mɨni Piŋkopnin do ya yaŋ iyɨŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi aŋek man madepni do yaŋ teŋteŋoneŋ. Dagok dagogɨ mɨni nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi, ae tapmɨm madepni taŋ ɨmdɨsak. Uŋun asi!”
Yesu da Nataniel apban kaŋek Nataniel do yaŋ yagɨt, “Kabɨt, Israel amɨn bamɨsi kɨnda abɨsak. Uŋun amɨn topni mɨnisi.”
“Yaŋ yoyɨŋek Amɨn Madep uŋun da tobɨl gwandeŋ tet do amɨn yaŋ yoyɨsak, ‘Jobɨt pabi kabɨ ji aŋgwikon kɨŋek kɨndapmon pɨgɨt. Uŋun kɨndap uŋun Sunduk gat aŋelo kabɨni gat uŋun do aŋnoman abi, uŋun kɨmot kɨmorɨ mɨni.
Yesu bot kɨnda abɨdaŋek pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda iyɨ da kokupmon kɨgɨt.
Jap do ae dɨma akdaŋ, ae pakbi do dɨma akdaŋ. Gɨldat da gɨptɨmni tebai dɨma pɨndatjak, ae yo kɨnda da gɨptɨmɨkon pɨndakban tedepmɨ dɨma nandakdaŋ.
Aŋakwan Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nandaŋ gadatji dukon yɨpmaŋ?” Yaŋban paŋdetni si pasalgwit. Aŋek wurɨpdagek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yawit, “On niaŋen amɨn kɨnda da pakbi mɨrɨmyo gen tebai yoyɨŋban geni guramɨkgamal?”
Bɨsap morapmɨ Yawe da mɨŋat amɨni paŋpulugagɨt, mani iyɨ dakon galaktok yolek kwen wɨgɨk aŋek yokwi morapmɨsi awit, do yokwisi egɨpgwit.
Parisi dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn, ji mibɨltok kap dakon burɨ ɨkdɨgoni kaŋ, manji iyɨ tagɨ kɨlek tosak.
(Jon da amɨn gat ae takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn gat telagɨ pakbi kɨlɨ soŋ yomgut, do gen uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Piŋkop dakon aŋpak uŋun kɨlegɨsi.”
Nak tayaŋgok egek Piŋkop dogɨn jomjom asat. Uŋun da nak yokwikon naŋ abɨŋakwan egɨsat.
Amɨn morap but kalɨpmon ekwaŋ uŋun aŋpak Piŋkop da galak tosok uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma ani.
Mɨktɨm daman dakon gen kokwin amɨn madep pɨdoki. Abɨsok abɨŋek iyɨ do nandaba wɨgɨsak amɨn dakon aŋpak yokwini do kobogɨ yokwisi yobi.
Mani pakbi da uwal wutjɨba kɨmak mudawit, kɨnda dɨma egɨpgut.
Gak aŋpak yokwi morap do manji yomɨŋek aŋpak tagɨ baŋgɨn abi. Yaŋ abi kaŋ, dagok dagogɨ mɨni mɨktɨmon tagɨsi egɨpdɨsal.
Nak gen on yosot, nido amɨn dɨ da top dayɨŋek paŋgalak ani yaŋ do dɨma galak tosot.
Ae yaŋ yagɨt: “Egɨp egɨpno Piŋkopmon tosok yaŋsi nandakeŋ.” Ae kɨnda gat yaŋ yagɨt: “Koki, nak Piŋkop da monjɨ gwayoni namgut nak uŋun gat oni ekwamaŋ.”
“Nak ji gat sigɨn egek gen on dayɨsat.
Mani Parisi amɨn da gen uŋun nandaŋek yawit, “On amɨn koŋ dakon mibɨltok amɨn madepni Belsebul uŋun da tapmɨmon koŋ yoldak.”
Gen uŋun yaŋ mandaneŋ, “Yawe iyɨ da telagɨ kokupmon kwen egek sɨŋtaŋban pɨgɨt. Uŋun Kwen Kokup egek sɨŋtaŋban mɨktɨmon pɨgɨt.
Amɨn yokwi gen tebango uŋun dɨma guramɨkgaŋ, do yokwikon baŋ dɨmasi tɨmɨtdɨsal.
Israel amɨn ɨdon abɨŋ Yawe ya yaŋ iyɨni do kalɨp kɨlɨ yoyɨgɨt uŋun gen yolek abɨŋ abɨŋ aŋ.
Uŋudeŋ gɨn, gak wɨli gɨmoŋɨ paŋteban abɨ uŋunyo kɨsi nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi aŋek iyɨ dakon egɨp egɨpni dakon kɨla tagɨsi ani.
“Nak abɨsok Piŋkop da kɨlasi asak do uŋun da kɨsiron depmaŋdat. Nandaŋ yawotni dakon geni da ji paŋteban aban yoni tagɨsi telagɨ amɨn kabɨni do yopbi uŋun tagɨ tɨmɨtni.
Nin ji dakon but paŋteban aŋek but yokwi dɨma ani yaŋ do dayɨŋ paŋteban agɨmaŋ. Ae aŋpak Piŋkop da pɨndakban tagɨsi aŋ uŋun baŋ ani do morapmɨ dayɨgɨmaŋ. Piŋkop da iyɨ dakon amɨn kɨla agak ae tɨlɨm kaganigwan egɨpni do yaŋ damɨsak.
Amɨn da nin do ŋugɨgɨ yaŋ yoŋ kaŋ, nin da Piŋkop dakon pi amaŋ do aŋek uŋun do yoŋ. Ae nin nandak nandak kɨlegɨsi tɨmɨgek pi amaŋ kaŋ, nin ji paŋpulugok do aŋek pi uŋun amaŋ.
Ae ɨmal kɨnda kagɨt uŋun Yesu da busuŋon wabi. Ɨmal uŋun ɨmal dɨwarɨ gat dɨma tawit. Uŋun gɨroŋɨkbi da iyɨndage taŋban kagɨt.
Yaŋban amɨn uŋun kɨŋ Yesu da yo agɨt uŋun dakon gen bin Dekapolis mɨktɨm uŋudon amɨn yoyɨŋban nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
Toktogɨsi aŋpak yokwi ak do nandak nandak aŋ, aŋek toktogɨsi mɨŋat amɨnyo da binapmon pɨdok pɨdok paŋalon aŋ.
Yesu bɨlakni 12 aŋakwan Yapyap Bɨlak dakon aŋpak yolek Jerusalem kɨwit.
Kɨŋ altaŋakwan amɨn kabɨ kɨnda da amɨn kadɨm mɨragɨ mɨni kɨnda aŋaŋ opgwit. Aŋobɨŋ Yesu da kɨsitni gɨptɨmɨkon wɨtjɨsak do bɨsit tebai iyɨwit.
Nin Piŋkop wasaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgumaŋ bɨsapmon, nandaŋ gadat tebaisi agɨmaŋ. Nandaŋ gadatnin aŋteban aŋapno teban taŋakwan wɨgɨ kɨmotneŋ dakon bɨsapmon wɨgɨsak kaŋ, nin Kristo dakon notnisi egɨpdamaŋ.
Iyɨ da tapmɨm madepmon da tɨmɨk paŋopgut. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Nandak nandak abɨsok yolgaŋ, uŋun Piŋkopmon da dɨma abɨsak. Piŋkop da ji iyɨkon kɨni do yaŋ ɨlɨkdak.
Tɨmɨgek dɨwarɨ iyɨ do yopmaŋakwan mɨŋatni uŋun kaŋ nandaŋyo agɨt. Aŋek kɨsisi paŋabɨsat yaŋ top yoyɨŋek moneŋ dɨwarɨ gɨn yabekbi kabɨ do yomgut.
Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋawit uŋun Masadonia ae Akaia provinskon ekwaŋ amɨn dagɨn dɨma nandawit, kokup dukwan dukwan kɨsi da ji da Piŋkop do nandaŋ gadawit uŋun dakon geni nandawit, do nin da saŋbeŋek gen dɨ yogogɨ mɨni.
Ae koko aŋelo 7 kabɨ Piŋkop da ɨŋamon akgaŋ uŋun do kweŋ 7 yaŋ yoba tɨmɨkgwit.
Amɨn kɨlegɨ gen yaŋ yomɨŋek kɨlɨ dapba kɨmakgwit. Uŋun iyɨ kutnok do yo kɨnda dɨma awit.
Amɨn kɨnda da Kwen Kokup dɨmasi wɨgɨgɨt. Amɨn Dakon Monji Kwen Kokup da pɨgɨt uŋun dagɨn wɨgɨgɨt.
“Yaŋ paŋ muwugek pi monjɨ pɨlɨndosi abeŋ uŋun do moneŋ 1 danari yomɨŋ yomɨŋ agɨt.
Paŋdetni da gen uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yaŋ kaŋ mɨŋat eyo dɨma aŋek egɨpdo.”
Aŋek ɨmal yutni telagɨ Silo kokup papmon tagɨt uŋun yɨpmaŋ kɨgɨt. Kalɨp uŋun yutnon egɨpgut bɨsapmon mɨŋat amɨnyo da binapmon egɨpgut.
Yawe, butjapgo da wutjɨŋ namɨsak. Gak da obɨsi nɨgek obɨsi aŋupbal asal.
Naŋakwa Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On yawino. Amɨn morapmɨ gat saŋbek saŋbek ak do parekdat.
Iyɨŋban Abraham butni yaworɨ taŋakwan jomjom aŋek don Piŋkop da yo morap ɨm do yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun tɨmɨkgɨt.
Yaŋban Pita da Yesu gen kɨnda yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nin yo morap yopmaŋek gak naŋ gɨn gol awɨlgamaŋ. Do nin yo ni baŋ tɨmɨtneŋ?”
Ji nandaŋ gadat aŋ mɨŋat amɨnyo yaŋsi nandaŋ, Kristo uŋun gwak wagɨl tagɨsisi. Mani nandaŋ gadat dɨma aŋ amɨn, uŋun do Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: “Yut agak amɨn da gwak yokwi yaŋ yaŋek maba kɨgɨt, uŋun gwak tɨp kɨnda naŋ tɨdawit da akdak.”
Gak da nin paron baŋ tɨmɨkgɨl. Yaŋ aŋek ninon jɨgɨ madepsi yɨpmaŋ nimgul.
Jɨgɨ da nak aŋupbal aŋ, do wɨsa dagokdo, ae gɨldat binap, ae kalbi kɨsi kunam tak ɨbo bɨsitno nandɨsak.
Uŋun yo morap altaŋakwa amɨn kɨmakba yopmaŋgaŋ tamo wɨtdal kɨŋakwa Piŋkop dakon amɨn morapmɨ kalɨp kɨmakba yopbi uŋun pɨdawit.
Monjɨ bulagɨ egɨpgum bɨsapmon da wɨŋ abɨsok egɨsaron, jɨgɨ paŋek kɨlɨ uŋunjok kɨmotdɨsat. Gak da yo yokwisi pasol pasolɨsi aŋ namɨŋaki tapmɨmno mɨni asak.
Kɨŋ Telagɨ Yut Madep uŋun da nagalgwan pɨgɨ pɨndakban amɨn moneŋ ɨlɨt pi awit. Amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋun bulmakau, sipsip ae mɨnam baŋ moneŋ ɨlɨt pi awit. Aŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ da tamonikon yɨgek moneŋ kulabɨk aba pɨndakgɨt.
Nin Yawe do ya yaŋsi iyɨneŋ. Yum nindaŋakwan uwal da nin dɨma nindapba pasɨlgɨmaŋ.
Nido, nit da ji dakon gen nandagɨmak, uŋun yaŋ: ji Yesu Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋ kɨmagek Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo but dasi galak taŋ yomaŋ. Ji yaŋ aŋ nido Piŋkop da ji do yo tagɨsi Kwen Kokupmon paŋnoman agɨt da toŋ uŋun tɨmɨtdamaŋ yaŋsi nandaŋ, do nandaŋ gadat aŋek amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomaŋ. Gen Bin Tagɨsi dakon gen bamɨ nandawit bɨsapmon yo Kwen Kokupmon toŋ yaŋ ji kɨlɨ nandawit. On Gen Bin Tagɨsi jikon obɨŋek mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ kɨsi kɨgɨt. Yaŋ aŋek madepsi paptaŋ ɨreŋ taŋek mɨŋat amɨn morapmon aŋpak tagɨsi paŋalon aŋ yomɨsak. Ae Gen Bin Tagɨsi si abɨdawit gɨldaron da wasaŋek yaŋ gɨn agɨt. Uŋun gɨldaron Piŋkop da asi amɨn do nandaŋ yawot aŋ yomɨsak uŋun nandaba pɨsagɨt.
Aeni saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ kɨŋ Gen Bin Tagɨsi amɨn kɨsisi yoyɨŋ mudoni.
Ji kabap madep ae monɨŋɨ gat ae kɨndap sopmɨ toŋ ae sida kɨndap madep,
Uŋun aŋelo 7 kabɨ ɨdap madep 7 kabɨ tɨmɨkgwit kabɨkon da kɨnda da abɨŋ yaŋ nayɨgɨt, “Gak apbɨ yumabi mɨŋat pakbi madep madep da kapmatjok yɨkdak, ni tomni yokwi baŋ tɨmɨtdɨsak uŋun golɨko.
Gak nak do toktogɨsi but dasi galak taŋ nam do yaŋ teban tok kɨlɨ agɨl. Do gen yagɨl da arɨpmon nak oman amɨngo dakon but aŋteban abi dosi nandɨsat.
Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nido kɨni? Dɨsi jap yomgut.”
Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Piŋkop da yoni mɨni amɨn dɨma ɨŋtaŋ yomɨsak. Jɨgɨni madepsi toŋ amɨn, uŋun Piŋkop da paŋpulugosak do nandaŋ gadat aŋek jomjom aŋ. Uŋun yum pɨndagakwan ɨsal dogɨn jomjom dɨma aŋ.
Paŋdetni da namɨn dasi mibɨltok amɨnin egɨsak yaŋ do gen emat awit.
Datji kaloŋɨ uŋun Kwen Kokup egɨsak, do mɨktɨm amɨn kɨnda do dat yaŋ dɨma iyɨni.
Yesu Kristo uŋun kulabɨgɨ mɨni apma, ae abɨsok, ae don egɨ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsak teban.
Amɨn morap iyɨ do nandaba paŋ, uŋun Piŋkop da yo morap yom do yagɨt uŋun yoban tɨmɨtdaŋ, do uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
Yaŋban Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep tɨmtɨm yaŋek apba pɨndagek koŋ tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Koŋ, gen kaga ae mɨrak sopsop amɨn, gak monjɨ on yɨpmaŋdet! Wagɨl kɨŋek buŋon on monjɨgwan dɨmasi pɨgɨki!”
Tikikus da nak da egɨp egɨp morap asat uŋun dayɨkdɨsak. Tikikus uŋun notninsi, ae pi ɨsalnin, ae Amɨn Tagɨ dakon oman amɨni tagɨsi.
Uwal da kɨsiron yɨpyɨp amɨn da gen kɨnda kɨlɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda nak da mandaŋ noko kaŋ, uŋun amɨn naŋ tebai abɨdoni.”
“Not kabɨ, kalɨpsigwan Telagɨ Wup da Dewit aŋtagap aban Piŋkop da papiakon Judas do gen kɨnda mandagɨt uŋun gen bamɨ toŋ agɨt. Judas uŋun Yesu aŋnoman aŋyoban obip amɨn da abɨdawit.
Nin Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni do yaŋ damgumaŋ bɨsapmon, gen gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma dayɨgɨmaŋ, ae nandak nandak yokwi dɨ gat nandaŋek pi dɨma agɨmaŋ, ae ji dɨma paŋkewalgɨmaŋ. Uŋun dɨmasi.
Aŋek Pilip Samaria dakon kokup pap kɨndakon pɨgɨ Kristo dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt.
Amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ gaban kaŋ, gak tamo amɨn pɨŋbisi do yopbi uŋudon paŋkɨ yɨkgi. Yɨgaki amɨn yaŋ gamjak uŋun da ‘Not, on tamo tagɨkon pawɨŋ yɨt’ yaŋ gayɨŋban pawɨŋ yɨgaki amɨn dɨwarɨ da amɨn mani toŋ kɨnda yaŋ gandani.
Mani egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨnikon kɨgɨk dakon wigat gat ae kositni uŋun gɨtnisi, uŋudon kɨgɨk dakon pini jɨgɨsi. Amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ dagɨn wigat uŋun kaŋ kwoŋ.”
Uŋun yaŋsi nandamaŋ, nido Piŋkop da Monji yaŋ iyɨgɨt: “Gak Monjɨno. Abɨsok nak Datgo dagosot.” Ae kɨnda gat yaŋ iyɨgɨt: “Nak da Datni egapbo uŋun da Monjɨno egɨpjak.” Piŋkop da aŋelo kɨnda do gen yaŋ dɨmasi iyɨgɨt.
Nak nawa gen do mɨrak yopmaŋek gita tɨdaŋek tɨlak gen dakon mibɨlɨ dayɨkeŋ.
Mɨnam monɨŋ uŋun yo monɨŋɨsok, bamorɨ dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun moneŋ gɨman tabɨlɨ kaloŋɨ gɨn. Mani Datji da kɨnda mɨktɨmon dɨma mosak do nandɨsak kaŋ, arɨpmɨ dɨma mokdɨsak.
Bɨsap yokwikon jɨgɨ dɨma pakdaŋ. Ae amɨn dɨwarɨ jap do ani bɨsapmon amɨn kɨlegɨ japni morapmɨ taŋ yomdaŋ.
Nin Kristo man madep ɨm do nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn yombem da ekwamaŋ, mani ji Kristokon gadawit do nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi amɨn ekwaŋ, ma? Nin tapmɨmnin mɨni aŋakwa ji da uŋun tapmɨmji toŋ, ma? Nin manin mɨni aŋakwa ji da uŋun man madepji toŋ, ma?
padɨk padɨkno 5 kabɨ ekwaŋ uŋun nawa gen tebai yoyɨŋban nandaŋek on tepmɨ kokupmon dɨma apni.’
Gen uŋuden yoŋ amɨn da pakyaŋsi yaŋ nandani. Nin opno ji gat egɨpneŋ bɨsapmon papia damgumaŋon gen toŋ uŋun da arɨpmon aŋpak uŋun baŋ aŋek egɨpdamaŋ.
Uŋun kundu wɨtdalek pɨgɨt. Aŋakwan gɨkwem pɨlisi da kandapni da mibɨlgwan tawit.
Kombɨ amɨn Osea da papia mandagɨron Piŋkop da Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ do yaŋ yagɨt: “Mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋun kalɨp nak dakon amɨn kabɨ dɨma egɨpgwit, uŋun abɨsok nak dakon amɨn kabɨno yaŋ yoyɨkeŋ. Ae but dasi dɨma galaktaŋ yomgum amɨn, uŋun abɨsok but dasi galaktaŋ yobeŋ.”
Uŋun gengwan tɨlak gen kɨnda tosok. Mɨŋat bamot uŋun saŋbek saŋbek bamorɨ dakon tɨlak asak. Aga uŋun Sinai Kabapmon saŋbek saŋbek dakon tɨlak asak. Aŋakwan monjini da gen teban dakon oman monjɨ dagoŋ.
Nido nin dagɨn Piŋkop dakon amɨn kabɨ bamɨsi ekwamaŋ. Nin Piŋkop dakon Wup da tapmɨmon Piŋkop gawak ɨmamaŋ, ae Yesu Kristo da nin do yo madepsi agɨt uŋun do nandaŋek man madep ɨmamaŋ, do Piŋkop da nin dogɨn nandaban kɨlek tosok. Nin da pi kɨnda ano Piŋkop da nindaban nin amɨn kɨlegɨsi amaŋ uŋun dakon kosit kɨnda dɨmasi tosok yaŋsi nandamaŋ.
Uŋun da iyɨ dakon amɨn kabɨ Israel uŋun do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek paŋteban asak do aŋek aŋkɨsaŋ. Yawe aŋkɨsini!
Mani nin Yesu komaŋ. Piŋkop da bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok yɨpban aŋelo dakon pɨŋbini egɨpgut. Mani Piŋkop da nandaŋ yawotni do aŋek Yesu yabekban mɨŋat amɨn morap dakon tamo abɨdaŋek tepmɨ madepsi paŋek kɨmakgɨt, do Piŋkop da aŋenagek tɨlɨm gɨlgwani tagɨsi gat ae man madep gat ɨmgut.
Nɨkba kɨmokgeŋ do nandaŋ amɨn uŋun nak abɨdok do pat yɨpmaŋ. Amɨn nak aŋtasɨk ak do nandaŋ amɨn yo yokwi aŋ nam do gen yoŋ. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ yokwi aŋ nam do gen yaŋ paŋteban aŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋek uŋudon gɨn Yesu da amɨn kabɨ madep yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nak do kabo noknok kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋek emat agak sɨba ae kɨndap kɨrɨŋyo tɨmɨgek nak abɨdok do abeŋ, ma? Nak gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan ji gat egek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨm. Uŋun bɨsapmon nak abɨdok do dɨma nandawit.
Piŋkop da aŋpak tagɨsi baŋgɨn ani do nandɨsak. Yaŋ aŋek kaŋdo nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn da gen kagani sopmaŋek gen dɨma yaŋ damni.
Nak da manjɨko monjɨno mibɨltogɨ dagosak, ae kɨla amɨn madep mibɨltogɨ dagaŋek mɨktɨmon kɨla amɨn madep morap yapmaŋ mudosak.
Gen teban yolgaŋ amɨn dagɨn Piŋkop dakon yaŋ teban tokni tɨmɨtni kaŋ, nandaŋ gadat uŋun yo ɨsalɨ asak, aŋakwan yaŋ teban tokni uŋun bamɨ mɨni aŋ mudokdaŋ.
Nak Yawe do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk asat. Do uŋun da nandak nandakno do galak tosak dosi nandɨsat.
Nak gulusuŋno gagon yaŋ teŋteŋosot, aŋek yokwi agɨm do bupmɨsi nandɨsat.
Piŋkop da man madep ɨmgut da iyɨ da amɨnsi tet do yɨkdak. Dat da Telagɨ Wup Monji do ɨbeŋ yaŋ kɨlɨ yaŋ teban tagɨt. Do Monji do ɨban uŋun da tagalban yo abɨsok noman tosok uŋun ji kaŋ nandaŋyo aŋ.
Yawe Jerusalem kokup papmon egɨsak, do mɨŋat amɨnyo ji Saion wɨgek mani aŋkɨsini. Yawe aŋkɨsini!
Yawe, gak da nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgi do gayamaŋ. Gak da nin paŋpulugaŋbɨ yo morap ano tagɨsi gɨn noman toni.
“Asi, not kabɨ ji gat ae kɨla amɨn kabɨsi gat dɨma nandaŋ pɨsaŋek Yesu aŋakgwit.
Kɨŋ pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda Yesu kaŋkwaŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, gak ni bɨsapmon ɨdon abɨl?”
Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek yo tagɨsi asal, mani mɨrak yopmaŋdak amɨn dakon burɨ dɨma aŋteban asal.
Juda amɨn gen uŋun nandaŋek aeni waseŋ kɨ kabi bamorɨ awit.
Yaŋba Pilip da kɨŋ Andru iyɨŋban kɨsi Yesukon kɨŋek gen uŋun iyɨgɨmal.
Pita da saŋbeŋek gen yaŋ yagɨt, “Kap Papia madepmon gen kɨnda yaŋ mandabi: ‘Yut kokupyonikon amɨn dɨ dɨma egɨpdo, ɨsal tosak dosi nandɨsat.’ Ae uŋun papiakon gen kɨnda yaŋ mandabi: ‘Kɨla amɨn pi agɨt uŋun amɨn kɨnda da kulabɨsak dosi nandɨsat.’
Yaŋ aŋakwa nandaŋek oman monjɨ kɨnda yaŋ ɨban apban iyɨgɨt, ‘Uŋun nibaŋ aŋ?’
Wudɨp daman aŋakwan mɨktɨm tɨm morap tap binap tawit uŋun kɨsisi tap kagagwan pɨgɨwit, ae kabap morap kɨsisi tuwɨl kɨ mɨnisi awit.
Yo si galak toŋ uŋun arɨpninon tugaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Ji yo ɨreŋ amɨn kɨlɨ dagaŋ mudaŋ da tagɨsi ekwamaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Ae nin ŋwapmaŋek kɨla amɨn madep dagamaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? O bupmɨsi. Nin ji da kɨla amɨn madep bamɨsi ekwa ninyo kɨsi ji gat kɨla amɨn madep gɨn egɨp do nandamaŋ.
Tebaisi atni, nido Piŋkop gen papia da yaŋ yosok: “Asi, bɨsap dubak dɨma, amɨn uŋun apdɨsak kɨlɨ uŋunjok apdɨsak. Ae tepmɨsi apdɨsak.
Piŋkop da yokwikon baŋ kɨlɨ tɨmɨkgɨt yaŋ nandani. Uŋun nandak nandak da busuŋ kutnokji asak. Yaŋ aŋek Telagɨ Wup dakon emat agak sɨba abɨdoni, uŋun Piŋkop dakon gen.
Mɨktɨm amɨn ninon kɨnda da amɨn kɨlegɨ aŋpulugok do kɨmot ak do dɨma nandɨsak, mani amɨn tagɨsi kɨnda amɨn dɨwarɨ da uŋuden amɨn aŋpulugok do tagɨ kɨmotni.
Yaŋban Pita da wasɨp yaŋek yagɨt, “Gak da gen uŋun yosol nak dɨma nandɨsat.”
Nin nandamaŋ, Piŋkop da nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsak, ae nin uŋun dogɨn nandaŋ gadamaŋ. Piŋkop uŋun but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak dakon ami. Amɨn kɨnda but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak aŋek egɨsak uŋun amɨn Piŋkop gat ekwamal, ae Piŋkop uŋun amɨn gat egɨsak.
Piŋkop, gak da nin manji kɨlɨ nimgul, ma? Nin dakon emat amɨn dɨma paŋpulugok do nandɨsal, ma?
Ji uŋun nak da but kagagwan ekwaŋ, do asi nak but dasi galak taŋ damɨsat. Piŋkop da nandaŋ yawotni do aŋek nak gat ae ji gat kɨsi yo tagɨsi nimɨŋ nimɨŋ asak. Dam tebanon egɨsaron, bo waŋga egek Gen Bin Tagɨsi aŋkutnaŋek aŋteban asaron, nandaŋ yawotni do aŋek paŋpulugok madepsi asak.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn tagɨni da uŋun oman monjɨ iyɨŋban yo morapni kɨla akdɨsak.
Ae jap yet dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm tagɨsikon maŋ kwawit. Uŋun bamɨ 100 taŋ taŋ awit.” Yesu da tɨlak gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gen on nandak do galak toŋ amɨn ji pakyaŋsi nandaŋek mibɨlɨ nandaŋ pɨsoni.”
Mani nak amɨn dɨma, nak waleŋ yombem yo ɨsalɨ. Amɨn morap da nandaba yokwi tok aŋnamɨŋek manji namaŋ.
Gawak nabi kaŋ, on yo morap gak do gamɨŋ mudokeŋ.”
Dɨwarɨ da dam tebanon yɨp do nandawit, mani amɨn kɨnda da dɨma abɨdagɨt.
Nak da obɨŋ altokeŋ bɨsapmon paretji Jerusalem paŋkɨni do dɨsi amɨn kabi dɨ manjɨni. Aŋakwa nak da but pɨso papia kɨnda mandaŋ yobo abɨdaŋek kɨni.
Ae nandaŋapbo amɨn tɨlak tɨmɨkgwit dakon tɨlak yaŋba nandagɨm. Israel amɨn kabɨ morap da binapmon amɨn 144 tausen da tɨlak uŋun tɨmɨkgwit.
Mɨŋat iyɨ do nandaba pɨŋakwa gen dɨma yaŋek tayaŋgok egek Piŋkop dakon gen tɨmɨt do pi ani.
Amɨn da uŋun aŋpak morap aŋakwa Piŋkop da pɨndakban yokwi aŋ. Mani ji kɨsitji dɨma sugaŋek jap noŋ uŋun da yokwi dɨma asak.”
Nandaŋ yawotni uŋun da aŋpak yaŋ aneŋ do nolɨsak. Piŋkop da pɨndakban aŋpak ɨŋani aŋ uŋun dɨma aneŋ do nolɨsak. Ae on mɨktɨm dakon aŋpak yokwi morap yopneŋ do nolɨsak. Ae on mɨktɨmon egek nin do kɨla tagɨsi aŋek kɨlegɨsi egek Piŋkop yolneŋ do nandaŋ yawotni da nolɨsak.
Amɨn kaloŋɨ kɨnda da kɨmot aŋalon agɨt, ae yaŋ gɨn amɨn kaloŋɨ kɨnda da kɨmoron da pɨdot pɨdot aŋalon agɨt.
Kɨla amɨn kabɨkon da kɨnda da yaŋ nayɨgɨt, “On amɨn ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk dubak kwakwagɨ payɨŋ uŋun namɨn? Ae dukwan da abeŋ?”
Nak gat ae paŋmuwukbi notno nak gat ekwamaŋ nin da Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn morap Galesia provinskon ekwaŋ ji do gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ dayamaŋ.
Amɨn Piŋkop dakon gen guramɨgek but dasi nandaŋek yolgaŋ uŋuden amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
Nak bɨsit yaŋ asat, “Yum pɨndagaki sagalek nɨkban uwal da but kwaktok dɨma nandani.”
Piŋkop Datnin mani dagok dagogɨ mɨni aŋkɨsiŋ kɨmotneŋ. Uŋun asi.
Saŋbeŋek yo yokwisi dɨma aŋ nabi. Yum nandaŋaki butno ae tagɨsi asak. Aŋaki don kɨmagek on mɨktɨm wagɨl yɨpmaŋ dekgeŋ.
Yesu gen uŋun nandaŋek nandaban yo madepsi aban tobɨlek amɨn madepsi buŋon yolgwit yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak yaŋ dayɨsat, Israel amɨnon nandaŋ gadatni madep on amɨn dakon yombem kɨnda dɨma kagɨm.”
Tepmɨ kɨmagakwan monjɨ gwayoni datni mɨni egɨpni, ae mɨŋatni sakwabat egɨpjak dosi nandɨsat.
Aŋek yutgo kwen ason pakbi kwenon asal. Gɨkwem da os da amɨn ɨlɨk pawɨlgaŋ tamo tɨmgo dagaŋakwan mɨrɨm da gak aŋaŋ kɨsak.
Aŋpak morapno uŋun pɨndakdal, do gen teban morapgo uŋun guramɨkdat.
Amɨn morap mɨrak paŋek yɨkgwit uŋun nandak nandakni ae kobogɨ bamɨsi yagɨt uŋun do nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
Yaŋ yaŋban Mata da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, asi gak Kristo, Piŋkop dakon Monji, mɨktɨmon apjak do yaŋbi amɨn yaŋ nandaŋ gamɨsat.”
Aŋek amɨn da maket tamokon ‘Yoyɨŋdet, gɨldat tagɨ’ yaŋ yoyɨni yaŋ do galak toŋ.
Yo tagɨsi tɨmɨtneŋ do jomjom amaŋ uŋun Piŋkop da uŋun nim do yaŋ teban tok agɨt. Egɨp egɨpji uŋudon tosok yaŋsi nandaŋ ɨmɨŋakwa uŋun da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ae but yawot daban butjikon tugosak, ae Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨmon yo tagɨsi dam do yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun tɨmɨtdamaŋ yaŋsi nandani dosi nandɨsat.
Ae Piŋkop da Monji mibɨltogɨ mɨktɨmon yabegek yaŋ yagɨt: “Piŋkop dakon aŋelo kɨsi morap da gawak ɨmɨŋ kɨmotni.”
Piŋkop, aŋpakgo telagɨ. Kokup kɨdat kɨnda gak gat arɨp dɨma. Gak da yapmaŋ mudosol.
Bɨsit yaŋ aneŋ kaŋ uŋun tagɨsi. Piŋkop Yokwikon Baŋ Tɨmɨt Tɨmɨt Amɨnin uŋun da yaŋ aneŋ do tagɨsi nandɨsak.
Bo Silom yut dubak tuwɨl kɨ maŋ amɨn 18 kabɨ wɨtjɨŋban kɨmakgwit do nandani. Uŋun amɨn kabɨ dakon yokwini da Jerusalem amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon yokwini yapgut uŋun do aŋek pasɨlgwit yaŋ nandaŋ?
Nagai uŋun Mat dakon monji. Mat uŋun Matatias dakon monji. Matatias uŋun Semen dakon monji. Semen uŋun Josek dakon monji. Josek uŋun Joda dakon monji.
Nandaŋ gadat dakon bɨsap dɨma altaŋakwan, gen teban da nin dam tebanon nipban egɨpgumaŋ. Dam tebanon sigɨn egapno wɨgɨ nandaŋ gadat dakon bɨsap uŋun altaŋ kɨlɨ noman tagɨt.
Ae nak gen kɨnda gat tosok. Nak Piŋkop da ji dakon bɨsit nandakdɨsak, aŋek nak nepban jikon tobɨl apdɨsat yaŋsi nandaŋ gadasat. Do yutgokon yut burɨ kɨnda nak da pokgeŋ do aŋnoman abi.
Nak ji do bɨsit yaŋ asat: Jikon amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak uŋun sigɨn madepsi aŋakwa pap tosak, ae nandak nandakji gat ae nandaŋ kokwinji gat tagɨsi taŋ damjak.
Yaŋ aban kaŋakwa Moses gat Elaija gat altaŋbal Yesu gat gen yaŋ nandatyo aba pɨndakgwit.
Nak Pol, nak da naga ji do gɨldat tagɨ mandɨsat. Papia morap mandɨsaron gen oden baŋ mandɨsat. Uŋun nak dakon papia dakon tɨlak asak.
Abrahamon da wɨŋ Dewiron dagagɨt uŋun babɨkni 14 kabɨ. Aŋakwan Dewiron da wɨŋ uwalni da tɨmɨk Babilon mɨktɨmon paŋkɨwit bɨsap uŋun babɨkni 14 kabɨ. Aŋakwan Babilon egɨpgwiron da wɨŋ Kristo altagɨt uŋun kɨsi babɨkni 14 kabɨ.
Aŋakwan tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋagek emat amɨn da satu wasok aŋek ɨmalni kokwinɨk tɨmɨkgwit.
Nin do nandaba wukwan nimɨŋek but galak do yo morapmɨ nimgwit. Ae tap wakga abɨdok do agɨmaŋ bɨsapmon kosit agek naŋ paŋyo aneŋ do yo uŋun tap wakgakon yopgwit.
Kristo da gen teban kɨnda nimgut uŋun yaŋ: Amɨn kɨnda Piŋkop do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmjak kaŋ, paŋmuwukbi notni do yaŋ gɨnsi asak.
Nawa gengo do but dasi dɨma galak tagɨm tam, nak jɨgɨ paŋek kɨlɨ kɨmakgɨm.
Amɨn gat but kaloŋ egɨp egɨp dakon mibɨlɨ dɨmasi nandaŋ.”
Top gen kɨnda dɨmasi yawit. Gulusuŋni mɨni egɨpgwit.
Yesu da amɨn 12 kabɨ uŋun yabegek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon bo ae Samaria amɨn da kokupmon dɨma kɨni.
Uŋun da wasok aban Kedes dakon mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ uŋun wudɨp madepsi asak.
Mɨŋat amɨni apgwit bɨsapmon amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ yolban kɨwit. Kɨŋakwa mɨktɨm uŋun Israel amɨn kabɨ do kokwinɨk yomgut. Aŋek yopban yutnikon yɨkgwit.
Aŋakwan mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋun kap yaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek yaŋ yokdaŋ, “Jerusalem, gak yo tagɨsi morap ninon toŋ uŋun dakon mibɨlɨsi.”
Yawe, yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun da arɨpmon oman amɨngo nak do aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ namgul.
Nak tayaŋgok egek Piŋkop do jomjom asat. Aŋek uŋun kaloŋ dagɨn aŋpulugosak do nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom asat.
Ji dɨsikon notji do but dasi galak taŋ yomni kaŋ, amɨn kɨsi da dandaba ji nak dakon paŋdet kabɨno akdaŋ.”
Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu Telagɨ Wup da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ɨban yaŋ yagɨt, “Dat, kundu ae mɨktɨm dakon Amɨn Tagɨ, amɨn dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm dakon nandak nandakni uŋun wukwisi, mani iyɨ do nandaba wɨgɨsak, do uŋuden amɨn do gen bamɨ morap si paŋkɨsɨbɨsal. Aŋek amɨn monɨŋɨ da tɨlagon ekwaŋ amɨn, uŋun do yolɨsal. Yaŋ asal do gak aŋkɨsisat. O Dat, gaga dakon galaktok yolek yaŋ asal.
Ji but dasi nandaŋek pi ani. Ji amɨn dakon pi ani bɨsapmon nin Amɨn Tagɨ dakon pi baŋ amaŋ yaŋon da nandaŋek ani.
Paŋmuwukbi kɨsi paŋpulugoneŋ do Telagɨ Wup da amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋon pi asak.
Gak mibɨlɨ nido wain pi dakon dam tuwɨlgɨl? Yaŋ agɨl do amɨn da kɨŋ ap aŋek bamɨ paŋ.
Ɨmal dubak pagɨt uŋun yawi madepsikon aŋbɨm abi naŋ pagɨt. Mani uŋun Piŋkop Dakon Gen.
Ji amɨn dakon yokwini yopmaŋ yomni kaŋ, dɨwarɨni pasɨl yomdaŋ, ae dɨma yopmaŋ yomni kaŋ, dɨwarɨni taŋ yomdaŋ.”
Ae notnin kɨnda gat yabetno uŋun gat kɨsi obamal. Uŋun amɨn paŋmuwukbi morapmon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋok dakon man bini toŋ amɨn kɨnda.
Jap bamɨ pakpak amɨn uŋun tomni tɨmɨkdak. Jap bamɨ paŋmuwukdak uŋun egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do paŋmuwukdak. Yaŋdo, jap kwaot kwaot amɨn gat ae jap bamɨ pakpak amɨn gat kɨsi da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ anjil.
Yawe, namɨn da gak da telagɨ yutgwan tagɨ wɨgɨsak? Telagɨ kabapgokon namɨn da tagɨ egɨpjak?
Nak butno yaworɨ taŋakwan Yawe da aŋpulugosak do jomjom agɨm. Aŋek yaŋ tɨdaŋapbo nak da tetgɨn do tobɨlek tekno nandagɨt.
Nak dakon man jikon tosok do aŋek amɨn kɨsi da nandaba yokwi tok madepsi aŋdamdaŋ.
Nak gengo do pakyaŋsi nandaŋ egɨsat. Ae aŋpakgo do nandaŋ egɨsat.
Gak aŋpak kɨlegɨ do but dasi galak taŋek aŋpak yokwi do kuragɨsi nandɨsal. Yaŋ nandɨsal do Piŋkopgo da gak kɨsɨk kɨsɨk abi do bɨt nelak tagal gamgut. Notgo kɨnda yaŋ dɨma tagal ɨmgut.
Yaŋba Pailat da amɨn dakon burɨ moni do Barabas pulugaŋ yɨpban mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyokon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan emat amɨn yoyɨŋban Yesu baljawit. Aba don tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotjak do yoyɨgɨt.
Yaŋsi dayɨsat, bɨsit yaŋ ani kaŋ, tepmɨsi paŋpulugokdɨsak. Mani, Amɨn Dakon Monji mɨktɨmon apjak bɨsapmon amɨn nandaŋ gadatni toŋ pɨndatjak, bo dɨma?”
Mani amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdaŋ. Aŋek Piŋkop da dabɨlon butni tagɨsi aŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi akdaŋ.
Aeno kaŋek os kwakwagɨ kɨnda kagɨm. Uŋun da kwenon amɨn kɨnda obipni abɨdaŋek yɨkgɨt. Uŋun amɨn do kɨla amɨn madep dakon pelɨt kɨnda ɨmgwit. Ɨba emaron teban tagɨt da tɨlagon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋek emat morapmɨ sigɨn aŋek teban tokeŋ yaŋon da nandaŋek kɨgɨt.
Gak do nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk abeŋ. Piŋkop Wukwisi, mango awɨgɨk do kap yokeŋ.
Nak naga uŋun yo morap wasagɨm.’ ”
Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn morapmɨ nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namaŋ uŋun nandaŋ gadatni yopba wɨtdal kɨŋakwa notni do nandaba yokwi tok aŋek uwal da kɨsiron yopmaŋ yopmaŋ akdaŋ.
Amɨn kokup kɨdat gawak yomɨŋek paŋkɨsaŋ uŋun mayak tok paŋ. Kokup kɨdat, ji Yawe gawak ɨmni.
“Nak bɨlak dɨ kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon egek don Jerusalem apgum. Juda amɨn notnoni yoni mɨni amɨn paŋpulugok do moneŋ paŋapgum, ae Piŋkop do mukwa sok do kɨsi apgum.
Paŋdetni dɨwarɨ Yesu kawit bɨsapmon kɨnda uŋun notni gat dɨma egɨpgwit, mani uŋun Tomas (ae mani kɨnda Yayat).
Kabaŋ morapmɨ da yaŋ nak aŋgwasɨwit. Mani joŋ kɨbɨrɨ soŋba soŋek tepmɨ pasɨlgaŋ, uŋun da tɨlak tepmɨ kɨmakgwit. Yawe da manon dapbo pasɨlgwit.
Ji tebai agakwa nin dakon tapmɨm mɨni aŋ bɨsapmon nin uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk amaŋ. Ae ji nandaŋ gadat kalɨp tebai awit uŋun aŋkaluk aŋek aesi tebai atni do bɨsit amaŋ.
Abɨsok nak amɨn pelaŋ kɨlɨ at, do tapmɨmno mɨnisi. Gak nepmaŋ degek manji dɨ nabɨm.
Abɨdaŋ kokup pap yɨpmaŋek waŋga abɨgɨ tɨpbaŋ aŋakgwit. Amɨn Stiwen do wasaŋek sɨtnok aŋ ɨmgwit uŋun da ɨmal dubakni ɨlɨk paŋkɨ monjɨ kɨnda akgɨt mani Sol uŋudon yopmaŋek Stiwen tɨpbaŋ aŋakgwit.
“Yaŋ aŋakwan amɨn tagɨni da yo agɨt uŋun kaŋban amɨn nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi da arɨpmon agɨt, do yo kɨla agak pi amɨni yokwi uŋun do nandaban wukwan ɨmgut. On mɨktɨm dakon amɨn kabɨ da nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi aŋek notni gat yumaŋ gwayek pi aŋ. Uŋun teŋteŋɨ dakon amɨn kabɨ yapmaŋgaŋ.
Aŋakwan nin kɨŋ mɨktɨm tɨmjok kɨnda tap binap tosok mani Kauda uŋun da manjikon da kɨgɨmaŋ. Uŋun da yoŋgam tɨmɨ dɨ agɨt do nin pi madepsi aŋek bot monɨŋ abɨsɨno buŋon nolgɨt uŋun ɨlɨtno apgut. Apban tap wakga dakon pi monjɨ da ɨlɨkba tap wakgakon wɨŋban tebaisi aŋteban awit. Yaŋ aŋek nap teban yopba tap wakga da mibɨlgwan pukwa tap wakga dɨma tuwɨl kɨsak do wamaŋ paŋteban awit. Ae Aprika mɨktɨm uŋun da kapmatjok nɨman tɨm yokwi kɨnda tosok mani Sitis uŋudon tap wakga da kɨŋ teban tosak yaŋ do pasol pasol awit. Yaŋ awit do tap wakga dakon ɨmal ɨlɨkba pɨŋba yum kaŋakwa mɨrɨm da tap wakga awɨlgɨt.
“Ji gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn do pɨndak kɨmotni. Uŋun ɨmal dubagɨ baŋ paŋek agɨp do galak toŋ. Ae yumaŋ gwayek tamokon amɨn da gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ yoyɨni do galagɨ nandaŋ. Ae muwut muwut yutnon tamo tagɨsikon yɨt do galak toŋ. Ae jap noknok bɨsap madepmon tamo amɨn mani toŋ do tɨlak abi uŋudon yɨt do galak toŋ.
Ae dat, ji monjɨ gwayosi tebaisi yoyɨŋba ji do nandaba yokwi tok dɨ aŋ dabam. Yaŋ aba yo tagɨ dɨ nin da arɨpmɨ dɨma aneŋ yaŋ dɨ nandabam.
“Gak Telagɨ Yut Madep tuwɨlek gɨldat kapbɨ da butgwan ae wɨtjɨk do yagɨl, do gɨptɨmgo aŋkutnoki! Gak asi Piŋkop dakon Monji egɨsalon tɨlak kɨndapmon da pɨ!”
Kalbi emat amɨn gen uŋun guramɨgek Pol abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ kokup pap Antiparis uŋudon aŋkɨwit.
“Nak Jerusalem do yaŋ yokdɨsat, ‘Uŋun mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi dakon kokup pap.’ ” Ae Piŋkop Wukwisi da Jerusalem aŋpulugaŋban tebaisi tokdɨsak.
Mani nak gak gat toktogɨsi egapbo kɨsitno amɨnsi tet do abɨdosol.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji bɨsit ani bɨsapmon jamba but amɨn da aŋ uŋudeŋ dɨma ani. Jamba but amɨn uŋun muwut muwut yut madepmon ae kokup papmon kosit amal amalon uŋudon agek bɨsit ak do galagɨsi nandaŋ. Uŋun amɨn amɨn da pɨndatni do yaŋ aŋ. Nak asisi dayɨsat, kobogɨni kɨsi wagɨlni tɨmɨkgaŋ.
Piŋkop dakon amɨn ekwaŋ uŋun da gen morap yosok uŋun nandaŋ. Mani ji Piŋkop dakon amɨn dɨma ekwaŋ, do geni dɨma nandaŋ.”
“Gak uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ amɨn dɨma yoyɨki. Aŋek mukwa sogok amɨnon kɨŋek gɨptɨmgo yolɨki. Aŋek Moses da yagɨt uŋun da tɨlagon paret aŋaki amɨn da asi kɨlek tal yaŋ gandani.”
Aŋakwa amɨn uŋun iyɨ yaŋ nandagɨt, ‘Jap bamɨ yopbeŋ dakon tamo kɨlɨ tugaŋ, do ae dɨ gat yopbeŋ dakon tamo arɨpmɨ dɨma, do niaŋsi abeŋ?’
Amɨn bamot Debe kokup papmon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋaŋakwal amɨn morapmɨsi da Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit. Aŋek uŋudon da tobɨl Lista ae Ikoniam ae Antiok kɨgɨmal.
Butno madepsi yokwi tagɨt, mani Yawe do madepsi yaŋ tɨdagɨm. Piŋkop da aŋpulugosak do yaŋ tɨdoko Telagɨ Yutnikon egek yaŋ ɨlɨtno nandagɨt. Aŋek bɨsitno do mɨrak yopgut.
Yoyɨŋban kɨŋakwa iyɨ gɨn ɨleŋ kɨndakon bɨsit ak do wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨgɨ gɨldat pɨgakwan iyɨ gɨn ɨleŋon egɨpgut.
Ae wɨli ji mɨŋatji but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ kɨmotni, aŋek burɨ si yokwi toni da arɨpmon aŋpak yokwi dɨma aŋyomni.
Yesu da Maria gat Juda amɨn Maria gat apgwit uŋun kunam takba pɨndagek bupmɨ madepsi nandaŋek burɨ da yokwi tagɨt.
Nak do oman asak amɨn uŋun nak nol kɨmotjak. Aŋek nak da egɨsaron oman amɨno kɨsi egɨpdeŋ. Nak do oman asak amɨn uŋun Datno da man madep ɨmdɨsak.”
Nak paŋmuwukbi morap ji dakon oman amɨn dagaŋek egɨsat, nido Piŋkop da iyɨ nak ji Israel amɨn kabɨkon nani dɨma uŋudon gen morapni yaŋ teŋteŋokeŋ do nak manjɨgɨt.
“Ji on amɨn kabɨ but upbal aŋ yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Dɨmasi! Bɨsap apmeŋon wɨsa dagokdo 9 kilok gɨn asak. Pakbi teban noknok bɨsap uŋun pɨlɨndo.
Aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kosit agɨp do yo dɨ dɨma tɨmɨtni. Wɨn kɨrɨŋ, ae yɨk, ae bret, ae moneŋ, ae paba pɨgɨk bamorɨ dɨma tɨmɨtni.
Yaŋdo, Piŋkop amɨn manjɨt do nandɨsak kaŋ, amɨn dakon galaktok bo amɨn dakon teban tebanon da dɨma manjɨsak, uŋun bupmɨni do aŋek manjɨsak.
“Nak do tapmɨm namɨŋbal kɨsitno amɨn kwenon wɨtjɨko Telagɨ Wup yaŋ gɨn abɨdoni.”
Not kabɨ, Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo aeni tobɨl apban uŋun gat muwutdamaŋ uŋun do dayɨkdamaŋ. Ji mɨrak pakyaŋsi yopni do tebai dayamaŋ.
Nak naga egɨp egɨp dakon bret.
(Dewit, Jesi dakon monji, uŋun dakon bɨsit obɨŋ ɨdon dagosok.)
Piŋkop, gak bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsal, do nandaŋ yawok nabi. Bupmɨgo madepsi do nak dakon dɨwarɨno yɨpmaŋ nabi.
Nin kɨsitnin da pi madepsi amaŋ. Nin da jobɨt paneŋ do yoŋ, mani Piŋkop da yo tagɨ aŋyomjak do bɨsit iyamaŋ. Nin do yo yokwisi aŋ nimɨŋakwa yaworɨsi egek jɨgɨ uŋun guramɨkgamaŋ.
Yawe, gak dɨma ɨŋtoki. Uwalgo da yaŋsul yokwisi aŋ gamaŋ. Uŋun nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn da mango do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ.
Nak yo ɨŋani kɨnda dɨmasi kokeŋ. Piŋkop manji ɨmaŋ amɨn dakon aŋpak do dɨma galak tosot. Nak uŋun gat kaloŋɨ dɨma agɨpneŋ.
“Gwakno kabɨ, nak ji gat bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok gɨn egɨpneŋ. Nak kɨŋapbo ji da nak wɨsɨkdaŋ. Mani Juda amɨn yoyɨgɨm yaŋ gɨn abɨsok ji baŋ dayɨsat, nak da kɨsaron ji arɨpmɨ dɨma apdaŋ.
Amɨn kɨnda yokwi asak uŋun Sunduk dakon amɨn, nido wasok wasogɨkon da Sunduk uŋun yokwi saŋbek saŋbek agɨt da asak. Piŋkop dakon Monji uŋun Sunduk dakon pi tuwɨl paŋtasɨk ak do abɨŋ noman tagɨt.
Yawe da pɨlɨn tukgwan baŋ tɨmɨk paŋabɨŋek dam teban dakon nap tebani paŋdagagɨt.
Mani Yesu da nandak nandakni pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek amɨn kɨsirɨ gɨreŋɨkbi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak pɨdaŋ amɨn da ɨŋamon at.” Iyɨŋban amɨn uŋun pɨdaŋ akgɨt.
Piŋkop nak monjɨ bɨlagɨ egek aŋpak yokwi agɨm uŋun do dɨma nandaki. Gak amɨn do bupmɨ nandaŋ yomɨsal, do but dasi galak taŋ nabi.
Yokwikon naŋ abɨdoki do yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun arɨpmɨ akdɨsal yaŋ do jomjom aŋek sɨŋtaŋ egɨt da dabɨlno tep namaŋ.
Mibɨlni yaŋ teŋteŋaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gwano, nandaŋ gadatgo da gak aŋkɨlek ak. Uŋun do butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan kɨki. Sotgo kɨlɨ pasɨlak.”
Piŋkop yo nido iyɨwit uŋun yomgut, mani sot madep kɨnda kɨsi yɨpban sot awit.
Pɨndagakwan gen kɨnda da yaŋ noman taŋban nandagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Pita, gak pɨdaŋ on dapmaŋ na.”
Piŋkop uŋun kokup papmon egɨsak, do kokup uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma yokwi tosak. Wɨsa mɨgon yɨpmaŋakwan Piŋkop da kokup uŋun aŋkutnosak.
Aŋpak tagɨsi aŋakwa uŋun do amɨn da jɨgɨ daba tepmɨ pani kaŋ, Piŋkop da ji do tagɨsi nandakdɨsak. Mani aŋpak yokwi aŋek uŋun dakon tepmɨ tɨmɨtneŋ kaŋ, uŋun da yo yokwisi asak.
Yawe, aŋpulugoki do yaŋ tɨdosot, do nandaŋ nabi dosi nandɨsat. Yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun da arɨpmon nandak nandak tagɨsi nabi.
Uŋun yo morap da abɨsok yaŋ nolɨsak, mukwa sogok amɨn da Piŋkop do but galak dakon jap ɨmaŋ ae bɨt kɨlapyo baŋ mukwa soŋ ɨmaŋ, mani uŋun da Piŋkop gawak ɨmaŋ amɨn dakon but arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋmɨlɨp asak, ae nin amɨn kɨlegɨsi yaŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma nandakdaŋ.
Kalɨp dabɨlɨ mɨni egɨpgut amɨn uŋun ae kosirɨ kɨnda gat iyɨŋba opban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Piŋkop man madep ɨmɨŋek yaŋ teban tok tebaisi kɨnda aŋek gen bamɨ gɨn yoki. Uŋun amɨn uŋun yokwi pakpak amɨn kɨnda yaŋ nandamaŋ.”
Gen tebanon Moses da gen kɨnda yagɨt uŋun yaŋ: mɨŋat uŋuden tɨpbaŋ aŋakba kɨmotjak. Gak da uŋun do niaŋ nandɨsal?”
Nido uŋun iyɨnaŋ bɨsap kaloŋ paregek paŋpulugaŋban mɨŋat amɨnyo iyɨ dakon telagɨ mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ dagoŋ. Ae uŋun da aban gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi awit, ae yaŋ gɨn toktogɨsi egɨ aŋaŋ kɨkdaŋ.
Ae Amɨn Tagɨ da paŋtagap aban aŋpak morap ani dosi dayɨgɨmaŋ uŋun aŋ yaŋsi nandamaŋ. Ae don kɨsi yaŋ gɨn akdaŋ yaŋsi nandamaŋ.
Yaŋban Pita da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon nandaŋ gadat wɨtdal kɨsak kaŋ, nak yaŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma abeŋ.”
Bo tap kɨlap do iyɨŋban tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ kɨnda tagɨ ɨmjak? Uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨmasi.
Ji pakyaŋsi nandani. Piŋkop da amɨn do aŋpak yaworɨ aŋyomɨsak, mani yokwi aba japmɨ nandaŋ yomɨsak. Amɨn morap aŋpakni yopmaŋ dekgwit uŋun yo yokwisi aŋyomgut, mani ji aŋpakni tagɨsi uŋun do nandaŋ teban taŋek sigɨn atni kaŋ, aŋpak yaworɨ aŋdamdɨsak. Mani ji yaŋon dɨma atni kaŋ, jiyo kɨsi paŋsanɨtdɨsak.
Mani kɨla amɨn madep nak naga Piŋkop do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdɨsat. Ae Piŋkop yol do uŋun da manon da yaŋ teban tok awit amɨn, uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ ani. Mani uŋun da top amɨn dakon gen kagani sopdɨsak.
Nandak nandakni burɨgwan pasɨlɨ toŋ uŋun teŋteŋokdaŋ. Ae maŋ pak gawagek Piŋkop gawak ɨmɨŋek “Piŋkop bamɨsi ji gat egɨsak” yaŋ yokdaŋ.
Mani notnonisi, yo don altokdaŋ uŋun do aesi nandani, uŋun Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo dakon yabekbini da kɨlɨ yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ damgwit.
Yawe, gak yo tagɨsi asal uŋun do nandaŋek butno tagɨsi asak. Kɨsitgo da pi asak uŋun do nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap yosot.
Don Piŋkop da Yesu kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt uŋun bɨsapmon paŋdetni da gen uŋun yagɨt uŋun do nandawit. Aŋek Piŋkop dakon gen gat ae Yesu da gen yagɨt kɨsi do nandaba bamɨsi agɨt.
Ae Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Mɨŋat kɨnda da silwa moneŋ tabɨlɨ 10 kabɨ baŋ kaloŋɨ da yutnon maŋ pasɨljak kaŋ uŋun niaŋ asak? Uŋun da lamni koleŋek yutni ɨkdɨgaŋek tebaisi wɨsɨŋek don kosak.
Ae uŋun do Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda gat yaŋ tosok: ‘Gak Telagɨ Amɨngo kɨmakbi tamokon yɨpbi taŋek dɨma mɨktosak.’
Piŋkop da Isip mɨktɨmon pi tapmɨmɨ toŋsi aŋek Isip da kɨsiron baŋ tɨmɨkgɨt, mani Israel amɨn da si ɨŋtaŋ ɨmgwit.
Stiwen yaŋ yaŋek ŋwakbeŋ aŋek yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, yokwini dakon kobogɨ dɨma yobi.” Stiwen yaŋ yaŋek kɨmakgɨt.
Piŋkop, pɨdaŋ abɨŋ nin paŋpuluga. Butdasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpakgo do nandaŋek nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨgaki kɨmot dɨma aneŋ.
Yaŋ iyɨŋban Liwai pɨdaŋ yo morapni kɨsi yopmaŋek Yesu yolgɨt.
Uŋun kabɨkon kɨnda mani Maria, kokupni Makdala. Ae Maria ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda Jems gat Josep gat dakon meŋi. Ae Sebedi dakon monjɨ bamot uŋun dakon meŋi kɨsi akgwit.
Egɨp egɨpno Piŋkopmon tosok yaŋsi nandɨsat, do yo kɨnda do dɨma pasolgeŋ. Amɨn da nak do yo kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma ani.
Nak tɨlak gen kɨnda dayɨkdɨsat. Olip kɨndap amɨn da kwaokbi dakon kɨlɨŋɨ uŋun Israel amɨn dakon tɨlak asak. Uŋun kɨlɨŋɨ dɨwarɨ Piŋkop da paŋsanɨk maban kɨwit. Ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ ji olip kɨndap iyɨ kwokwo dakon kɨlɨŋɨ yombem, ji paŋabɨŋ olip kɨndap tagɨsi amɨn da kwaokbikon saŋbegɨt da gelɨkon pakbi ɨlɨgek kɨlɨŋɨ dɨwarɨ gat tagɨsi toŋ.
Uŋun Wup kaloŋ dagɨn uŋun yo morap paŋalon asak. Iyɨ da galaktogon but galak dakon yo kokwinɨgek amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ do yomɨŋ yomɨŋ asak.
Mani gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma iyɨwit. Yaŋ aŋakwa Yesu da amɨn uŋun abɨdaŋek aŋmɨlɨp aŋek dɨgo kɨ yaŋ iyɨŋban si kɨgɨt.
Nido gen morap namgul uŋun yoyɨko abɨdawit. Aŋek asi nak gagon da apgum ae gak da nak yabekgɨl, yaŋsi nandaba bamɨsi asak.
Yawe uŋun Piŋkopnin. Uŋun da mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨlani asak.
Yesu uŋun Jon aŋakba kɨmakgɨt dakon gen bin nandaŋek iyɨ gɨn bot kɨnda abɨdaŋek mɨktɨm amɨni mɨnikon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep Yesu uŋudon kɨsak yaŋ nandaŋek kokupni yopmaŋ yopmaŋ aŋek pakbi ɨdap ɨleŋɨ naŋ yol aŋkɨwit.
Yaŋbal nandaŋ gadat amɨn dɨ Parisi da kabɨkon nani uŋun da pɨdaŋ agek yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon nani uŋun gɨptɨmni mandaŋek Moses dakon gen teban guramɨtni do yoyɨni.”
Yaŋ yoyɨŋek koŋni toŋ amɨn da mɨŋgaŋ kwenikon wɨgɨ obɨsi dapmaŋek ɨmalni paŋ dagaŋ yopban yut yɨpmaŋek molaŋ abɨgɨwit.
Piŋkop da iyɨ dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni yumaŋ nagɨt. Aŋek uŋun gat saŋbek saŋbek dagok dagogɨ mɨni agɨt. Piŋkop uŋun mani telagɨ ae masɨ masɨmɨ.
Bɨsap kɨndakon gen teban dakon mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn kɨnda da pɨdaŋ agek Yesu aŋkewal do aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, yo ninaŋ aŋek egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokeŋ?”
Yaŋ pɨndagakwan Pita da iyɨgɨt, “Nak moneŋno mɨni. Mani yo taŋ namaŋ uŋun tagɨ gabeŋ. Yesu Kristo Nasaret kokupmon nani uŋun da tapmɨm namgut do gayɨko pɨdaŋ kosit agɨp!”
Mani, Amɨn Tagɨ Dakon Gɨldat uŋun kabo noknok da but pɨsoni mɨni abaŋ uŋun da tɨlak noman tokdɨsak. Uŋun gɨldaron kundukon wuwɨk madepsi noman taŋek yo morap kundukon toŋ uŋun kɨndap da soŋban wagɨl soŋ mudokdaŋ. Ae mɨktɨm gat ae yo morap mɨktɨmon toŋ uŋun kɨsi kɨndap da soŋban saŋbeŋek dɨma tokdaŋ.
Korin amɨn, Piŋkop dakon gen jikon da noman tagɨt yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Ae geni ji dagɨn abɨdawit, aŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ dɨma abɨdawit yaŋ nandaŋ, ma?
Mani geni kobogɨ yaworɨ ae aŋpak tagɨsikon da paŋtobɨl yomni. Ae Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlegɨsi egɨpni. Yaŋ aba Kristo yol do aŋek aŋpak tagɨsi aŋakwa gen yokwi dayaŋ amɨn uŋun mayagɨ pakdaŋ.
Yawe, aŋkutnoki do gagon obɨsat. Nak aŋkutnaŋaki mayagɨ dɨma pakeŋ.
Israel amɨn, Yawe da nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsak, ae dɨma yokwi toneŋ yaŋ do bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ nin paŋpulugosok, do Yawe da nin paŋpulugokdɨsak yaŋsi nandaŋ teban taŋek uŋun do jomjom aneŋ.
Uŋun amɨn yokwi da yaŋ yoyaŋ: “Ji nin nolni kaŋ, napmɨ mɨni tagɨsi egɨpdaŋ.” Mani iyɨ aŋpak si tasɨk toni dakon oman monjɨ ekwaŋ. Nido, amɨn kɨnda yo kɨnda yɨpban uŋun da kɨlani asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn uŋun yo dakon oman monjɨ egɨsak.
Nido Yawe gak Piŋkop Wɨkwisi egek mɨktɨm morap kɨsi kɨla asal. Gak piŋkop ŋwakŋwarɨ morap kɨsi yapmaŋek mango wukwisi tosok.
Uŋun dakon paljɨgɨ da kundukon gɨk morapmɨ wɨrɨrɨkban mɨktɨmon mawit. Uŋun gɨk kokwin kabi kapbɨ aŋek, uŋun dakon kabi kɨnda kɨsisi mɨktɨmon mawit. Nugɨm yokwisi uŋun mɨŋat uŋun da monjɨ aŋalak do agɨt uŋun da ɨŋamon akgɨt. Mɨŋat uŋun da monjɨ aŋalaŋban monjɨ uŋun si nok do jomjom aŋek akgɨt.
Piŋkop, amɨn da silwa soŋba gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi aŋ uŋun da tɨlak gak da nin kɨlɨ paŋkewalgɨl.
Nin Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek Piŋkop da dabɨlon amɨn kɨlegɨ agɨmaŋ. Ae nin Juda amɨn dakon gen teban dɨma yolgamaŋ, do Juda amɨn da nandaŋ, nin Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da arɨp yokwi pakpak gɨn yaŋ nandaŋ nimaŋ. Aŋek Kristo da yokwi aneŋ do nandɨsak yaŋ nandaŋ. Mani uŋun dɨmasisi!
Yaŋ yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn pup gen yaŋban kosit bamot agɨt. Yaŋban nandaŋek Pita Yesu da gen yagɨt uŋun do nandagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak dakon man kosit kapbɨ wasɨp yaŋaki pup da kosit bamot gen yosak.” Gen uŋun do nandaŋek burɨ yokwi taŋban kunam madepsi takgɨt.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa amɨn muwukgwit kɨsi da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋyomgwit. Yaŋ aba gen kokwin amɨn madep da amɨn bamot dakon paba pɨgɨkni ɨlɨgek kalɨŋ kɨrɨŋbaŋ baljoni do yoyɨwit.
Nak Juda amɨn ae Grik amɨn but tobɨl aŋek Piŋkopmon kɨŋek Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni do gen madepsi yaŋ teŋteŋagɨm.
Yo morap Yawe da wasagɨt da kɨlani asak uŋun dukwan dukwan taŋ aŋaŋ kwaŋ, ji Yawe aŋkɨsini. Nak Yawe aŋkɨsikeŋ.
Wuwɨk uŋun nandaŋek uŋun mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi da muwugek amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ mɨrak paŋ nandaba Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn kabɨ da iyɨ da genonsi da gen yawit. Yaŋba nandaŋek nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi
Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu uŋun bɨsit pi aŋek egɨpgut. Bɨsit aban mudaŋakwan paŋdetni kɨnda da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, Jon da paŋdetni bɨsit agak do yoyɨŋ dekgɨt, yaŋ gɨn niyɨŋ dekgi.”
Uŋun bɨsapmon jɨgɨ madepsi Juda mɨktɨmon noman taŋakwan Piŋkop dakon butjap amɨn da kwenon mokdɨsak. Do mɨŋat monjɨ kwapni toŋ, ae mɨŋat monjɨ mum noŋ uŋun bupmɨsi.
Pol da Esia mɨktɨmon bɨsap noknok dɨma aneŋ yaŋ nandagɨt, do nin tap wakgakon da Epesas kokup pap si yapmaŋek Miletus kokup pap kɨgɨmaŋ. Bɨsap noknok dɨma aŋek tepmɨ kɨneŋ kaŋ, Pentikos Bɨsap Madep Jerusalem koneŋ yaŋ nandagɨt.
Mani ji da kokup kɨdat do mukwa sosoŋ uŋun do nak da yo bamɨsi aŋ yaŋ yosot yaŋ dɨ nandabam. Ae kokup kɨdat do yo bamɨsi yaŋ dɨma yosot.
Gak aego altoki dosi gayɨt uŋun do dɨma wɨrɨpdakgi.
Wɨgɨ pakbi ɨdapmon kɨŋakwa tepmɨsi mɨrɨm madepsi da abɨŋ pakbi tamalɨgakwan boron pɨgɨwit. Yaŋ aŋakwan Yesu dɨpmɨn pagakwan
Telagɨ Wup Samaria amɨnon dɨma pɨgɨt. Ɨsal Yesu da manon gɨn telagɨ pakbi sowit do yabekba kɨŋ altaŋek Telagɨ Wup abɨdoni do bɨsit agɨmal.
Mani amɨn kabɨ kɨnda 40 yapmaŋdak uŋun da jap pakbiyo dɨma aŋek Pol kosiron pasɨlɨkon da aŋatno kɨmagakwan don noneŋ yaŋ aŋteban awit. Yaŋ dɨma aneŋ kaŋ, Piŋkop da nin tagɨ nindapjak yaŋ yawit. Do gak dɨma nandaŋ yobi. Gak da geni nandaŋek nandaŋ yobi do sɨŋtaŋ ekwaŋ.”
Mani Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da jap madepsi kɨnda paŋkosit aŋek amɨn morapmɨ yaŋ yomgut.
Pita gen uŋun nandaŋek pɨdaŋban amɨn bamot gat kɨwit. Kwan abɨdaŋba yut kwen nani tagɨt do aŋaŋ wɨgɨwit. Wɨkwan sakwabat morapmɨ da abɨŋ Pita aŋgwasɨŋek kunam tagek Dokas da egek ɨmal bupgut uŋun yolɨwit.
Aisak nandaŋ gadat aŋek Jekop gat Iso gat do gɨsam yomgut. Aŋek yo don noman taŋ yomdaŋ uŋun do yoyɨgɨt.
Nak Piŋkop da Saion amɨn kɨnda yabekban abɨŋ Israel amɨn yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak do nandɨsat. Yawe da mɨŋat amɨni paŋpulugaŋban aeni tagɨsi egɨpni bɨsapmon, Israel amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdaŋ. Asi, but galaksi egɨpdaŋ.
Gɨldat morapmɨ jap dɨma naŋek agɨpgwit. Don Pol da binapnikon agek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kabɨ, ji nak dakon gen guramɨkba Krit mɨktɨm tɨmon si egɨpgumaŋ tam, tap wakga dɨma yokwi taŋban, ae yo morap dɨma pasɨlbam.
Nak Kristo yolyol amɨn kɨnda nandaŋ ɨmɨsat, uŋun bɨlak 14 mudaŋakwa Piŋkop da abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ Kwen Kokup 3 kon uŋudon awɨgɨ yɨpgut. Uŋun gɨptɨm walɨmbɨl wɨgɨgɨt, bo gɨptɨm yɨpmaŋek wɨgɨgɨt nak dɨma nandɨsat, Piŋkop dagɨn nandɨsak.
Abraham Piŋkop do nandaŋ gadat agɨt, do Piŋkop da yaŋ ɨmgut bɨsapmon Abraham Piŋkop dakon gen guramɨkgɨt. Uŋun kokupni yɨpmaŋ degek Piŋkop da mɨktɨm kɨnda ɨban iyɨ dakon mɨktɨm dagosak do nandagɨt uŋudon kɨgɨt. Abraham dukwan kɨkeŋ uŋun dɨma nandagɨt, mani nandaŋ gadat aŋek kɨgɨt.
Uŋun bɨsapmon gɨldat dabɨl pɨlɨn tuk aŋakwan kanek yawi dom akdɨsak. Yaŋ aŋakwan Amɨn Tagɨ apjak dakon bɨsap madep don altosak. Uŋun bɨsap madepmon Amɨn Tagɨ dakon tapmɨm madepni ae tɨlɨm madepni uŋun altokdɨsak.
Nido, Piŋkop da yaŋ yagɨt: “Mɨŋat eyo kɨlɨ abi, ji yumabi aŋpak dɨma ani.” Ae yaŋ kɨsi yagɨt: “Ji amɨn dɨma dapba kɨmotni.” Do yumabi aŋpak dɨma agɨl, mani amɨn kɨnda aŋakbɨ kɨmakgɨt kaŋ, gak gen teban morap tuwɨl tuwɨl amɨn kɨnda dagagɨl.
Gak aŋpak kɨlegɨ do dɨma galak tosol. Aŋpak yokwi dogɨn galak tosol. Gak gen bamɨ yogok do dɨma galak tosol. Top yogok dogɨn galak tosol.
Nin paŋmuwukbi notnin dɨwarɨ do but dasi galak taŋ yomamaŋ. Yaŋ amaŋ do aŋek yaŋ nandamaŋ, nin kɨmot dakon kosit kɨlɨ yɨpgumaŋ da egɨp egɨp dakon kosit naŋ yolgamaŋ. Amɨn kɨnda amɨn do but dasi dɨma galak taŋ yomɨsak uŋun amɨn kɨmot da kosiron sigɨn agɨsak.
Nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsak. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ geni guramɨk kɨmagek nin dɨma nipmaŋ dekdak. Yawe aŋkɨsini!
Piŋkop kaloŋɨ gɨn uŋun nin morap kɨsi dakon Datnin. Uŋun mɨŋat amɨn morap dakon wukwini, ae mɨŋat amɨn morap da binapmon pi asak, ae mɨŋat amɨn morap da butgwan egɨsak.
Ji bo ae amɨn dɨ da man madep nimni yaŋon da pi dɨma agɨmaŋ.
Gɨldat dabɨl uŋungwan da amɨn kɨnda da mɨŋat paŋek but galagon da yutni yɨpmaŋek waŋga pɨsak, uŋun da tɨlak waŋga pɨsak. Gɨldat dabɨl uŋun amɨn kɨnda da napbɨ gwapbo do tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨk do asak, uŋun da tɨlak kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek kositni naŋ kɨsak.
Nak dakon man yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek jɨgɨ pasak uŋun yolɨko pɨndatjak.”
Amɨn yokwi nak aŋupbal ak do apni bɨsapmon kosit yokwigɨn agek maŋ potdaŋ.
Mani Amɨn Tagɨ, abɨsok nak nido jomjom asat? Nak gak do nandaŋ gadaŋek gak dagɨn aŋpulugoki do jomjom asat.
Uŋun da sakwabat gat, ae mɨŋat monjɨyo meŋi datni yopmaŋ kɨmakgwit gat, ae amɨn kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon da apgwit da mɨktɨmninon ekwaŋ, uŋun dapba kɨmokgoŋ.
Gak Piŋkopno. Amɨn yokwi da dɨma abɨdoni yaŋ do gagon obɨŋ pasɨldat. Yaŋ aŋapbo nido manji namɨsal? Nido uwal da abɨŋ nepmaŋakwa butno obɨsi jɨk tosok?
Yaŋban Yesu da kɨsitni amɨn uŋun da kwenon wɨtjɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kɨlek toki do nandɨsat, do pasɨl gamni!” Yaŋ yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn wudani kɨbɨdaŋakwa gɨptɨmni kɨlek tagɨt.
Mani Yawe uŋun kɨla amɨn madep dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨ wɨgɨsak. Uŋun kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamonikon yɨgek gen kokwin pi ak do kɨlɨ tagap tagɨt.
Ae kaŋapbo aŋelo tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda Kwen Kokup da pɨgɨt. Uŋun gɨptɨmɨ gɨkwem naŋ wamgut, ae busuŋɨ da kwenon kɨlap baŋ kɨnda tagɨt. Tomno dabɨlni gɨldat da yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Aŋakwan kandap bamotni mɨleŋ asɨp yombem.
Nak kalugɨ sigɨn egɨpbeŋ bɨsapmon butji sigɨn pabo pɨsaŋakwa uŋun do sigɨn nandani kaŋ, tagɨsi yaŋ nandɨsat.
Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn dɨ gat ae Parisi amɨn dɨ gat da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, gak da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda abɨ kaŋek asi gak Piŋkop dakon pi naŋ asal yaŋ gandaneŋ.”
Uŋun da kwenon aŋelo 4 kabɨ mɨktɨm dakon kodɨgɨ 4 kabɨkon akba pɨndakgɨm. Mɨrɨm da mɨktɨm gat ae tap gat ae kɨndap gat dɨma pɨsoni yaŋ do mɨrɨm 4 kabɨ uŋun tebaisi tɨmɨkgwit.
Yawe uŋun mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ man madepni tosok. Tɨlɨmni uŋun kundu si yapmaŋek wagɨl tagɨsisi.
Uŋun bɨsapmon Amɨn Dakon Monji dakon tɨlak kundukon altaŋban kaŋek mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn kɨsi morap da kunam tatdaŋ. Kaŋakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji tapmɨmni gat ae tɨlɨm madepni gat gɨkwemon da apban kokdaŋ.
Gen yɨpban kwan opba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak kɨlɨsi Esia mɨktɨmon apgum bɨsapmon ji gat bɨsap morapmɨ egek aŋpak agɨm uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ.
Jerusalem, nak gak do ɨŋtaŋek yo ɨsalɨ yaŋ gandaŋek yo dɨwarɨ do nandako wɨgɨni kaŋ, Piŋkop da nak melno aŋkadɨm aban kap dɨma yokeŋ dosi nandɨsat.
Yesu paŋdet kabɨni boron wɨgek pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda uŋun da kalɨp wɨgɨni do yoyɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwa Yesu mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep yoyɨŋban kɨwit.
Ji paret ak do wagɨlsi tagap taŋ yaŋsi nandamaŋ. Mani nak gat Masadonia amɨn dɨ gat da obɨŋ dandano ji dɨma tagap toni kaŋ, nak gat ji gat kɨsi mayagɨ pakdamaŋ.
Nido nin nandamaŋ, nandaŋ gadat kosiron dagɨn amɨn kɨlegɨ amaŋ. Gen teban yolyol kosiron da dɨma.
Paŋmuwukbi mɨŋat amɨnyo Babilon ekwaŋ, uŋun mɨŋat amɨnyo Piŋkop da ji gat kɨsi kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt, uŋun da gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ dayaŋ. Monjɨno Mak yo kɨsi da gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ dayɨsak.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak tɨlak gen kɨnda gat yoko nandabɨt. Amɨn kɨnda da wain pini aŋek nagal aŋ uŋun nagalon wain sop bamaŋ tɨl do gapma kɨnda wayɨkgɨt. Wayɨk mudaŋek kabo noknok pɨndat do yut dubak kɨnda aban wɨgɨgɨt. Yut aŋ mudaŋek amɨn da moneŋ pini dɨ aŋek pi ami do bamɨ dɨ paŋ ɨmni yaŋ nandaŋek pi uŋun da kɨsiron yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨm dubagɨkon kɨgɨt.
Yaŋban Jon da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, nin kaŋapno amɨn kɨnda da gak da manon koŋ yolban kamaŋ. Mani nin da kabɨkon nani kɨnda dɨma, do yaŋsop aŋ ɨmɨmaŋ.”
Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨ teŋteŋaŋ yoban kɨsɨk kɨsɨk paŋ.
Mani paŋdetni gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ pasɨlɨ taŋ yomgut, do dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt. Ae gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do aŋek iyɨk do si pasalgwit.
Uŋun kaloŋ da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ madep asak. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Sami bamot da Yesu do gen yɨpbal kɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, notgo but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsal uŋun sot asak.”
Gak dakon nandak nandakgo da notgo nandaŋ gadatni dɨma teban taŋbi aŋtasɨk akdɨsak. Kristo uŋun amɨn do aŋek kɨmakgɨt.
Yawe da gen yaŋakwan tap kwenon kɨŋakwan nandaŋ. Piŋkop tɨlɨmni madep kɨrɨrɨŋ da yaŋ madepsi yosok. Gen madepsi yaŋban sulɨgɨ tap madep kwenon kɨŋakwan nandaŋ.
Yesu da gen uŋun yaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn yoni morapmɨ paŋmuwut do pi aŋegek Piŋkop do dɨma nandaŋek ekwaŋ amɨn, uŋun amɨnon yo yaŋsi altokdɨsak.”
Piŋkop gak wagɨl kɨlegɨsi. Amɨn morap dakon nandak nandak butyo pakyaŋsi pɨndak nandaŋyo asal. Amɨn yokwi aŋpak yokwi saŋbeŋek dɨma ani do kɨrɨŋɨk yobi. Mani amɨn kɨlegɨ paŋpulugaŋaki tebai atni.
Kosit ɨlalogɨ naŋ yul namgul, do sagalek dɨma nɨkgɨt.
Not kabɨ, Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo do nandaŋek, ae Telagɨ Wup da amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak paŋalon asak, uŋun do kɨsi nandaŋek nagon saŋbeŋba Piŋkop do bɨsit aŋ kɨmotneŋsi.
Piŋkop, butnokon da gak do tebaisi nandaŋ gadasat. Do gak dakon man awɨgɨk do kap yokdɨsat.
Aŋek babɨkni yombem dɨma egɨpni. Babɨkni kwen wɨgɨk aŋek Piŋkop dakon gen pabɨŋ yopmaŋek tebai dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit. Aŋek wupmon da toktogɨsi dɨma yolgwit.
Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu da yaŋ mudaŋ niban nawa gen dayɨgɨmaŋ uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ.
Gen teban morap kɨsi on gen teban kaloŋgwan gɨn tosok: “Gaga do but dasi niaŋ galak tosol, uŋudeŋ gɨn amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yobi.”
Parisi amɨn sigɨn egakwa Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
“Parisi amɨn uŋun agek iyɨ burɨkon da bɨsit yaŋ agɨt, ‘Piŋkop, amɨn yokwi dɨwarɨ ekwaŋ nak uŋuden amɨn dɨma, uŋun do nak ya yaŋ gayɨsat. Kabo noknok, bo yokwi pakpak, bo yumabi agak amɨn, bo ae takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn amon akdak, nak uŋuden dɨma.
Uŋun bɨsapmon wurɨpdagek yaŋ yagɨm, “Gak da nak nolbɨ gak da dubagɨkon egɨsat.” Mani bupmɨ nandaŋek aŋpulugoki do yaŋ tɨdoko nandaŋ namgul.
Yaŋban Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn da notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Uŋun dukwan kɨŋakwan dɨma koneŋ do yosok? Juda amɨn notnin Grik amɨn kabɨkon ekwaŋ uŋudon kɨŋek Grik amɨn yoyɨŋ detjak do yosok?
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu aeni yaŋ tɨdaŋek wupni yɨpban kɨŋakwan kɨmakgɨt.
Nak yaŋsi nandɨsat, Piŋkop uŋun paŋpulugokno, do bɨsit aŋ ɨbeŋ bɨsapmon uŋun da uwalno yolban kɨŋ mudokdaŋ.
Amɨn kɨnda yaŋ dɨma nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn do kombɨ amɨn kɨnda dɨma yaŋ nandaŋ ɨmni.
Dɨsi nandaŋ, Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ ji kalɨp olip kɨndap iyɨ kwokwo dakon kɨlɨŋɨ yombem da yaŋ egɨpgwit. Uŋudon baŋ Piŋkop da ji paŋsanɨk olip kɨndap amɨn da kwaokbikon saŋbegɨt. Kɨndap iyɨ yaŋ dɨma kwoŋ, mani Piŋkop da yaŋ agɨt. Do kɨlɨŋɨ uŋun paŋsanɨkgɨt uŋun iyɨ da obikonsi tagapmɨsi saŋbekdɨsak.
Nao uŋun Seruk dakon monji. Seruk uŋun Reu dakon monji. Reu uŋun Pelek dakon monji. Pelek uŋun Ebe dakon monji. Ebe uŋun Sela dakon monji.
Piŋkop gen morapni guramɨk kɨmokdok, ae nin gen kagakon da “Aneŋ” yaŋ yoneŋ kaŋ uŋun aneŋsi.
Yesu da sigɨn yaŋ yagɨt, “Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn abɨŋek bret dɨma nagɨt, ae wain dɨma nagɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan, ‘Koŋni kɨnda taŋ ɨmɨsak’ ji da gen uŋun yawit.
Kaŋek yutnikon tobɨl kɨŋ bumjotnikon yop do marasin gat ae pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi gat paŋkosit awit. Mani Sabat dakon gen teban yolek yɨk yawot awit.
Josep gat Maria gat Piŋkop da ɨŋamon kɨlek tok dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ noman tagɨt. Uŋun dakon gen Moses dakon gen tebanon tosok. Do Maria gat Josep gat da Yesu Monjɨ Amɨn Tagɨ do paret do Jerusalem aŋkɨgɨmal.
Mani Yawe da yaŋ yosok, “Amɨn yokwi da tapmɨmni mɨni amɨn pabɨŋ yopmaŋgaŋ, ae yoni mɨni amɨn iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋek ekwaŋ. Do nak da abɨŋ paŋpulugokeŋ. Uŋun nak da paŋkutnokeŋ do yoŋ, do yaŋsi akdɨsat.”
Mani nak toktogɨsi gak nandaŋ gadaŋ gamɨŋek aŋpulugoki do jomjom abeŋ. Mango madepsi sigɨn awɨgɨkeŋ.
Aŋek yaŋ teban tok kɨnda aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yo nido nayɨki, tagɨ gabeŋ.”
