Yo morap uŋun wasaŋek altoni bɨsapmon Piŋkop da ji tɨmɨtjak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun kwaŋ tosok, do ji pɨdaŋ agek busuŋji kwen gwaŋ pɨdaŋ mudoni.”
Mani ji nin paŋpulugaŋek bɨsit aba Piŋkop da amɨn morapmɨ dakon bɨsitni nandaŋek nin paŋpulugosak. Aŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da Piŋkop da ninon paŋpulugok asak uŋun kaŋek ya yaŋ iyɨni.
Gen on ji da man madep nimni yaŋon da dɨma yomaŋ. Ji da nin dakon aŋpak do tagɨsi nandani yaŋon da yomaŋ. Amɨn dɨwarɨ da man madep dogɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek amɨn butgwan yo bamɨsi toŋ uŋun do dɨma nandaŋ. Nin ji da uŋun amɨn dakon geni kobogɨ paŋtobɨl yomni do nandamaŋ.
Uŋun da kokup papji dakon wigat paŋteban aŋek amɨn kabɨgo gɨsam yomɨsak.
Yaŋ aŋaki nak kap yaŋek Piŋkop dakon man awɨgɨkdɨsat. Aŋek ya yaŋ iyɨŋek man madepni do yaŋ teŋteŋok abeŋ.
Nak don egɨ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsat uŋun gak da kɨsiron tosok. Uwalno nak aŋsopmaŋgaŋ uŋun da kɨsiron baŋ pulugaŋ nepbi.
Yawe, bɨsap niaŋ da amɨn yokwi da aŋpakni do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani?
Yawe uŋun kɨla amɨn madep egɨsak. Mɨktɨm gak kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aki. Mɨktɨm tɨm tap binap toŋ ji but galak nandani.
Kalɨp Pita Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ nandaŋ gadat awit uŋun gat jap kaloŋɨ naŋ naŋ awit. Mani don Jems da Juda amɨn dɨ yabekban Antiok kɨwit. Uŋun amɨn yaŋ nandawit, nin Yesu nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek gɨptɨmninyo kɨsi mandaneŋ kaŋ, Piŋkop da kaŋban kɨlek tosak. Do abɨŋ altawit bɨsapmon Pita uŋun Juda amɨn da yokwi nandaŋ namni yaŋ do pasalek Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ yopmaŋ degek uŋun gat gadat gadat dɨma awit.
Uŋun bɨsapmon gɨldat dabɨl pɨlɨn tuksi agɨt, do 12 kilok aŋakwan mɨktɨm kɨsi pɨlɨn tuk aŋakwan kɨŋ pɨlɨndo 3 kilok agɨt. Aŋakwan Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon yoma ɨmal uŋun kwen da sulugɨ pɨŋ mibɨlɨkon dagaŋ kɨ tɨmɨ bamorɨ agɨt.
Bupmɨ nandaŋ namɨŋek aŋpulugoki do yaŋ tɨdokeŋ bɨsapmon nandaŋ nabi. Bɨsit aŋek kɨsitno paŋenokgo telagɨ yutgo da tet do wɨgɨsak.
Ji telagɨ pakbi sowit bɨsapmon, Piŋkop da ji gat ae Kristo gat kɨsi kɨmakbi tamogwan wayɨkgɨt. Ae Piŋkop Kristo kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt uŋun dakon tapmɨm madepni do nandaŋ gadaŋ, do telagɨ pakbi sowit uŋun kɨmoron baŋ paban pɨdawit yaŋ asak.
Uŋun amɨn Piŋkop dakon mibɨlɨ kɨlɨ nandawit, nido Piŋkop da iyɨ kɨlɨ yolɨgɨt.
Nak da uwalni bamaŋ yomdɨsat, aŋek amɨn nandaba yokwi taŋ ɨmni amɨn dapbo kɨmotdaŋ.
Uŋun butnogwan yo mɨni yaŋ nandaŋek nandaŋ gadat amaŋ dakon gen bamɨ morap Piŋkop da nolɨgɨt uŋun tebaisi tɨmɨkdak.
Ɨleŋon egek kaŋakwa Yesu dakon gɨptɨm ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt. Aŋakwan tomno dabɨlniyo gɨldat da yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Ae ɨmalniyo kɨsi kwakwagɨsi ae teŋteŋɨni toŋsi agɨt.
Ji uŋun yo morap altawit uŋun pɨndakgwit, do uŋun dakon gen bin mɨŋat amɨn morapyo yoyɨŋ teŋteŋokni.
Wɨŋ kɨŋakwan amɨn da uŋun kaŋek wurɨpdagek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Mao, uŋun ni yo kɨnda da altosok? On amɨn gen ŋwakŋwarɨsi yosok. Amɨn mani toŋ da tɨlagon yosok. Koŋ gen yoyɨŋban geni guramɨkgaŋ.”
Uŋun da abɨŋ amɨn kɨsisi geni nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek teŋteŋɨ nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni do teŋteŋɨ dakon but pɨso gen yagɨt.
Piŋkop Wɨkwisi Madep uŋun telagɨ kokup papnikon egɨsak. Uŋun kokupmon pakbi madep kɨnda pagek amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk yomɨsak.
Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋakwan pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo paŋdetni da abɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma ekwaŋon ekwamaŋ, ae gɨldat kɨlɨ pɨgɨkdɨsak,
Amɨn Tagɨ da gen gayɨgɨt uŋun nandabɨ bamɨ asisi noman tokdɨsak yaŋ nandagɨl, do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ abi.”
Amɨn da yubam tam, moneŋ madepsi tɨmɨk yoni mɨni amɨn do yomnom.”
Uŋun amɨn kabɨ uŋun mɨktɨmon nani, do gen yoŋ uŋun mɨktɨmon nani baŋ yaŋakwa mɨktɨm amɨn da geni nandaŋ yomaŋ.
“Amɨn morap on mɨktɨmon baŋ namgul kabɨkon gak dakon mibɨlgo kɨlɨ yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨm. Uŋun amɨn gak dakon baŋ nak do nabɨ gak dakon gen guramɨkgwit.
Yesu tɨmɨsok dɨ kɨŋek ae amɨn bamorɨ gat pɨndakgɨt, kɨnda uŋun Jems, Sebedi dakon monji, ae padɨge Jon. Uŋun bamot gat datni gat boron yɨgek tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni bɨsawɨk paŋmɨlɨp aŋyo aŋakwal pɨndakgɨt. Pɨndagek yaŋ yoban
Dewit Telagɨ Wup da aŋpulugaŋban iyɨ yaŋ yagɨt: ‘Piŋkop da nak dakon Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak abɨŋ nak da amɨnsi tet do yɨkbɨ don uwalgo kandap gɨbaŋgogwan yopbo gengo guramɨtni.” ’
“Nandaki. Mɨŋat kɨnda amɨn gat dɨma pakbi kɨnda da monjɨ kwap awɨlek monjɨ wɨli kɨnda aŋalasak. Aŋalaŋban mani Emanuel yaŋ yoni.” (Emanuel dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ: “Piŋkop nin gat egɨsak.”)
Yaŋdo, nak amɨn kapbɨ uŋun yabekgo mibɨltaŋ jikon obɨŋ paŋpulugaŋba paret uŋun yop do yawit uŋun paŋmuwutni do nandɨsat. Do nin da opneŋ bɨsapmon amɨn da ji but galagon da paret aŋ yaŋ dandani. Nin da teban teban yaŋapno aŋ yaŋ dɨma nandani.
Kalɨp si aŋkɨsɨbɨgɨt, mani abɨsok paŋmuwukbini aban noman taŋakwan nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi gat nandak nandakni gat aban teŋteŋosok. Aban aŋelo tapmɨmɨ toŋ gat ae Kwen Kokup dakon wup gat da Piŋkop dakon nandak nandak nandaba pɨsosok.
“Ji Yesukon kɨŋ yaŋ iyɨni, ‘Piŋkop da amɨn yabet do yagɨt uŋun gak, bo nin amɨn kɨnda don apdɨsak uŋun do jomjom aneŋ?’ ”
Nak da yo do wadaŋek gen on dɨma dayɨsat. Nak nandak nandak yaŋ naŋ kɨlɨ nandako pɨsagɨt: Nak yo kabɨno morapmɨ bo morapmɨ dɨma, uŋun do nandaba kɨk dɨma asat, kɨsi tagɨ gɨn yaŋ nandɨsat.
Nak pɨdaŋek dɨpmɨn yopbo kɨŋakwan gita gat kulele gat tɨdokeŋ. Wɨsa wɨsa do uŋun baŋ tɨdokeŋ.
Kap kalugɨ kɨnda Piŋkop dakon kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamokon yawit. Ae yo 4 kabɨ egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ da ɨŋamon ae kɨla amɨn da ɨŋamon yawit. Amɨn 144 tausen yaŋ Piŋkop da mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨnyo da binapmon yokwikon baŋ yumaŋ naŋ yopgut, uŋun kabɨ dagɨn kap uŋun tagɨ nandaba pɨsosak.
Gak da jɨgɨ namgul uŋun tagɨsi agɨl. Uŋun da gengo do nayɨŋdet tagɨsi agɨt.
Yawe, nak gak do bɨsit tebai asat. Bɨsitno nandaŋaki gen morapgo guramɨkgeŋ.
Mani bɨsap kɨnda apjak, ae kɨlɨ abɨk, uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨmon da, ae aŋpak bamɨsikon da Dat gawak ɨmdaŋ. Dat da uŋuden amɨn da gawak ɨmni do galak tosok.
Yaŋdo, nin nandamaŋ, Piŋkop da amɨn kɨnda do bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨm do nandɨsak kaŋ, bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨmdɨsak. Ae amɨn kɨnda aban but teban asak do nandɨsak kaŋ, galaktokni yolek aban but teban asak.
Aŋelo gen nayɨgɨt uŋun da kalɨŋ kɨrɨŋ gol baŋ wasaŋbi kɨnda abɨdagɨt. Uŋun naŋ kokup pap gat, ae nagal madepni uŋun gat, ae nagal uŋun dakon yoma kagani tɨlak yop do abɨdagɨt.
Nak Pol, Yesu Kristo yoldat do aŋek dam tebanon egɨsat. Nak gat ae notnin Timoti, nit da papia on Pilimon gak do mandamak. Gak notnin tagɨsi ae pi ɨsalnin.
Kɨŋek kosiron yaŋ nandat aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Namɨn da tɨp kɨnam dakon tɨp madep aŋtobɨlban pɨsosak?”
Aŋek gɨldat wɨsak tet da mɨrɨm yɨpban kɨgɨt. Ae tapmɨm madepnikon da saut tet da mɨrɨm yɨpban kɨgɨt.
Yawe da nak do yo tagɨsisi aŋ namgut, do butno aeni yaworɨsi tosok.
Nin dakon aŋpak yokwinin da Piŋkop dakon aŋpak kɨlegɨsi nomansi aŋteŋteŋ asak kaŋ niaŋ yoneŋ? Piŋkop da yokwinin dakon kobogɨ niban suŋ asal yaŋ tagɨ iyɨneŋ? Uŋun dɨmasi! Uŋun amɨn dakon nandak nandak gɨn. Piŋkop bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ aŋpak kɨlegɨkon da pi dɨma asak kaŋ, niaŋon da mɨŋat amɨn morapyo kokwin akdɨsak?
Yesu gen yaŋ yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn paŋdetni da tobɨl abɨŋ kaŋba Yesu mɨŋat kɨnda gat gen yaŋbal pɨndagek wɨrɨpdakgwit. Mani “Gak yo nido galak tosol?” bo “Nido on mɨŋat gat gen yomal?” yaŋ kɨnda da Yesu dɨma iyɨwit.
Yɨgakwa Yesu da bret 5 kabɨ gat ae tap kɨlap bamot gat kɨsi tɨmɨk Kwen Kokup sɨŋtaŋek gɨsamɨkgɨt. Aŋek bret gat ae tap kɨlap gat paŋdagaŋek paŋdetni do yomɨŋakwan amɨn do kokwinɨk yomgwit.
Ae yopmaŋ degek yum pɨndagakwan Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da kɨsiron kɨwit. Aŋakwan uwalni dakon pɨŋbi egek geni guramɨkgwit.
Tɨlak kɨndapni guramɨgek dɨma noljak amɨn paŋdetno arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpjak.
Yaŋ yaŋek uŋun kokup papmon amɨn morapmɨ da madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek upbalap madepsi awit. Aŋek Pol dakon notni bamorɨ uŋun ɨlɨk paŋpaŋ muwut muwut yut madepmon paŋkɨwit. Uŋun amɨn bamot uŋun Masadonia amɨn, Pol gat kɨsi agɨpgwit. Mani kɨnda Gaius ae kɨnda Aristakus.
Uŋun amɨn kapbɨ dakon gen dɨma nandɨsak kaŋ, kɨŋ paŋmuwukbi kabɨkon mibɨlni yoyɨni. Aŋek paŋmuwukbi kabɨ dakon gen dɨma nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yokwisi asak. Uŋun amɨn do Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn ae takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn yaŋ nandaŋ ɨmni.
Abɨsok yaŋsi nandaŋ, yo morap namgul uŋun gak dasi namgul yaŋ nandaŋ.
Aŋakwan Yesu dakon ɨmalni kwakwagɨsi teŋteŋagɨt. Uŋun mɨktɨm amɨn kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨma agagɨ, kwakwagɨsi agɨt.
Pɨlɨn tukgwan teŋteŋɨ da altaŋek amɨn kɨlegɨ paŋpulugosok. Amɨn kɨlegɨ uŋun amɨn do nandaŋ yawot aŋ yomɨŋek bupmɨ nandaŋek kosit kɨlegɨ agɨsak.
Yaŋdo, tomni abɨdokeŋsi yaŋ nandaŋek tɨmtɨm yaŋek dukwan dukwan dɨma wɨsɨŋek tɨlagonsi kɨsat. Amɨn da kɨsit emat dakon aktɨdok tagɨsi aŋ uŋun da tɨlak kɨsitno ɨsal tɨmon dɨma dapmaŋdat.
Yawe da nak dɨma aŋpulugagɨt tam, bɨsap dubak dɨma kɨmakbi tamokon pakgɨm.
Jikon da kɨnda sot asak kaŋ, paŋmuwukbi dakon kɨla amɨn yaŋ yoba opni. Abɨŋek Amɨn Tagɨ da manon bɨt nelak gɨptɨmɨkon soŋ ɨmɨŋek Piŋkop da aŋpulugaŋban kɨlek tosak do bɨsit ani.
Gen morap gayɨsat uŋun bamɨsi. Nak gen uŋun do madepsi yaŋ teŋteŋoki do nandɨsat, aŋaki mɨŋat amɨnyo Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun da aŋpak tagɨsi ak do pi madepsi ani. Aŋpak uŋuden uŋun yo bamɨsi, ae uŋun da amɨn morapmɨ tagɨ paŋpulugogɨ.
Ae Piŋkop da yokwi kɨlɨ wɨrɨrɨkgɨt, do yokwi wɨrɨrɨt dakon mukwa soni dakon pi mɨni.
Bɨsap kɨndakon nin bɨsit agak tamokon kɨgɨmaŋ. Kɨno oman mɨŋatjok kɨnda kosiron apban domdom agɨmaŋ. Uŋun mɨŋatjok koŋni kɨnda taŋ ɨmɨŋakwan yo don altoni uŋun do yaŋkwok agɨt. Amɨn da opba yo don altoni dakon mibɨlɨ yoyɨŋakwan kɨla amɨni da moneŋ madepsi tɨmɨkgwit.
Yaŋba datni da yaŋ nandagɨt, apma uŋun bɨsapmonsi Yesu da yaŋ nayɨgɨt, “Monjɨgo egɨpdɨsak.” Yaŋ nandaŋek iyɨ gat ae amɨn kabɨni yutnikon egɨpgwit uŋun gat kɨsi nandaŋ gadat awit.
Yaŋ yaŋban gen aeni iyɨgɨt, “Yo Piŋkop da paŋmɨlɨp aban yo tagɨsi aŋ uŋun gak da dɨma noknogɨ yaŋ dɨma yoki.”
Amɨn da tapmɨm madepgo gat ae Kɨla Amɨn Madep Wɨkwisi egɨsal uŋun do yokdaŋ. Aŋakwa nak do pi madep madep asal uŋun do nandaŋek egɨpbeŋ.
Yokwi pakpak amɨn do dɨma galak taŋek Yawe do pasolgoŋ amɨn do nandaban wukwan yomɨsak. Yaŋ teban tok asak uŋun jɨgɨ noman taŋ ɨmaŋ bɨsapmon dɨma kɨrɨŋɨgek geni guramɨk kɨmokdok.
Emat amɨn da Pol aŋaŋ yutnikon awɨgɨk do aŋakwa emat amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn Grik genon da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gen kɨnda tagɨ gayɨkeŋ?” Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Gak Grik gen nandɨsal, ma?
Butjapsi nandaŋ yomɨŋek gen tebai yoyɨŋban pasal kɨmokgoŋ.
Mani Piŋkop gen papia da yosok, “Yokwi da mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi dam tebanon yopgut,” do Yesu Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da kalɨp yaŋ teban tok agɨt yo uŋun tagɨ abɨdoni.
Pabɨŋ yopmaŋaki toktogɨsi pasal kɨmotni do nandɨsat. Paŋmayak aŋek dapbɨ kɨmotni dosi nandɨsat.
Nak amɨn da moneŋ ae yo galagɨsi do galak toŋ, nak uŋun da tɨlak gak dakon gen guramɨt do galagɨsi nandɨsat.
Babɨkji Abraham uŋun nak dakon bɨsap kok do tagɨsi nandagɨt. Uŋun kaŋek but kwaktok nandagɨt.”
nandaŋek uŋudon gɨn botni gat datni Sebedi gat yopmaŋek yolgɨmal.
Paŋdet kabɨ yo uŋun noman tok do aban kaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, emat agak sɨbanin baŋ tagɨ dapneŋ?”
Yawe, gak amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsal. Uŋun dakon tɨlakni kundu gat arɨp, madepsi. Ae gengo aŋteban aŋek nin tagɨsi paŋpulugosol. Tɨlakni uŋun kwen ason gɨkwem da arɨp.
“Abɨsok jap naŋek butji paptoŋ amɨn, awa! Don jap do akdaŋ. “Abɨsok jɨkgo yanjaŋ amɨn, awa! Don kunam tagakwa dabɨl pakbisi mokdaŋ.
Kulup madep dɨma altaŋakwan jap pakbiyo aŋek mɨŋat pakpak awit. Yaŋ aŋek egakwa Noa tap wakgakon wɨgɨgɨt.
Dat da Monji but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨŋek yo morap asak uŋun Monji yolɨsak. Wasok agɨt uŋun si yapmaŋek Dat da wasok masɨ masɨmɨ yolɨŋban ji uŋun pɨndagek tamtam yokdaŋ.
Yesu da Lasarus kɨmakgɨt dakon gen yaŋban paŋdetni da asi dɨpmɨn pokdok yaŋ nandawit.
Ji kɨmoron da pɨdot pɨdot dakon mibɨlɨ pakyaŋsi dɨma nandaba pɨsosok. Piŋkop da uŋun do kɨlɨ dayɨgɨt. Ji dɨma manjɨŋ nandaŋ, ma? Yaŋ yagɨt:
Yaŋdo, kɨmot da ninon pi asak, mani egɨp egɨp da jikon pi asak.
Yaŋban mɨŋat gɨmoŋ uŋun da waŋga kɨŋ meŋi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ni yo naŋ namjak do iyɨkeŋ?” Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Kɨŋ Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn uŋun dakon busuŋɨ uŋun do iyɨki.”
Yokwi pakpak amɨn gat kɨsi nak dɨma ɨlɨk paŋkɨ mabɨ kɨneŋ. Uŋun amɨn kwen da notni do gen galagɨ galagɨ yoŋ. Mani burɨgwan nandak nandakni yokwi morapmɨ toŋ.
Yaŋdo, ji on mɨktɨm dakon moneŋ kɨlani tagɨ dɨma ani kaŋ, namɨn da nandaŋ gadaŋ damɨŋek yo tagɨsi bamɨsi daban kɨlani ani?
Yaŋ do aŋek aŋpak ɨŋani mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gat ae aŋpak yokwi morap jikon madepsi ɨreŋ tosok, uŋun wɨrɨrɨtni. Aŋek dɨsi do nandaba pɨŋakwa egek Piŋkop da gen uŋun butjikon kwaokgɨt uŋun naŋ abɨdoni. Gen uŋun da ji yokwikon baŋ tagɨ tɨmɨtjak.
Yaŋgɨn, nin mɨŋat amɨnyo morapmɨ mani nin Kristokon gɨptɨm kaloŋɨ agɨmaŋ. Ae nin kɨsi gɨptɨm kaloŋɨ dakon dɨwatni da ekwamaŋ.
Apolos uŋun Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgek pasol pasolɨ mɨni Piŋkop dakon gen madepsi yoyɨgɨt. Yoyɨŋakwan Prisila gat Akwila gat da geni nandaŋ Apolos abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ yutnikon egek Piŋkop dakon mibɨlɨ pakyaŋsi nandaŋ pɨsosak do iyɨŋ dekgɨmal.
Yaŋ yaŋek wain kɨnam abɨdaŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek yagɨt, “Nak yaŋ dayɨsat, nak wain ae dɨma naŋek egɨ wɨgɨ Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asagon don nokeŋ. Do abɨdaŋek dɨsi kokwin aŋek noni.”
Do mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋun da manon Piŋkop da kapmatjok kɨni uŋun bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ yokwikon baŋ tagɨ tɨmɨtjak, nido uŋun dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨsak, aŋek Piŋkop da paŋpulugosak do bɨsit aŋegɨsak.
Yesu da aeni yoyɨgɨt, “Ji namɨn naŋ wɨsaŋ?” Yoyɨŋban yawit, “Yesu Nasaret amɨn.”
Nin Yawe ya yaŋ iyɨneŋ. Uŋun Isip amɨn dakon monjɨ mibɨltogɨ dapban kɨmakgwit. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Not kabɨno, wasɨp do yaŋ dayɨsat, ji Amɨn Tagɨ dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani. Kalɨp papia dɨwarɨ ji do mandaŋ damgum uŋudeŋ ae mandak do dɨma kurak tosot, nido gen uŋun da ji paŋpulugokdɨsak. Gen uŋun yaŋ:
Mani amɨn kɨsi da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “On amɨn aŋakbɨ kɨmagakwan Barabas naŋ yɨpbɨ ninon apjak!”
“Ji nagon toktogɨ saŋbeni ae geno jikon tosak kaŋ, yo nido galak taŋek bɨsit ani uŋun dakon bamɨ noman taŋ damdɨsak.
Yawe mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni tapmɨm yomɨsak. Yaŋ aŋek gɨsamɨgakwan yaworɨsi ekwaŋ.
Uŋun kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamonikon yɨgek sɨŋtaŋban pɨŋakwan mɨktɨmon amɨn morap pɨndakdak.
Sadyusi amɨn da Yesu aŋkewal do iyɨŋba gen tagɨsi yaŋakwan kobogɨ iyɨk do dɨma nandawit. Parisi amɨn da uŋun nandaŋek Yesukon opgwit.
Orep Kabapmon uŋudon egek gol baŋ bulmakau wup kɨnda wasaŋek uŋun Piŋkopnin yaŋ yaŋek gawak ɨmgwit.
Yawe da nak yokwikon naŋ abɨdagɨt, do ya yaŋ iyɨŋek paret ak do wain kap aŋenokgeŋ.
Ji pakyaŋsi nandani. Apolos uŋun namɨn? Ae nak Pol uŋun namɨn? Nit pi amɨn gɨn. Amɨn Tagɨ da nit do pi ŋwakŋwat ŋwakŋwat nimgut. Aban nit pi uŋun ando ji Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit.
Yawe do kap yaŋ ɨmɨŋek mani aŋkɨsini. Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ amɨn yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨk tɨmɨk asak uŋun dakon geni yaŋ teŋteŋoni.
Yaŋ yaŋakwan tɨp madep aba kɨŋakwan Yesu kwen sɨŋtaŋban wɨgakwan yaŋ yagɨt, “Dat, gak bɨsitno kɨlɨ nandal, do ya yaŋ gayɨsat.
Uŋun do nak yaŋ dayɨsat, ni yo kɨnda do Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨŋek yo uŋun tɨmɨtni do nandaŋ gadaŋ kɨmotni kaŋ, yaŋ gɨn tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Monjɨ bulagɨ emat madepmon kɨmagakwa mɨŋatjok wɨli mɨni, do amɨn dɨma pawit.
Uwal da jɨgɨlak gen yaŋ namɨŋek gen gɨreŋ nayaŋ. Aŋek kobogɨ do aŋpak yokwisi aŋ namaŋ. Do bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ yokwisi nandaŋek mayaktok obɨsi pasat.
Kosit morap agɨpbikon Yawe da aŋeloni pi yoban kɨlago akdaŋ.
Yesu Nasaret kokup yɨpmaŋek Galili mɨktɨmon kokup kɨnda mani Kapaneam uŋudon pɨgɨgɨt. Pabɨgɨ egek Sabat bɨsap morapmon amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
Aban Yesu dakon bumjotni tɨlak kɨndapmon naŋ abɨdaŋ abɨŋ ɨmal kwakwagɨ kɨnda naŋ wamgut. Wamaŋek aŋkɨ kɨmakbi tamo kɨnda kalɨp tɨpnaŋ pasɨwit, ae bumjot kɨnda uŋudon dɨma yɨpbi, uŋudon yɨpgut.
Yawe da nandak nandakni mɨni amɨn paŋkutnosok. Kalɨp tapmɨmno mɨni da egapbo pulugaŋ nepgut.
Piŋkop da Abraham do yaŋ teban tok aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt: “Aisagon da babɨkgo altokdaŋ.” Mani Piŋkop da Abraham aŋkewalek monji aŋak mukwa sosak do iyɨŋban monji kaloŋɨ Piŋkop do ɨmgut.
Yawe, nak dɨwarɨno mɨni yaŋ nandaki do kɨsitno pakbi naŋ sugosot. Nak gak dakon alta aŋgwasɨŋek
Ae kɨnda yɨgakwan Piŋkop da gen kɨnda aŋalon aŋɨban kaŋ, gen yosok amɨn gen saŋbeŋek dɨma yosak.
Asi, Onesimus bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok gepmaŋ dekgɨt. Mani yo uŋun noman taŋ ɨmgut, uŋun gak da yokwikon naŋ ae abɨdaŋbɨ gak gat toktogɨsi egɨpjil do bo noman tagɨt.
Iyɨŋban Nikodemus da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn pelaŋ kɨlɨ abi kɨnda da niaŋ aŋek aeni altosak? Meŋi da butgwan pɨgek aeni tagɨ altosak?”
“Yɨgakwa kɨla amɨn madep da amɨn obeŋ uŋun pɨndat do yutnon wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨgɨ kaŋban amɨn kɨnda mɨŋat paŋek jap noknok aŋ bɨsapmon ɨmal tagɨsi paŋ uŋuden kɨnda dɨma pagɨt kagɨt.
“Mani Piŋkop Wɨkwisi uŋun amɨn kɨsit da yut awalgaŋon uŋudon dɨma egɨsak. Kombɨ amɨn da yaŋ yawit:
Amɨn Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak dakon gen nandaŋek butni dɨma pɨsoŋ uŋun jap yet kosiron mawit uŋuden. Yokwi Ami da abɨŋ gen tagɨ butnikon toŋ uŋun gwayeŋ paŋkɨsak.
“Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda nak dakon gen nandaŋek Dat yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdosak. Uŋun amɨn gen pi tamokon dɨma atjak. Uŋun kɨmot yɨpmaŋek egɨp egɨp kɨlɨ abɨdosok.
Amɨn da nandaba wukwan namni do pi dɨma asat. Amɨn kɨnda gen kokwin amɨn egɨsak, uŋun da mano wukwisi tosak do pini asak.
Yaŋ yaŋban iyɨwit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, pɨndat! Nin emat agak sɨbanin bamorɨ oni.” Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Uŋun arɨpmɨ.”
Datno da yo morap nolɨgɨt uŋun do dayɨsat. Ae datji da aŋpak ani do dayɨgɨt, ji uŋun baŋ aŋ.”
“Kɨla amɨn madep Agripa, gak Juda amɨn nin dakon aŋpak uŋun pakyaŋsi nandɨsal, ae pɨdok pɨdok mibɨlɨ nido amaŋ uŋun kɨsi nandaŋ mudosol. Do Juda amɨn da gen yaŋ namɨŋakwa nak naga aŋkutnok do gen kobogɨ gak da ɨŋamon yok do tagɨsi nandɨsat. Butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan yɨgek gen morap gayɨkdɨsat uŋun pakyaŋsi nandaki.
Yawe aŋkɨsini! Piŋkopnin kap yaŋek aŋkɨsamaŋ kaŋ, aŋpak kɨlegɨsi amaŋ. Yaŋ aŋapno butnin tagɨsisi tosok, ae aŋkɨsamaŋ uŋun agagɨsi naŋ amaŋ.
Piŋkop dakon man madepni dagok dagogɨ mɨni taŋ aŋaŋ kɨsak teban. Uŋun asi.
Yo madepsi abi do nandɨsat uŋun yaŋ: gak da mɨŋat amɨn morap yoyɨŋbɨ bɨsit mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ aŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek amɨn morap kɨsi paŋpulugosak do bɨsit iyɨni.
Yaŋban nandaŋek Juda amɨn da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Datnin uŋun Abraham.” Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji asi Abraham dakon monjini tam, Abraham da iyɨ aŋpak agɨt uŋun baŋ abam.
Abɨsok abɨŋ Saion kokup pap do bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek aŋpulugoki. Bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨbi dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ noman tak. Abɨsok bupmɨ bɨsap.
Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon Piŋkop gen dɨma yoyɨneŋ yaŋ do kosit sopsop ak do pi aŋ, nido Piŋkop da yokwikon baŋ dɨma tɨmɨtjak do nandaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek kalɨpgwan da yokwi sigɨn aŋek yokwini paŋmuwuk kakwaŋba madepsi aŋakwan apmeŋon Piŋkop dakon butjapni pabɨŋ uŋun amɨnon tagɨt.
Amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ egɨ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋun yoni tɨlɨmɨ tagɨsi toŋ gat ae man madep ɨmɨm aŋpakni kɨsi tɨmɨgek uŋudon paŋopdaŋ.
Jems gat Jon gat, Sebedi dakon monjɨ bamot, uŋun da Yesukon altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Yoyɨŋdet, nit yo kɨnda do gayɨkdamak, uŋun gak da abi do nandamak.”
kɨla amɨn 24 kabɨ da Amɨn uŋun kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamokon yɨkdak uŋun da buron maŋ pokgoŋ. Maŋ pagek egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨsak Amɨn uŋun gawak ɨmaŋ. Ae pelɨtni kɨldani toŋ gol baŋ wasaŋbi uŋun kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamo tosok uŋudon noman ɨlɨk yopmaŋek kap yaŋ yoŋ,
Amɨn Kwen Kokup da pɨŋ mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨn morapyo do egɨp egɨp yomɨsak uŋun Piŋkop dakon bretni.”
Yoyɨŋban iyɨwit, “Gak ŋugɨgɨ, Pita dam teban yutnon yɨgek arɨpmɨ dɨma apjak.” Yaŋ iyɨŋba sigɨn teban taŋek yagɨt, “Asisi, Pita yomakon akdak!” Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Aŋeloni da bo akdak.”
Not kabɨ, nak ji da gen pasɨlɨ kɨnda tosok uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandaba pɨsosak do nandɨsat. Yaŋ kaŋ dɨsi do dɨma nandaba wɨgɨsak. Gen pasɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ: Israel amɨn dɨwarɨ Piŋkop da but yomani sopgut uŋun yaŋ egɨ wɨgakwa Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ niaŋ da iyɨkon apni do tɨlak yɨpgut uŋun da arɨpmon iyɨkon apdaŋ.
Yesu iyɨ dɨwarɨnin wɨrɨrɨt dakon paret dagagɨt. Ae nin do gɨn dɨma, amɨn morap mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun dakon dɨwarɨni kɨsi do agɨt.
Nin nandamaŋ, nin Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat monjɨyoni ekwamaŋ, mani amɨn dɨwarɨ morap Yokwi Ami da kɨlani asak.
Ae mɨŋat amɨnyo dage dage aŋek ekwaŋ uŋun dɨwatni paŋalon aŋyoban tagɨsi yɨkgaŋ. Ae dam tebanon ekwaŋ amɨn pulugaŋban kokupmon tagɨsi ekwaŋ. Mani kwen wugɨk aŋ amɨn mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨm yokwisikon paŋkɨ egɨpdaŋ.
Yesu da mɨŋat amɨnyo yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak naga mɨktɨm dakon teŋteŋɨ. Amɨn kɨnda nak noljak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn pɨlɨn tukgwan dɨma agɨpjak. Egɨp egɨp dakon teŋteŋɨ da uŋun amɨnon tosak.”
Piŋkop dakon tɨlɨmɨ madepni uŋun kokup papmon teŋteŋagɨt. Teŋteŋɨni uŋun ŋwakŋwarɨsi, tɨp yumaŋ nogɨ wukwisi dakon teŋteŋɨni yombem. Uŋun tɨp jaspa yombem da yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Uŋun glas yombem gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi.
Ae nin pakyaŋsi nandamaŋ, gɨsam yomɨsak amɨn uŋun amɨn madep aŋakwan gɨsam tɨmɨkdak amɨn uŋun pɨŋbini egɨsak.
Mukwa sogok dakon yo kɨndapmon wagɨl sosoŋ gat ae yokwi wɨrɨrɨt dakon mukwa sosoŋ uŋun kɨsi do gak dɨma galak tagɨl.
Nak yaŋ yagɨm, “Yawe, nak yokwi gak do aŋgamɨsat, do bupmɨ nandaŋ namɨŋek sotno aŋmɨlɨp abɨ pasɨljak.”
Amɨn morapmɨ da nɨkgaŋ, mani gɨptɨmno dɨma yokwi taŋ, nido Piŋkop da jɨgɨkon naŋ pulugaŋ nepmaŋek kɨlano aŋakwan tagɨsi egɨsat.
Sabat bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu da Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut kɨndakon amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
Nido but yokwi nandɨsat? Nido butno jɨk tosok? Nak Piŋkop do nandaŋ gadaŋek uŋun da yokwikon baŋ kukwaŋ nepjak do jomjom abeŋ. Uŋun Piŋkopno, do aeno mani yaŋ aŋkɨsikeŋ.
Nak yaŋ dayɨsat, jap on ae dɨma nokeŋ. Yaŋ aŋapbo wɨgɨ on jap dakon mibɨlɨsi Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak kagagwan bamɨ don noman tokdɨsak.”
Dɨsi nandaŋ, Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmgwit bɨsapmon kokup kɨdat dakon wupmɨ gen dɨma yoŋ uŋudon kɨni do amɨn da dayɨŋba kokwin dɨma aŋek kɨŋ kɨŋ awit.
Kɨla amɨn madep uŋun yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋun nak dakon pi ani do manjɨgɨm, do aŋpak yokwi dɨma aŋyomni. Nak dakon kombɨ amɨno do yokwi dɨma aŋyomni.”
Pol da buŋon nak dakon ɨŋamno ae dɨma kokdaŋ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt do bupmɨsi nandawit. Bupmɨ yaŋsi nandaŋek Pol aŋaŋ tap wakgakon aŋkɨwit.
Oman monjɨ uŋun amɨn tagɨni da yo morap asak uŋun dɨma nandaŋ. Uŋun do oman monjɨno yaŋ aeno dɨma dayɨkeŋ. Gen morap Datnokon nandagɨm uŋun kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm. Yaŋ agɨm do ji notnoni yaŋ dayɨsat.
Gen teban mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn kɨnda da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, Parisi amɨn do gen uŋun yaŋek, ninyo kɨsi pabɨŋ nipmaŋdal.”
Kɨŋek Silisia ae Pampilia Provins bamot yapmaŋek tap binap mandaŋek kokup pap Maira uŋudon kɨŋ altagɨmaŋ. Maira uŋun Lisia Provinskon tosok.
Ae amɨn kɨnda da wain kalugɨ tɨbɨrɨ meme gɨp baŋ wasaŋbi kalɨpmɨ kɨndakon kolesak kaŋ uŋun tagɨ dɨma. Yaŋ asak kaŋ, wain da pukwa paptaŋ meme gɨp kɨrɨŋɨgakwa wain maŋ mudokdaŋ. Ae meme gɨpyo kɨsi yokwi tokdɨsak.
Mani nak da ji dakon man pawɨgɨsat uŋun gen ɨsalɨ dɨma asak do nandɨsat. Ae nak ji da paret yop do kɨlɨ tagap tawit yaŋ kɨlɨ yoyɨgɨm, do amɨn kapbɨ uŋun yabekgo obɨŋ ji paŋtagap aba paret yop do wagɨl tagap taŋek egɨpni yaŋ do yabekdat.
aban yaŋ yawit, “On amɨn kabɨ gen yoŋ uŋun kɨsi morap Galili amɨn gɨn, ma?
Ae bret 7 kabɨ baŋ amɨn 4 tausen do yobo naŋakwa dɨwarɨ yɨk morapmɨ sɨmɨlba tugawit ji uŋun do si ɨŋtoŋ?
Yawe, gak da top gen yogok amɨn morap paŋupbal asal. Amɨn dapba kɨmokgoŋ amɨn gat, ae amɨn paŋkewalgaŋ amɨn gat dɨmasi galak taŋ yomɨsal.
Ji kabo noknok pɨndagek not aŋyomaŋ. Aŋek yumabi amɨn gat kɨsi akwaŋ.
Judas kwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon obip amɨn uŋun dakon mibɨltok amɨn gat gen yawit. Niaŋon da Yesu kɨsitnikon yɨpjak yaŋ do yaŋ nandat awit.
Uwalni da yo yokwi aŋ yomni kaŋ, kɨndap gen kaganikon da noman taŋek soŋba mɨni aŋ. Asi, amɨn dɨ uŋun amɨn bamot yo yokwi aŋ yomni kaŋ, kosit yaŋon da si kɨmotdaŋ.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut uŋun monji bamorɨ.
Nak dakon bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok yɨpgul. Gak da dabɨlon nak dakon bɨsap yo ɨsalɨ. Amɨn kɨnda da mɨrɨm yawɨk pɨsosok, amɨn morap uŋun da tɨlak mɨktɨmon bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok gɨn ekwaŋ.”
Nin Kristokon gadano uŋun da kɨmot agɨt nin yo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn kɨmakgɨmaŋ, do uŋun da kɨmoron da pɨdagɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn nin kɨmoron da pɨdokdamaŋ.
Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo dakon Piŋkopni ae Datni uŋun aŋkɨsineŋ. Uŋun Datnin bupmɨ ami, ae amɨn morap jɨgɨ paŋ uŋun butni paŋteban asak dakon Piŋkop.
Yaŋ yaŋek yawit, “Telagɨ bɨsap madepmon dɨma abɨdoneŋ. Yaŋ aneŋ kaŋ, mɨŋat amɨnyokon pɨdok pɨdok noman tokdɨsak.”
Mao, Dat da nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsak uŋun madepsi daman. Piŋkop dakon gwakni kabɨ yaŋsi niyɨsak. Asi, nin Piŋkop dakon gwakni kabɨ ekwamaŋ. Mɨktɨm amɨn da Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmgwit, uŋun do aŋek ninyo kɨsi dɨma nandaŋ nimaŋ.
Kwen kundukon yo tebai toŋ uŋun da kwakwalɨtdaŋ, do amɨn morapmɨ da jɨgɨ morap mɨktɨmon noman tokdɨsak do nandaba kɨk aŋek pasol pasol madepsi aŋek ɨŋam kɨmot akdaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋban Pilip da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gak da Dat nolɨŋbɨ nin dakon but mudaŋban.”
Tepmɨ madep Kristo da pagɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn ninyo kɨsi pamaŋ. Ae Kristo da butnin paŋteban aban butnin yaworɨsi tosok.
Yawe, tap pakbi madep uŋun da madepsi tamalɨkgaŋ. Aŋek wɨwɨk madepsi yaŋek sulukwaŋ, ae ɨleŋɨkon tebaisi tɨdoŋ.
Abɨsok nak paŋmuwukbi dakon kɨla amɨn gat gen yogogɨ. Nakyo kɨsi kɨla amɨn kɨnda. Naga da dabɨlon Kristo kaŋapbo tepmɨ pagɨt. Ae nak gat ji gat Kristo dakon tapmɨm ae man madep noman altosak bɨsapmon Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi nin morap kɨsi do nim do yagɨt uŋun tɨmɨtdamaŋ. Kɨla amɨn ji pi yaŋ baŋ ani do dayɨsat.
Yawe, amɨn tagɨsi butni kɨlegɨ uŋun amɨnon aŋpak tagɨsi aŋyobi.
Ji Yawe but dasi galak taŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn, ji aŋpak yokwi do nandaba ɨŋanisi asak. Iyɨ dakon telagɨ amɨn kabɨni, yokwi aŋ amɨn da kɨsiron baŋ tɨmɨgek kɨlani asak.
Ji nak do ya yaŋ nayɨni kaŋ, uŋun da mukwa sogok tagɨsi asak. But galak do yo morap Piŋkop Wɨkwisi nak do nam do yaŋ teban tok awit uŋun namni.
Piŋkop da Yesu abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ Kwen Kokup wɨgɨsak dakon bɨsap kwaŋ tagɨt. Aŋakwan Yesu uŋun Jerusalem kɨkeŋ yaŋsi nandaban teban tagɨt.
Kɨla amɨn madep dakon gwani gat mɨŋat man madepni toŋ dɨwarɨ gat uŋun gak da yutnon ekwaŋ. Kwin amɨn tetgo do akdak. Uŋun tɨlɨmni Opir mɨktɨm dakon gol baŋ wasaŋbi.
Parisi amɨn da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Ni bɨsapmon Piŋkop Amɨn Kɨla Agakni yɨpban apdɨsak?” Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Agakni yɨpban apban amɨn da dabɨlni da kaŋba pɨsosak dakon tɨlak altaŋba dɨma pɨndatdaŋ.
Nak mɨktɨmon egɨsaron nak naga on mɨktɨm dakon teŋteŋɨ.”
Amɨn kɨnda da nak dakon gen uŋun do gen emat asak kaŋ, yaŋsi nandɨsak, nin gat ae Piŋkop dakon paŋmuwukbi dɨwarɨ gat aŋpak ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda dɨma yolgamaŋ.
Amɨn kaloŋɨ da gen kɨrɨŋɨt aban uŋun do aŋek amɨn morap kɨsi yokwi pakpak amɨn dagawit. Yaŋ gɨn amɨn kaloŋɨ da gen guramɨt aban mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi amɨn kɨlegɨ dagokdaŋ.
“Dat, gak tagɨ nandɨsal kaŋ, tepmɨ dɨma pakeŋ. Mani nak dakon galaktok dɨma yolgi. Gaga dakon galaktok yolgi.”
Mani manji yomɨŋaki si pasolgoŋ. Ae mɨrɨm gwayesal bɨsapmon kɨmagek mɨktɨm dagoŋ.
Mani, ji kɨsi kombɨ gen yoni kaŋ, but galak dakon yo dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaŋ amɨn, bo ae nandaŋ gadat dɨma abi amɨn da abɨŋ gen uŋun nandaŋ uŋun da burɨ sugaŋba iyɨ do nin yokwi pakpak do kobogɨ pakdamaŋ yaŋ nandakdaŋ.
Nak Pol da on nandani do nandɨsat: Nak ji gat ae Laodisia mɨŋat amɨnyo gat ae mɨŋat amɨn morap dɨwarɨ gat kɨsi da nak dakon ɨŋam dɨma kawit amɨn nak ji kɨsi paŋpulugok do pi madepsi asat.
Amɨn kɨnda emaron teban tosak kaŋ, uŋun do kɨsi ɨmal kwakwagɨ paŋ ɨbeŋ. Ae egɨp egɨp papiakon mani dɨma wɨrɨrɨkgeŋ. Datno da ɨŋamon ae aŋeloni da ɨŋamon mani yaŋ teŋteŋokeŋ.
Yesu iyɨ gen kɨnda yaŋ yagɨt, “Kombɨ amɨn kɨnda iyɨ da mɨktɨmon amɨn da dɨma nandaba wɨkwan ɨmaŋ.”
Epraim ae Benjamin ae Manase da bɨkbɨgon tapmɨm madepgo nolɨki. Abɨŋ nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgi.
Kɨnda da abɨŋ nandaŋek top yaŋ namɨsak. Aŋek sotno dakon mibɨlɨ nandaŋek kɨŋ amɨn yoyɨŋek aŋupbal ak do yosok.
Asisi gayɨsat, gak dam tebanon sigɨn egaki wɨgɨ moneŋ niaŋ yopbi do gayɨni uŋun kɨsisi yopmaŋek don waŋga kɨkdɨsal.”
Uwalno morapmɨsi uŋun do pɨndat. Uŋun nak do japmɨsi nandaŋek ukwayɨt aŋ.
Uŋun amɨn bamot pɨndagek Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋ nak nolgɨl, aŋakwal amɨn tɨmɨt tɨmɨt dakon kosit dolɨko.”
Ae amɨn kɨnda da nak Yesu dakon paŋdetni kɨnda aŋpulugosot yaŋ nandaŋek nak dakon paŋdetno mani mɨni kɨnda do pakbi mɨrɨmjok kɨnda koleŋ ɨmjak kaŋ, asisi dayɨsat, kobogɨ do yo tagɨsi tɨmɨtdɨsak.”
Gengo dɨmasi ɨŋtokeŋ. Nido uŋun yolapbo gak da egɨp egɨpno aŋkutnal.
Amɨn kɨnda uwal dɨma aŋ nimjak amɨn uŋun notnin.
Do wain kalugɨ meme gɨp kalugɨkon kolaŋ.
Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep uŋun do pasalgwit, do Yesu niaŋon da abɨdaŋek aŋatno kɨmotjak uŋun do nandak nandak awit.
Notnoni, ji yo kaloŋ on do dɨma ɨŋtoni: Amɨn Tagɨ da nandak nandagon gɨldat kaloŋɨ uŋun bɨlak 1 tausen da arɨp asak, ae bɨlak 1 tausen uŋun bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok gɨldat kaloŋɨ yombem gɨn yaŋ kosok.
Mani sakwabat uŋun monjɨni dɨ toŋ bo ae uwani dɨ toŋ kaŋ, paŋpulugaŋbɨ Piŋkop da dabɨlon aŋpak madepsi kɨnda uŋun nandaŋ pɨsoni. Uŋun meŋi kɨlani tagɨsi aŋek meŋ datyo da kalɨp pi madep awit uŋun dakon gomani tagɨ sopni. Piŋkop da aŋpak uŋuden do tagɨsi nandɨsak.
Gen uŋun nandaŋek nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt. Mani Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Monjɨnoni, amɨn Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan pɨgɨk do aŋtɨdok aŋ.
Yawe aŋkɨsikeŋ. Uŋun da tagɨsi egɨpbeŋ do nayɨŋ nolɨsak. Ae kalbi butno da nayɨŋ dekdak.
Amɨn madep kabɨgwan da amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ tɨdaŋek aŋpulugosak do yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, monjɨno kaloŋɨ kɨndagɨn. Do kɨŋ koki do nandɨsat.
“Yaŋ yoyɨŋek egɨ pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo pi ami da kɨŋ pi monjɨ dakon kɨla amɨn yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Pi monjɨ yaŋ paŋmuwugek moneŋni yobi. Buŋonsi abeŋ uŋudon da wasaŋek yomɨŋaki wɨgɨ mibɨltok abeŋ uŋudon dagosak.’
Asi Piŋkop da papiakon gen mandabi uŋun da tɨlagon Amɨn Dakon Monji kɨmoron kɨkdɨsak. Mani Amɨn Dakon Monji uwal da kɨsiron yɨpjak amɨn, awa! Uŋun amɨn meŋi da dɨma aŋalagɨt tam tagɨ.”
Paŋmuwuk Banabas gat Sol gat do yomɨŋek yabekba Jerusalem paŋmuwukbi dakon kɨla amɨn do paŋkɨgɨmal.
Gak da butno jɨgɨsi tagɨt uŋun aŋtagap abɨ kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap asat. Ae but yokwi nandagɨm uŋun aŋyawot abɨ but kwaktok nandɨsat.
Kalɨp tagɨsi egɨpgul do nandaki. Gak kɨlɨ mal. Do aŋpak kalɨp agɨl uŋun do aego nandaŋek but tobɨl aŋek aŋpak kalɨp agɨl uŋudeŋ abi. Yaŋ dɨma abi kaŋ, abɨŋ lamgo uŋun si gwayekeŋ.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban nandaŋakwa Sol Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn gat Jerusalem egɨpgwit. Egek pasol pasolɨ mɨni agek Yesu da manon Piŋkop gen yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt.
Gak da abɨŋ yɨpgul da kɨla amɨn madep saŋbeŋek dɨma egɨsak, ae saŋbeŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨla dɨma asak.
Dewit but dasi nandaŋek kɨlani tagɨsi agɨt. Aŋek tagɨsi tɨmɨk paŋkɨgɨt.
Dɨsi nandaŋ, jap kɨsi tagɨ noknogɨ, mani nandaŋ gadatni dɨma teban taŋbi amɨn da jap kokup kɨdat do parekbi naŋba dandaŋek yokwikon dɨ maŋbam. Do ji kaŋ kɨmotni.
Aŋek gak gat ae mɨŋat amɨn gak da dam madepgwan ekwaŋ uŋun kɨsi wagɨlsi tuwɨl paŋtasɨk akdaŋ. Tuwɨlba tɨp notni da kwenon dɨma taŋ taŋ akdaŋ. Nido Piŋkop gagon kɨlɨ abɨk, mani butgo dɨma pɨsak.”
Mibɨltok pini do paŋkɨlɨk pɨndatni. Pɨndakba pi tagɨ ani kaŋ, yopba paŋmuwukbi dakon pi amɨn tagɨ egɨpni.
Yolek amɨn wuda tebani toŋ kɨnda da Yesukon kɨŋ ŋwakbeŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlek tokeŋ do nandɨsal kaŋ, tagɨ aŋmɨlɨp abɨ kɨlek tokeŋ.”
Yaŋbal yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil kɨŋ kokup papmon pɨgakwal amɨn kɨnda pakbi kwoba kɨnda guramɨk apban jil gat domdom akdaŋ. Uŋun amɨn da yut wɨgɨsagon jil uŋudon yol aŋaŋ wɨgɨnjil.
Galak tok yokwisi gat, ae nandak nandak yokwisi gat da ɨlɨk paŋkwa Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn da yumabi aŋ uŋudeŋ dɨ abam.
Kɨlɨ aŋelo da maban gapma kɨdagɨ mɨnikon pɨgɨgɨt. Pɨgakwan gapma uŋun dakon yoma sopmaŋek tebaisi aŋteban agɨt. Mɨktɨm amɨn morap arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋkewaljak, yaŋ do agɨt. Uŋun bɨlak 1 tausen mudaŋakwan don yɨpmaŋ dekba bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok galaktoknikon egɨpdɨsak.
Uwal da gen yaŋ namaŋ, do aŋpulugaŋek yokwikon naŋ abɨdoki. Kalɨp yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun yolek egɨp egɨp nabi.
Nido, Piŋkop Wukwisi kwen wɨgɨk aŋ ɨmɨŋek geni abɨŋ yɨpgwit.
Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn Josep uŋun kalbi monjɨ ŋakŋak gat meŋi gat tɨmɨkban Isip kɨk do kosit wasawit.
Piŋkop da Dewit do yo tagɨsi aŋ ɨmgut. Aŋakwan Dewit da Jekop dakon Piŋkop do yut kɨnda awal do bɨsit agɨt.
Kɨla amɨn madep da egɨp egɨpni Yawekon tosok yaŋsi nandɨsak. Piŋkop Wukwisi, uŋun da kɨla amɨn madep do bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsak, do tebaisi atdɨsak.
Uŋun bɨsapmon Sinai dakon Piŋkop abɨŋakwan mɨktɨm wudɨp agɨt. Asi, Israel dakon Piŋkop abɨŋakwan sɨkak madepsi magɨt.
Do dagok dagogɨ mɨni paŋmuwukbi mɨŋat amɨnyo Yesu Kristo da manon Piŋkop dakon man aŋkɨsiŋ kɨmotni. Don babɨkon da babɨkon yaŋ gɨn taŋ aŋaŋ kɨsak teban. Uŋun asi.
On yo noman tokdaŋ uŋun do Aisaia da kalɨp yaŋ yagɨt: “Amɨn Tagɨ Tapmɨm Ami da nin dakon amɨn kabɨ kaloŋɨsok dɨ dɨma yopban egɨpgwit tam, nin Sodom ae Gomora kokup da tasɨk tagɨmal yaŋ gɨn tasɨk tagɨmaŋ.”
Amɨn morap Piŋkop bɨsit iyaŋ uŋun yo tɨmɨkgaŋ, ae yo wɨsaŋ amɨn uŋun bamɨ koŋ, ae yoma domon tɨdoŋ amɨn uŋun wɨtdal yomɨsak.
Piŋkop uŋun nin dakon pasɨlɨ tamonin. Uŋun da nin bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ paŋteban asak. Jɨgɨ pamaŋ bɨsapmon uŋun nin da kapmatjok egek paŋpulugosok.
Yaŋ aŋakwa Parisi amɨn da pɨndagek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Yo morap aŋ ɨm do nandamaŋ uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma aneŋ. Pɨndakgɨt, mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨŋat amɨnyo morap kɨsi da yolgaŋ.”
Yɨgakwa uŋun muwut muwut yut dakon kɨla amɨn da gen teban ae kombɨ amɨn gen Piŋkop da papiakon toŋ uŋun baŋ dɨwarɨ manjɨŋ mudaŋek Pol gat dabɨni gat do gen yaŋ yɨpba pɨgɨgɨt, “Not kabɨ, ji amɨn dakon but paŋteban ak do gen dɨ yok do nandaŋ kaŋ tagɨ yoni.”
Ji Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn da binapmon pɨlɨk bamok kɨlegɨsi ani. Asi, gulusuŋ aŋ do gen yaŋ damdaŋ, mani aŋpakji kɨlegɨ koni do don Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨnyo gen pikon yop do apjak bɨsapmon Piŋkop dakon man aŋkɨsikdaŋ.
Nak mano awɨgɨkeŋsi kaŋ, yo ni da tapmɨmno madep dɨma yaŋ nolɨŋban kosot, nak uŋun baŋ awɨgɨkeŋ.
Judia mɨktɨmon kokup kɨnda mani Betlehem uŋudon Maria da Yesu aŋalagɨt. Uŋun bɨsapmon Erot da kɨla amɨn madep yɨkgɨt. Yesu altaŋakwan nandak nandak amɨn gɨldat wɨsak tetgɨn da Jerusalem kokup papmon apgwit.
Piŋkop dakon pi asak do gak amɨn kɨnda da kwenon kɨsitgo tepmɨsi wutjɨk do dɨma nandaki. Amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon yokwi da gagon dɨ tegaŋbam. Gak gaga do kɨla tagɨsi aŋek Piŋkop da dabɨlon gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi egɨpbi.
Ɨleŋ da Jerusalem aŋgwasɨŋek toŋ uŋun da tɨlak Yawe da abɨsok ae don paŋgwasɨŋek mɨŋat amɨni kɨlani akdɨsak.
Amɨn da kɨsiron jap dɨ ɨsalsi dɨma tɨmɨkgɨmaŋ. Nin si yumgumaŋ. Jɨgɨ dɨma damneŋ yaŋ do gɨldarɨ ae kalbi pi tebaisi agɨmaŋ.
Kombɨ amɨn Jerusalem kokup papmon gɨn dapba kɨmokgoŋ. Kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon dɨma dapba kɨmokgoŋ, do nak abɨsok ae aŋwa ae pɨdaŋɨ do sigɨn kɨkeŋ.
Kalɨp kombɨ amɨn yaŋ gɨn dapmaŋ yolyo awit. Do jiyo kɨsi aŋpakji kɨlegɨ dakon tomni wukwisi Kwen Kokupmon tɨmɨtdaŋ, do but galak nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani.”
Juda amɨn dakon mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kɨnda mani Skewa uŋun dakon monjini 7 kabɨ da yaŋ gɨn awit.
Uŋun do Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda yaŋ tosok: “Nandani, yut kodɨgɨkon gwak teban tɨp kɨndanaŋ tɨdosot uŋun nak da kɨlɨ manjɨgɨm. Uŋun gwak tagɨsi ae tebaisi. Uŋun abɨsok yɨpbo Saion kokup papmon tosok. Uŋun do nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni amɨn mayaktok arɨpmɨ dɨma pakdaŋ.”
Nin Rom pɨgɨno Pol iyɨ gɨn yut kɨndakon egakwan emat amɨn kɨnda da kɨlani aban egɨpjil do yawit.
Mani Piŋkop da kobogɨ ni gen naŋ iyɨgɨt? Yaŋ iyɨgɨt: “Nak dakon amɨn kabɨno 7 tausen da ekwaŋ, uŋun amɨn kokup kɨdat Bal uŋun do gawat gawat dɨma awit.”
Yaŋban Pol da yagɨt, “Nak Juda amɨn kɨnda. Kokupno uŋun Tasas, Silisia mɨktɨmon tosok. Kokup madepno amɨn morap da man bini nandaŋ. Amɨn gen tagɨ yoyɨkeŋ?”
“Ma, amɨn on ni gen naŋ yosok? On Piŋkop kulabɨsak on! Namɨn amɨn da dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt pi asak? Uŋun pi Piŋkop dagɨn agagɨ!”
Geni uŋun tuŋon amɨn dakon pakbi emarɨ toŋ yombem. Mɨrakni ɨŋtagɨt, do
Don dɨwarɨno gagon yaŋ teŋteŋagɨm. Aŋpakno yokwi kɨnda dɨma aŋkɨsɨbɨgɨm. “Yawekon dɨwarɨno kɨsi yaŋ kwokeŋ” yaŋ yagɨm. Yaŋkwok abo dɨwarɨno kɨsisi wɨrɨrɨk namgul.
Gak da amɨn tebai yoyɨŋek yokwini dakon kobogɨ yomɨsal. Yo monɨŋ da ɨmal kɨnda naŋba yokwi tosok, uŋun da tɨlak yo morap uŋun do galak tosok uŋun wagɨl wɨrɨrɨkbɨ pasɨl mudoŋ. Amɨn kɨnda da mɨrɨm pɨsosok, amɨn morap uŋun da tɨlak mɨktɨmon bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok gɨn ekwaŋ.
Mani amɨn da bɨkbɨgon da si kɨgɨt.
Yesu gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋakwan abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn uŋun da yutnon awɨgɨwit. Aŋakwa Pita kagɨsok da yolgɨt.
Kaŋ abɨdosok bɨsapmon but galak nandaŋek notni gat ae kokup ɨsalni gat yoyɨŋban obɨŋ muwukba yaŋ yoyɨsak, ‘Moneŋno pasɨlak uŋun kɨlɨ wɨsɨŋ kat, do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ano.’ ”
Jikon amɨn kɨnda dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn kɨnda apban kaŋ, uŋun abɨdok do dɨma ɨŋtoni. Kalɨp amɨn dɨwarɨ da amɨnsi baŋ tɨmɨkgamaŋ yaŋ nandawit, mani aŋelo baŋ tɨmɨkgwit.
Yaŋdo, opbeŋ kaŋ aŋpak asak uŋun do yaŋkwok abeŋ. Uŋun nin do yaŋba yok aŋek gen yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yosok. Ae Yesu dakon pi amɨn yutnikon dɨma paŋkɨsak. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, paŋmuwukbi da pi amɨn iyɨ da yutnon paŋkɨk do aba yaŋsop aŋyomɨsak. Ae paŋmuwukbi kabɨ da waŋga egɨpni do yoldak.
Ji yaŋ aŋek babɨkji dakon yaŋ teban tok gen guramɨgek Piŋkop dakon gen maba kɨsak. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, yo morap dɨwarɨ kɨsi yaŋ gɨn aŋ.”
Amɨn bamot uŋun mɨktɨm daman dakon Amɨn Tagɨni da ɨŋamon olip kɨndap bamot ae lam bamot akgamal uŋun mani.
Mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨlegɨ da mango aŋkɨsikdaŋ. Uŋun gak gat kɨsi egɨpdaŋ.
Nak naga on mɨktɨmon nani dɨma, ae amɨn kabɨno uŋun kɨsi on mɨktɨmon nani dɨma.
Piŋkop, nin Saion kokup papmon kɨŋek gak aŋkɨsineŋsi. Yaŋ aŋapno yo morap ak do yagɨmaŋ uŋun kɨnda dɨma suŋ tosak.
Telagɨ Wup gat ae pakbi gat ae yawi gat uŋun kapbɨ da Yesu Kristo do yaŋ teŋteŋaŋba gen kaloŋɨ asak.
Uŋun da Israel amɨn nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨgek dɨwarɨnin kɨsisi wɨrɨrɨk nimɨsak.
Ji amɨn dɨwarɨ paŋpulugaŋek jɨgɨni guramɨtni. Yaŋ aŋek Kristo dakon gen teban tagɨsi guramɨtni.
Piŋkop, nak gak dakon pi madep do aeno nandakeŋ. Asi, wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kalɨp agɨl uŋun do nandakeŋ.
Amo amɨn kabɨ dakon kɨla amɨn madep Sion aŋakban kɨmakgɨt. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Yutnikon yo kabɨni morapmɨ taŋ ɨmni, ae aŋpakni tagɨsi uŋun do amɨn da dɨma ɨŋtoni.
Yaŋ iyɨŋban Sol da yagɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ gak namɨn?” Yaŋ iyɨŋban yagɨt, “Nak Yesu, nak naŋ aŋupbal ak do pi asal.
Do mibɨltok uŋun do dayɨkdɨsat. Piŋkop gawak ɨm do muwukgaŋ bɨsapmon pɨdok pɨdok aŋek ekwaŋ yaŋ amɨn da yaŋba nandagɨm. Gen uŋun nandako bamɨsok agɨt,
Nak dakon mibɨlno uŋun da kɨlɨsi nandaŋ namgwit, do iyɨ gayɨk do nandaŋ kaŋ tagɨ gayɨni. Nak monjɨ bɨlagɨ egɨpgumon da wasaŋek Parisi amɨn kɨnda egɨpgum. Parisi amɨn dakon gen tebani uŋun morapmɨsi. Juda amɨn kabɨ dɨwarɨ dakon gen tebani yapmaŋek uŋun dakon jɨgɨsi. Gen teban morap uŋun guramɨkgɨm.
Yesu da gen uŋun yoyɨŋban paŋdetni dɨwarɨ tobɨl kɨŋek Yesu saŋbeŋek dɨma yolgwit.
Ae gen dayɨgɨm uŋun tebaisi abɨdoni kaŋ, Piŋkop da uŋun Gen Bin Tagɨsikon da ji yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtdɨsak. Yaŋ dɨma ani kaŋ, nandaŋ gadatji uŋun yo ɨsalɨ.
Gɨldat 6 kabɨ mudaŋakwa Yesu da Pita, Jems ae padɨge Jon yoyɨŋban buŋon yolba ɨleŋ dubagɨ kɨndakon pawɨgɨ iyɨ gɨn egɨpgwit.
Pol aŋakba kɨmot do aŋakwa Jerusalem amɨn morap kɨsi gen butjap ematyo madep aŋ uŋun dakon gen bini Rom dakon emat amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da nandagɨt.
Kɨŋ pɨndakban Isip amɨn kɨnda da Israel amɨn kɨnda yokwi aŋ ɨban kagɨt. Yaŋ kaŋek notni aŋpulugok do aŋek Isip amɨn uŋun yokwi agɨt dakon kobogɨ do uŋun amɨn aŋakban kɨmakgɨt.
Ji butji sigɨn pakyaŋsi dɨma nandaŋ pɨsoŋ, ma? Nak bret 5 kabɨ baŋ amɨn 5 tausen do yobo naŋakwa dɨwarɨ yɨk morapmɨ sɨmɨlba tugawit ji uŋun do si ɨŋtoŋ?
Yawe da kɨlago aŋakwan yo yokwi morap toŋ kɨndasok da gak dɨma aŋupbal asak. Egɨp egɨpgo kɨsi kɨla asak.
Abɨsok gak pɨdaŋ kokup papmon pɨgɨki. Pɨgaki amɨn kɨnda da yo ninaŋsi aki uŋun da don gayɨsak.”
Uŋun amɨn kabɨ da kɨŋ yabekbi kabɨ tɨmɨk dam teban yutnon yopgwit.
Do but bamorɨ mɨni ɨŋamɨkon agek yaŋsi nandaneŋ, nin Piŋkop dakon galaktok yolek bɨsit iyɨneŋ kaŋ, bɨsitnin nandaŋ nimdɨsak.
Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni yopmaŋek Yesu yolgɨmal.
Mɨŋat amɨnyo nin da gen teban morapgo tagɨ nandaŋ gadaneŋ. Amɨn da ɨsal dogɨn yokwi aŋ namaŋ, do aŋpulugoki do nandɨsat.
Uŋun do Piŋkop gen papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: “Namɨn da Amɨn Tagɨ dakon butni kagɨt? Ae namɨn da aŋpulugaŋek nandak nandak ɨmgut?”
Yaŋ sɨmɨl aŋek tɨlɨm madepni do nandaŋek Yawe aŋkɨsini. Paretji tɨmɨgek Telagɨ Yut Madepni da nagalgwan pɨgɨni.
Piŋkop da ji do but dasi galak taŋ damɨsak, do uŋun da kapmatjok egek bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo do jomjom aŋakwa bupmɨni nomansi aŋalon aŋakwan egɨp egɨp teban abɨdoni.
Yawe, nak gak do yaŋ tɨdosot. Tepmɨsi aŋpulugoki do nandɨsat. Gak do yaŋ tɨdosot, do bɨsitno nandaki.
Yaŋ iyɨŋbal uŋun amɨn da yut madep kɨnda kwen nani do dolɨsak. Uŋun yutnon jap noknok tamo ae amɨn yɨyɨt tamo kɨlɨ paŋnoman abi da toŋ. Uŋudon japnin paŋkosit anjil.”
Yesu Sabat dakon gen teban yapgut, ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, Piŋkop uŋun naga dakon Datno yaŋ yaŋek nak Piŋkop gat arɨp yaŋ nandagɨt. Uŋun yagɨt do Juda amɨn da mibɨltok aŋakba kɨmotjak do nandawit uŋun si yapmaŋek wagɨlsi aŋatno kɨmotjak yaŋ nandaba teban tagɨt.
Bɨsitno nandaki. Aŋpulugoki do yaŋ tɨdosot,
Ae yo kɨnda do wadak wadak aban amɨn kɨsit da yo uŋun wasaŋek Piŋkop aŋpulugogɨ uŋun dɨma tosok. Piŋkop da iyɨ egɨp egɨp ae mɨrɨm ae yo morap gat kɨsi amɨn kɨsi do yomɨsak.
Yesu gat paŋdetni kapbɨ gat ɨleŋon da pɨŋ mɨŋat amɨn morapmɨ muwukgwit kabɨkon kɨŋakwa amɨn kɨnda da abɨŋ Yesu da buron gawagek yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
Mani Piŋkop da iyɨ tapmɨm namɨŋakwan koŋ yoldat kaŋ, Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni jikon kɨlɨ abɨk.
Yesu gen yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn paŋdetni 12 kabɨkon da kɨnda mani Judas altaŋ yomgut. Amɨn kabɨ madep emat agak sɨbani ae kɨndap kɨrɨŋni tɨmɨgek buŋon yolgwit. Mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn gat da yabekba opgwit.
Mani mɨktɨmon egek ji paŋpulugokeŋ kaŋ, uŋun da tagɨsi asak.
Amɨn Tagɨ Yawe, gak dakon tapmɨm do nandaŋek gak aŋkɨsikeŋ. “Yawe kaloŋ gɨn uŋun amɨn kɨlegɨsi” yaŋ yoyɨŋ teŋteŋokeŋ.
But kalɨp dakon galaktok da Telagɨ Wup abɨŋ yɨp do pi asak. Ae Telagɨ Wup dakon galaktok da but kalɨp abɨŋ yɨp do pi asak. Uŋun bamot uwal uwal amal, do yo ak do nandaŋ uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma ani.
Yoyɨŋban Jon dakon paŋdet kabɨni kɨŋakwa Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep Jon do yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji mɨktɨm amɨni mɨnikon ninaŋ kok do kɨwit? Mɨrɨm da nagal paŋwayɨŋ aban pɨndat do kɨwit?
Pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda Genesaret mɨktɨmon kɨŋ ɨleŋɨkon wɨgakwan
Ji but kalɨp dakon aŋpagon arɨpmɨsi agɨpgwit, aŋek Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn da aŋpak aŋ uŋun ak do galagɨsi nandawit. Aŋpak uŋun, yumabi aŋpak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, ae pakbi teban naŋek but upbal agak, ae jap pakbiyo madepsi aŋek pakbi teban morapmɨ naŋek aŋpak yokwi agak, ae aŋpak wagɨl yokwisi kɨnda uŋun kokup kɨdat do gawak yomyom aŋpak, uŋun aŋpak morap awit.
Yaŋ yaŋban Sunduk da Yesu iyɨŋ aŋaŋ Jerusalem kokup papmon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋ Telagɨ Yut Madep da kwenon awɨgɨ yɨpmaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda yaŋ tosok: ‘Uŋun da aŋeloni yoyɨŋban kɨlago tagɨsi ani. Ae kandapgo tɨpmon dɨma gɨtni yaŋ do aŋelo da gak kɨsit da kendak abɨŋ gepni.’ Gen yaŋ tosok, do gak asi Piŋkop dakon Monji kaŋ, gak amon mibɨlɨkon paŋ ma.”
Yabekbi 12 kabɨ dakon man uŋun yaŋ: mibɨltok Saimon (mani kɨnda Pita), ae padɨge Andru, Sebedi dakon monji Jems, ae padɨge Jon.
“Ae amɨn kɨnda pigaga egɨpjak kaŋ, yutnon ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni kɨŋ abɨdok do dɨmasi kɨsak.
Yesu da nak naga bret Kwen Kokup da pɨgɨm yaŋ yagɨt do Juda amɨn da nandaba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨŋek gen morapmɨ yawit.
Bɨsap yokwi kɨnda noman taŋ namɨŋakwan uwalno abɨŋ nagon emat awit. Mani Yawe da kɨlano agɨt.
Bamɨ mɨni pɨndagek pi kɨla amɨni yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Nandaki. Nak bɨlak kapbɨ abɨŋ pik kɨndap dakon sopmɨ wɨsɨŋ wɨsɨŋ aŋek mɨni pɨndakdat. Yaŋ do kɨndap on si pasɨki. Mɨktɨm dakon tapmɨm nido ɨsal dogɨn ɨlɨk mudosok?’
Nandaki. Don bɨsap kɨnda noman tokdɨsak. Uŋun bɨsapmon uwalgo da gak aŋgwasɨŋek mɨktɨm paŋabɨŋ dam madepgokon yopba tugaŋ wɨgɨkdaŋ. Aŋakwa terɨ terɨ da abɨŋ paŋdagat akdaŋ.
Mani uŋun da mɨktɨm amɨn morap kɨsi yoyɨŋ dekgamal. Geni kɨŋ mɨktɨm morap kɨsi arɨpmɨ asak. Kundukon Piŋkop da gɨldat do ɨmal yut kɨnda wɨtjɨgɨt.
Amɨn yokwi da nak abɨdok do pat yɨpmaŋ, mani gengo dɨma yɨpmaŋ dekdat.
Uŋun da yaŋban gɨkwem noman toŋ, ae mal aŋek sɨkak mosok, ae yo morap yopyop yutnikon da mɨrɨm yopban kwaŋ.
Gaga dakon aŋpak ae yoyɨŋdet agakgo do kɨla tagɨsi abi. Si teban taŋek sigɨn abi kaŋ, Piŋkop da gaga gat ae gengo nandaŋ amɨn gat kɨsi yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtdɨsak.
Mɨŋat monjɨyo, ji Dat pakyaŋsi nandaŋ ɨmaŋ. Uŋun do aŋek on papia mandaŋ damɨsat. Dat kabɨ, amɨn uŋun wasok wasogɨkon egɨpgut da egɨsak uŋun nandaŋ ɨmaŋ. Uŋun do aŋek on papia mandaŋ damɨsat. Wɨli gɨmoŋɨ, ji amɨn tebaisi, ae Piŋkop dakon gen ji da buron tebaisi tosok, ae Yokwi Ami kɨlɨ abɨŋ yɨpgwit. Uŋun do aŋek on papia mandaŋ damɨsat.
Nido ji gat egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon yo ŋwakŋwarɨ dɨ do nandak nandak dɨmasi agɨm. Yesu Kristo, ae tɨlak kɨndapmon kɨmot agɨt uŋun dogɨn nandagɨm.
Kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek but galak nandaŋek kɨla amɨn madep da yut madepgwan wukwaŋ.
Amɨn da Jon dakon gen uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin niaŋsi aneŋ?”
Elisabet da monjɨ aŋalasak dakon bɨsap abɨŋakwan monji wɨli aŋalagɨt.
Abɨsok amɨn dɨ yabekbɨ amɨn kɨnda Jopa kokup papmon egɨsak uŋun abɨdaŋ aŋop do kɨni. Amɨn uŋun mani Saimon ae mani kɨnda Pita yaŋ iyaŋ.
Yawe, pabɨŋ yopmaŋaki mayaktok madepsi pani. Aŋek gak tapmɨmgo madepsi yaŋ yokdaŋ.
Yaŋ iyɨŋek Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen iyɨŋek amɨn morap yutnikon egɨpgwit gat kɨsi yoyɨgɨmal.
Do kɨla amɨnji dɨ yopba nak gat pɨgɨno gulusuŋ kɨnda agɨt kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da gen yaŋ ɨmni.”
Yaŋdo, ji mɨktɨm dakon aŋpak morap butjikon toŋ uŋun dapba kɨmak mudoni. Nak aŋpak oden do yosot: yumabi aŋpak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, ae yo yokwi ak do but kɨndap, ae yo morapmɨ tɨmɨt do nandaba kɨk. Uŋun yo morapmɨ tɨmɨt do nandak nandak uŋun da ji kokup kɨdat gawak yomaŋ yaŋ asak.
Teŋteŋɨ gat pɨlɨn tuk gat gen kagani mɨni, do gen arɨpmɨ dɨma yonjil. Nin da uŋun bamot dakon tekni dɨma nandamaŋ.
Uŋun Piŋkop manji ɨmgwit, do Piŋkop da yum pɨndagakwan aŋpak mayak mayagɨ ak do but kɨndap pawit. Aŋek mɨŋat da mɨŋat eyo dakon aŋpak yɨpmaŋek mɨŋat notni gat aŋpak yokwisi awit.
Nak papia uŋun amɨn kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨmasi wɨtdaljak bo ae kosak yaŋ kaŋek kunam madepsi saŋbek saŋbek morapmɨ takgɨm.
Yawe da Isip amɨn dakon butni paŋtobɨlban mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni do uwal aŋ yomgwit. Aŋek Yawe dakon oman amɨni do yokwi aŋ yom do kosit wusɨk awit.
Dɨsi nandaŋ, ji gat sigɨn egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon yaŋ dayɨgɨmaŋ, pi dɨma ak do nandɨsak amɨn, uŋun jap dɨma nosak.
Yaŋ yawit, ‘Kristo uŋun tepmɨ paŋek don kɨmoron da wasok wasok pɨdot pɨdot amɨn egɨpjak. Aŋek Israel amɨnon ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon kwan Piŋkop dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi dakon teŋteŋɨ do yaŋ teŋteŋosak.’ ”
Amɨnon goman morap agɨl uŋun sopbi. Takis mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yopyopmɨ uŋun yopni. Ae kɨla amɨn mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ morap do gawak yomɨŋek man madep yomni.
Wɨkwan amɨn Yesu gat yɨkgwit uŋun da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Meŋgo padɨk padɨkgo yomakon da gak do yoŋ.”
Ji nak da egɨp egɨpji paŋmɨlɨp abeŋ do kuragɨsi nandaŋ, aŋek bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ nak dakon gen pabɨŋ yopmaŋgaŋ.
Yaŋba Parisi amɨn da yoyɨwit, “Ji kɨsi bo paŋkewalak?
Yesu gen uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Uŋun sot asak mani wagɨl dɨma kɨmotjak. Piŋkop gat Monji gat da man madep panjil do sot uŋun asak.”
Nin tapmɨmnin mɨni da egapno Piŋkop bɨsap yɨpguron Kristo da abɨŋ yokwi pakpak amɨn nin do kɨmakgɨt.
Tap uŋun yo galagɨsi. Mani tap dakon galagɨ pasɨljak kaŋ, niaŋsi aŋek galagɨni aŋkaluk aneŋ? Ji tap yombem egek notji gat but kaloŋsi egɨpni.”
Yaŋban mɨŋat amɨn morapyo da dabɨlon Yesu aŋkewalno suŋ kɨnda yaŋban abɨdoneŋ yaŋ dakon kosit kɨnda dɨma kawit. Geni kobogɨ yoyɨgɨt do nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi aban tayaŋgok akgwit.
Aŋek yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yesu, Piŋkop Wɨkwisi dakon Monji, gak niaŋsi aŋnam do abɨsal? Piŋkop da manon tepmɨ pi dɨma nabi do yaŋ teban ta.”
Yaŋban Saimon da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil nak do bɨsit abal Amɨn Tagɨ da nak do nandaŋ yawok namɨŋakwan yo uŋun yomal uŋun nagon dɨma noman toni.”
Yaŋ yaŋek yagɨt, “Yesu, gak kɨla amɨn madep man paki bɨsapmon nandaŋ nabi.”
“Dɨsi nandaŋ, gɨldat bamorɨ gɨn egek Yapyap Bɨlak egɨpmɨ. Uŋun bɨsapmon Amɨn Dakon Monji amɨn da abɨdaŋ uwal da kɨsiron yɨpba tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋatdaŋ.”
Uŋun kɨla amɨn ae mibɨltok amɨn da yoŋgamgwan egakwan wɨgɨ dat da bɨsap yɨpguron wɨgɨsak.
Yawe Piŋkopgo yaŋ teban tok aŋ ɨmɨŋek uŋun gen si guramɨkgi. Mɨŋat amɨn morap ji Yawe do pasalek but galak do yo paŋkɨ ɨmni.
Yaŋban Yesu da kɨsitni amɨn uŋun kwenikon wɨtjɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kɨlek toki do nandɨsat, do pasɨl gamni!” Yaŋ yaŋban uŋudon gɨn wuda tebani pasɨl ɨmɨŋakwa kɨlek tagɨt.
Yum kaŋapno mɨrɨm da tap wakganin awɨl aŋkɨ mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda tap binap tosok uŋudon yɨpban tegaŋ atdɨsak.”
Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdetni da yaŋ gɨn aba amɨn kɨsi yɨk mudawit.
Yaŋ yaŋban ae amɨn kɨnda da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gol do nandɨsat, mani nandaŋ namɨŋaki kɨŋ gwakno galok gen yoyɨŋek don abɨŋ golgeŋ.”
Oman amɨngo gat saŋbek saŋbek agɨmal uŋun paŋdagagɨl. Gak da kɨla amɨn madep pelɨtni mabɨ mɨktɨmon maŋek yo ɨsalɨ agɨt.
Uŋun dakon geni pasɨlɨ tawit, mani iyɨ dakon Wupni da nin do paŋalon aŋ nimgut. Telagɨ Wup da yo morap kɨsi pakyaŋsi pɨndak mudosok, ae Piŋkop dakon nandak nandakni pasɨlɨ kɨsi pɨndakdak.
Bɨsap morapmɨ koŋ da aŋakgo kɨmotjak yaŋ nandaŋek maban kɨndapmon ae pakbikon pɨgɨgɨt. Tapmɨm taŋ gamɨsak kaŋ, nit do bupmɨ nandaŋek paŋpulugoki.”
“Uŋun bɨsapmon ji dɨsi do kɨla ani. Amɨn da gen pikon depdaŋ ae Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon pawɨgɨ nap kɨrɨŋbaŋ baljokdaŋ. Ji nak nandaŋ namaŋ do amɨn da ji paŋkɨ mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn madep da ɨŋamon depba atdaŋ. Uŋun bɨsapmon nak dakon gen yoyɨni.
Yaŋ nandaŋek kɨŋ obip amɨn kabi kɨnda yapmaŋek kɨŋ aeni obip amɨn kabi kɨnda gat yapmaŋek ain yoma tagɨt uŋudon kɨgɨmal. Uŋudon kɨŋakwal ain yoma uŋun iyɨ wɨtdal kɨŋakwan kokup papmon pɨgɨgɨmal. Pɨgɨ tɨmɨsok dɨ kɨŋek aŋelo uŋun Pita yɨpmaŋ dek kɨgɨt.
Yesu uŋun do nayɨkdaŋ yaŋ pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gen uŋun yat dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do dɨsi gɨn yoŋ, ma? Yaŋ dayɨt, ‘Bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok nak saŋbeŋek ae dɨma nandakdaŋ. Ae bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok egek ae donjok nandakdaŋ.’
Butnokon jɨgɨ madepsi taŋakwan tasɨk tosot. Gɨldat kɨnda kaloŋ bupmɨ nandaŋek kunam gɨn tak egɨsat.
Kalɨp Piŋkop da Kristo da pi asak uŋun do aŋek yo uŋun yaŋ abeŋ yaŋ kɨlɨ nandagɨt. Mani nandak nandakni uŋun pasɨlɨ tagɨt, abɨsok ninon kɨlɨ paŋalon agɨt.
Yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Asisi gayɨsat, gak abɨsok nak gat Paradais kon egɨpdamak.”
Mani uŋun amɨn nandaŋ gadatsi aŋek Piŋkop do bɨsit asak. Nandaŋ gadatni tɨmɨsok dɨ yɨpmaŋ degek “Piŋkop da uŋun namdɨsak bo dɨma” yaŋ dɨma nandɨsak. Nido amɨn but bamot aŋ uŋun tap pakbi mɨrɨm da pɨsoŋakwan tamalɨkgaŋ uŋun yombem.
Yaŋba Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On telagɨ yut tuwɨlba gɨldat kapbɨ da butgwan nak da kaluk wɨtjɨkdɨsat.”
Gen on yosot uŋun nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn dakon gen, mani dɨsi aŋpak aŋ uŋun pɨndagek yaŋ yosot. Asi, nak amɨn ɨsalɨ kɨnda, mani ji da nak do amɨn tagɨsi yaŋ yawit tam tagɨsi, nido uŋun yabekbi ji da nandaba wukwan yomaŋ nak uŋun dakon pɨŋbini dɨma egɨsat.
Piŋkop da dabɨlon gak dakon but tagɨ dɨma tosok do Piŋkop dakon pi amaŋ uŋun gak gat arɨpmɨ dɨmasi agagɨ.
Jap naŋ yɨgakwa Erodias dakon gwi da paŋabɨŋ ɨŋamnikon kap agɨt. Aban Erot ae amɨn jap nawit uŋun kɨsi da kaŋ galak tawit. Kaŋ galak taŋ Erot da mɨŋat gɨmoŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ni yo do galak tosol uŋun nayɨŋbɨ tagɨ gabeŋ.”
Yo morap dɨma noman taŋakwa Kristo kɨlɨ egɨpgut. Ae yo morap iyɨ da kɨsiron da kɨla aŋakwan kosirɨkon toŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Sakius pɨdaŋ agek Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nandaki. Nak abɨsok yo kabɨ morapno kokwinɨk kabi bamorɨ aŋakwa kabi kɨnda yoni mɨni amɨn do yobeŋ. Ae amɨn kɨnda aŋkewalek yo kabɨni dɨ tɨmɨkgɨm kaŋ, uŋun dakon kobogɨ do yo tɨmɨkgɨm uŋun do yo 4 kabɨ gat saŋbeŋek yomɨŋ yomɨŋ abeŋ.”
Amɨn dam tebanon ekwaŋ amɨn do dɨma ɨŋtaŋ yomni. Nin uŋun gat kɨsi dam tebanon ekwamaŋ yaŋ nandani. Ae uwal da jɨgɨ yomaŋ amɨn uŋun do dɨma ɨŋtaŋ yomni. Ninyo kɨsi da jɨgɨ uŋun pamaŋ yaŋ nandaŋek egɨpni.
Yaŋ yaŋban Juda amɨn da iyɨ gɨn gen emat madepsi aŋek yawit, “Uŋun amɨn niaŋon da sabamni niban noneŋ do yosok?”
Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu wasaŋek Piŋkop dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon bɨsap kwaŋ tosok, do ji but tobɨl ani.”
Aŋakwan gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn kɨnda da obɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, gak dukwan dukwan agɨpbi uŋun nak gol awɨlgeŋ gɨn.”
Aŋakwa Parisi amɨn dɨ da pɨndagek yawit, “Ji Sabat bɨsap dakon gen teban yapmaŋek nido yaŋ aŋ?”
Mani pini uŋun madepsi dɨma ɨreŋ tokdɨsak. Uŋun kalɨp amɨn da Janes gat ae Jambres gat dakon ŋugɨgɨ aŋpakni pɨndakgwit yaŋ gɨn amɨn morap da aŋpakni pɨndakba ŋugɨgɨsi akdaŋ.
“Mɨktɨmon amɨn ekwaŋ, awa! Amɨn dɨwarɨ da yokwikon depdaŋ. Mani yokwi ani do yabetdaŋ amɨn, awa!
Amɨn uŋun yoni morapmɨ taŋ ɨmgwit, do gen uŋun nandaŋ burɨ jɨk taŋban si kɨgɨt.
Pɨlɨn kɨlɨ uŋunjok mudokdɨsak, aŋakwan wɨsa yo kɨsi kɨlɨ uŋunjok dagokdɨsak. Yaŋdo, nin pɨlɨn tuk dakon aŋpak yokwi morap yopmaŋek teŋteŋɨ dakon yo baŋ pasɨk yaŋ paneŋ.
Nin aŋeloyo kɨsi dakon aŋpak kokwin akdamaŋ, ji uŋun dɨma nandaŋ, ma? Nin da kokwin yaŋ akdamaŋ, do on mɨktɨm dakon yo morap kokwin arɨpmɨ tagɨ aneŋ.
Mɨrɨm madep aŋyawot aban tap pakbi tamalɨkgɨt uŋun yaworɨ tagɨt.
Abɨŋek mɨŋat amɨn morap gen pikon yopdɨsak. Aŋek aŋpak yokwi awit ae gen yokwisi yaŋ ɨmgwit dakon kobogɨ yomdɨsak.”
Enok uŋun Adam dakon babɨknikon da altaŋban kosirɨ 7 agɨt. Uŋun da uŋun amɨn yokwi do kombɨ gen yaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Koni, Amɨn Tagɨ telagɨ aŋeloni tausen morapmɨ gat apdɨsak.
Pɨlak pɨlak uŋun os amɨn da emat do paŋtagap aŋ yombem pɨndakgɨm. Busuŋɨkon pelɨt gol baŋ wasaŋbi yombem da taŋ yomgwit. Tomno dabɨlni uŋun amɨn dakon yombem.
Not kabɨ, Kloi da kabɨkon amɨn dɨ da ji da binapmon pɨdok pɨdok taŋakwan ekwaŋ yaŋ nayɨwit.
Piŋkop da papiakon tɨmɨ kɨndakon amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ yagɨt: “Piŋkop, amɨn uŋun niaŋen baŋ uŋun do nandak nandak aŋegɨsal? Amɨn uŋun yo ɨsalɨ. Gak nido kɨlani aŋegɨsal?
Ae abɨsok Yesu Kristo yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨnin noman kɨlɨ altaŋ teŋteŋaŋban Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni kɨsi noman altaŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Yesu Kristo da kɨmot dakon tapmɨm aban pasɨlgɨt, aŋek Gen Bin Tagɨsi da paŋtagap aban mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi egɨp egɨp teban do nandaba pɨsagɨt.
Taitus jikon apgut bɨsapmon ji da nandaba wɨkwan ɨmɨŋek pasal nɨmnɨmɨkyo aŋek abɨdaŋek geni guramɨkgwit. Uŋun da uŋun aŋpak awit uŋun do sigɨn nandaŋ egek ji do nandaban yo madepsi asak.
Kɨlɨ mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn kɨla amɨn da ɨŋamon agek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma yoyɨki? On amɨn morap gen yaŋ gaba niaŋ nandaŋ yomɨsal?”
Mani nak gak da kapmatjok egɨsat, uŋun da tagɨsi. Amɨn Tagɨ Yawe, gak da nak tagɨsi aŋkutnosol. Nak yo morap agɨl do yaŋ teŋteŋok abeŋ.
Yesu yagɨt da arɨpmon Piŋkop da kɨlɨ aban pɨdak. Ɨdon dɨma egɨsak. Abɨŋ tamoni do konjil.
ae Judas Iskariot (uŋun egɨ don Yesu uwalni da kɨsiron yɨpgut).
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni abɨŋ muwutni da dabɨlon nak kalɨp Yawe do yo ak do yaŋ teban tok agɨm uŋun abo pɨndatdaŋ.
Mani mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae kɨla amɨn gat da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep burɨ sugaŋek yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Ji Pailat da Barabas naŋ pulugaŋek Yesu naŋ aŋakban kɨmotjak do iyɨni.”
Telagɨ Wup da iyɨ amɨn egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni yomɨsak. Amɨn da iyɨ egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni arɨpmɨ dɨma tɨmɨtni. Gen dayɨsat uŋun da Wup egɨp egɨp damɨsak uŋun jikon aŋabɨsak.
Saion kokup papmon uŋudon Yawe tapmɨm madepni taŋ ɨmɨsak. Ae uŋun da mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi dakon man yapmaŋek mani da wɨkwisi asak.
Juda amɨn Jerusalem egɨpgwit uŋun da mukwa sogok amɨn ae Liwai amɨn yabekba Jonon kɨŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak niaŋen amɨn kɨnda?”
Kalɨp babɨkni da awit, uŋudeŋ gɨn, kwen wɨgɨk aŋek Piŋkop manji ɨmgwit. Uŋun obip gɨreŋɨ dɨkdɨk suŋ yamaŋdak uŋun yombem.
Ae gen kɨnda uŋun yaŋ: Mɨŋat ɨmal pak do kaŋ, gɨptɨmni tagɨ wɨtjɨni uŋun da arɨpmon gɨn pani, wɨli da pɨndak galaktok ani yaŋon da ɨmal yumaŋ nogɨ wukwi baŋ dɨma pani. Busuŋ daŋgwani dɨma paŋtɨlɨm ani, ae gol kɨndɨrɨŋyo baŋ gɨptɨmji dɨma paŋtɨlɨm ani.
Gak kɨla amɨn tagɨsi baŋ manjɨki, nido kwen wɨgɨk amɨn morapmɨ ekwaŋ. Uŋun gen ɨsalɨ morapmɨ yaŋek amɨn dakon nandak nandak paŋkewalgaŋ. Uŋun kabɨkon, morapmɨ uŋun Juda amɨn, uŋun da gɨp mandani do pi tebaisi aŋ.
Gen uŋun yaŋban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn Ananias da Pol da kapmatjok akgwit amɨn gen kaganikon aŋatni do yoyɨgɨt.
Kɨnda uŋun mani Saimon (uŋun Yesu da Pita yaŋ iyɨgɨt). Ae Saimon dakon padɨge Andru, ae Jems, Jon, Pilip, Batolomiu,
Yaŋ aŋakwan kombɨ amɨn Aisaia da papiakon gen mandabi uŋun bamɨ tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yosok, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ dakon kosit aŋdɨmdɨm ani, kositni pasɨŋ aŋmɨlɨp ani.
On Juda amɨn kabɨ nak asɨdon gen kokwin amɨn kabɨni da ɨŋamon agapbo kɨlɨ nandawit. Do ni gulusuŋno naŋ kawit uŋun naŋsi gayɨni do yoyɨ.
Pɨdaŋba kɨno! Kabɨt, uwal da kɨsiron nepjak amɨn kɨlɨ abɨk.”
“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem amɨn, ji kombɨ amɨn dapba kɨmokgoŋ. Amɨn Piŋkop da yabekban jikon abaŋ uŋun ji da tɨpbaŋ dapba kɨmokgoŋ. Pup meŋi da monjini paŋmuwuk pɨrɨgwan yopmaŋdak, uŋun da tɨlak nak da bɨsap morapmɨ ji paŋmuwut do nandagɨm, mani ji da kurak taŋ namgwit.
Wɨli 7 kabɨ kɨsi da pawit, do amɨn da kɨmoron da pɨdoni bɨsap madepmon namɨn dakon mɨŋatni asak?”
Ji nak dɨma nandaŋek egɨ wɨgɨ ni bɨsapmon nak do ‘Amɨn on Amɨn Tagɨ da manon abɨsak, uŋun Piŋkop da gɨsamɨgakwan abɨsak’ yaŋ nak do yoni uŋun bɨsapmon nandakdaŋ.”
Kɨmot agɨt uŋun yokwi dakon tapmɨm abɨk do aŋek bɨsap kaloŋ kɨnda kɨmakban dagagɨt, mani abɨsok Piŋkop man madep ɨm do egɨsak.
Yo yaŋ altaŋakwan amɨn Sol gat agɨpgwit gen uŋun nandawit mani ami dɨma kawit, do geni mɨnisi akgwit.
Yɨgek jap pi ae wain pi aŋek bamɨ ɨreŋɨsi paŋ.
Piŋkop da iyɨ egɨp egɨp kalugɨ uŋun nimɨsak. Kalɨp nin uŋun dakon uwal egapno Kristo da nin paŋpulugaŋban Piŋkop gat but kaloŋ agɨmaŋ. Ae mɨŋat amɨnyo tɨmɨk paŋapno Piŋkop gat but kaloŋ ani do nin do pi uŋun nimgut.
Iyɨŋban yagɨt, “Ji Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopji uŋun but gat ae wup gat ae tapmɨmgo gat ae nandak nandakgo gat kɨsi but dasi galak taŋ ɨbi. Ae gaga do but dasi niaŋ galak tosol, uŋudeŋ gɨn amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yobi.”
Nandaki! Nak yomakon agek yoma domon tɨdaŋek yaŋ yosot: Nak yutnon tagɨ wɨkeŋ? Amɨn kɨnda tekno nandaŋek yoma wɨtdaljak kaŋ, nak wɨgɨko uŋun gat egek jap nondeŋ.
Mɨktɨm da mudosak bɨsap madep tepmɨ dɨma apdɨsak. Mibɨltok amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun da Gen Bin Tagɨsi nandani.
Yesu da yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek jɨkgo yanjaŋ ɨmgwit. Yaŋ aba yoyɨŋban yomakon pɨgɨ mudaŋakwa, mɨŋatjok dakon meŋi datniyo ae paŋdetni tɨmɨkban mɨŋatjok pakgɨron wɨgɨwit.
Aŋpak morap asal uŋun kɨsi nandaŋ mudosot. Nak nandɨsat, gak mɨrɨmɨ dɨma, ae tedepmɨ dɨma. Gak da mɨrɨmɨ bo ae tedepmɨ egɨpbi do nandɨsat.
Yawe da saŋbek saŋbekni nin gat toktogɨsi agɨt. Dagok dagogɨ mɨni saŋbek saŋbekni do nandaŋ egɨsak.
Aŋakwa pɨlɨn taŋakwan Yesu dɨma opban kaŋ iyɨ gɨn bot kɨndakon wɨgek Kapaneam kokupmon kɨk do pakbi ɨdap binap naŋ kɨwit.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn tagɨ bamorɨ dakon oman arɨpmɨ dɨma asak. Yaŋ kaŋ, kɨnda naŋgɨn galak taŋ ɨmɨŋek kɨnda do nandaban yokwi taŋ ɨmdɨsak. Ae kɨnda dakon gen guramɨgek kɨnda manji ɨmdɨsak. Ji Piŋkop gat ae moneŋ gat kɨsi dakon oman monjɨni arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ.”
Nak ji dandak do galagɨsi nandɨsat, nido wupji dakon yo tagɨsi dɨ dabo paŋek tebaisi atni do nandɨsat.
Piŋkop dakon Monji man madep pagɨt, do gen nandagɨmaŋ uŋun nandak nandakninon da tebai abɨdaŋek guramɨk kɨmotneŋ. Gen uŋun guramɨt do alek taŋek dɨ dɨwalɨk pɨkwam.
Gen teban dɨma nandagɨm bɨsapmon nak kalugɨ egɨpgum. Mani gen teban nagon apgut bɨsapmon yokwi da pɨdaŋakwan nak kɨmot agɨm.
“Yoni mɨni amɨn egek kɨmakban aŋelo da abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ yɨpba Abraham gat egɨpgumal. Egakwal yoni morapmɨ amɨn uŋun yo kɨsi kɨmakban wayɨkgwit.
Yaŋ aŋek Pol do os kɨnda kɨsi aŋnoman aŋek Pol aŋkutnaŋ aŋaŋ gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn madep Pelikskon aŋkɨni.”
Isip amɨn Israel do madepsi pasalgwit, do kɨŋ mudaŋakwa but galak nandawit.
Mani gen teban da nak kɨmoron nepgut, do abɨsok egɨp egɨpno Piŋkopmon tosok. Nak Kristo gat kɨsi tɨlak kɨndapmon kɨmakgɨmak.
Mani Yesu da koŋ tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak gen dɨma yaŋek amɨn on yɨpmaŋ det!” Yaŋ iyɨŋakwan koŋ uŋun da amɨn ukwayɨkban maŋ amɨn da binapmon pakgɨt. Pagakwan amɨn uŋun dɨma aŋupbal aŋek yɨpmaŋ kɨgɨt.
Nido mɨŋat amɨnyo pakbi do tegɨ kɨbɨdoŋ uŋun pakbi yoban naŋek yawokgoŋ, ae jap do aŋ amɨn jap morapmɨ yoban naŋek tugoŋ.
Yawe Wukwi Madep da yoŋgamgwan egɨpbi kaŋ,
Kalɨp Piŋkop da Abraham gat babɨkni gat do mɨktɨm morap kɨsi yom do yaŋ teban tok agɨt. Abraham gen teban yolakwan uŋun do aŋek yaŋ teban tok dɨma aŋ ɨmgut. Nandaŋ gadat gɨn aŋakwan amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ iyɨŋek yaŋ teban tok aŋ ɨmgut.
Yaŋdo, japmon notno yokwikon yɨpbeŋ kaŋ, nak buŋon bɨt kɨlapyo dɨmasi nokeŋ. Yaŋ aŋek notno yokwikon dɨ yɨpbom.
Mani jap si galak tawit uŋun sigɨn naŋ egakwa
Yaŋ aŋakwa amɨn morap da pi madep asal uŋun do nandani. Aŋek gak kɨla amɨn madep tapmɨmɨ toŋ egɨsal ae mango wukwisi tosok yaŋ nandaŋ gamni.
Pɨdot pɨdot bɨsap madepmon mɨŋat wɨliyo agak dɨma tokdɨsak. Aŋelo Kwen Kokup ɨsal ekwaŋ uŋun da tɨlagon egɨpdaŋ.
Yoba tɨmɨk amɨn morap kɨsisi arɨpmɨsi nawit. Naŋba bret dɨwat tawit uŋun paŋdetni da sɨmɨlba yɨk madepsi 12 kabɨ yaŋ tugawit.
Yomɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak suŋsi aŋek amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨnda uwal da kɨsiron yɨpmat. Uŋun ji da aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak.” Yoyɨŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Uŋun nin dakon yo dɨma. Uŋun gak dakon yo gɨn.”
Gen teban da galaktok yokwi ninon paŋalon aban yokwi amaŋ kaŋ, gen teban uŋun yo yokwi yaŋ tagɨ yoneŋ? Uŋun dɨmasi! Gen teban da taŋek yokwino nolɨŋban nomansi pɨndakdat. Gen teban da yaŋ yosok: “Ji amɨn dakon yo do pɨndak galaktok dɨma ani.” Yaŋ dɨma yosok tam, pɨndak galaktok uŋun aŋpak yokwi yaŋ dɨma nandakom.
Piŋkop da aŋpakji kokwin asak bɨsapmon uŋun ji pulugaŋ depmaŋdak dakon gen teban uŋun do nandaŋek kokwin akdɨsak. Do ji uŋun do nandaŋek amɨn do bupmɨ nandaŋek toktogɨsi gen yogokji gat ae aŋpakji gat dakon kɨla tagɨsi ani.
Gak apbi bɨsapmon paba pɨgɨk dubakno kokup pap Troas uŋudon Kapus da yutnon yɨpgum uŋun si abɨdaŋek opbi. Ae papia kɨsi tɨmɨkgi. Papia sipsip gɨp baŋ wasaŋbi uŋun baŋsi tɨmɨkgi.
Uŋun kabɨkon kunam pakbi morap dabɨlɨkon toni uŋun kɨsisi wɨrɨrɨkban kunam saŋbeŋek dɨma tatdaŋ. Ae amɨn saŋbeŋek dɨma kɨmotdaŋ, ae but yokwi aŋek saŋbeŋek kunam dɨma tatdaŋ, ae tepmɨ saŋbeŋek dɨma pakdaŋ. Nido mɨktɨm kalɨpmɨ gat yoni kalɨpmɨ gat uŋun kɨsisi pasɨl mudokdaŋ.”
Geni uŋun geni tepmɨsi. Emat agak sɨba da yaŋ mandaŋ namaŋ. Amɨn da amɨn do tɨlak aŋek obip paŋɨlɨkgaŋ, uŋun da tɨlak geni emarɨ toŋ baŋ nak paŋɨlɨk namaŋ.
“Ae 5 tausen danari tɨmɨkgɨt amɨn uŋun da abɨŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, gak dakon mibɨlgo nandɨsat, gak bupmɨgo mɨni. Amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ da pi aŋakwa jap bamɨ gak da pasal, ae mɨktɨmon jap yet tɨŋtɨŋoŋ dakon bamɨ gaga do pasal.
Nandani, bɨsap kɨlɨ kwaŋtak. Asi bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun, do ji bɨrɨpmɨgɨ yutjikon kɨŋ kɨŋ akdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek nak nepba naga gɨn egɨpdɨsat. Mani Dat nak gat egɨsak do naga gɨnsi dɨma egɨpbeŋ.
Ae Kristo kaloŋon gɨn egɨp egɨp bamɨ jikon tugagɨt. Uŋun kɨla amɨn mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ mɨktɨmon ae kwen binap ekwaŋ kɨsi dakon Amɨn Tagɨni egɨsak.
Yaŋ aŋakwan Segius uŋun kaŋek nandaŋ gadat agɨt. Aŋek Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen do nandaban yo madepsi agɨt.
Aŋpak yokwi da butnikon tugawit, do uwalno but pɨsoni mɨni tepmɨsi kɨmotni do nandɨsat. Kalugɨ sigɨn egek kɨmakbi kokupmon kɨnisi.
Mani gak bɨsit ak do nandɨsal kaŋ, yutgokon wɨgɨ yoma sopmaŋek Datgo pasɨlɨ egɨsak uŋun bɨsit iyɨki. Yaŋ aŋaki Datgo yo pasɨlɨ pɨndakdak uŋun da kobogɨ tagɨsi gamdɨsak.
Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: Kristo uŋun kɨla amɨn madep Dewit dakon yawi dɨwat kabɨkon da altosak. Uŋun kalɨp Dewit da egɨpgut kokup Betlehem uŋudon altokdɨsak.”
Nandaŋ kokwingo tagɨ dɨma amɨn, gak nandaŋ gadat gɨn aŋek aŋpak tagɨyo kɨsi dɨma abi kaŋ, nandaŋ gadatgo uŋun yo ɨsalɨ. Gak gen on dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do nandɨsal? Kaŋ, nandaki,
Tap wakga dakon kɨla amɨn pi madepsi aŋakwa Krit dakon tap kɨdɨpmɨŋ naŋ yolek kɨgɨmaŋ. Kɨŋ don kokup kɨnda mani Tap Waga Tamo Tagɨsi uŋudon kɨŋ altagɨmaŋ. Kokup uŋun kokup pap Lasia da kapmatjok tosok.
Yɨk yawogakwan Samaria mɨŋat kɨnda pakbini kolek do apgut. Apban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Pakbi tagɨ koleŋ nabɨ nokeŋ?”
Mɨŋat monjɨyo da gen guramɨt aŋ uŋudeŋ ani. Kalɨp nandak nandakji mɨni, do galaktok yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yolgwit, mani abɨsok aŋpak uŋun dɨma yolni.
Aŋek kokup pap bo kokup monɨŋ ae dukwan dukwan kɨgɨt amɨn da sot amɨn muwut muwut tamokon uŋudon paŋabɨŋ yopgwit. Aŋek paba pɨgɨk dɨwatnikon ɨgayɨni do bɨsit tebai iyɨwit. Yaŋ ɨgayɨwit amɨn uŋun kɨlek taŋ mudawit.
Aŋek ni gulusuŋ kɨnda agɨt naŋ abɨdawit uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do aŋek gen kokwin amɨn kabɨnikon aŋkɨgɨm.
Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, kuraktok aŋpak tɨmɨgek yut dɨwarɨkon agɨ agɨ aŋ. Ae kuraktok aŋpak gɨn dɨma, amɨn dɨwarɨ da yo aŋ uŋun dakon geni nandak do galagɨ nandaŋ. Aŋek gen morapmɨ dɨma yogogɨ yoŋ.
Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kɨŋ uŋun top amɨn yaŋ iyɨni, ‘Nandaki. Nak abɨsok ae aŋwa koŋ yolgeŋ, ae sot amɨn paŋmɨlɨp abeŋ. Ae pɨdaŋɨ do pi abeŋ do nandagɨm uŋun aŋwasɨp abeŋ.’
Paŋmuwukbi Agabus da gen yagɨt uŋun nandaŋek notni Judia mɨktɨmon egɨpgwit paŋpulugok do yawit. Yaŋek amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ moneŋ taŋ yomgwit da tɨlagon paŋmuwukgwit.
Gɨldatno tagɨ paŋmuwukbi uŋun bamot da yutnon muwukgaŋ uŋun do yomni. Gɨldatno tagɨ notnosi Epenetus do ɨmni. Uŋun da mibɨltok Esia Provinskon Kristo do nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgut.
Nak da Juda amɨn yoyɨko iyɨ dakon gen tebani kɨnda yapmak do aŋek abɨdamaŋ yaŋ nayɨwit. Mani gen yaŋ ɨmgwit uŋun koko yo madep dɨma agɨt. Rom amɨn nin da si aŋatno kɨmotjak bo ae dam tebanon yɨpneŋ da arɨpmon gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma agɨt.
Yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu do gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin dɨma nandamaŋ.” Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nakyo kɨsi namɨn da pi uŋun abeŋ do yaŋ mudaŋ namgut uŋun dɨma dayɨkeŋ.”
Mani yaŋsi nandaki, mibɨ bɨsapmon jɨgɨ morapmɨ yokwisi da noman tokdaŋ.
Nandani. Gak kokup kɨdat do yo bamɨ dɨma yaŋ nandaŋek kokup kɨdat gawak yomyom yutnon wɨgɨ jap uŋun naŋaki notgo dɨma noknogɨ yaŋ nandɨsak amɨn kɨnda da gandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun yo kɨsi burɨ pɨdaŋban jap uŋun kokup kɨdat do parekbi uŋun nokdɨsak.
Mani goman uŋun sopsop dakon moneŋ uŋun da arɨpmon dɨma taŋ ɨmgut. Do kɨla amɨn madep da uŋun amɨn gat gwakni gat oman amɨn egakwa tomni do amɨn da moneŋ ɨba gomani sopjak do yagɨt. Ae yo morapni yumaŋ naŋ mudaŋek uŋun dakon moneŋ baŋ goman sopjak do amɨn tagɨni da gen tebai yagɨt.
Kɨlɨ uŋun da kwenon nandaŋapbo Kwen Kokupgwan da amɨn kɨnda da madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Abɨsok Piŋkopnin da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkdak. Tapmɨmni altaŋ teŋteŋaŋakwan kɨla amɨn madep yɨkdak. Aŋakwan Kristoni man madepni gat ae tapmɨmni gat abɨsok tɨmɨkdak. Nido, notnin gen yaŋ yomɨsak amɨn abɨsok aŋelo da kɨlɨ maba pɨgɨk. Uŋun gɨldat kalba ae kalbiyo Piŋkopnin da ɨŋamon gen yaŋ yomgut.
Amɨn morap Monjɨgo da kɨla asak do yaŋ mudaŋ ɨmgul. Yaŋdo, amɨn morap ɨmɨsal uŋun da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni tagɨ yomjak.
Uŋun da kwenon Yesu kokup pap ae kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ tawit uŋudon agek Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Yabekbi 12 kabɨ kɨsi agɨpgwit.
Mɨŋat bamot kɨŋakwal obip amɨn dɨwarɨ tɨp kɨnam dakon kɨla awit uŋun da kokup papmon kɨŋ mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ yo morap altawit uŋun dakon gen morap yoyɨŋ mudawit.
Yaŋban kɨla amɨni gen uŋun nandaŋ kɨŋ mibɨltok amɨni yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ma, on amɨn Rom amɨn kɨnda. Gak niaŋsi akdɨsal?”
Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, babɨknin Aisak da Rebeka paŋek monji yayat paŋalagɨt.
Mɨŋat amɨn morap ji nandani. Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ mɨŋat amɨn morap ji nak dakon gen do mɨrak yopni.
Yaŋdo, ji but tobɨl aŋek Piŋkopmon gadaŋba yokwisi mudoni.
Mɨktɨmon egɨpbeŋ bɨsapmon Yawe dakon mani aŋkɨsikeŋ. Piŋkopno do kap yaŋek aŋkɨsiŋ wɨgek kɨmokgeŋ.
Gen paŋteban agak dakon aŋpak uŋun yaŋ. Amɨn kɨnda da manon gen yaŋ aŋteban aŋ kaŋ, uŋun amɨn wukwisi ae iyɨ yapmaŋdak yaŋ yolɨsak. Amɨn kɨnda gen yaŋ aŋteban ak asak kaŋ, uŋun da geni aŋteban aŋakwan amɨn geni abɨŋ yɨp do nandayɨŋ amɨn dakon gen kositni sopmaŋ yomɨsak.
Mani abɨsok Piŋkop kɨlɨ nandaŋ ɨmeŋ. Bo yaŋsi yokeŋ kaŋ tagɨ, Piŋkop da ji kɨlɨ nandaŋ damgut. Do ji nido ae tobɨl kɨŋek wup yokwi tapmɨmɨ mɨnisi yo ɨsalɨ uŋuden uŋun dakon oman monjɨ egɨp do nandaŋ?
Kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamokon da mal dakon teŋteŋɨ da yamgwit. Aŋakwa nandaŋapbo wuwɨk madepsi noman taŋakwa kɨrɨrɨŋ agɨt. Kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamo noman da kalɨŋ 7 kabɨ sowit. Kalɨŋ uŋun Piŋkop dakon wupni 7 kabɨ.
yaŋ gɨn gak da sɨkak mal kɨrɨrɨŋyo madepsi yɨpbɨ abɨŋek uŋun amɨn kabɨ yolban pasal kɨni. Ae uŋun da pasolni do mɨrɨm madepsi yɨpbɨ kɨsak.
Yo ni da gen teban yapyap amɨn kosit sopmaŋ ɨmɨŋakwan tepmɨ dɨma noman tosok uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ. Ni bɨsapmon noman togɨ uŋun bɨsapmonsi noman tokdɨsak.
Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek egɨpni.
Gen tebango do nandaŋ gadasat. Do nandak nandak gat ae gen kokwin tagɨsi agak dakon nandak nandak do nayɨŋ dekgi.
Piŋkop da nin tɨmɨk yɨk yawot kokupmon paŋkɨk do yaŋ teban tok agɨt. Do nin si pasalek kaŋ kɨmotneŋ, Piŋkop da jikon amɨn kɨnda uŋun kokupmon arɨpmɨ dɨma kɨkdɨsak yaŋ kɨnda dɨ kaŋban.
Jems da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Do nak yaŋ nandɨsat, Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ but tobɨl aŋek Piŋkopmon kwaŋ uŋun nin da jɨgɨ dɨma yomneŋ do nandɨsat.
Mani dɨma. Gak tedepmɨ yaŋgok egɨsal. Gak tedepmɨsi dɨma ae mɨrɨmɨsi yo dɨma. Yaŋ do aŋek gen kaganokon da gak wandɨtdɨsat.
Amɨn da Yesu burɨkon koŋ kɨnda egɨsak yaŋ yawit uŋun do aŋek gen uŋun yagɨt.
Gen yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ dɨma yoni. Amɨn alegɨ tagɨ paŋteban ani dakon gen baŋgɨn yoni. Gen uŋuden nandaŋ amɨn uŋun dakon butni paŋteban asak.
Nak tepmɨ madepsi pakdɨsat. Butno jɨk tosok, do pako dagosak dosi nandɨsat.
Yaŋ abo Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ morap naga do kɨlɨ manjɨgɨm uŋun da Amɨn Tagɨni nak wɨsɨni.” ’ Gen uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ da kalɨpsigwan kɨlɨ yagɨt.”
Mani nak butji pabo pɨsaŋakwa gen dɨwarɨ aesi nandani do gen dɨwarɨ tebaisi baŋ mandaŋ damɨsat. Nido Piŋkop da nandaŋ yawok namɨŋek
“Mani babɨknin Moses dakon gen nandaŋ guramɨt do dɨma galak tawit. Geni maba kɨŋakwan burɨkon da Isip mɨktɨmon tobɨl kɨk do nandawit.
Yawe da wasok agɨt uŋun pɨndakgwit. Tap ɨlarɨsikon wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨt uŋun pɨndakgwit.
Yesu pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda do kɨŋ altaŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da but dasi abɨdawit, nido uŋun do jomjom aŋek egɨpgwit.
Saŋbek saŋbek uŋun kalɨp Isip mɨktɨmon babɨkni kɨsitnikon da tɨmɨk paŋapgum bɨsapmon saŋbek saŋbek agɨm uŋudeŋ dɨma abeŋ. Nido nak da saŋbek saŋbek agɨm dakon gen dɨma guramɨkgwit, do nak da manji yomgum.
Yawe da mɨŋat amɨnyo dakon nandak nandakni paŋtagap aban yo madep madep agɨt uŋun do sigɨn nandaŋek ekwaŋ. Yawe bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ nandaŋ yawok nimɨŋek nin do bupmɨ nandɨsak.
Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn on bɨsapmon ekwaŋ uŋun amɨn yokwisi gɨn. Piŋkop dakon pi naŋ asat yaŋ nandak do wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda kok do yoŋ. Mani kɨnda dɨma kokdaŋ. Kombɨ amɨn Jona dakon tɨlak naŋgɨn kokdaŋ.
Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ mɨŋat pɨndak galak taŋek yumabi aŋpak ak do nandaŋ. Yokwi agak dakon galagɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma aba mudogɨ. Nandaŋ gadatni dɨma teban taŋbi amɨn uŋun paŋgalak aŋek ɨlɨk paŋgwa yokwi aŋ. Ae pɨndak galaktok dakon aŋpak do pakyaŋsi nandaŋ. Piŋkop da uŋun amɨn obɨsi paŋtasɨk akdɨsak.
Gen dayɨgɨm uŋun do nandani, ‘Oman monjɨ amɨn tagɨni dɨma yapmaŋgaŋ.’ Nak yokwi aŋnamgwit kaŋ, jiyo kɨsi yokwi yaŋ gɨn aŋdamdaŋ. Ae nak dakon gen guramɨkgwit kaŋ, ji dakon gen kɨsi guramɨtdaŋ.
Mani Pol da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak dam tebanon nepni do tagɨ nandɨsat. Ae Jerusalem Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu da man do kɨmokgeŋ do tagɨ nandɨsat. Do ji nido nak aŋgolgol aŋek kunam takgaŋ? Yaŋ aŋakwa butno yokwi tosok.”
Timoti, monjɨno, gak do kombɨ gen yawit, nak uŋun do nandaŋek gak da yo abi uŋun do gayɨkdɨsat. Kombɨ gen uŋun da gak aŋteban aŋakwan aŋpak yokwi pabɨŋ yop do emat abi.
Saimon Pita, ae Tomas (Yayat yaŋ iyɨwit), ae Nataniel (Galili mɨktɨm, Kana kokupmon nani kɨnda), ae Sebedi dakon monji bamot gat, ae Yesu dakon paŋdetni bamorɨ gat kɨsi egɨpgwit.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Jon abɨŋek jap morapmɨ dɨma nagɨt, ae wain dɨma nagɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan, ‘Koŋni toŋ’ yaŋ yawit.
Amɨn pi aŋek tomni tɨmɨkgaŋ uŋun do but galak dakon yo yaŋ dɨma yomaŋ. Uŋun tomni tɨmɨkgaŋ yaŋ yomaŋ.
Asi, yokwinin da nindapba kɨmak mudagɨmaŋ. Nin amɨn wagɨl kɨmakbi da tɨlak egɨpgumaŋ, mani Piŋkop dakon bupmɨni uŋun tugok tugogɨsi, ae nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimgut. Aban Kristo gat kɨsi egɨp egɨp abɨdagɨmaŋ. Asi, Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni do aŋek ji yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgɨt.
Yaŋ yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Sunduk uŋun Kwen Kokup da mal da yaŋ maŋban kagɨm.
Ji uwalji do dɨma pasolni. Uwalji do dɨma pasolni kaŋ uŋun da yaŋ yolɨsak: Piŋkop da ji yokwikon baŋ pulugaŋ depdɨsak, mani uwalji si pasɨldaŋ.
Wɨli kɨnda da mɨŋat kɨnda pasak kaŋ, mɨŋat uŋun iyɨ do pasak. Paŋakwan wɨli dakon notni da agek mɨrak yopmaŋek geni nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk asak. Abɨsok kɨsɨk kɨsɨk da nak da buron tugosok.
Aŋakwan Parisi amɨn da kɨŋ “Niaŋ aŋek Yesu aŋatneŋ?” yaŋon da gen paŋkosit awit.
Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Dat da yo morap ak do bɨsap manjɨgɨt uŋun ji dakon yo dɨma. Dat da yo morap uŋun iyɨ kɨla asak.
Mani, nak tapmɨm madepgo do kap yokeŋ. Wɨsa dagokdo but dasi galak taŋ namɨsal, uŋun do nandaŋek kap yokeŋ. Nido, kalɨp jɨgɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ noman taŋ namgwit bɨsapmon tagɨsi aŋkutnagɨl, aŋek dam tebano arɨpmɨ dɨma tuwɨlɨ egɨpgul.
Yaŋban Yesu da Pita yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Sunduk gak nepmaŋ det! Kosit sopsop dɨma aŋnam. Gak Piŋkop dakon nandak nandak naŋ dɨma yoldal, gak amɨn dakon nandak nandak naŋ yoldal.”
Uŋun da nandɨsak, nak gulusuŋno mɨni. Kosit agɨpgum uŋun kɨla tebai aŋek yokwi kɨnda dɨma agɨm.
Aŋakwa papia gɨroŋɨk yopmaŋgamaŋ, uŋun da tɨlagon kundu si kɨŋ pasɨlgɨt. Aŋakwan kabap gat ae tap binap mɨktɨm tɨm toŋ uŋun tamoni yopmaŋ degek duwalɨk kɨwit.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak naga wain nap obɨsi. Ae Datno uŋun wain pi dakon kɨla amɨn.
Bɨsap kɨnda uŋun gat egek yaŋsi ani do yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Jerusalem kokup pap dɨma yɨpmaŋ detni. Datno da yo dam do yaŋ teban tagɨt uŋun abɨdok do jomjom ani. Nak kalɨp yo uŋun do kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm.
Aŋpakgo tagɨsi uŋun dakon geni yaŋek kapmon da aŋpakgo kɨlegɨsi uŋun do yoni.
Yaŋban paŋdetni da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Amɨn da gadat gadat tebaisi aŋakwa namɨn da ɨgayɨŋ namɨsak yaŋ nido yosol?”
Yesu da Galili Pakbi Ɨdap kɨdɨpmɨŋ agek tap kɨlap do pi agak amɨn bamorɨ pɨndakgɨt. Kɨnda uŋun mani Saimon (ae mani kɨnda Pita), uŋun gat ae padɨge Andru gat pɨndakgɨt. Uŋun amɨn bamot tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni pakbi ɨdapgwan mabal pɨgakwan egɨpgumal.
Uŋuden amɨn gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma aŋ. Yawe dakon aŋpak baŋgɨn yolgaŋ.
Gak aŋpak kɨnda do tagɨsi agagɨ yaŋ nandɨsal kaŋ, kaŋ kɨmokgi. Uŋun aŋpak do aŋek notgo aŋupbal abɨ amɨn da aŋpak uŋun do aŋpak yokwi yaŋ dɨ yaŋbam.
Jɨgɨni toŋ amɨn paŋpulugaŋek amɨn da pabɨŋ yopmaŋgaŋ amɨn uŋun paŋenakban tagɨsi ekwaŋ.
Gak pɨdaŋ at. Gak nak dakon oman aki do aŋek manjɨŋ gep do altaŋ gamɨsat. Gak abɨsok yo pɨndakdal, ae yo don golɨko pɨndatgi uŋun dakon yaŋ teŋteŋok abi do manjɨŋ gepmaŋdat.
Gen gayɨsat uŋun asi Piŋkop da bɨsap yɨpgut uŋun bɨsapmon noman tokdɨsak, mani nandabɨ bamɨ dɨma asak, do gen yogok kositgo sopmaŋakwan gen dɨmasi yaŋek egɨ wɨgaki gen gayɨsat uŋun bamɨ noman tokdɨsak.”
Mani amɨn morap tebaisi sigɨn agakwa wɨgɨ mibɨ bɨsapmon wɨgɨsak uŋun Piŋkop da pulugaŋ yopdɨsak.
Nak oman amɨngo, do nandak nandak namɨŋaki gengo do tagɨ nandabo pɨsosak.
Kɨsirɨ amɨn tet da gɨk 7 kabɨ tɨmɨkgɨt. Ae emat agak sɨba geni terɨ terɨ ae geni tepmɨsi uŋun gen kaganigwan da pawɨŋ tagɨt. Gɨldat da tebaisi wɨsɨsak uŋudeŋ tomno dabɨlni madepsi teŋteŋagɨt.
Pita gat Jon gat da Samaria amɨn Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨmal. Ae Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi aŋyoban kagɨmal uŋunyo kɨsi yoyɨgɨmal. Yoyɨŋ mudaŋek Jerusalem kokup papmon aeni kɨgɨmal. Kosiron kɨŋek Samaria dakon kokup morap tawit uŋudon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨmal.
“Sot yokwisi kɨnda da abɨdak, do pokdok tamokon da arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨdosak.”
Yawe da aŋpulugosak do aŋek yaŋ tɨdaŋapbo nandaŋ namgut. Yawe da bɨsitno nandagɨt.
Aŋakwa Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak Datno dakon pi tagɨsi morapmɨ ji dolɨk do aŋapbo pɨndakgwit. Uŋun pi agɨmgwan ni pi naŋ agɨm do nandaŋek tɨpbaŋ nɨt do aŋ?”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji on mɨktɨmon yo tagɨsi paŋmuwut do nandak nandak dɨma ani. Uŋun yo monɨŋ da nokdaŋ, ae maŋut maŋut akdaŋ, ae kabo noknok da yutji tuwɨlek paŋkɨsɨbɨkdaŋ.
Tap wakga dakon pi monjɨ uŋun niaŋ aŋek tap wakga tayaŋgok yɨpmaŋ degek gɨptɨmnin paŋkutnoneŋ yaŋon da kosit wusɨk awit. Do bot monɨŋɨ wɨtdalba pɨgakwan kɨrat madep tap wakga abɨdaŋban akgaŋ uŋun tomnikon da yopno pɨgɨni yaŋ top yoyɨwit.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn da lam koleŋ kwoba naŋ dɨma wutjɨŋba toŋ, bo ae dɨpmɨn potpot tamo da mibɨlgwan dɨma yopmaŋgaŋ. Noman tamokon yopmaŋakwa amɨn da yutnon wɨŋek teŋteŋɨ uŋun koŋ.
Gen morapgo uŋun bamɨsi gɨn. Nawa gen morapgo kɨlegɨsi uŋun toktogɨsi taŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdaŋ.
Pɨlɨndo gɨldat da pɨgɨsak uŋun da arɨpmon egɨp egɨpno bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok gɨn. Nak joŋ da kɨbɨdoŋ uŋun yombem.
Os da nin dakon galaktok yolek kosit agɨpni do gen kaganikon ain tɨm yopmaŋgamaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek gɨptɨmni kɨsi ɨlɨgapno nin dakon galaktok yolek akwaŋ.
Abɨŋek uŋun oman monjɨ tepmɨ pi ɨmɨŋek yɨpban jamba but amɨn gat kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋ tɨdaŋek egɨpdaŋ.”
Asi, Yawe do pasalek ekwaŋ amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ ani.
Amɨn kɨnda uŋuden amɨn gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ iyɨsak kaŋ, aŋpulugaŋban pi yokwini kɨsi da amal.
Nin Yawe dakon man toktogɨsi awɨgɨ kɨmotneŋ. Uŋun asi.
Kweŋ pɨsoŋek aŋkɨsini. Gita mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ tɨdaŋek aŋkɨsini.
“Yaŋ yaŋban iyɨwit, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, uŋun amɨn moneŋ tabɨlni 10 kabɨ kɨlɨ tɨmak!’
Wɨsa dɨma dagaŋakwan pɨdaŋek aŋpulugoki do yaŋ tɨdosot. Gen tebango da nak tagɨ aŋpulugosak yaŋ nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom asat.
Benjamin dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo kaloŋɨsok da mibɨltok kwaŋ. Ae Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn gat ae mɨŋat amɨnyo gat Benjamin dakon amɨn kabɨ baŋ yolgaŋ. Aŋakwa Sebulan gat Naptali gat dakon kɨla amɨn buŋon yolgaŋ.
Mɨŋat monjɨyono, ji Piŋkop dakon amɨn kabɨ ekwaŋ. Wup jikon egɨsak uŋun da wup yokwi mɨktɨm amɨnon pi asak uŋun yapmaŋdak, do ji kombɨ amɨn toptopmɨ uŋun kɨlɨ pabɨŋ yopgwit.
Mani ji da yaŋ yokdaŋ, “Nin da kɨndap obikon saŋbeneŋ do aŋek kɨlɨŋɨ uŋun Piŋkop da paŋsanɨkgɨt.”
Piŋkop dakon galak tok dɨma yolyolɨ dakon gen morap manji yobi. Gen uŋuden da amɨn ɨlɨk paŋpaŋ Piŋkop dakon kosit da dubagɨkonsi sigɨn paŋkɨkdaŋ.
Nin Juda amɨn kabɨkon da altagɨmaŋ. Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ yokwi pakpak kabɨkon da dɨma altagɨmaŋ.
“Kombɨ amɨn morap gat ae gen teban papia kɨsi da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Akdɨsak uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋaŋakwa wɨŋ Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok pini wasagɨt bɨsapmon wɨgɨt. Jon da Piŋkop dakon gen wasaŋek yagɨron da wɨŋ abɨsok ekwamaŋon Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨlani Ak do pi madepsi asak. Aŋakwan amɨn da uŋun kɨrɨŋɨt do pi madep aŋ. Yaŋ aŋek emat jɨgɨyo morapmɨsi paŋalon aŋ.
Egakwal Pol Atens kokup papmon pɨgɨ altaŋek iyɨ gat pɨgɨwit amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji tobɨl Beria wɨgɨ Timoti gat Sailas gat yoyɨŋba tepmɨ pɨnjil.” Yaŋ yoyɨŋban wɨgɨwit.
Yesu Telagɨ Yut Madepmon egakwan amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni ae kandapmɨ yokwi uŋudon opba paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Piŋkop dakon gen teban da kɨmot aŋalon agɨt. Piŋkop da uŋun gen teban tɨpmon mandagɨt bɨsapmon tɨlɨmni madepsi gat kɨsi noman tagɨt. Do mibɨltok Moses dakon tomno dabɨlni madepsi teŋteŋagɨt, aban Israel amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma kokogɨ agɨt, ae don teŋteŋɨ uŋun yawokgɨt.
Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap noknok bɨsap dɨma altaŋakwan Yesu on mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋek Daron wɨgɨkdɨsat dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ kwaŋ tosok yaŋ nandagɨt. Yesu on mɨktɨmon paŋdetni egɨpgwit uŋun do but dasi galak taŋ yomgut. Sigɨn yaŋ gɨn nandaŋ yomɨŋakwan wɨgɨ bɨsapni mudagɨt.
nido kalɨp Piŋkop da yo wagɨl tagɨsi nin kɨsi da tɨmɨtneŋ do nandaŋ kokwin kɨlɨ agɨt. Kalɨp egɨpgwit amɨn gat ae nin gat kɨsi bɨsap kaloŋ gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi egɨpneŋ do nandagɨt.
Gen teban kalɨpmɨ uŋun Liwai amɨn dagɨn mukwa sogok amɨn dagoni uŋun Piŋkop da kɨlɨ wɨrɨrɨk mudagɨt, nido gen teban uŋun tapmɨmɨ mɨni ae uŋun da nin arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋpulugogɨ.
Amɨn da gen uŋun nandaŋek yawit, “Yaŋ kaŋ, namɨn da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdosak?”
Yesu gen uŋun yaŋakwan muwut muwut yut dakon kɨla amɨn Jairus da yutnon da amɨn kɨnda apgut. Abɨŋek Jairus yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gwago kɨlɨ kuŋwak, do yoyɨŋdet ɨsal dogɨn dɨma iyɨŋbɨ kɨsak.”
“Yaŋ nayɨŋban nak da wasaŋek yaŋapbo Telagɨ Wup ninon mibɨltok pɨgɨt uŋun amɨn kabɨkon yaŋ gɨn pɨgɨt.
Ae amɨn uŋun tɨlak agɨt uŋunyo kɨsi yaŋ yomgut. Ae amɨn uŋun yaŋ yomgut uŋun mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨlegɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt. Ae amɨn uŋun kɨlegɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt uŋun tɨlɨmni yomgut.
Burɨ pɨsaŋba tɨp kɨnamon da tobɨl kɨŋek yo pɨndak nandaŋyo awit uŋun yabekbi 11 kabɨ gat, ae amɨn dɨwarɨ gat kɨsi yoyɨwit.
Kɨlɨ nak Piŋkop aŋkɨsisat. Tapmɨmni madepsi, do kɨlasi aŋakwan arɨpmɨ dɨma mokdaŋ. Uŋun da tɨmɨk paŋkɨ depban iyɨ gat tɨlɨmnikon egek gulusuŋji mɨni ae kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi taŋ damdɨsak.
Not kabɨno, amɨn da yokwi aŋ damni kaŋ, yokwi kobogɨ dɨma aŋ yomni. Piŋkop da butjap nandaŋ yomjak do bɨkbɨk ɨmni. Nido Piŋkop gen papiakon Amɨn Tagɨ da yaŋ yosok: “Kobogɨ yomyom uŋun nak dakon pi. Yo yokwi awit dakon kobogɨ nak da naga yomdɨsat.”
(Barabas uŋun kalɨp amɨn kɨnda aŋakban kɨmakgɨt, ae Jerusalem kokup papmon Rom gapman gat emat wamgwit, uŋun do dam tebanon yɨpgwit.)
Amɨn morap nak do nandaŋek yutni, notni, sami, meŋi, datni, mɨŋat monjɨyoni, ae jap pini yopmaŋ detni, uŋun yo morapni kosirɨ 100 yaŋ tɨmɨk tɨmɨk akdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokdaŋ.
Yaŋ aŋek gen yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Nak dakon yut uŋun mɨŋat amɨnyo da abɨŋ bɨsit aŋnamni do tosok.’ Mani ji da kulabɨk aba ‘kabo noknok dakon pasɨlɨ tamo’ yombem asak.”
Jikon amɨn dɨ nak da yabekgo opgwit, uŋun kabɨkon da kɨnda da galaktokni yolni do pasɨlɨkon da ji paŋkɨlɨgek yo kabɨsi tɨmɨkgwit, ma?
Gen uŋun yoyɨŋakwan Datni do yosok yaŋ dɨma nandawit,
Yut morap kaloŋ kaloŋ amɨn da awalgwit, mani Piŋkop da yo morap wasagɨt.
Kokup kɨdat dakon wup uŋun gen kagani toŋ, mani gen arɨpmɨ dɨma yoni. Dabɨlni toŋ mani arɨpmɨ dɨma sɨŋtoni.
Yaŋban iyɨgɨmal, “Kɨŋ dukwan paŋkosit andeŋ do nandɨsal?”
Aŋek gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn dɨ uŋun Parisi kabɨkon nani uŋun da pɨdaŋ agek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit, “On amɨn gulusuŋni mɨnisi komaŋ. Wup bo aŋelo kɨnda da gen bo iyɨgɨt? Uŋun dɨma nandamaŋ.”
Pol, bo Apolos, bo Pita, bo on mɨktɨm, bo egɨp egɨp, bo kɨmot, bo yo morap abɨsok toŋ, bo yo don noman tokdaŋ, uŋun yo morap ji dakon.
Uŋun da kwenon Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Judia mɨktɨmon kɨwit. Paŋkɨ paŋdetni gat egek amɨn telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomgut.
Uŋun da Juda amɨn dakon gen teban gat ae gen tebani monɨŋ monɨŋ dɨwarɨ morap gat kɨsi wɨrɨrɨk mudagɨt. Uŋun da amɨn kabi bamorɨ paŋmuwukban amɨn kaloŋɨ kɨnda kalugɨ asak uŋun do aŋek yaŋ agɨt. Yaŋ aban but kaloŋ agɨmaŋ.
Sunduk da paŋkewal morap uŋun aŋ mudaŋek ae bɨsap kɨndakon don aŋkewalgeŋ yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu yɨpmaŋ kɨgɨt.
Nak kɨŋ ji dakon tamo paŋnoman aŋek, aeno tobɨl abɨŋ ji tɨmɨkgo paŋkɨ nak gat egɨpneŋ.
Yaŋ kaŋek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Dɨma pudoneŋ. Namɨn da abɨdosak yaŋ do satu wasok aneŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋek yaŋ gɨn aba Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun bamɨ toŋ agɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Ɨmalno kokwinɨgek tɨmɨkgwit, ae namɨn da paba pɨgɨkno abɨdosak yaŋ do satu wasok awit.” Do emat amɨn da yaŋ awit.
Ji bamɨ morapmɨsi taŋba amɨn da dandaba nak dakon paŋdetnosi akdaŋ. Yaŋ aba Datno da man madep pakdɨsak.
Nak Jon, ji dakon notji. Nin Yesu dakon amɨn kabɨ, ae Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun da kagagwan kaloŋɨ ekwamaŋ, do but yaworon da jɨgɨ ae tepmɨyo kaloŋɨ pamaŋ. Paŋek kɨsin da dɨma alek taŋek tebai akgamaŋ. Nak Piŋkop dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek, “Nak Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨsat” yaŋ yagɨm, do aŋek nak abɨdaŋ tap binap mɨktɨm tɨm Patmos uŋudon nepgwit da egɨsat.
Asi, nin butninon da topmɨ mɨni egɨpneŋ do nandɨsal. Do gak da nandaŋ kokwingo tagɨsi butnokon nayɨŋ dekgi do nandɨsat.
Uŋun da pɨŋ pi aban mɨktɨm amɨn morap aŋpak yokwi gat, ae aŋpak kɨlegɨ gat, ae Piŋkop da amɨn gen pikon yopdɨsak gat dakon mibɨlɨ kɨsi pakyaŋsi nandaba pɨsokdɨsak.
Jiyo yaŋ gɨn, Piŋkop da oman morap ani do dayɨgɨt uŋun aŋ mudaŋek yaŋ gɨn yoni, ‘Nin oman monjɨ do, ɨsal pinin gɨn amaŋ.’ ”
